43002005	Ma 'iyamo Yesuina sinana topaihowao 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Yesu 'enana wahesagohe , 'eguma to'aha nuwanuwana tuwa wada paihowa . ”
43002006	Tupwaina 'oina we'aha 'adi we'aha patu 'adi baibaiwa sikisi sitotoholo , da'ule 'oidiyega sipaihowediya . Taudi sowasowahidi ma we'aha madouna 'oidiyega silohemahadi , meYudiya mumugadiyega 'idi 'ebe deudeula weyahidi .
43002007	Coinega Yesu topaihowaedi 'ihegwaediya ma we'aha patuwedi gaugaulidimo we'ahega silohemahediya ta mabwaiyadi simaha .
43002008	Ma wete 'ihegwaediya ma we'aha patuwedi 'oidiyega we'aha tupwadi sigoidiya ma sitauyediya haiina toni wagana 'oina .
43002009	Coinega hehaiina toni wagana we'ahedi 'inuma tohodiya , ta 'adi 'amna bwebwe'ana . Weyahina we'ahedi 'ihemala waini pwaiya , tuwa waini moisa . Beno 'oina hehaiina toni waganaina geya 'isanapu ta'ehega waini bewa si'eweya , benomo topaihowaedi sisanapuya . Eema hehaiina toni wagana tohai loheyana 'ihegwae gahuweya
43002010	'igwae , “ Togidega ta waini bewa bwebwe'ana ne'abwega tuwa 'abwa 'ulagu latuheyama ? Ma hesi 'uda sanapu 'abehega tauda mumugada beno waini bwebwe'ana ta'ebwae nugetedi tomota 'oidiya 'abwa muliyetega waini galana . ”
43002011	Beno Yesu 'ina 'ila'ilala waiwaina 'ihegaine nugeteya 'asa Kena 'oina , beno Galili tupwaina , ma 'ihe'itaeya tomota 'oidiya , ma wetenuge 'ina waiwai si'iteya , 'oinega 'ana tomuliyao sihemisaeya .
43002012	Hehaiina 'igumwala , ma Yesu sinana ma tasinao ma wete 'ana tomuliyao mahetenao sisuluwa Kapaneumi 'oina . Beno 'oina simiyamiya tupwana sabwelo 'oidiya .
43002013	MeYudiya 'idi Hataona Guyaina 'ana tuta 'i'ehohoya , ma Yesu 'ihaneya Yelusalema ,
43002014	Yehoba 'ina Hada He'asisi 'oina 'iluhuwa ma tohegimwane 'i'itediya sihehegimwane . Tohegimwaneyedi beno bulumakau ma sipi ma wete gabubu sihehegimwaneyedi hadainaina 'oina . Mane 'adi tohe'ebwaya hila wete 'i'itediya 'idi 'ebelagu hatahatala deina simiyamiya .
43002015	Coinega Yesu balae 'i'eweya ma 'oinega tohegimwaneyedi ma 'idi hebahebaiyao Yehoba 'ina hada 'oinega 'ipa'idiya . Mane 'adi tohe'ebwaya hilao 'idi 'ebe lagu hatahatala wete 'i'ahu peinediya ma 'idi mane 'ihabiya biyaunediya .
43002016	Ma wete gabubu 'adi tohegimwane 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Cimi bwasumowao wa'ahalidi ma hada bewa 'oinega walatu , sahena Tamagu 'ina hada wahehemohomoho ma 'abehega 'imi 'ebe gimwane . ”
43002017	Cana tomuliyao si'e'ebubu ma Yehoba 'ina buki 'ina hepwaila sinuwatuhu yahiya beno 'igwaeya , “ Yehoba yo , 'ino hada tobwebwe'ana 'iya , ma nuwagu 'i'eweya . ”
43002018	Muliyetega meYudiya 'idi tohanugetao sitauya Yesu sihesilaleya sigwae , “ To 'ila'ilala nata 'oinega 'uhe'itemai ma 'oinega 'asanapu to loina 'oinega ginaula bewa 'upaipaihowadi ? ”
43002019	Coinega Yesu 'enadi 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Hada bewa 'eguma waligehi , nata sawasawahigu sabwelo 'etoi 'oidiya yahetoholo hila . ”
43002020	Ma 'iyamo taudi sigwaeya , sigwae , “ Hada bewa sabwelo 'etoi 'oidiya 'uhetoholo hila ? Ma hesi 'uda sanapu 'abehega hada bewa bolime poti sikisi 'oidiya si'abi'abi . ”
43002021	Ma hesi Yesu geya hada moisana weyahina 'ihehegwaegwae , ma 'iboi tuwa wahina weyahina 'ihegwaegwaeya .
43002022	Muliyetega Yesu 'amasa 'oinega 'itoholo hila ee 'abwa 'ana tomuliyaedi 'ina gwaeina 'oidiya sinuwatuhuya , 'oinega Yehoba 'ina hepwailina bukiina 'oina ma wete Yesuina 'ina gwaeyedi 'abwa hesi sihemisa bwaibwainidiya .
43002023	Tutaina 'oina Yesu Hataona Guyaina 'oina 'imiyamiya . Ma boda mabwaiyadi 'ina paihowa waiwaina si'iteya , 'oinega sihemisaeya 'abehega tauna tuwa To'abihetenaina .
43002024	Ma hesiyage bodaedi Yesu geya 'ihemisaedi . Weyahina 'idi nuwatuhu mabwaiyana 'isanapu nugetediya .
43002025	Coinega geya 'eta taiya sawasawahina ma boda weyahidi 'ihegwaegwae Yesu 'oina , weyahina Yesu boda mabwaiyadi 'idi nuwatuhu 'atediya simiyamiya 'isanasanapudi .
43003001	Loheya 'aigeda sanina Nikodimo , tauna Palisi 'idi boda 'aigeda . Ma wete tauna meYudiya 'adi tohanugeta .
43003002	Loheyainaina nihuwanega 'itauya Yesu 'oina ma 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Cinapwana , 'asanapuya 'owa tohe'itaina Yehoba 'oinega 'utauyama . Weyahina geya 'eta taiya 'ina paihowa waiwaina 'owa gidemusa 'eguma Yehoba geya mahetena . ”
43003003	Coinega Yesu Nikodimo 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oiuwa , 'eguma geya'abwa 'uli'u hila , geya'abwa wete Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'u'ita'ita . ”
43003004	Ma Nikodimo Yesu 'ihesilaleya 'igwae , “ Togidega ma taugu loheya madougu ma 'abehega sinagu gamwanega yali'u hila ? Ma moisa tuwa , geya sawasawahigu ma sinagu gamwana yaluhu ma 'ihenatune hilegau . ”
43003005	Coinega Yesu Nikodimo 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oiuwa , 'eguma geya'abwa we'aha ma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'oidiyega 'uli'uli'u hila , nata geya'abwa wete Yehoba 'ina 'ebe loina 'oina 'uluhuluhu .
43003006	Tomota natudiyao sili'u tomota moisa . Ma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'oinega yaluyaluwamo 'ihenatune .
43003007	“ Coinega sahena nuwau 'ihehenainaida weyahina yahegwaegowa 'abehega 'ihenatune hilago .
43003008	Yaumai 'ina towa wete gidemusa , 'eguma ta'ehega nuwanuwana ma 'oinega 'itowa , nata tuwa wete 'oinega 'itowama . Ta yaumai nata moisa 'enadi tahesagohedi , ma hesi geya tasanapu ta'ehega yaumai 'ihaha'esama , nuwana to'eha 'itautauya . Ceda 'aigedanaina wete gidemusa 'eguma taiyawedi Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ihenatunedi . ”
43003009	Coinega Nikodimo Yesu 'ihesilala hileya 'igwae , “ To'aha 'ino gwaeina 'ana sanapu ? ”
43003010	Ma Yesu Nikodimo 'enana 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Cowa 'aigeda meIsileli 'idi tohanugeta madouna . Ma to'aha weyahina 'igu gwae bewa 'oiuwa geya 'usanapu ?
43003011	Ma yagwae moisa 'oiuwa 'abehega bewa tuwa 'ahehegwae bwaibwainigomi to'aha gidemusa 'asanapudiya ma 'a'itediya . Ma hesi 'ima gwaeyedi geya wada hesagohediya ma nuwana wada hemisaediya .
43003012	Ceguma bale'u weyahina 'ahehepwaila ma geya wada hemisaediya , togidega nata galewa 'ina 'ebe loina wasanapu 'ese tutaina 'eguma galewa weyahina 'ahegwaegwae 'oimiya ?
43003013	Coimiyega geya 'eta taiya wete galewa 'oina 'ihane tohona , yaboi Loheyaiguina sowasowagu , weyahina galewega yasulu nugetama .
43003014	“ Mwalona gidemusa tubudao 'oidiya yoho 'awawa sitautauya ma Mosese mwata pwawati 'oinega 'ipaihoweya ma 'aiwe 'oinega 'i'abi haneheya ma 'oinega tubudaowedi lema silobeya . Coinega taugu 'abwa nata wete 'aiwe 'oina si'abi hanehegau ,
43003015	ma taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma wahemisaegauwa , nata yawasi miyamiya hatayana waloba .
43003016	Comi tomiya bale'u Yehoba 'ihelauwegomiya sinabwana , 'oinega taugu natunaina 'aigeda tuwa 'itagwalegauwa 'oimiya , ma 'oinega taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma wahemisaegau , geya'abwa wahehesilae , ma hesi yawasimi miyamiya hatayana waloba .
43003017	Ta Yehobaina natunaina taugu 'ihesumanegauma bale'uwa geya 'abehega yaloinaegomi , ma hesi yatauyama 'imi pui 'oidiyega sabi lemegomi .
43003018	“ Coinega taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma Yehoba natunaina taugu wahemisegau , nata geya'abwa loina mwaudi walobalobadi . Ma hesi taiyawedi 'omi geya wahemisegau , 'omi loina mwauna 'oina waluhu pwaiya , weyahina taugu Yehobaina natunaina moisa geya wahemisaegau .
43003019	Loinaedi mwaudiyedi huhuna bewa gidemusa : Maedanaina 'isulu pwaima bale'uwa , ma hesi tomiya bale'u nuwanuwadi guguyou . Coinega maedanaina silogwahateya , weyahina mumugadiyedi galadi .
43003020	Coinega taiyawedi mumugadi galadi maedanaina geya nuwadi . Ma wete geya nuwadi ma maedanaina 'oina silatu , nata gidemusa mumugadiyedi galadi maedanaina 'i'abi latuhedi .
43003021	Ma hesi taiyawedi mumugadi bwebwe'adi , nata taudi ma'idi yaliyaya maedanaina 'oina silatu ma maedanaina 'idi mumuga bwebwe'adiyedi 'i'abi latuhedi 'abehega Yehoba 'oinega simumuga 'esa . ”
43003022	Muliyetega Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao sitauya Yudiya 'ina tupwa 'oina . Tupwainaina 'oina sabwelo tupwadi 'oidiya simiyamiya ma Yesu tomota 'i'abi'abi hebabitaisodi .
43003023	Yoni wete 'asa 'aigeda sanina Ainoni 'oina , beno 'asa Selimi deina , 'i'abi'abi hebabitaiso . Weyahina tupwainaina 'oina we'aha madouna 'imiyamiya , eeta we'ahinaina 'oina boda sitautauyama , ma Yoni 'i'abi'abi hebabitaisodi .
43003024	Tutainaina 'oina Yoni 'abwa geya deliya silagu luhuwe .
43003025	Ta Yoni 'ana tomuliyao Yudiya loheyaina 'aigeda mahetediu sihe'ohe'ohena babitaiso weyahina . Weyahina geya sisanapu taiya 'ina babitaiso bwebwe'ana hedadena tauna sawasawahina ma tomota 'i'abi he'ehaudi .
43003026	Coinega tohe'ohe'oheyedi sitauya Yoni 'oina sigwae , “ Cinapwana , mwalona loheyaina 'oima 'ugwaegwaeneya tutaina 'owa ma tauma Yolidani we'ahina hali tupwanega tamiyamiya . Tauna bewa tuwa loheyaina 'i'abi'abi hebabitaiso , ma boda mabwaiyadi 'ina babitaiso nuwadi 'i'eweya , 'oinega si'au'auta 'oina . ”
43003027	Ma Yoni 'ana tomuliyaedi 'enadi 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Geya 'eta taiya sowasowahina ma 'iheloheya madou 'eguma Yehoba geya 'oina 'itagwala .
43003028	Coimiya wete yagwae pwaiya ta wasanapuya 'abehega taugu geya To'abihetenaina . Taugu tuwa Yehoba 'ihesumanegauma yanugetama ta loheyainaina 'ana muliya .
43003029	Loheyainaina tauna gidemusa haihai meloheyana ma taugu tuwa 'ana tohayahina . Tuwa gidemusa 'eguma haihai loheyana mwanena 'iloba ma 'oinega 'iyana 'aigeda haihai loheyainaina 'enana 'ihesagohe ma weyahina 'iyaliyaya . Coinega taugu wete gide Yesu wasana yahesagoheya ma weyahina yayaliyaya sinabwana .
43003030	Tauna 'ilobwaineya ma 'iheloheya madou , ma hesi taugu tuwa yamuliyeyamo .
43003031	“ Loheyainaina tauna galewega 'isuluma , tomota mabwaiyadi 'imadou sinediya . Weyahina taiya 'eguma bale'uwega 'itauyama , tauna tuwa bale'u loheyaina , ma bale'u ginaulinao 'oidiyega 'ihehegwaegwae . Ma hesi loheyainaina tauna galewega 'isuluma , tauna moisa tomota mabwaiyadi 'imadou sinediya .
43003032	To'aha gide 'inonodiya ta 'i'itediya weyahidi 'ihehegwaegwae . Ma hesi 'ina gwaeyedi geya 'eta taiya 'ida 'abi yahidiya .
43003033	Ma hesi taiyawedi 'eguma 'ina gwaeyedi si'abi'abi yahidi , beno taudi sihepwaileya 'abehega Yehoba 'ina gwae moisa .
43003034	“ Loheyainaina Yehoba 'ihesumaneyama tauna 'ina gwae 'ihehepwailedi , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'oinega 'ilohemaheya .
43003035	Eeta Yehoba natunaina 'ihelauweya , 'oinega 'ina 'ebeloina mabwaiyana natuna nimana 'ilaguya .
43003036	Coinega taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma Yehoba natunaina wahemisae , nata yawasi hataya waloba . Ma hesi taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma Yehoba natunaina geya wahemisae , nata geya'abwa yawasi hataya walobaloba , ma hesi 'omi nata Yehoba 'ina gamwasowala 'oimiya geya'abwa 'igumwagumwala . ”
43004001	Yesu 'ina 'abi hebabitaiso 'oinega 'ana tomuliyao baibaiwadi 'ilobediya . Ma hesi Yoni 'ana tomuliyao geya baibaiwadi .
43004002	Yesu moisa geya babitaiso 'ida paihowediya , 'ana tomuliyaedi siboi babitaiso sipaipaihowadi .
43004003	Ma Palisiyao 'enadi Yesu 'ihesagoheya 'abehega 'ina paihowa wasana sisanapuya , 'oinega Yudiya 'i'ebe sineya ma 'ilohihila Galili .
43004004	Cina tauyaina 'oina nuwanuwana ma 'abehega Sameliya 'oinega 'itauya .
43004005	Coinega 'itauya Sameliya 'ana gamwagamwana 'oina 'ilatuwa ma 'itautauya ta 'asa 'aigeda 'oina 'ilatuwa , 'asainaina sanina Saika , 'oinega geya 'eda saliyana mwalona Yakobo bale'uina natuna Yosepa 'i'ebwaeya .
43004006	Casainaina 'oina we'aha 'eli 'aigeda 'imiyamiya , Yakobo mwalo 'ana paipaihowa . Yesu tupwainaina 'oina 'ilatuwa 'asudiladila gamwana . Wahina 'ibeluwa , ma we'ahina papalina 'imiyatoiya sabi 'aiyawasi .
43004007	Tuta 'i'iuna 'oina ma Sameliya wahineina 'aigeda 'ilatuwa we'ahinaina 'oina 'ana we'aha sabi goi . Beno 'oina Yesu wahineina 'i'iteya ma 'oina 'i'ahwanoiya 'igwae . “ Wahine , we'aha 'u'ebwaegau yanuma . ”
43004008	Tuta beno 'oina Yesu 'iboinamo 'imiyamiya , weyahina 'ana tomuliyaedi sitauya 'asa madouna 'oina 'adi sigimwagimwane .
43004009	Coinega Sameliya wahineina Yesu 'ihegwaeya , “ Cu'ita , 'owa Yudiya loheyaina ma taugu Sameliya wahineina . Ma to'aha weyahina we'aha weyahina 'oiguwa 'u'ahwanoiyeya ? ” Weyahina meYudiya ma meSameliya geya si'ahwa 'iya'iyagu .
43004010	Coinega Yesu Sameliya wahineina 'ihegwaehileya , “ Yehoba 'eguma 'ina helau 'oiuwa 'usanasanapu , ma wete 'eguma 'usanapugauwa taiya taugu 'oiuwa we'aha weyahina ya'ahwa'awanoi , 'owa hesi 'ilobwainegowa 'oiguwa 'uda 'ahwanoi ma we'aha yawasiu weyahina ya'ebwaego . ”
43004011	Ma wahineina 'igwaeya “ Cinapwana , 'owa geya 'ino 'ebe goimo . Weyahina we'aha gaula bewa 'isulu hedadeya ma 'ugwaeya 'abehega we'aha 'u'ebwaegau yawasigu weyahina .
43004012	Cowa nuwana 'utohotoho ma 'abehega tubudai Yakobo 'ulagu suluhe ? Ma hesiyage 'uda sanapu 'abehega 'ama we'aha 'eli bewa , Yakobo mwalona heneyage 'ipaihoweya ma we'ahinaina bewa , manatunao ma wete 'idi hebahebaiyao 'idi 'ebe numa . ”
43004013	Ma Yesu wahineina 'ihegwae hileya , “ Taiya 'eguma we'aha bewa 'oinega 'inuma , nata wete tani'ona 'iyahala hila .
43004014	Ma hesi taiya 'eguma we'ahina 'oiguwega ya'ebwae ma 'inuma , nata geya'abwa wete tani'ona 'iyahayahala hila . Weyahina we'ahina 'oiguwega ya'ebwae , nata 'atena 'ihebidala yawasina miyamiya hatayana weyahina . ”
43004015	Coinega wahineina 'igwaeya “ Cinapwana , we'ahinaina bewa tuwa 'uda 'ebwaegau , ma 'aneyage geya'abwa tani'ogu 'iyahayahala hila bo nuwana geya'abwa wete yahilahilama we'aha 'eli bewa 'oina ma yagoigoi hila . ”
43004016	Coinega Yesu wahineina 'ihegwae hileya , “ Cutauya mwaneu 'u'auliyama . ”
43004017	Ma wahineina Yesu 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Ciya , taugu geya mwanegumo . ” Coinega Yesu wahineina 'enana 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Moisa beno 'ugwaeya 'abehega geya mwaneumo .
43004018	Ma hesi mwanemwao 'adi baibaiwa nima 'ai'aigeda taudi bewa tuwa geya mahetemwao . Ma hesi loheyaina tauna bewa tuwa maheteu wamiyamiya geya mwaneu moisana , 'awa ? ”
43004019	Coinega wahineina 'igwaeya , “ Cinapwana , 'abwa hesi yasanapugowa 'owa 'abe 'aigeda palopita .
43004020	Bewa tuwa 'uhegwaegau to tupwa 'oina 'ilobwaineya ma Yehoba 'oina tatapwalolo ? Weyahina tauma mwalona tubumayao 'oidiyega ma bewa tuwa 'itautauya 'ima 'oya bewa Sameliya 'oina 'atapwatapwalolo . Ma hesi 'omi meYudiya wagwaeya 'abehega Yelusalema 'ebe tapwalolo moisa . ”
43004021	Ma Yesu wahineina 'ihegwae hileya , “ Wahine , bewa tuwa 'uhemisaegau . Weyahina 'abwa tuta sinaonaoma 'oidiya , tomota geya'abwa 'oya bewa Sameliya 'oina bo Yelusalema 'oina sitapwatapwalolo .
43004022	Comi meSameliya geya wasanapu taiya 'oina watapwatapwalolo . Ma hesiyage tauma meYudiya 'asanapuya taiya 'oina 'atapwatapwalolo , weyahina tauma 'oimega Yehoba 'ina lemaina 'ilatuwa .
43004023	Ma sauga deina ma wete bewa 'ilatu pwaima , ma taiyawedi taudi Tamada 'ana totapwalolowao moisa , Tamadai 'oina sitapwalolo yaluyaluwadi mabwaiyana 'oidiyega ma wete nuwadi moisa 'oidiyega . Weyahina totapwalolowedi taudi bewa gide Yehoba nuwanuwana ma 'oina sitapwalolo .
43004024	Weyahina Yehoba tauna tuwa yaluyaluwa , 'oinega taiyawedi 'eguma 'oina sitapwatapwalolo , 'ilobwainediya ma yaluyaluwadi mabwaiyana 'oinega ma wete nuwadi moisa 'oidiyega 'oina sitapwalolo . ”
43004025	Coinega wahineina Yesu 'ihegwaehileya , “ Yasanapuya 'abehega 'abwa nata To'abihetenaina 'itauyama , tauna sibwauweya Keliso . Tauna nata 'itauyama 'abwa ginaula mabwaiyana 'oida 'ilihasidi . ”
43004026	Ma Yesu 'ihegwaeya , 'igwae , “ Taugu bewa To'abihetenaina 'oiuwa yahehegwaegwae . ”
43004027	Tutaina 'oina Yesu 'ana tomuliyaedi silohihilama , ta 'idi Cinapwana si'iteya wahine mahetena sihehegwaegwae . Coinega taudi nuwadi 'ihenainaida , ma hesiyage geya 'eta taiya Yesuina 'ihesilala ma 'igwae , “ To'aha nuwanuwau ? ” Bo 'igwae , “ To'aha weyahina wahine maheteu wahehegwaegwae ? ”
43004028	Ma hesi wahineina 'ina 'ebe goi 'i'ebesineya ma 'itauya 'asai , tomota 'ihegwaediya 'igwae ,
43004029	“ Ciyagwao , wanaoma tatauya wa'ita loheyaina tauna mumugagu mabwaiyana 'oiguwa 'ihepwailediya nuwana tauna To'abihetenaina ? ”
43004030	Coinega tomotaedi 'asa madounaina 'oinega silatuwa ma sitauya Yesu 'oina .
43004031	Beno 'oina tomuliyaedi Yesu sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Cinapwana , mane musa 'eta to'aha 'uda 'aputoho ? ”
43004032	Ma hesi 'ihegwae hilediya , 'igwae , “ Cagu 'e'ahai 'imiyamiya , 'omi geya wasanapu . ”
43004033	Ta tomuliyaedi nuwadi 'ihenainaida , ma siboi 'oidiya sigwae , “ Nuwana 'eta taiya 'ana 'e'ahai 'itauyeyama . ”
43004034	Muliyetega Yesu 'ana tomuliyaedi 'ihegwae hilediya , “ Bewa tauna 'aguina : Tauna 'ihesumanegauma 'ina nuwatuhu yapaihowadi ma 'ina paihowa mabwaiyana yalosalohidi . ”
43004035	Coinega wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Tomadega 'imi nuwatuhu 'abehega wai'ena 'ehata sigumwala 'abwa mamasalai . Ma hesi yagwae moisa 'oimiya 'abehega mamasalai bewa tuwa 'ilatu pwaiya . Nata hina wa'ita lohihila ma tanoha 'adi 'ita wa'itadi .
43004036	Ma hesi taiyawedi 'eguma 'e'etahiina 'oina si'etahi , nata 'adi maisa siloba . Tanohinaina 'e'etahinaina yawasi miyamiya hatayana weyahina . Tanohinaina 'ana todauna hagadi ma wete 'ana to'etahi hagadi , ma hesi mabwaiyadi nata 'idi yaliyaya mahemahetena .
43004037	Ta moisa tuwa Yehoba 'ina buki 'oina 'ihepwaila bwaibwaina 'igwaeya ‘ Loheya 'aigeda todauna ma 'aigeda to'etahi . ’
43004038	Coinega bewa tuwa taugu yahehesumanegomi ma tanohinaina 'oina geya wadauna 'oinega wa'etahi . Hali tomota mwalo sidauna , ma 'idi paihowega 'omi 'etahi nata wapaihowa . ”
43004039	Casa nage 'oina meSameliya baibaiwadi Yesu sihemisaeya , weyahina wahineina 'oidiya 'ihepwaila 'igwae , “ Cigu 'eda'eda mabwaiyana 'oiguwa 'ihepwailediya . ”
43004040	Saugaina 'oina meSameliya sitauya Yesu 'oina ma sigwae , “ Ceguma sowasowahina 'owa mahetemai tada miyamiya . ” Coinega 'itagwala ma 'imiya hila gide sabwelo 'eluwa 'oidiya .
43004041	Coinega boda baibaiwadi wete sihemisaeya 'ina gwae weyahina .
43004042	Eeta wahineina sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Moisa tuwa 'ino gwaeina geya 'u'abo . Ta geya 'abehega 'ino gwaemo 'oidiyega ma 'ahemiseya , weyahina tauma 'aboi wete 'ina gwae 'ahesagohediya ma 'asanapuya 'abehega moisa tauna tuwa Tolemaina gogo gabulena mabwaiyada weyahida . ”
43004043	Sabwelo 'eluwa sigumwala ma Yesu tupwaina 'i'ebesineya ta Galili 'oina 'itauya .
43004044	Yesuina 'iboinamo 'igwaeya , “ Moisa , palopita geya 'adi he'asisimo 'eguma siboi 'idi 'asa 'oina siguguguya . ”
43004045	Ma hesi tutaina Yesu Galili 'oina 'ilatuwa , meGalili siyaliyaya , weyahina bodaedi Yesu 'ina paihowa waiwaina si'iteya tutaina mwalo sitauya Yelusalema Hataona Guyaina 'oina .
43004046	Muliyetega Yesu 'ilohihila Kena 'oina , beno Galili 'ina tupwa 'oina . Casainaina 'oina mwalona Yesu we'aha 'i'abi buiya ma 'ihemala wainiya . Beno 'oina toloina 'aigeda madouna natuna 'ilohala ma 'asa Kapaneumi 'oina 'i'eno'eno .
43004047	Toloinaina Yesu wasana 'ihesagoheya 'abehega Yudiya 'oinega 'itautauyama Galili . Coinega loheyainaina Yesu 'oina 'itauya ma 'i'ahwanoiya 'igwae , “ Ceguma sawasawahina 'owa mahetegu tatauya Kapaneumi ma natugu 'u'abi hebwebwe'ane . Weyahina gwamainaina 'i'iunamo ma yawasina 'igumwala . ”
43004048	Coinega Yesu toloinaina 'ihegwae hileya , “ Geya 'eta taiya 'ida hemisaegauwa , beno tuwa 'eguma 'igu paihowa waiwaidi ya'abi latuhedi wa'itadi ee 'abwa wahemisaegau . ”
43004049	Ma hesi toloinaina Yesu 'ihegwaeya , “ Cinapwana , 'ulomwayamwayau 'unaoma tatauya , nata gide natugu yawasina 'igumwala . ”
43004050	Coinega Yesu 'igwae , “ Natuina 'i'iuna ma 'ibwebwe'ana , nata 'ulohihila natuina 'u'ita bwebwe'ana 'imiyamiya . ” Eeta loheyaina Yesu 'ina gwae 'ihemisaeya ma 'ilohihila natunaina 'oina .
43004051	Citautauya ta 'edai 'ina topaihowao 'eluwa 'ilobediya , ma wasa si'ebwaeya sigwae , “ Cinapwana , natuina 'ibwebwe'ana pwaiya . ”
43004052	Coinega 'ihesilalediya 'igwae , “ To sauga gide 'oina natugu 'iyawesaiya ? ” Ma taudi sigwae , “ Boi 'asudiladila 'ana gamwagamwana 'oina ma wahina mabwaiyana 'iyawesaiya . ”
43004053	Nage 'oina gwamaina tamana Yesu 'ina gwae 'inuwatuhuya tutaina 'oina 'igwae , “ Natuina 'i'iunamo ma 'ibwebwe'ana . ” Beno 'oina loheyainaina ma'ina susuwao Yesu sihemisaeya .
43004054	Bewa Yesu 'ina paihowa waiwaina heluwena 'i'abi latuheya , tutaina Yudiya 'oinega 'itauyama ma Galili 'oina 'ipaihowa .
43005001	Muliyetega Yesu 'ihaneya Yelusalema meYudiya 'idi guyai weyahina .
43005002	Yelusalema 'oina sipi 'idi 'ahwa'eda deina , we'aha 'aigeda ni'una 'imiyamiya . We'ahinaina meYudiya 'enadiyega beno Bedeseida . Ma we'ahinaina papalina hada 'ebe 'aiyawasi ma'ana 'ahwa'eda 'adi baibaiwa nima 'ai'aigeda simiyamiya .
43005003	Hadaedi 'oidiya tololohala baibaiwadi si'eno'eno , taudi mata gibugibuidi ma peupeudi ma wete hemwalomwalo howaidi .
43005005	Tolohalaedi 'oidiyega loheya 'aigeda 'ana lohala 'oina 'imiyamiya gide bolime teti 'eiti ( 38 ) sigumwala .
43005006	Tutainaina Yesu 'itauyama loheyainaina 'i'iteya ta wete 'isanapuya 'abehega 'ana lohalaina 'oina 'imiyamiya tuta saliya hedadena 'oidiya . Coinega Yesu loheyaina 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Nuwanuwau ma 'ubwebwe'ana ? ”
43005007	Coinega loheyaina Yesu 'enana 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Cinapwana , geya 'eta taiya weyahigu ma 'i'ahala dobihegau we'aha bewa 'ina tuta nihu 'oina . Tuta baibaiwana 'oidiya yatohotohona ma 'abehega yaboigumo yadobi we'ahaina bewa 'oina , ma hesi geya sawasawahigu . Weyahina taugu 'abwa yaheheboi ma 'iyagwaowedi silomwayamwayau sidobi nugeta ma 'adi lohalaedi 'oidiyega sigumwagumwala , ma taugu 'agu 'itaina . ”
43005008	Ma Yesu loheyaina 'ihegwaehileya , “ Cutoholo 'ino sita 'u'ewadi ma 'utauya . ”
43005009	Saugaina 'oina loheya 'ibwebwe'ana ma 'ina sita 'i'ewediya ma 'itauya . Sabweloinaina 'oina Sabati ,
43005010	'oinega meYudiya 'idi tohanugetao loheyaina si'iteya ma sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Geya 'ana 'ita bwebwe'ana Sabati 'oina 'ino sita 'u'a'ahala dadanedi . ”
43005011	Loheyaina 'idi gwae 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Loheyaina tauna 'i'abi hebwebwe'anegauwa 'ihegwaegauwa 'igwae , ‘ Cino sita 'u'ewadi ma 'utauya . ’ ”
43005012	Coinega sihesilala hileya sigwae , “ To loheya beno gidemusa 'ihegwae 'esegowa ? ”
43005013	Ma hesi loheyaina 'ana lohala 'igumwagumwala 'ana to'abi hebwebwe'anaina geya 'isanapu . Weyahina 'asainaina 'oina boda madouna simiyamiya ma Yesu soladiyega 'itauya pwaiya .
43005014	Muliyetega Yesu loheyaina 'ilobeya Yehoba 'ina hada solana , ma 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Bewa tuwa 'ubwebwe'ana pwaiya , 'oinega sahena wete 'upuipui hila , nata gide ginaula gala hedadedi 'oiuwa silatu . ”
43005015	Beno 'oina loheyaina 'itauya meYudiya 'idi tohanugetao 'oidiya ma 'ana to'abi hebwebwe'anaina 'ihepwaileya 'abehega Yesu tauna 'ana to'abi hebwebwe'anaina .
43005016	Beno huhuna 'oinega meYudiyaedi Yesu sihe'aleheya , weyahina ginaula bewa Sabati 'oina 'ipaihoweya .
43005017	Ma hesi Yesu meYudiyaedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Sabwelo mabwaiyana 'oidiya Tamagu 'ipaipaihowa , 'oinega taugu wete gide yapaihowa 'esa . ”
43005018	MeYudiyaedi Yesu 'ina gwae sihesagoheya , 'oinega sitohotoho waiwai ma 'abehega togidega ma silohe'amasi . Weyahina Sabati 'ana loina 'iligehiya , ma wete 'igwaeya 'abehega Yehoba Tamana moisa ta 'abehega Yehoba mahetena sihemahemahetena .
43005019	Coinega Yesu tomotaedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oimiya , taugu geya sowasowahigu ma yaboi 'igu nuwatuhu 'oinega yapaihowa . Ma hesiyage to'aha gide Tamagu ya'iteya 'ipaipaihowadi , taugu wete gide yapaihowa 'esa .
43005020	Ma Tamagu 'ihelauwegauwa , 'oinega 'ina paihowa mabwaiyana to'aha gide 'ipaipaihowadi 'ihe'itegauwa . Ma wete paihowa madoudi nata 'abwa 'ihe'itegau ma yapaihowadi , 'oinega mabwaiyami nuwami sihenainaida .
43005021	Gide Tamagu to'amasa 'i'abi'abi hetoholo hiledi ma yawasidi 'i'ebwa'ebwaedi . Coinega taugu wete gide yawasi hauhauna tomota ya'ebwa'ebwaedi taiyawedi taudi yahesinuwedi .
43005022	“ Ma wada sanapu 'abehega Tamagu geya 'eta wete 'ina loina mwauna 'imiyamiya tomota 'adi heyatala weyahina , weyahina heyatala 'ana loina mabwaiyana 'i'ebwae pwaigauwa ma yaboi yapaihowadi ,
43005023	ma 'oinega mabwaiyami wahe'asisiyanegau gide Tamagu wahehe'asisiyana 'ese . Ma 'eguma taiyawedi geya wahe'asisiyanegau , beno wete Tamagu tauna 'ihesumanegauma geya wahe'asisiyane .
43005024	“ Coinega yahegwae bwaibwainigomi 'eguma taiyawedi 'omi 'igu gwae wahesagohedi ma wete 'agu Tohesumaneina wahemisae , nata yawasi miyamiya hatayaina waloba . Ma 'oinega heyatala 'ana tuta 'oina 'omi geya'abwa loina walobaloba . Weyahina 'omi 'amasa 'ina tupwa wa'ebesineya ma wahabala yawasi hauhauna 'ina tupwa .
43005025	“ Ma wete yahegwae bwaibwainigomi 'abehega tuta bewa tuwa 'ilatulatuma , bo tagwae tuta 'ilatu pwaima ma to'amasa Yehoba natuna 'enana sihesagohe , beno taugu tuwa 'enagu . Ma 'eguma taiyawedi 'omi 'enagu wahesagohe , nata yawasi hauhauna waloba .
43005026	“ Tamagu tauna yawasi moisa huhuna , 'oinega 'oiguwa 'itagwala ma taugu wete yawasi huhuna ,
43005027	ma wete heyatalaina 'ana loina 'i'ebwaegauwa ma taugu heyatala yapaihowadi , taugu tuwa Loheyaiguina moisa .
43005028	Coinega sahena nuwami sihehenainaida gwae bewa weyahina . Ma wete tuta 'inaonaoma 'oina to'amasa mabwaiyadi nata 'enagu sihesagohe
43005029	ma galihega silatuma . Ma 'eguma taiyawedi taudi mumugadi bwebwe'adi , nata yawasi bwebwe'ana siloba . Ma taiyawedi taudi mumugadi geya bwebwe'adi , loina mwauna siloba .
43005030	“ Taugu wete geya sowasowahigu ma yaboigumo paihowaedi yapaihowadi , weyahina 'igu loina heyatala weyahina Yehoba tauna 'ihe'itegauwa , 'oinega 'igu loina bwebwe'ana . Weyahina taugu geya yatohotoho ma 'abehega yaboi 'igu nuwatuhu yapaihowadi , ma hesi to'aha gide 'agu Tohesumaneina 'ina nuwatuhu gide yapaihowa 'esedi .
43005031	“ Eeta 'eguma yaboi weyahigu yahehepwaila , nata geya'abwa wa'ahwa'ahwa moisaegau .
43005032	Ma hesiyage wada sanapu 'abehega hali loheya weyahigu 'ihepwaila pwaiya , ma yasanapuya to'aha gide 'ina hepwaila weyahigu mabwaiyana gwae moisa .
43005033	Loheyainaina mwalona tohalewasa tupwadi 'oina wahesumanediya , sanina Yoni . Ta gwae moisa 'i'ebwaediya ta 'oimiya wete sihepwaila bwaibwaina . ”
43005034	Coinega Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Taugu tomota 'idi hepwaila geya weyahina yada nuwatuhuwa . Ma hesi gwae bewa Yoni weyahina yahehepwaila ma 'oinega nuwami 'i'asilala ma 'abihetena waloba .
43005035	Yoni tauna gide mayale waiwaina , 'oinega 'omi nuwanuwami ma 'ina 'asilalaina 'oina wayaliyaya tuta 'i'iunamo .
43005036	Ma Yoni weyahigu 'ihepwaila , beno geya ginaula madouna . Ma hesi ginaula 'aigeda madou hedadena 'imiyamiya , beno 'ebe'itaedi Tamagu 'oinega bewa tuwa yapaipaihowadi . Coinega paihowaedi weyahidi wanuwatuhu bwaibwaina , ma 'oinega wasanapugau 'abehega Tamagu tauna 'ihesumanegauma .
43005037	“ Tamagu tauna weyahigu 'ihepwaila pwaiya ma hesi 'omi geya 'eta tuta 'enana wahesagoha toho , bo nuwana manina wa'ita tohoya ,
43005038	ma wete 'ina gwae 'oimiya geya 'atemiya walagudi , huhunaina geya wahemisaegau 'abehega taugu Yehoba 'oinega yatauyama .
43005039	Yehoba 'ina buki wahasihasili . Ma wanuwatuhu 'abehega bukiina 'oinega yawasimi miyamiya hatayana wada loba . Ma hesi geya wasanapu 'abehega bukiina taugu tuwa weyahigu 'ihehegwaegwae .
43005040	Beno 'oinega geya nuwami ma wanaoma 'oiguwa yawasimi miyamiya hatayana weyahina .
43005041	“ Ma hesi wada sanapu 'abehega taugu geya tomota 'idi hepwatu weyahidi yada nuwatuhuwa .
43005042	Comi weteyage yasanapu pwaigomiya , geya 'eta wete Yehoba 'ana helau 'atemiya walagu tohodi .
43005043	Taugu Tamagu saninega yatauyama ma geya wahemisaegau . Ma hesi 'omi 'eguma hali loheya tauna saninega 'itauyawa 'oimiya , nata loheyainaina wahemisae .
43005044	Ta moisa tuwa , 'omi nuwanuwami ma 'ami hepwatu waboi 'oimiyega wahesagohedi . Ma hesi geya watohona ma 'ane Yehoba 'iboimo 'oinega 'ami hepwatu walobadi . Beno 'oinega geya sowasowahimi ma wahemisaegau .
43005045	“ Sahena wanuwanuwatuhu 'abehega taugu nata Tamagu 'oina yahe'ewegami , loheya 'aigeda hesi tauna nata 'ihe'ewegami , tauna wanuwatuhuya 'abehega 'abwa nata 'ilemegomi , sanina Mosese .
43005046	Ma 'eguma moisa Mosese wahemisaeya , taugu wete gide wahemisaegau . Weyahina Mosese tauna mwalona Yehoba 'ina buki 'oina weyahigu 'ihepwaila pwaiya .
43005047	Ma hesi 'ina hepwailina geya wahemisae , 'oinega geya sowasowahimi ma 'igu gwae wahemisaedi . ”
43006001	Coinega Yesu 'ilohihilama Galili 'ina tupwa ma 'igeluwa 'ihabala Galili holaina hali tupwanega . Holainaina sanina heluwena Taibiliya .
43006002	Eeta boda madouna mulinega sitauya , weyahina 'ina paihowa waiwaina tolohala 'oidiya si'ita pwaiya .
43006003	Coinega Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao sihaneya 'oyai simiyatoiya .
43006004	Tutaina 'oina meYudiya 'idi Hataona Guyaina 'ana tuta 'i'ehohoya .
43006005	Yesu 'i'ita lohihila ma boda madouna 'i'itediya mulinega sitautauyama , 'oinega Yesu Pilipi 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Ta'ehega nata 'e'ahai tagimwanedi ma boda bewa tahe'aidi ? ”
43006006	Hesilala bewa 'oinega Pilipi 'itohoya , ma hesi Yesu 'isanapu nugeteya to'aha nata 'ipaihowa .
43006007	Ma Pilipi Yesu 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Boda bewa madou hedadena , ma 'eguma tu handeledi kina 'oinega beledi tagimwanedi weyahidi , bwagana nata 'i'iuna 'i'iuna si'ai , ma hesi nata geya'abwa mabwaiyadi sowasowahidi . ”
43006008	Coinega Yesu 'ana tomuliya 'aigeda wete Yesu 'ihegwaeya 'igwae ,
43006009	“ Gwama 'aigeda yalobeya 'ana beledi nima 'ai'aigeda , ma wete 'ana silahana 'eluwa . Ma boda mabwaiyadi geya sowasowahidi . ” Tomuliyaina sanina Andulu , Saimoni Pita tasina .
43006010	Muliyetega Yesu 'ana tomuliyaedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Tomota mabwaiyadi wahegwaedi ma modumoduwa simiya 'alatutu . ” Weyahina 'asainaina 'oina modumodu 'ana 'asa , 'oinega mabwaiyadi modumodu 'oina simiya toiya , loheloheyaedimo 'adi baibaiwa gide paibi tausani .
43006011	Muliyetega Yesu beledi 'i'ewediya ma weyahidi 'igwae helauwa Yehoba 'oina , 'abwa muliyetega tomotaedi simiyatoiya 'iheguyaiyediya ma silahanedi wete gide 'oidiya 'ipaihowa 'esediya . Coinega mabwaiyadi si'aiya ta sowasowahidi , simwausuwa .
43006012	Simwausuwa , ta Yesu 'ana tomuliyaedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Beledi 'ana tupwa mabwaiyana wasiwa he'autedi , sahena 'eta to'ehina wete wamudamudali . ”
43006013	Coinega belediyedi mugumugudi sisiwa he'autediya ma boha tuwelo 'adi baibaiwa silohemahediya .
43006014	Cigumwala ma bodaedi Yesu 'ina paihowa waiwaina 'ana 'ila'ilala si'iteya ma sigwae , “ Tauna tuwa bewa palopitainaina tauna 'abehega gogo gabulena 'oina 'itauyama . ”
43006015	Eeta Yesu tomotaedi 'isanapudiya 'abehega nata si'abiyahi ma 'oidiya 'ihekini . Ma hesi Yesuina geya nuwana , 'oinega 'iboinamo 'ilohihila 'oyai .
43006016	Coinega lahilahiyega 'ana tomuliyaedi sidobiya Galili holaina gadowaina 'oina ,
43006017	ma 'idi waga 'oina sigeluwa ma sihahabala Kapaneumi , ma ni'u 'awawa 'iguguyouwa . Eeta Yesu geya 'itauya 'oidiya .
43006018	Coinega sihahabala ma ni'uwa yaumai ma bagodu madouna silobeya .
43006019	Tutaina 'oina sihadobiya ni'u gamwagamwana , 'abwa muliyetega Yesu si'iteya hola tabwanega 'itautauyama 'idi waga deina . Beno 'oina simatauta .
43006020	Ma 'iyamo Yesu 'ihegwaediya 'igwae . “ Sahena wamatamatauta , taugu tuwa . ”
43006021	Coinega tomuliyaedi Yesu sido'oya wagai , ma tutaina 'oina sisohota 'asaina silagalaga 'oina gadowaina .
43006022	Gona 'i'adaleya ma bodaedi taudi Galili holaina hali tupwanega simiyamiya , sisanapuya 'abehega boi Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao 'idi waga 'aigeda tuwa 'oinega sigeluwa . Ma hesi 'idi lohihila 'oina tomuliyaedi siboidimo sigeluwa wagai ta sitauya , ma Yesu geya mahetediu sigelu .
43006023	Ma 'iyamo waga tupwadi Taibiliya 'oinega sitauyama gadowaina 'oina boi Yesu boda beledi 'oinega 'ihe'aidiya , tutaina belediyedi 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anediya Yehoba 'oina .
43006024	Ma bodaedi Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao sibesa 'asaediya , 'oinega wagaedi 'oidiya sigeluwa , ma sihabala Kapaneumi 'oina Yesu sibesebese .
43006025	Muliyetega Galili holaina hali tupwega silobeya , ma sihegwaeya , sigwae , “ Cinapwana , tolahisa 'uhabalama ? ”
43006026	Coinega Yesu tomotaedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oimiya , belediyedi 'oidiyega yahe'aigomiya ma wamwausuwa 'oinega bewa wabesebesegau , geya 'igu paihowa waiwaidi 'adi 'ila'ilalaina weyahina .
43006027	Coinega bewa tuwa yahegwaegomi , sahena 'e'ahai gumwagumwalidi weyahidi wapaipaihowa , ma hesi 'e'ahai yawasimi miyamiya hatayana weyahidi wapaihowa . Ce'ahainaina bewa weyahina yahehegwaegwae . Loheyaiguina taugu nata ya'ebwaegomi . Weyahina Tamagu 'ina paihowa bewa weyahina 'ihesumanegauma ma yapaihowadi . ”
43006028	Coinega tomotaedi Yesu sihegwae hileya , “ To'aha nata 'oidiyega Yehoba 'ina paihowa 'apaihowadi ? ”
43006029	Ma Yesu 'ihegwae hilediya , “ Yehoba 'ina paihowaina bewa gide taugu wahemisaegauwa , weyahina tauna 'ihesumanegauma . ”
43006030	Ma wete sihegwae hileya , “ To 'ila'ilala nata 'oima 'upaihowa ma 'oinega 'ahemisaego ?
43006031	Mwalona gide tubumayao yoho 'awawa 'e'ahainaina si'aiya sanina mana . Yehoba 'ina buki 'oina wete gide 'ihepwaila 'esa 'igwae , ‘ Ce'ahainaina galewega 'i'ebwaediya ma si'aiya . ’ Coinega 'owa mane wete 'ino 'ila'ilala 'upaihowa ma 'a'ita . ”
43006032	Ma Yesu tomotaedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oimiya , Mosese 'e'ahainaina beno geya galewega 'i'ebwaegomi , ma hesi Tamagu tauna hene 'e'ahai moisaina galewega 'i'ebwa'ebwaegomi .
43006033	Ma 'e'ahainaina Yehoba 'oinega tauna 'ilatu pwaima bale'uwa ma tomota yawasidi 'i'ebwa'ebwaedi . ”
43006034	Coinega taudi wete Yesu sihegwaeya , sigwae , “ Cinapwana , 'e'ahainaina beno sauga mabwaiyana 'u'ebwa'ebwaemai . ”
43006035	Ma Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya , “ Taugu yawasimi 'ana 'e'ahai , 'oinega taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma watauyama 'oiguwa , geya'abwa wagomagomale . Taiyawedi wete 'eguma 'omi wahemisaegau , nata geya'abwa tani'omi siyahayahala .
43006036	“ Ma yahegwae pwaigomiya 'abehega wa'ita pwaigauwa , ma hesi geya wahemisaegau .
43006037	Tomotaedi taudi Tamagu 'i'ebwaegauwa hesi nata 'oiguwa sitauyama , ma 'eguma sitauyama 'oiguwa , nata geya'abwa yalolohesohesoiyedi .
43006038	Weyahina taugu galewega yasuluma geya 'igu nuwatuhu sabi paihowaina , ma hesi tauna 'ihesumanegauma 'ina nuwatuhu sabi paihowaina .
43006039	Cihesumanegauma ma 'igu tomotaedi 'i'ebwaegauwa 'ina nuwatuhu bewa gide ma 'abehega geya'abwa 'eta taiya 'oidiyega yahe'wadalele . Ma hesi mabwaiyadi 'amasa 'oinega yada 'abi hetoholo hiladi tuta 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'oina .
43006040	Tamagu bewa gide wete 'ina nuwatuhu ma 'abehega taiyawedi 'eguma taugu natunaina si'itegauwa ma sihemisaegauwa , nata yawasidi miyamiya hatayana siloba . Ma wete tuta 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'oina 'amasa 'oinega ya'abi hetoholo hiladi . ”
43006041	Beno 'oina meYudiya Yesu 'ina gwae sihesagoheya ma silomugiyeya 'ina gwaeina weyahina 'igwae , “ Taugu bewa 'e'ahainaina galewega yasuluma . ”
43006042	Ma siboidimo 'oidiya sigwae , “ Loheya bewa Yosepa natuna , sanina Yesu , 'awa ? Tamana ma sinana wete tasanapu pwaidiya , ma togidega ta 'igwaeya 'abehega tauna galewega 'isuluma ? ”
43006043	Coinega Yesu 'ihegwae hilediya , “ Sahena waboi 'oimiya weyahigu walolomugi .
43006044	Weyahina Tamagu 'ihesumanegauma ma 'oinega taiyawedi 'omi 'ilisigomi ma wanaoma 'oiguwa , 'omi nata tuta 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'oina 'amasa 'oinega ya'abihetoho hilegomi . Ma taiyawedi 'eguma geya 'ilisidima taudi nata geya'abwa 'oiguwa sinaonaoma .
43006045	“ Gwae bewa mwalo heneyage Yehoba 'ina buki 'oina palopitao sileleya sigwae , ‘ Tomota mabwaiyadi nata 'adi he'ita Yehoba 'oinega siloba . ’ Ma 'oinega taiyawedi 'omi Tamadai 'ina he'ita wahesagoheya ma wasanapudiya , 'omi nata 'oiguwa watauyama .
43006046	Ma geya 'eta taiya Tamadai 'i'ita toho , beno tuwa yaboi , weyahina taugu 'oinega yasuluma .
43006047	Coinega bewa yagwae moisa 'oimiya 'eguma taiyawedi 'omi wahemisaegau , nata yawasi miyamiya hatayana waloba .
43006048	Taugu tuwa yawasimi 'ana 'e'ahai .
43006049	Tubumiyaowedi mwalona yoho 'awawa 'oina 'e'ahai sanina mana si'aiya , ma 'iyamo geya manaina 'oinega yawasidi miyamiya hatayana siloba , ma hesi 'oinega simiyamiya 'ana siga si'amasaeya .
43006050	“ Ma hesi 'e'ahai hauhaunaina galewega 'isuluma taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma wa'ewa ma wa'ai , nata geya'abwa wa'ama'amasa .
43006051	Weyahina taugu yawasimi 'ana 'e'ahai galewega yasuluma , ma taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma 'e'ahainaina 'oiguwega wa'ai , nata yawasimi miyamiya hatayana waloba . Ce'ahainaina beno taugu hesiyogu ya'ebwaegomi ma wa'ai , weyahina wahigu yatagwaleya mebale'u mabwaiyami yawasimi weyahina . ”
43006052	Beno 'oina meYudiya siboidimo sihe'ohe'ohena sigwae , “ Togidega ma loheya bewa 'abehega hesiyona 'i'ebwaegita ma ta'ai ? ”
43006053	Coinega Yesu 'ihegwae hilediya , “ Yagwae moisa 'oimiya , taugu loheyaiguina moisa , ma 'eguma hesiyogu geya'abwa wa'ai'ai ma wete 'eguma geya'abwa bweyahigu wanumanuma , nata geya'abwa yawasimi miyamiya hatayaina walobaloba .
43006054	Ma hesi taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma hesiyogu wa'ai ma bweyahigu wanuma , nata moisa yawasimi miyamiya hatayaina waloba , ma wete taugu 'abwa nata 'amasa 'oinega ya'abi hetoholo hilegomi tuta 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'oina .
43006055	Weyahina wahigu bewa tauna 'e'ahai moisa , ma wete bweyahigu 'ebe numa moisa .
43006056	Taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma wahigu wa'ewa wa'ai ma bweyahigu wanuma , 'omi 'oiguwa wamiyamiya ma taugu wete 'oimiya yamiyamiya .
43006057	Tamagu tauna moisa miyamiya hatayaina 'ihesumanegauma , tauna 'oinega yawasigu ya'ewa'ewa . Coinega taugu wete gide , 'eguma taiyawedi 'omi hesiyogu wa'ai , 'omi nata wete yawasimi 'oiguwega wa'ewa'ewadi .
43006058	“ Ce'ahainaina bewa galewega 'isuluma geya gide tubumiyaowedi 'e'ahainaina mwalona yoho 'awawa si'aiya . Weyahina 'e'ahainaina mwalona si'aiya ma geya 'oinega yawasidi miyamiya hatayana siloba , ma hesi 'oinega simiyamiya 'ana siga si'amasaeya . Ma hesi 'e'ahaiina bewa 'oiguwega taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma wa'ai , nata yawasimi miyamiya hatayana waloba . ”
43006059	Gwae bewa mabwaiyana 'ihepwaila latuhediya Kapaneumi 'oina tutaina hada tapwalolo 'oina 'ihehe'ita .
43006060	Cihehe'ita , ma 'ana tomuliyao Yesu 'ina gwaeina sihesagoheya , 'oinega tupwana baibaiwadi siboidimo 'oidiya sigwae , “ Gwae bewa 'ana hesagoha mwauna , 'oinega tauda geya nuwada . ”
43006061	Ma hesi Yesu nige heneyage 'isanapu pwaiya 'abehega 'ana tomuliyaowedi gwae bewa weyahina silolomugi . Coinega 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Gwae bewa weyahina ma 'abehega waguipaila ?
43006062	Taugu loheyaiguina moisa ma togidega 'eguma wa'itegau yahane 'asainaina mwalona 'oinega yasuluma ?
43006063	Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'iboinamo yawasimi 'ana to'ebwaya , ma hesiyage wahimi geya 'eta wete 'ina lema 'oimiya . Cigu gwaeyedi ya'ebwaya pwaigomiya ma 'oidiyega yawasimi Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'oinega wa'ewa'ewadi .
43006064	Ma hesiyage tupwami geya wahemisegauwa . ” Gwae bewa Yesu 'i'inanediya weyahina 'isanapu nugeteya taiyawedi geya sihemisae , ma wete 'isanapuya taiya tauna 'abwa nata 'itebae 'ana 'alehaowedi 'oidiya .
43006065	Coinega wete 'igwae , “ Nuwatuhu bewa weyahina mwalona yahegwaegomiya 'abehega geya 'eta taiya sowasowahina ma 'itauyama 'oiguwa , 'eguma Tamagu geya 'oina 'itagwala . ”
43006066	Bewa weyahina tomuliyaedi taudi Yesu silogwahateya ma si'ebesineya .
43006067	Ma site tuwelowedi siboidimo simiya hila , 'oinega Yesu 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Comi togidega , nuwanuwami wete watauya ? ”
43006068	Coinega Saimoni Pita Yesu 'enana 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Cinapwana , taiya nata 'oina 'atauya ? Weyahina 'owa 'uboi yawasi miyamiya hatayana 'ana gwae 'oiuwa 'imiyamiya .
43006069	Ma wete tauma 'ahemisaegowa 'abehega 'owa To'abihetenaina Yehoba 'oinega 'utauyama . ”
43006070	Coinega Yesu 'ihegwae hilediya , 'igwae , “ Moisa tuwa , 'omi wate tuwelo yahesinuwa pwaigomiya , ma hesiyage 'oimiyega nata 'aigeda Seitani 'ina boda . ”
43006071	Gwae bewa Yesu 'igwaeneya Yudasa weyahina , tauna Saimoni Isakaliyota natuna . Yudasaina tauna tuwa 'aigeda Yesu 'ana tomuliya , ma hesi nata Yesu 'itebae 'ana 'alehaowedi 'oidiya .
43007001	Muliyetega Yesu Galili 'ina 'ebe loina mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'itauya , ma hesiyage geya nuwana Yudiya 'ina 'ebe loina 'oidiya 'itauya . Weyahina meYudiya 'idi 'inapwanaedi nuwanuwadi Yesu silohe'amasi .
43007002	Sauga beno 'oina meYudiya 'idi Yoheyohe Guyaina 'i'ehohoya .
43007003	Coinega Yesu tasinao sihegwaeya 'oina sigwae , “ Casa bewa 'u'ebesine ma 'utauya Yudiya , ma 'a tomuliyao nobwa 'ino paihowa si'ita . ”
43007004	Ma wete sigwae , “ Geya 'eta taiya paihowa dahwana 'oinega sanina 'ida hemadouwa . Ceguma nuwanuwau ma tomota mabwaiyadi sisanapugo 'owa tuwa 'uboi 'uhe'itaego 'oidiya . ”
43007005	Tasinaowedi gwae bewa si'inaneya 'oina weyahina geya sihemisae .
43007006	Coinega Yesu 'ihegwae hilediya , “ Casainaina 'oina 'igu sauga tauya geya 'ana tuta 'iloba . Ma hesi 'omi 'ami lobwaina to tuta 'oina 'eguma nuwanuwami , watauya .
43007007	Weyahina 'omi nata geya'abwa mebale'u silolo'alehegomi , ma taugu hesi silo'alehegauwa , weyahina mumugadi galanaina yahepwailediya 'oidiya .
43007008	Comi nata watauya guyaiina 'oina , taugu nata geya'abwa yatautauyawa , weyahina 'igu sauga 'abwa geya 'ilatu . ”
43007009	Gwae bewa 'i'ebwaediya 'oinega sitauya , ma tauna tuwa Galili 'oina 'imiyahila .
43007010	Coinega Yesu tasinaowedi si'ebesineya ma sitauya guyaiina 'oina . Muliyetega Yesu wete 'itauya dahwana ma 'asainaina 'oina 'ilatuwa , ma geya 'eta taiya 'isanapu toho .
43007011	Tutaina 'oina meYudiya 'idi 'inapwanao Yesu sibesebeseya ma sigwaegwae , “ Ta'eha tauna loheyainaina ? ”
43007012	Tomota baibaiwadi siboidimo 'oidiya sihehe'ahwa henahena Yesu weyahina . Tupwadi tomota sigwae , “ Tauna loheya bwebwe'ana . ” Ma tupwadi tomota sigwae , “ Tauna wete to'e'abo'abo 'aigeda , tomota 'i'waya'wayamidi . ”
43007013	Ma hesi geya 'eta taiya Yesu 'ihepwaila latuwe , weyahina meYudiya 'idi 'inapwanao simatautediya .
43007014	Ma guyai 'ana gamwagamwana 'oina Yesu Hada He'asisi 'oina 'iluhuwa ma 'ihehe'ita .
43007015	Beno 'oina meYudiya nuwadi 'ihenainaida madouna , sigwae , “ To'ehega loheya bewa 'ina sanapu 'iloba 'eseya ? Weyahina tauna geya 'eta 'ebe se'ulu madouna 'oina 'iluhu tohona . ”
43007016	Coinega Yesu 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Taugu geya yaboi 'igu nuwatuhuwega yahehe'ita , ma hesi tauna 'ihesumanegauma 'ina nuwatuhu 'oinega yahehe'ita .
43007017	Taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu wapaipaihowa , 'omi nata wasanapugau 'abehega 'igu he'itaina Yehoba 'oinega , ma geya yaboi 'igu nuwatuhuwega .
43007018	Ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi 'eguma taiya 'iboimo 'ina nuwatuhu 'ihehe'ita , 'iboimo sanina weyahina 'ipaipaihowa . Ma hesi taugu nuwanuwagu ma tauna 'ihesumanegauma sanina ya'abi hemadou . Weyahina taugu 'igu gwaeyao moisa , ma wete geya 'igu puimo .
43007019	Ma togidega ? Mosese loinaina 'i'ebwaegomiya wanuwa naideya ? Ma geya 'eta taiya 'oimiyega loinaedi 'imuliya bwaibwainidi . Ma bewa watohotohogau ma 'abehega walohe'amasigau . ”
43007020	Coinega bodaedi Yesu sihegwae hileya , “ Yaluyaluwa bi'i debau 'i'abi heyauyauleya 'oinega beno gide 'ugwaegwae 'esa ? Taiya hede nuwanuwana ma 'abehega 'ilohe'amasigo ? ”
43007021	Coinega Yesu bodaedi wete 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Wagamwasowalegauwa weyahina loheya ya'abi hebwebwe'aneya Sabati 'ana sabwelo 'oina ? Ma 'omi togidega 'imi paihowa Sabati 'ina sabwelo 'oina ?
43007022	Weyahina Mosese 'ina loina 'abehega natumiyao loheloheyadi 'idi 'ebe selolo 'wapina wa'upwa yahuledi . ( Loinaina bewa geya Mosese 'oinega , ma hesi tubumiyao nugenugetadi 'oidiyega loina bewa 'itauyama . )
43007023	Coinega 'eda'eda bewa 'eguma gide wapaihowa 'esedi ma gwagwama loheloheyadi 'oidiya gide wapaihowa 'esedi Sabati 'ana sabwelo 'oina , beno moisa Mosese 'ina loina wamulimuliye . Ma to'aha hede weyahina ta walo'alehegauwa tutaina loheya Sabati 'ana sabwelo 'oina ya'abi hebwebwe'aniya ?
43007024	Coinega sahena 'iyamiyao 'adi 'ita 'oinega weyahidi wagwaegwae hesihesinuwa . Ma hesi soladiya loina dumwalunega wagwae hesihesinuwa bwaibwaina . ”
43007025	Saugaina 'oina meYelusalema tupwadi sigwaeya sigwae , “ Loheya bewa nuwana tauna nuwanuwadi ma 'abehega silohe'amasi , 'awa ?
43007026	Ma hesi wa'ita , boda gamwagamwanidiya 'itoholowa ma 'oidiya 'ihehegwaegwae ma geya 'eta taiya 'enana 'ida hehileya . Togidega ma 'ida tohanugetao si'ahwa moisaeya 'abehega tauna tuwa To'abihetenaina , 'awa ?
43007027	Ma nuwana geya , weyahina mabwaiyada loheya bewa tasanapuya to 'asa 'oinega 'itauyama . Ma hesi To'abihetenaina 'eguma 'itauyama , geya 'eta taiya 'ina 'ebe tauyama 'isanapu . ”
43007028	Tutaina Yesu 'abwa Yehoba 'ina hada 'oina 'ihehe'ita , 'enana madouna 'oinega 'ihegwaegwaeya 'igwae , “ Moisa tuwa , wasanapu pwaigauwa to 'asa 'oinega yatauyama , ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tauna 'ihesumanegauma 'ina loina 'oinega yatauyama 'asa bewa 'oina . Geya yaboi 'igu loina 'oinega ma 'asa bewa 'oina yatauyama . Cagu tohesumaneina tauna mumugana bwebwe'ana , ma 'omi geya wasanapu tauna .
43007029	Yaboi hesi yasanasanapu weyahina tauna 'ihesumanegauma ma wete tauna 'oinega yatauyama . ”
43007030	Beno 'oina loheloheyaedi sitohoya ma 'abehega si'abiyahi , ma togidega ta geya 'eta taiya 'wapina 'i'abi toho . Weyahina 'ina 'amasa 'ana sauga geya 'iloba .
43007031	Ma hesi tomota tupwana baibaiwadi sihemisaeya , 'oinega sigwae , “ Loheya bewa moisa To'abihetena , weyahina geya sowasowahina ma 'eta taiya 'itauyama ma loheya bewa 'ina paihowa waiwaina 'inugete . ”
43007032	Eeta tomota 'idi gwae dahwana meYudiya 'idi 'inapwanao sisanapuya , 'oinega taudi ma topwaoli madoudi 'idi tuilalao sihesumanediya sitauya Yesu 'abehega si'abiyahi .
43007033	Sitauyama ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Taugu tuwa sauga 'i'iunamo 'oina 'oimiya yamiyamiya ma wete yalohihila tauna 'ihesumanegauma 'oina .
43007034	Cabwa nata wabesegau ma gesowana walobegau . Casainaina 'oina yamiyamiya 'omi geya sowasowahimi 'oina watauyawa . ”
43007035	Coinega meYudiyaedi siboidimo 'oidiya sigwae , “ To'ehega 'abehega 'iha'esa ma geya'abwa talobaloba ? Bo nuwana 'abehega taudi meYudiya siboi 'idi 'asa 'oinega silatuwa ma sitauya tupwa ganamuliyedi 'oidiya simiyamiya , ma nobwa tomiya ganamuliyedi 'ihe'itadi , 'awa ?
43007036	Cina gwaeina togidega 'ana sanapu ? Weyahina 'igwaeya 'igwae , ‘ Nata wabesegau , ma hesi gesowana walobegau ’ . Ma wete 'igwaeya 'igwae , ‘ Casainaina 'oina yamiyamiya 'omi geya sowasowahimi ma 'oina watauyawa . ’ ”
43007037	Ma guyainaina 'ana 'ebe losaloha , beno 'ana sabwelo madouna 'oina , Yesu boda gamwagamwanidiya 'itoholowa ma 'enana madounega 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma tani'omi siyahala , wanaoma 'oiguwa ma we'aha wanuma .
43007038	Weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaila 'igwae , ‘ Taiyawedi 'agu tohemisaowedi , 'atediyega we'aha 'idaudau tomota yawasidi weyahina . ’ ”
43007039	Yesu 'ihehegwaegwae Yaluyaluwa Tabuna weyahina , ma muliyetega 'abwa 'ana tohemisaowedi Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oidiya 'iluhu . Tutaina beno 'oina , Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'abwa geya tomota 'oidiya 'iluhu , weyahina Yesu 'abwa geya 'ihane 'ina 'ebeloina 'oina .
43007040	Yesu 'ina hegwaegwae tomota sihesagoheya 'oinega tupwana baibaiwadi siboidimo 'oidiya sigwae , “ Moisa tuwa , loheya bewa palopitaina sigwaegwaeneya . ”
43007041	Ma tupwadi sigwae , “ Tauna tuwa To'abihetenaina . ” Ma tupwadi wete sigwae , “ Moisa wanuwatuhuya 'abehega To'abihetenaina Galili 'oinega 'itauyama ? Cana 'ita geya sowasowahina .
43007042	Weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaila pwaiya 'abehega To'abihetenaina nata tubudai Debida 'ina susu 'oinega 'itauyama . Ma wete Debidaina 'ina 'asa Bedeliyema 'oina , nata To'abihetenaina 'oina 'ili'u . ”
43007043	Bewa 'oinega , tomota 'oidiya miya wasiwasi 'ilatuwa .
43007044	Tomotaedi tupwadi nuwanuwadi ma Yesu si'abiyahi , ma hesi geya 'eta taiya 'oidiyega Yesu 'wapina 'i'abitoho .
43007045	Coinega tuilalaedi silohihila topwaoli madoudi ma wete Palisiyao 'oidiya , 'oinega 'inapwanaowedi 'idi tuilalaedi sihesilalediya sigwae , “ To'aha weyahina geya wa'abiyahi ma watauyeyama ? ”
43007046	Coinega tuilalaedi sigwae , “ Loheya nage 'ina gwae mabwaiyana bwebwe'adi . Geya 'eta taiya gidemusa . ”
43007047	Coinega Palisiyedi sigwae , “ Nuwana 'ihenuwa 'ewegomiya , 'awa ?
43007048	Ma hesi wada sanapu 'abehega geya 'eta taiya 'inapwanao 'oidiyega bo wete tauma Palisiyao 'oimega Yesu 'ihemisae .
43007049	Boda baibaiwadi hesi sihemisaeya , weyahina taudi Mosese 'ina loinao geya sisanapudi , 'oinega taudi Yehoba 'ina loina mwau hedadena nata siloba . ”
43007050	Toloinaedi 'oidiyega 'aigeda sanina Nikodimo , tauna mwalona nihuwanega Yesu 'oina 'itauya ma mahetena sihegwaegwaeya . Nikodimoina toloinaowedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae ,
43007051	“ Tauda 'ida loina 'abehega geya'abwa taloiloina bwagabwaga , ma hesi loheya tahesilalae ma 'ina pui tabesa nugete , 'abwa muliyetega to'aha 'ana loina ta'ebwae . ”
43007052	Coinega 'inapwanaowedi Nikodimo sihegwae hileya , “ Nuwana 'owa Galili loheyaina , 'awa ? Ma hesi 'eguma Buki He'asisi 'uhasili , nata 'usanapu 'abehega geya 'eta wete palopita Galili 'oinega 'itauyama . ”
43007053	Muliyetega mabwaiyadi silohihila 'idi hada 'oidiya .
43008001	Ma Yesu 'ilatuwa , 'itauya Olibe 'oyana 'oina .
43008002	Gona 'i'adaleya ma Yesu wete 'ilohihila Hada He'asisi 'alona , ma tomota mabwaiyadi wete simiya 'wabu'wabuya ma tauna wete 'imiyatoiya ma 'ihe'itediya .
43008003	Muliyetega loina 'adi tohe'itao ma wete Palisiyao wahine 'aigeda sitoeyama Yesu 'oina . Weyahina wahineina si'italobeya pui 'ipaihoweya , 'oinega sihetoholoya tomota gamwagamwanidiya , ma Yesu sihegwaeya sigwae ,
43008004	“ Tohe'ita , wahine bewa 'alobeya pui 'ipaihoweya .
43008005	Tauda 'ida loina Mosese 'i'ebwaegita 'abehega 'eguma taiyawedi tolopui talobadi wahine bewa gidemusa , 'abehega 'ilobwainediya ma da'ule 'oidiyega ta'ahu yamatedi ma si'amasa . Ma hesi 'owa togidega 'ino nuwatuhu wahine bewa weyahina ? ”
43008006	Gwae bewa si'inaneya ma 'abehega 'oinega Yesu 'ina 'abo siloba ma wete siheyatalae . Ma hesi 'idi gwaeina Yesu geya 'ihemaise , tuwa 'imiya bwasibwasi'a'a ma negwanegwala 'oina nimanega 'ilelelele .
43008007	Taudi 'abwa tuwa sihehesilala dada , 'oinega Yesu 'itoholowa ma 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Ceguma 'omi 'oimiyega taiya geya 'ina puimo , bewa tuwa da'ule 'i'ewa ma wahineina 'oina 'iula nugeta . ”
43008008	Coinega 'imiya bwasibwasi'a'a hila ma wete negwanegwala 'oina 'ilelelele .
43008009	Beno 'oina Yesu 'ina gwae sihesagoheya ma 'aigeda 'aigeda 'idi pui sinuwatuhudiya ma 'oinega silatulatu . Cinapwanaowedi sihapwesa nugeta , ta baibaiwadi simuliya , eeta siteluwaedi Yesu ma wahineina 'itotoholo ba'idana si'ebesinediya .
43008010	Muliyetega Yesu 'isapaila hila ta wahineina 'ihesilaleya 'igwae , “ Loheloheyaedi ta'ehega siha'esa ? Ta geya 'eta taiya 'imiya hila ma tauna 'ihe'ewago ? ”
43008011	Ma wahineina 'igwaeya , “ Cinapwana , geya 'eta taiya . ” Coinega Yesu wete 'igwaeya , “ Bwebwe'ana , taugu nata geya'abwa wete yahehe'ewago . Coinega bewa tuwa 'utauya ma hesi sahena wete 'upuipui hila . ”
43008012	Coinega Yesu wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Taugu gogo gabulena 'ana 'asilala . Ma taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma wamuliyegau , nata taugu 'asilalaina yawasimi 'oidiya yasae hane , ma 'oinega geya'abwa guguyou 'oina watautauya . ”
43008013	Ma hesi Palisiyedi Yesu sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Cowa hene 'uboi weyahiu 'uhehegwaegwae , 'oinega geya wete 'ahemisamo . ”
43008014	Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Yaboi moisa weyahigu yahehegwaegwae , ma hesi to'aha gide 'igu hepwaila , mabwaiyadi hepwaila moisa . Weyahina yasanapuya ta'ehega yatauyama ma wete yasanapuya ta'eha yatautauya . Ma hesi 'omi geya wasanapu ta'ehega yatauyama ma wete geya wasanapu ta'eha yahaha'esa .
43008015	Comi , 'imi hesinuwa mebale'u 'idi hesinuwa gidemusa . Ma hesiyage taugu geya 'eta taiya weyahina yada hesinuwa , bo nuwana yada loina .
43008016	Ma 'eguma tomota weyahidi yahesinuwa , nata 'igu loina mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana . Weyahina loinaina geya yaboi 'igu loina , ma hesi Tamagu tauna 'ihesumanegauma mahetegu 'ima loinega yaloiloina .
43008017	Mosese 'ina loinaedi wasanapudiya 'abehega 'eguma tohepwaila siteluwa 'oidiyega 'idi hepwaila mahemahetena , beno hepwaila moisa .
43008018	Taugu yaboi weyahigu yahehepwaila , ma Tamagu wete weyahigu 'ihehepwaila , tauna 'ihesumanegauma . ”
43008019	Coinega sihesilaleya sigwae , “ Tamauina ta'eha 'imiyamiya ? ” Ma Yesu 'enadi 'ihemaiseya , 'igwae , “ Geya wasanapugau , 'oinega Tamagu wete geya wasanapu . Ma 'eguma moisa wada sanapugauwa , Tamagu wete wada sanapuya . ”
43008020	Yesu 'ina he'itaedi bewa , Hada He'asisi 'oina 'ihe'itaediya , helau 'adi 'ebe do'ona deidiya . Ma hesi geya 'eta taiya Yesu 'i'abiyahi , weyahina 'ina tuta 'abwa geya 'iloba .
43008021	Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya , “ Cabwa nata ya'ebe sinegomi , ma hesi 'asainaina 'oina yatautauya geya sowasowahimi ma 'oina watauyawa . Weyahina nata moisa wa'ebesegau , ma hesi nata 'imi pui 'oidiyega wa'amasa . ”
43008022	Coinega meYudiyaedi siboidimo 'oidiya sigwae , “ To'aha 'ina gwaeina 'ana sanapu , weyahina 'igwaeya 'abehega 'asainaina 'oina 'itautauya , geya sowasowahida ma 'oina tatauya ? Bo nuwana 'iboimo 'abehega 'ilohe'amasa hile ? ”
43008023	Ma Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya , 'igwae , “ Comi gogo gabulena 'oinega walatuma , ma taugu hesiyage tabwanega yasuluma . Coinega 'omi moisa 'imi gogo bewa , taugu geya .
43008024	Beno huhuna 'oinega yahegwaegomiya 'abehega 'imi pui nata 'oidiyega wa'amasa , 'eguma geya wahemisaegau taugu . ”
43008025	Coinega taudi wete Yesu sihegwaeya sigwae , “ To loheya hede 'owa ? ” Ta tauna wete 'enadi 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Mwalona yahegwae pwaigomiya taugu taiya . ”
43008026	Ma wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Sowasowahigu ma ginaula baibaiwadi weyahidi yahegwaegwae ma wete weyahidi yaloina , ma hesiyage tauna 'ihesumanegauma mumugana mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana . To'aha gidemusa 'oinega yahesagohediya , beno tuwa taudi weyahidi yahehegwaegwae mebale'u 'oimiya . ”
43008027	Ma hesi taudi tuwa Yesuina 'ina gwaeina 'oidiya Tamana weyahina geya nuwadi 'i'asilala tohona .
43008028	Ma Yesu wete 'igwaeya , “ Taugu Loheyaiguina moisa 'abwa nata wa'abi hanehegau ma beno 'oina nata wasanapugau taugu taiya , ma wete wasanapu 'abehega taugu geya yaboi 'igu nuwatuhu 'oinega yada paihowa , ma hesi to'aha gide Tamagu 'ihe'itegauwa 'oidiyega yahehegwaegwae .
43008029	Tauna 'ihesumanegauma geya 'i'ebesinegau , deiguwa 'imiyamiya . Weyahina tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'igu paihowa 'oidiyega ya'abi'abi heyaliyaya . ”
43008030	Yesu 'ina gwaeina bewa tomota tupwana baibaiwadi sihesagoheya , 'abwa hesi sihemisae bwaibwainiya .
43008031	Coinega meYudiyaedi taudi Yesu sihemisaeya , 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Cigu he'ita 'eguma wamuliyedi , 'omi moisa 'agu tomuliyao .
43008032	Ma 'oinega sanapu moisa waloba , ma sanapuina 'oinega lihasa waloba . ”
43008033	Ma taudi Yesu sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Ciya , tauma hene Ebalahamo 'ina bodao , geya 'eta taiya wete 'ina loina 'oinega 'ipaimai . Ma to'aha weyahina 'ugwaeya 'abehega lihasa 'oiuwega 'aloba ? ”
43008034	Coinega Yesu wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oimiya , taiyawedi 'eguma 'idi paihowa galadi , taudi beno bodaedi geya lihasa 'oina simiyamiya . Weyahina ginaula galadi 'ina waiwai 'oinega 'ipaidiya .
43008035	Weyahina topaihowa taudi geya lihalihasidi , tuta mabwaiyana geya susu 'ina boda 'oina sida miya hataya . Ma hesi toni hada natuna tauna susu 'ina boda 'ona miyamiya hatayana .
43008036	Comi wete gidemusa , 'eguma toni hada natunaina 'ilihasigomi 'omi nata bewa tuwa lihalihasimi .
43008037	“ Yasanapu pwaigomiya 'omi Ebalahamo 'ina bodao , ma hesiyage watohotoho ma 'abehega walohe'amasigau . Weyahina 'igu he'itao geya 'atemiya wada lagudiya .
43008038	Ma hesiyage taugu to'aha gide Tamagu 'ihe'itegauwa , wete gide 'oimiya yahehegwaegwaenedi . Comi hesi to'aha gidemusa tamamiu 'oinega wahesagoheya , wete gide wapaipaihowa 'esedi . ”
43008039	Coinega Yesu 'enana sihemaiseya sigwae , “ Ciya , tauma heneyage Ebalahamo tamamai . ” Ma Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Ceguma 'omi moisa Ebalahamo natunao , 'ina paihowega wada paihowa .
43008040	Ma hesi 'omi 'imi paihowa hagana , weyahina watohotoho ma 'abehega taugu gwaeina moisaina 'ana tohepwailina Yehoba 'oinega walohe'amasigau . Ma wete paihowaedi bewa gide wapaipaihowa 'esedi , geya gidemusa Ebalahamo 'ina paihowa .
43008041	Comi hene waboi tamamiu 'ina paihowa 'oinega watautauya . ” Coinega Yesu 'enana sihemaiseya sigwae , “ Tauma geya tama budabudaima , tauma hene tamamaina 'aigeda tuwa Yehoba . ”
43008042	Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Comi 'eguma moisa Yehoba tamamiu , wada helauwegauwa . Weyahina taugu Yehoba 'ihesumanegauma , ma 'asa bewa 'oina yatauyama . Ma geya 'abehega yaboi 'igu nuwatuhuwega yatauyama 'asa bewa 'oina , ma hesi tauna 'ihesumanegauma 'ina nuwatuhu 'oinega yatauyama .
43008043	Coinega to'aha weyahina 'igu gwae geya wada sanapudiya ? Nuwana 'igu hepwailaedi geya wada hesagoha bwaibwainidiya .
43008044	Comi hesiyage Seitani tamamiu , 'oinega nuwanuwami ma tamamiuina 'ina nuwatuhuwedi wapaihowadi . Weyahina sauga 'ebe hegaina hauhau 'oinega 'itauyama , tauna tolohe'amasa moisa . Geya 'eta wete 'eda dumwadumwaluna 'oinega 'ida tauya . Weyahina geya 'eta wete gwae moisa 'oina 'ida miyana . Tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'e'abo'abo 'oidiyega 'ihehegwaegwae , weyahina tauna tuwa beno gidemusa mumugana , ma wete tauna to'e'abo'abowao mabwaiyadi tamadiu .
43008045	Ma hesiyage taugu gwae moisa 'oimiya yahehepwailedi , ma geya wada hemisaegauwa .
43008046	“ Ma togidega ? Sowasowahimi ma 'eta taiya 'oimiyega 'igu 'eda galadi 'ihepwailedi ? Nuwana geya sowasowahimi , 'awa ? Coinega 'eguma gwae moisa 'oidiyega yahehegwaegwae , to'aha weyahina geya wada hemisaegauwa ?
43008047	Weyahina taiya 'eguma moisa Yehoba 'oinega 'itauyama , tauna moisa Yehoba 'ina gwae 'ana tohesagoha bwaibwaina . Ma 'omi hesi nuwana geya Yehoba 'oinega watauyama , 'oinega Yehoba 'ina gwae geya wada hesagohediya . ”
43008048	MeYudiyaedi 'idi 'inapwanao Yesu 'ina gwaeina sihemisaeya , sigwae , “ Mwalona 'ima gwae weyahiu , 'ana moisa 'ilatu pwaima . Weyahina 'agwaeya 'abehega 'owa Sameliya loheyaina , ma wete hi'ahi'a 'oiuwa 'imiyamiya . ”
43008049	Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Taugu geya hi'ahi'a 'oiguwa , weyahina Tamagu yahe'asisiyaneya , ma hesi geya wahe'asisiyanegau .
43008050	Taugu moisa yaboi geya sanigu yada 'abi haneheya . Toloina 'aigeda tauna hesi sanigu 'i'abi'abi hanehe .
43008051	Coinega yagwae moisa 'oimiya taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma 'igu gwae wagwahu bigadi , 'omi nata geya'abwa wa'ama'amasa . ”
43008052	Coinega meYudiyaedi wete sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Cabwa hesi 'asanapu bwaibwainigowa , tomada 'abe hi'ahi'a 'oiuwa 'imiyamiya . Weyahina Ebalahamo 'asanapuya 'i'amasa pwaiya ma wete palopitao 'asanapudiya si'amasa pwaiya . Ma 'ugwaeya 'abehega taiyawedi 'eguma 'ino gwae sihegwahu bigadi , geya'abwa si'ama'amasa .
43008053	Tamamaina Ebalahamo 'i'amasa pwaiya , 'oinega sahena 'utohotoho ma 'abehega tamamaina 'ulagu suluhe ma 'uboi 'ulagu hanehego . Palopitao wete si'amasa pwaiya , 'oinega sahena wete 'utohotoho ma 'abehega 'ulagu suluhedi , 'awa ? ”
43008054	Eema Yesu 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Taugu 'eguma yaboi moisa yahehepwatu hilegau , 'agu hepwatuina ginaula bwagabwaga . Ma hesi Tamagu tauna moisa 'agu tohepwatuina , tauna tuwa wagwaeneya 'abehega 'imi Yehoba .
43008055	Ma hesi tauna geya wasanapu toho , yaboi tuwa yasanapuya . Ma 'eguma yagwae , ‘ Geya yasanapu , ’ nata ya'abowegomi gidemusa 'omi wa'e'abo'abo . Ma hesiyage tauna yasanapu bwaibwainiya 'oinega 'enanaina yagwahugwahu bigadi .
43008056	Tamamiuina Ebalahamo ma'ina yaliyaya ma 'abehega 'igu sabwelo 'i'ita , 'oinega 'igu sabweloina 'i'iteya ma 'iyaliyaya madouna . ”
43008057	Coinega meYudiyaedi Yesu sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Cowa 'abwa geya 'ino bolime pipiti 'uloba ma 'ugwaeya 'abehega Ebalahamo 'u'iteya . ”
43008058	Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya , 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oimiya , taugu nugeta yamiyamiya , 'abwa muliyetega Ebalahamo 'ili'uwa . ”
43008059	Coinega meYudiyaedi da'ule si'ewediya ma 'abehega si'ahu yamate , ma Yesu 'oidiyega 'iha'waiha ma Hada He'asisi 'oinega 'ilatuwa ma 'itauya .
43009001	Hali sabwelo 'oina Yesu 'itautauya ta 'edai loheya 'aigeda mata gibugibuina 'ilobeya , loheyaina 'ina mata gibugibuina 'ina sauga li'u 'oinega .
43009002	Ma Yesu 'ana tomuliyao sihegwae sigwae , “ Tohe'ita , taiya 'ina pui 'oinega loheya nage 'ili'uwa mata gibugibuina ? Ciboimo tuwa 'ina pui bo sinana ma tamana 'idi pui ? ”
43009003	Coinega 'enadi Yesu 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Geya tauna 'ina pui 'oinega , bo nuwana sinana ma tamana 'idi pui 'oinega . Ma hesi tuwa nage gidemusa matana 'igibuwa ma 'oinega tomota mabwaiyadi Yehoba 'ina paihowa waiwaina si'ita , loheyaina 'oinega .
43009004	Tauna 'ihesumanegauma 'ina paihowa sowasowana tapaihowadi sabwelo 'oina , weyahina nihuwana 'eguma 'ilatu , geya sowasowahina tapaihowa .
43009005	Coinega tutaina taugu bale'uwa yamiyamiya , taugu tuwa bale'uina 'ana 'asilalaina . ”
43009006	Gwae bewa 'i'inanediya 'igumwala , ma bale'uwa 'i'esoha ma 'esohanaina 'oinega bale'u mahetena 'ihinisiya ta dobadoba'a 'ipaihoweya , ma 'oinega loheyaina mata gibugibuinaina matana 'oina 'i'e'abi'abiyeya . Cigumwala
43009007	ma 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Cutauya Sailome we'ahina 'oina matauina 'ubuyo . ” ( Sailome 'ana bui beno hesumane . ) Coinega loheyaina 'itauya Sailome we'ahina 'oina , matanaina 'ibuyoya ma 'ibwebwe'ana ma wete 'ihilama .
43009008	Muliyetega loheyaina 'iyanaowedi ma wete tomotaedi taudi loheyaina sisanapuya 'abehega tauna tolo'ahwa'ahwanoi ta sigwae , “ Tauna bewa tolo'ahwa'ahwanoi hedahedada sauga mabwaiyana 'imiyamiya ma 'ilolo'ahwa'ahwanoi , 'awa ? ”
43009009	Coinega tupwadi sigwae , “ Cehe , tauna tuwa beno loheyainaina . ” Ma wete tupwadi sigwae , “ Ciya , hagana , ma hesi loheya 'aigeda 'ana 'ita tauna gidemusa . ” Ma 'iyamo loheyaina 'iboimo 'ihepwaila hileya 'igwae , “ Geya , taugu tuwa tolo'ahwa 'ahwanoiina . ”
43009010	Coinega sihesilaleya sigwae , “ Togidega matau 'ibwebwe'ana 'esa ? ”
43009011	Ma loheyainaina 'enadi 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Loheya 'aigeda sanina Yesu dobadoba'a 'ipaihoweya ma matagu 'oina 'i'e'abi'abiyeya , ma 'ihegwaegauwa 'igwae , ‘ Cutauya Sailome we'ahina 'oina matauina 'ubuyo . ’ Coinega yatauya we'ahina 'oina mataguina yabuyoya , 'oinega nige bewa mataguina 'ibwebwe'ana . ”
43009012	Ta wete sihesilala hileya sigwae , “ Ta'eha tauna loheyainaina ? ” Ma 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Cinamuge , geya yasanapu . ”
43009013	Yesu loheyaina matana 'i'abi'abi hebwebwe'aneya Sabati 'ana sabwelo 'oina . Coinega tomata gibugibuina sitoeya ma sitauyeya Palisiyao 'oidiya .
43009014	
43009015	Ma Palisiyedi tomata gibugibuina wete sihesilala hileya sigwae , “ Togidega matauina 'ibwebwe'ana 'esa ? ” Coinega 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Dobadoba'a 'ipaihoweya ma mataguwa 'i'e'abi'abiyeya ma we'aha 'oina yabuyoya ma mataguina 'ibwebwe'ana . ”
43009016	Coinega Palisiyedi tupwadi sigwae , “ Matauina 'ana topaihowaina , tauna geya Yehoba 'oinega 'itauyama . Weyahina Sabati 'ana loina geya 'ida muliyediya . ” Ma tupwadi wete sigwae , “ Togidega , togala 'eta sowasowahina ma 'ila'ilala bewa gidemusa 'ipaihowa 'ese ? Bo geya 'eta taiya sowasowahina , 'awa ? ” Bewa 'oinega wataha 'oidiya 'ilatuwa . Weyahina boda tupwadi 'idi gwae hagadi ma hali boda wete 'idi gwae hagadi .
43009017	Muliyetega Palisiyedi wete tomata gibugibuina sihesilala hileya sigwae , “ Cowa togidega 'ino nuwatuhu matau 'ana to'abi hebwebwe'anaina weyahina ? ” Coinega tauna 'igwaeya , “ Tauna palopita 'aigeda . ”
43009018	Ma hesi meYudiyaedi loheyaina geya sihemisae 'abehega tauna moisa mata gibugibuina ma 'abehega bewa tuwa matana 'ibwebwe'ana hila . Coinega sinana ma tamana sibwauwediya
43009019	ma sihesilalediya sigwae , “ Tauna bewa moisa natumiu ? Ma wete wasanapuya 'abehega mamata gibugibuina 'ili'uwa ? Ma wete togidega ta matana 'ibwebwe'ana hila ? ”
43009020	Coinega loheyaina sinana ma tamana Palisiyao 'enadi sihemaiseya sigwae , “ Tauma bewa moisa natumai , ma wete 'asanapuya 'abehega mata gibugibuina 'ili'uwa .
43009021	Ma hesi geya 'asanapu togidega matana 'ibwebwe'ana 'esa . Ma wete geya 'asanapu taiya matana 'i'abi hebwebwe'aniya . Ma mane hana tauna wahesilala . Tauna bo'iyage 'ihemadou pwaiya , sowasowahina ma 'iboi weyahina 'ihegwaegwae . ”
43009022	Sinanaina ma tamanaina gwae bewa si'inanediya weyahina meYudiya 'idi tohanugetao simatautediya . Weyahina meYudiya 'idi loina silaguya 'abehega taiyawedi 'eguma Yesu si'ahwa To'abihetena , taudi nata hada tapwalolo 'oinega sipa'idi .
43009023	Bewa huhuna 'oinega loheyaina tamana ma sinana sigwaeya sigwae , “ Mane hana tauna wahesilala ma 'iboi weyahina 'ihegwaegwae , weyahina 'ihemadou pwaiya . ”
43009024	Coinega wete tomata gibugibuina sibwau hileya ma sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Cuhepwaila bwaibwaina 'oima , weyahina loheyaina 'asanapu bwaibwainiya tauna togala . ”
43009025	Ma 'igwaeya , “ Geya yasanapu nuwana tauna togala , bo nuwana geya . Ma tuwa beno yasanapuya matagu 'igibuwa ma 'i'abihe bwebwe'anigauwa . ”
43009026	Coinega 'oina sihesilala , sigwae , “ To'aha matauina 'oina 'ipaihoweya ma 'ubwebwe'ana ? ”
43009027	Ma tauna wete 'ihegwaediya , “ Nige heneyage yahegwae pwaigomiya ma 'enagu geya wahesagohe . To'aha weyahina 'abehega wahesagoha hila ? Nuwana nuwanuwami ma 'abehega wamuliye , 'awa ? ”
43009028	Ma hesi taudi siheliyeya sigwae , “ Cowa tuwa 'ana tomuliyaina , taiya hedeyage . Ma tauma Mosese 'ana tomuliyao ,
43009029	weyahina 'asanapuya 'abehega Yehoba 'ina hepwailao 'i'ebwaeya Mosese 'oina . Ma hesi loheyaina beno geya 'asanapu ta'ehega 'itauyama . ”
43009030	Loheyaina 'enadi 'ihemaiseya 'igwae , “ Cebe nuwa henainaida , weyahina loheyaina matagu 'i'abi hebwebwe'aneya , ma hesi geya wasanapu ta'ehega 'itauyama .
43009031	Ta wete mabwaiyada tasanasanapu 'abehega Yehoba geya sowasowahina ma togala 'enadi 'ihesagohedi , beno tuwa 'eguma taiya Yehoba 'ihe'asisiyane ma 'ina nuwatuhu 'ipaihowadi , nata tauna 'enana Yehoba 'ihesagohedi .
43009032	Ma wete tasanasanapu 'abehega bale'u 'ana hemasalaha hauhau 'oinega ta nige bewa , geya 'eta taiya wasana tahesagohe 'abehega tomata gibugibu 'i'abi'abi hebwebwe'anedi .
43009033	Loheyaina beno 'eguma geya Yehoba 'oinega , geya sawasawahina ma 'ila'ilala bewa gide 'ipaihowa 'ese . ”
43009034	Ta Palisiyedi loheyaina sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Cino li'u hauhau 'oinega 'itauyama 'owa 'aigeda topui . Ma bewa 'abehega 'utohotoho ma 'uhe'itemai , 'awa ? Taiya 'owa nigeyage ? ” Coinega loheyaina hada tapwalolo 'oinega sipa'iya ma 'ilatuwa .
43009035	Loheyaina wasana Yesu 'ihesagoheya 'abehega hada tapwalolo 'oinega sipa'iya , 'oinega 'itauya loheyainaina 'ibeseya , ta 'ilobeya , ma 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Loheyaina moisa 'uhemisaeya ? ”
43009036	Ma loheyaina 'igwae , “ Cinapwana , taiya 'abehega yahemisaeya ? ”
43009037	Coinega Yesu wete 'ihegwae hileya 'igwae , “ Loheyainaina 'u'ita pwaiya ta tauna bewa tuwa maheteu wahehegwaegwae . ”
43009038	Coinega loheyaina 'igwae , “ Cinapwana , 'abwa hesi yahemisaegowa , ” eeta 'i'etuluha Yesu 'oina .
43009039	Muliyetega Yesu 'igwae , “ Taugu yatauya pwaima bale'uwa ma yaloinaegomi ma 'oinega taiyawedi 'omi mata gibugibuimi , matami sibwebwe'ana hila . Ma hesi taudi sigwaeya 'abehega matadi bwebwe'ana , nata matadi sigibu . ”
43009040	Ta Palisiyedi Yesu deina sitotoholo 'ina gwaeina sihesagoheya ma sigwae , “ Togidega ma tauma 'abehega wete mata gibugibuima , 'awa ? ”
43009041	Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Comi 'eguma mata gibugibuimi , geya'abwa 'imi mumuga galadi . Ma hesi wagwaeya 'abehega matami bwebwe'adi , 'oinega 'imi mumuga galadiyedi 'abwa tuwa simiyamiya . ”
43010001	Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oimiya , taiyawedi 'eguma sipi 'adi 'ali 'ana 'ahwa'eda geya 'oinega siluhu , ma sinao hali tupwega siluhu , taudi sanidi toyagaha .
43010002	Ma hesi taiya 'eguma sipi 'idi 'ahwa'eda moisa 'oinega 'iluhu , tauna sipi 'adi to'itayahina .
43010003	Weyahina 'idi 'ahwa'edaina 'ana to'itayahina 'ahwa'edaina 'iso'e . Ciso'eya ma sipi 'adi to'itayahinaina 'iluhu ma 'ina sipiyedi 'aigeda 'aigeda sanidi 'oidiyega 'ibwaubwauwedi . Cibwauwedi ma 'enana sihesagohe , ma 'inugetedi , silatulatu 'atamana .
43010004	Silatu mabwaiyadi ma 'adi to'itayahinaina 'inugenugeta ma taudi simulimuliyaya . Weyahina 'adi toniina 'enana sisanasanapu ma wete simanasameya .
43010005	Sipiyedi geya sowasowahina ma 'eta taiya hagahagana sihemuli tabubu , ma hesi nata hali loheya 'oidiyega sidena . Weyahina hali loheya 'enadi geya sisanapu ma wete geya simanasamedi . ”
43010006	Yesu gwae hegehegedi bewa 'oidiya 'i'inaneya , ma hesi taudi tuwa geya 'oidiya 'imaedana tohona to'aha weyahina 'ihehegwaegwae .
43010007	Coinega Yesu wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Yagwae moisa 'oimiya , taugu sipi 'idi 'ahwa'eda moisa .
43010008	To'itayahinedi mwalona sinugetama taudi toyagaha , 'oinega 'enadi sipiyedi geya sihesagohedi . ”
43010009	Coinega wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Taugu tuwa bewa sipiyedi 'idi 'ahwa'edaina . Coinega taiyawedi 'omi 'eguma 'oiguwega waluhu , nata bwebwe'ana waloba . Weyahina sauga 'aigeda 'aigeda nata 'oidiya 'oiguwega waluhuluhu ma wete 'oiguwega walatulatu ma modumodu bwebwe'ana 'oidiya wa'ai'ai .
43010010	Ma hesi toyagaha 'idi paihowa beno nata sitauyama siyagaha ma silohe'amasa , ma wete sipi si'abi hegaladi . Taugu hesiyage yatauyama ma 'oinega 'oiguwega tomota yawasidi bwebwe'ana ma mahamahana siloba . ”
43010011	Coinega wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Taugu moisa sipi 'adi to'itayahina bwebwe'agu , weyahina yawasigu yatagwaleya ma 'abehega 'igu sipi weyahidi ya'amasa .
43010012	Ma hesiyage taiya 'eguma geya sipi 'adi to'itayahina moisa ma maisamo weyahina 'ipaipaihowa , tutaina 'eguma 'edewa sasasasaina 'i'ita 'itautauyama , nata sipiyedi 'i'ebesinedi ma 'idena . Cabwa hesi 'edewaina sasasasaina 'inaoma ma sipi tupwadi 'ilohe'amasidi ma mabwaiyadi 'ipa'i lelewanedi .
43010013	Loheyaina bewa gidemusa nata 'idena weyahina tauna tuwa maisamo weyahina 'ipaipaihowa , tauna geya sipiyedi weyahidi 'inuwatuhu . ”
43010014	Coinega wete 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Ma taugu hesi sipi 'adi to'itayahina bwebwe'agu , weyahina 'igu sipiyao mabwaiyadi yasanasanapudi ma wete taudi sisanasanapugau .
43010015	Gidemusa tuwa , Tamagu 'isanasanapugau ma wete taugu Tamagu yasanasanapu . Eema yawasigu yatagwaleya ma 'igu sipi weyahidi ya'amasa .
43010016	Cigu sipi tupwadi wete simiyamiya taudi tuta bewa 'oina geya 'igu 'ali 'alona simiyamiya . Ma hesi yatohotoho ma sipidiyedi yatoedima , ma 'oinega 'enagu sihesagohe ma 'oiguwa sinaoma ma'iyadiyao siheboda 'aigeda , ma wete 'aneyage 'adi to'itayahina 'aigeda tuwa .
43010017	Tamaguina tauna 'ihelauwegauwa madouna , weyahina yawasigu yatagwaleya ma ya'amasa 'abwa muliyetega yawasigu ya'ewahila .
43010018	Cigu 'amasaina geya 'eta taiya 'iloinaegau ma ya'amasa , yaboi tuwa yatagwalegauwa ma ya'amasa . Sowasowahigu yatagwalegau ya'amasa , ma weteyage sowasowahigu yawasigu ya'ewa hila , weyahina Tamagu bewa gide 'ina nuwatuhu ta wete 'ina loina 'oiguwa . ”
43010019	Yesu 'ina gwaeyedi weyahidi meYudiya siboidimo sihe'ohe'ohena madouna , 'oinega 'oidiya wataha 'ilatuwa .
43010020	Nage 'oina tomota baibaiwa hedade sigwae , “ Loheya beno hi'ahi'a 'oina 'imiyamiya , 'oinega 'i'abi'abi heyauyaule . Sahena 'ina gwae wahehesagohedi . ”
43010021	Ma hesiyage tomota tupwadi sigwae , “ Ciya , bewa geya gidemusa hi'ahi'a 'ina gwae . Weyahina yaluyaluwa bi'i geya sowasowahina tomata gibugibu bewa gidemusa 'i'abi hebwebwe'ana 'ese . ”
43010022	Gogagogai 'ana tuta 'oina guyai 'aigeda Yelusalema 'oina sipaihoweya , beno meYudiya 'idi 'ebe nuwatuhuyahina weyahina beno Hada He'asisi si'abi hemaedana hileya ma sibwa'a he'asisiyane Yehoba 'oina .
43010023	Guyainaina 'oina Yesu Hada He'asisi 'oina 'iyawala dadana 'aigeda biliupa 'oina . Biliupainaina sibwauweya Kini Solomoni 'ina biliupa .
43010024	Nage 'oina meYudiya Yesu siha'wabu'wabuya ma sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'owa 'ima nuwatuhu 'uhehe lahalahadi . Ma to tuta 'oina 'abwa 'oima 'uhepwaila bwaibwaina , 'owa moisa To'abihetenaina bo geya ? ”
43010025	Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Coimiya yahepwaila pwaiya ma geya wahemisaegau . Ma wete paihowaedi Tamagu saninega yapaipaihowadi ta 'oidiyega wete sihepwaila pwaigauwa ,
43010026	ma hesiyage geya wahemisa tohogau , weyahina 'omi geya 'igu sipiyao moisa .
43010027	Weyahina taugu 'igu sipiyao 'enagu sisanasanapu , ma wete taugu yasanasanapudi eema simulimuliyegau .
43010028	Ma wete 'igu sipiyedi yawasidi miyamiya hatayana ya'ebwaediya ma 'oinega geya'abwa sigalagala . Ma wete taudi nata geya'abwa 'eta taiya nimaguwega 'i'waye'wayegau .
43010029	Sipiyedi Tamagu tauna 'i'ebwaegauwa , 'oinega geya 'eta taiya sowasowahina ma Tamagu nimanega 'i'waya . Weyahina tauna ginaula mabwaiyana 'ihemadou sinediya .
43010030	Taugu ma Tamagu 'aigeda tuwa . ”
43010031	Coinega meYudiyaedi da'ule wete si'ewediya ma 'abehega Yesu si'ahu he'amasi ,
43010032	ma Yesuina 'i'itediya ma 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Paihowa bwebwe'adi ma wete baibaiwadi Tamagu 'oinega yapaihowediya 'oimiya ma wa'itediya , ma to paihowa hede weyahina nuwanuwami ma 'abehega da'uleyega walohe'amasigau ? ”
43010033	Coinega meYudiyaedi Yesu 'enana sihemaiseya sigwae , “ Geya 'abehega 'ino paihowa bwebwe'adi weyahidi 'ahunugo , ma hesiyage 'ino gwae hohopa'ala weyahidi 'ahunugo . Weyahina 'owa tuwa loheya masiha ma 'ugwaeya 'abehega 'owa tuwa Yehobaina . ”
43010034	Coinega Yesu wete 'ihegwae hilediya 'igwae , “ Cima loina 'oidiya Buki He'asisi 'oina silele pwaiya Yehoba 'ina gwae 'abehega , ‘ Comi tuwa yehobaedi . ’
43010035	Ma moisa tuwa Yehoba 'ina hepwailaina 'ina Buki He'asisi 'oidiya mabwaiyana geya 'ida 'abowa . Ma bukinaina 'oina 'ihepwaila 'abehega tomotaedi taudi Yehoba 'ina gwae 'i'ebwaediya , ma 'i'ahwa yehobaediya .
43010036	Coinega to'aha weyahina 'igu gwae wanuwatuhuya 'abehega gwae hohopa'ala tutaina yagwaeya 'abehega taugu Yehoba natuna ? Ma hesi wa'ita , taugu 'ihesinuwanegauwa ma 'ihesumanegauma ma yatauyama bale'uwa ma 'ina paihowa yapaipaihowadi .
43010037	Coinega 'eguma taugu geya Tamagu 'ina paihowa yada paihowediya , sahena wete wahehemisaegau .
43010038	Ma 'eguma taugu moisa Tamagu 'ina paihowa yapaipaihowadi , ma geya wahemisaegau , tuwa hede paihowaedi wahemisaedi , 'abwa hesi 'igu paihowaedi 'oidiyega wasanapu bwaibwainigau 'abehega taugu moisa Tamagu 'oiguwa 'imiyamiya ma wete taugu Tamagu 'oina yamiyamiya . ”
43010039	Nage 'oina meYudiyaedi wete sitohoya ma 'abehega si'abiyahi , ma hesi nimadiyega 'ilatuwa ma 'itauya .
43010040	Ci'ebesinediya ma 'ihabala hila Yolidani we'ahina 'oina , beno Yoni 'ina 'ebe hebabitaiso nugenugetana deina , ma 'oina nobwa 'ilo'asa .
43010041	Nage 'oina boda si'autama 'oina ma siboidimo 'oidiya sihegwaegwaeya sigwae , “ Yoni moisa geya 'eta paihowa waiwaina 'ipaihowadi , ma hesiyage 'ina hepwaila loheya bewa weyahina 'ana moisa 'ilatu pwaima , ta wete ta'ahwa moisaeya . ”
43010042	Casainaina 'oina tomota baibaiwadi Yesu sihemisaeya .
43011001	Loheya 'aigeda lolohalaina sanina Lasalo , Bedani loheyaina . Loheyainaina nuhunao siteluwa mahetenao simiyamiya , 'aigeda sanina Meli ma 'aigeda sanina Malida .
43011002	Meliina tauna 'abwa nata Yesu 'ahena 'iheholoi ma wete debanega Yesuina 'ahena 'ilogogosi .
43011003	Coinega tutaina nuhudiuina Lasalo 'ilohala taudi tuwa nuhunaowedi wasa sitauyeya Yesu 'oina sigwae , “ Cinapwana , 'iyauina Lasalo 'ilohala . ”
43011004	Nage 'oina Yesu Lasalo wasana 'ihesagoheya 'oinega tomota 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Lohalaina beno 'ana sanapu nata geya'abwa yawasina 'igumwagumwala . Ma hesi lohala nage 'oina 'ilatuwa ma 'oinega tomota mabwaiyadi Yehoba sihepwatuwe ma wete natunaina sihepwatuwe . ”
43011005	Yesu Malida matasina ma wete nuhudiuina Lasalo 'ihelauwediya madouna .
43011006	Eeta tutaina Lasalo wasana 'ihesagoheya 'asainaina 'oina 'imiyamiya , 'oina sabwelo 'eluwa 'imiya hila .
43011007	Sabwelowedi 'eluwa sigumwala ma 'ana tomuliyaedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Bewa tuwa talohihila Yudiya . ”
43011008	Coinega 'ana tomuliyaedi sihegwaeya sigwae , “ Cinapwana , sahena tatautauya 'asainaina 'oina . Weyahina 'eguma tatauya , nata meYudiya da'uleyega si'ahu he'amasigo . ”
43011009	Coinega Yesu 'ana tomuliyaedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Sabwelo 'ana mabwaiyana beno gonagona 'oinega ma 'itauya 'ana siga lahilahi . Sabweloina 'oina 'eguma 'eta taiya loheya 'itauya , nata geya'abwa 'ihehetupatupa . Weyahina gogo gabulena 'ana maedana 'imiyamiya .
43011010	Ma hesi 'eguma 'eta loheya nihuwanega 'itauya , nata 'ihetupa deyadeya . Weyahina nihuwana 'oina geya 'eta wete he'ala hemaedana 'imiyamiya . ”
43011011	Gwaeyedi 'i'inanediya ma wete 'oidiya 'igwaeya , “ Ciyadaina Lasalo 'i'eno sineya , 'oinega yatauya ma yahano . ”
43011012	Coinega 'ana tomuliyaedi sigwae , “ Cinapwana , 'eguma moisa 'i'eno sineya , nata moisa 'ana lohalaina 'oinega 'ibwebwe'ana hila . ”
43011013	Weyahina tomuliyaedi 'idi nuwatuhu 'abehega Lasalo moisa 'i'eno sineya Yesu weyahina 'ihehegwaegwae . Ma hesi Yesu 'ina gwae 'ana sanapu 'abehega Lasalo moisa yawasina 'igumwala pwaiya .
43011014	Coinega Yesu 'igwae latu bwaibwaina 'oidiya 'igwae , “ Lasalo yawasina 'igumwala pwaiya .
43011015	Ma hesiyage ma'igu yaliyaya , weyahina 'ina 'amasaina geya 'oina yamiyamiya ma 'oinega 'igu paihowa waiwaina wa'ita ma wahemisaegau . Ma tuwa wete bwebwe'ana , ma hana tuwa tatauya ma ta'ita . ”
43011016	Coinega Tomasi tauna sibwauweya Didiluwaluwa 'iyanaowedi 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Cida tohe'ita tuwa mahetedai tatauya , 'eguma 'i'amasa , tauda wete ta'amasa . ”
43011017	Coinega tutaina Yesu Bedani deina 'ilatuwa ma wasa 'ihesagoheya 'abehega sabwelo 'ehata sigumwala 'oidiya Lasalo sigaliheya .
43011018	Bedani beno geya bwaga Yelusalema 'oinega ,
43011019	eeta meYudiya baibaiwadi ma'idi 'ate muyamuya sitauyama Malida ma Meli 'abehega nuwadi si'abi hebwebwe'anidi .
43011020	Sauga nage 'oina Malida Yesu wasana 'ihesagoheya 'abehega 'itauyama , 'oinega 'iboinamo 'ilatuwa 'edai Yesu sabi helatuina . Ma Meli beno hadai 'imiyamiya .
43011021	Malidaina Yesu 'ilobeya ma 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Cinapwana , 'owa 'eguma 'ebwa 'uda miyamiyana , nuhugu geya'abwa yawasina 'ida gumwagumwala .
43011022	Ma hesiyage yasanapuya 'abehega 'eguma to'aha weyahina Yehoba 'oina 'u'ahwanoi nata tuwa 'ino 'ahwanoiina maisana 'i'ebwaego . ”
43011023	Coinega Yesu Malida 'ihegwaeya 'igwae , “ Nuhuina nata 'itoholo hila . ”
43011024	Coinega wahineina 'igwae , “ Cehe , yasanapuya nata moisa tuta 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'oina galihega 'itoholo hila . ”
43011025	Coinega Yesu wahineina wete 'ihegwae hileya 'igwae , “ Taugu moisa toholo hila huhuna ma wete yawasi moisa . Ma taiyawedi 'eguma sihemisaegau , tutaina 'eguma yawasidi 'igumwala , yawasi miyamiya hatayana siloba .
43011026	Ma taiyawedi 'eguma mayawasidi ma sihemisaegau , nata geya'abwa yawasidi 'igumwagumwala . Coinega togidega 'igu gwae bewa 'oiuwa , 'uhemisaegauwa bo geya ? ”
43011027	Ta Malida 'igwae , “ Cinapwana , yahemisaegowa 'abehega 'owa To'abihetenaina , Yehoba natuna , gogo gabulena bewa 'oina 'utauyama . ”
43011028	Malida 'ina gwae mulina 'ilohihila hadai ma tasinaina Meli 'ihegwae gahuya 'igwae , “ Ciyagu , Tohe'itaina 'ilatuma ma 'ihesilalegowa . ”
43011029	Nage 'oina Meli tasina 'enana 'ihesagoheya 'oinega 'isiwa toholo mwayamwayauwa ma 'itauya Yesu 'oina .
43011030	Ma hesiyage Yesu 'abwa geya 'asainaina 'oina 'iluhuma , 'abwa tuwa tupwaina Malida 'oina 'ilobeya 'oina 'itotoholo .
43011031	Sauga nage 'oina meYudiyaedi taudi Meli mahetediu sihehedoudouwa Meliina 'ina tauya 'oina si'iteya , ma 'idi nuwatuhu 'abehega 'itautauya galiha 'idou , 'oinega sihemuli tabubuya mahetediu sitauya .
43011032	Coinega tutaina Meli Yesu 'oina 'ilatuwa 'ahena 'ituluha ma 'ihe'asisiyaneya , ma 'igwaeya , 'igwae , “ Cinapwana , 'owa 'eguma 'ebwalai 'ebwa 'uda miyamiya geya'abwa wete nuhuguina yawasina 'ida gumwagumwala . ”
43011033	Yesu nage 'oina 'i'iteya Meli ma meYudiyaedi mahetenao sitauyama sidoudou . Cidi douwega Yesu wete 'atena 'imuyamuya ma nuwana 'igala madouna .
43011034	Ma 'ihegwaediya 'igwae , “ Mane 'oina 'ana galihina ? ” Ma taudi sigwae , “ Cinapwana , 'unaoma tatauya ma 'ahe'itago . ”
43011035	Ta Yesu wete 'idouwa .
43011036	Coinega meYudiyaedi Yesu si'iteya ma sigwaeya , “ Ciyanaina moisa 'ihelauweya madouna . ”
43011037	Ta 'oidiyega tupwadi sigwae , “ Tauna tuwa Yesuina mwalona tomata gibugibu 'i'abihe bwebwe'aniya . Ma to'aha weyahina geya 'itauyama ma 'iyanaina bewa 'ilemema geya'abwa yawasina 'igumwagumwala ? ”
43011038	Beno 'oina Yesu tuwa ma'ina nuwagala madouna ma galihina 'oina 'ilatuwa . Galihina duluha , 'oinega 'ahwanaina da'ule tabatabana 'oinega silagu 'ausiya .
