44027024	ta 'ihegwaegauwa , 'Paulo , sahena 'u'ate'ateyoho ; 'abwama Sisa matana 'utoholo , weyahina 'ino 'ahwanoi 'oinega waga 'ana togeluwao mabwaiyadi mahetemwao Yehoba 'i'abihetegomi . ’
44027025	Ma tasigwao , sahena wa'ate'ateyoho , weyahina Yehoba yahemiseya , ma nata 'ipaihowa gide tuwa 'ihe'itegauwa .
44027026	Eema bwanabwana 'aigeda 'oina taduna . ”
44027027	Wiki 'eluwa sigumwala , 'abwa hene Ediliya ni'una 'idoedoe dadanemai , ma nihuwana gamwana waga 'ana topaihowao sinuwatuhuya 'abehega 'oya'oya deina 'alatulatu .
44027028	Ma ni'u siloho tohotohoya ta silobeya 'ana saliyana gide tuweniti lihe 'ana saliyana . Ta tupwana 'ahedoe naowa ta wete siliheya ta silobeya ni'u saliyana gide pipitini lihe .
44027029	Ta simatauta tabu ma da'ule 'oina 'aduna , ta waga yiuwega loho 'ehata siulediya , ma si'ahwa'ahwanoi gona 'ada'adale weyahina .
44027030	Ta tupwadi wagaina 'ana topaihowao nuwanuwadi ma wagega sidena , ta waga 'ebe talalaga siulasuluheya holai , ta si'abowa 'abehega loho wete siule waga matanega .
44027031	Ta Paulo tolo'alehao ma 'adi tohanugetao 'ihegwaediya , “ Ceguma loheloheya nage wagega sidena , nata geya'abwa tabwebwebwe'ana . ”
44027032	Ta tolo'alehaowedi waga 'ebe talalaga 'ana balae si'upwa yahuleya ta 'idoeya .
44027033	Ta 'i'iuna ma gona 'i'adale , ta Paulo 'ihegwaediya ma si'ai , 'igwae , “ Sabwelo potini 'ateyoho weyahina ta geya wete 'e'ahai wada lotohoya .
44027034	Coinega 'ilobwainegita ma talohepa'ala , weyahina sahena hesi 'aigeda 'ihehesilae . ”
44027035	Ma gwae bewa 'igwaeneya ta beledi 'i'eweya ta weyahina 'iloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , mabwaiyama matama , ma 'ihisiya , ma tauna 'i'ai nugeta .
44027036	Ta 'oinega mabwaiyama nuwama 'ibwebwe'ana , ta wete 'a'aiya .
44027037	Ta 'ama baibaiwa wagaina 'oina 'ageluwa beno tu handeledi ma sebeniti sikisi .
44027038	Eema 'amwausuwa , ta pwalawa waga 'alonega siuleya holai , ma 'abehega waga 'imalamalai .
44027039	Ta gona 'i'adale pwaiya ta 'oya'oya si'iteya , ta geya si'inana to 'asa , ma 'alo namonamoina si'ita lobeya , 'oinega sinuwanuwatuhu 'eguma sowasowahina wagaina silagahe 'aloina 'oina .
44027040	Ta loho si'upwa yahuleya ma ni'uwa si'abi sinediya , ma wete 'eyaisi 'ana balaeyao silihasidiya ma si'eyaisa , ma 'ole'ole 'ai matana si'u'eya ma si'u'e 'oya'oya weyahina .
44027041	Ma 'alusa 'idoemaiya ta waga 'aheduneya namonamo 'oina , ta waga 'abusuna 'iduna ma geya sowasowahina 'ilonihu , ma gwahuna bagodu 'idi lasa hilehilega ta 'ipisaliya .
44027042	Ta tolo'alehao sinuwanuwatuhu 'abehega paipaidi silohe'amasidi tabu ma tupwadi situbehane 'oya'oya ma sidena .
44027043	Ta 'adi tohanugetaina nuwanuwana ma Paulo 'i'abihete , 'oinega 'i'ausidiya , 'abehega sahena silolohe 'amasidi . Ma hesi 'iloinaedi taudi sowasowahidi ma sitube nugeta ma 'oya'oya weyahina sitube ,
44027044	ma tupwama wagaina tupwatupwana 'oidiyega 'atube laga , ta mabwaiyama ma'ima bwebwe'ana 'atube haneya 'oya'oya .
44028001	Ta 'agayo haneya 'oya'oya , ma bwanabwanaina 'ana tomiyao sihepwaila 'oima 'abehega bwanabwana sanina Melita .
44028002	Ma bwanabwanaedi sihelauwemaiya madouna , ta 'aiwe siholeya , ma mabwaiyama sibwauwemaiya ta 'amwaimwailu , weyahina 'i'wesu'wesu ma gogai wete .
44028003	Ma Paulo 'aiwe 'idomweyama , ta 'aiwe 'oina 'ilagu balediya , ma yahiyahi weyahina ta mwata newanewalina 'ilatuma , ta Paulo nimana 'inaliya .
44028004	Ta bwanabwanaedi si'iteya Paulo nimana mwata 'isanasanana , ta sihehegwaegwae siboidimo , sigwaeya , “ Moisa tuwa , loheya nage tolohe'amasa , ma geya sowasowahina loinega 'iboi 'i'abihete . Bwagana damanega 'idenama 'oya'oya , ma wa'ita mwata 'inaliya . ”
44028005	Ta Paulo mwataina 'ilosepaleya 'aiwe ninininimina 'alona , ma geya muya 'ilolotoho .
44028006	Ta bwanabwanaedi Paulo si'e'ebubuya ta 'idi nuwatuhu nata nimana 'iseseha , nuwana 'itai ma 'i'amasa , ma siyamwayamwa , ta Paulo geya wete 'aigeda to'aha 'i'ewa'ewa , 'oinega 'idi nuwatuhu sibuiya , ta sigwae , “ Loheyaina 'aigeda yehoba . ”
44028007	Bwanabwanaina 'ana bada sanina Pubiliyasi , ta 'ina 'asa tupwaina deina 'aluhuwa , ta Pubiliyasiina sabwelo 'etoi 'oidiya 'i'itayahi bwaibwainimaiya .
44028008	Ma tutaina 'oina Pabiliyasi tamana hadai 'i'eno'eno ma'ina lohala , ta 'ina lohala yahiyahi ma gamwa pilipili . Ta Paulo 'iluhuwa 'oina , ma weyahina 'i'ahwanoiya Yehoba 'oina , ta wahina 'i'abi tohoya ta 'i'abihe bwebwe'aneya .
44028009	Ta bwanabwanaedi mabwaiyadi taudi ma'adi lohala sinaoma Paulo 'oina , ma taudi wete 'i'abihe bwebwe'anediya .
44028010	Coinega helau baibaiwana si'ebwaemaiya , ta 'ima tuta gelu 'oina , 'ama 'alai sowasowahima sido'oya .
44028011	Ta wai'ena 'etoi sigumwala ma Melitega 'agelu Loma weyahina , ta 'ima waga Alekisanidela wagana , matana 'ana tosamala didiluwaluwa loheyadi . Ma wagaina , mwalo wai'ena gogaiyedi 'oidiya bwanabwanaina 'oina 'iyamwayamwana 'ana siga yaumai madouna 'ilolaguwa .
44028012	Ta 'a'u'e ma Sailakiusa 'oina 'asohota , ta sabwelo 'etoi 'amiyamiya .
44028013	Nage 'oina 'asakowasiya Legiyami ta 'asohota . Ci'adaleya , ta yalasi 'itowama , 'oinega 'a'u'e hila , ta 'apilipili , ta sabwelo 'eluwa tuwa ma 'aluhuwa Putioli .
44028014	Putioli 'oina tupwana tohekalesiyao 'alobediya , ta sitoemaiya 'idi hada , ta 'oidiya 'amiyamiya sabwelo sebeni 'oidiya . Ta nage 'oinega 'atauya Loma weyahina .
44028015	Ma tohekalesiyao Loma 'oina tetelima sihesagoheya , ta sitauyama 'edai sihesohotemaiya tupwa Cebegimwane , sanina Apio ma Hada Taumana 'etoi 'oidiya . Ta tutaina Paulo 'iyanaowedi 'ilobediya , Yehoba 'oina 'iloyauwedowa , ma 'i'atepatu .
44028016	Nage 'oinega 'atauya ta Loma 'oina 'alatuwa , ta tolo'alehao Paulo sitagwaleya ma 'imiya wasi , ma 'ana to'itayahina tolo'aleha 'aigeda tuwa .
44028017	Ma sabwelo 'etoi sigumwala , ta Paulo meYudiya 'idi tohanugetao 'ibwau 'autedima . Sihapwesama ta 'ihegwaediya , 'igwae , “ Tasigwao , taugu geya 'eta to'aha galana 'ida boda 'oidiya yapaihowa , nuwana mumugada tubudao 'oidiyega yaligeligehi , ma hesi Yelusalema 'oina si'ebwayaegauwa meLoma 'oidiya , ta deliya silagugauwa .
44028018	Ta 'igu yatala mulina meLomaedi nuwanuwadi ma silihasigau , weyahina geya 'aigeda 'igu pui siloba , ma 'abehega sida lohe'amasigau .
44028019	Ta meYudiya si'oheya gabana 'oina 'abehega sahena silihalihasigau . Bewa huhuna ya'ahwanoiya Sisa 'ina yatala weyahina , ta geya 'abehega 'ida bodao yahe'ewadi .
44028020	Ma hesi taudi 'idi he'ewa 'oiguwa weyahina yabwauwegomiya ma 'ane tahegwaegwae . Moisa tuwa tauda meIsileli tahehemisa 'abehega 'ada lema Yehoba 'oinega 'ilatuma , ta hemisaina bewa weyahina deliya silagugauwa . ”
44028021	Ta meYudiyaedi sigwaeya , “ Tauma geya 'aigeda Yudiyega leta weyahiu 'alobaloba , ma wete 'iyadao 'ebwa sinaonaoma geya sihepwailego 'abehega 'owa galau .
44028022	Ta hesi nuwanuwama 'ahesagohamo 'oiuwega to'aha 'ino nuwatuhuwedi , weyahina tupwa baibaiwadi tomota 'ino boda hekalesiya si'ahwa galegaleya . ”
44028023	Ma sabwelo siupaeya , ma boda madouna si'eto'autama Paulo 'ina hada , ma gonegonega 'ana siga 'iboi 'oidiya 'iguguya , Yehoba 'ina hetoloina weyahina , ta Mosese 'ina loina 'oinega , ma palopitao 'idi gwaeyao 'oidiyega , 'ihe'itediya Yesu weyahina , ta 'itohoya ma 'abehega 'i'abihe 'asilaladi .
44028024	Ta tupwadi sihemiseya ma tupwadi sipa'ala .
44028025	Weyahina 'idi nuwatuhuwao hagana ma hagana , 'oinega sisawala . Ta Paulo 'ina gwae 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'oidiya 'igwaeya , “ Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina gwae tubumiyao weyahidi gwae moisa , beno palopita Aiseya 'ahwanega 'igwaenediya :
44028026	'Cutauya ma tomotaedi 'uhegwaedi : Cabwa wahehesagoha , ma sahena nuwami 'isabwasabwalena . Ta wete tuwa wa'e'ebubuna , ma nata geya wa'ita'ita .
44028027	Weyahina tomota bewa sinuwapota , ma tenadi si'elotuiya , ta matadi si'elogibuwa , tabu ta matadiyega si'ita ma tenadiyega sihesagohe , ma sinuwa sabwalena , ma 'oiguwa si'ita hila , ma ya'abihe bwebwe'anedi . ’ ”
44028028	Ta Paulo 'ina gwaeina wete 'iloheposeyaneya , 'igwae , “ Wasanapu Yehoba 'ina hepwaila 'ada 'abihetena weyahina 'abehega 'ihewaseya taudi 'asa ganamuli geya meYudiya 'oidiya , ma taudi hesi sihesagohe . ”
44028030	Ta Paulo 'ina hada nage 'ihehemaisa eeta 'oina 'imiyamiya bolime 'eluwa 'oidiya , ta tomota baibaiwadi 'ina hadaina siluhuluhu ma mahetenao sihe'iya'iyagu ,
44028031	ta Yehoba 'ina loina weyahina 'iguguguyae ma 'ihehe'itae Bada Yesu Keliso weyahina , ta geya 'aigeda taiya 'itoho ma 'ina guguyaina 'i'ausi .
45001001	Taugu Paulo , Yesu Keliso weyahina yahetopaihowa . Yehoba 'ihesinuwegauwa 'abehega tetelina bwebwe'ana weyahina yahetohepwaila .
45001002	Tetela bwebwe'ana Yehoba mwalo 'igwae hemisaeya 'ina palopitao 'oidiya , ma sileleya Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina .
45001003	Tetelaina beno Yehoba natuna Yesu Keliso he'ote'otetelina . Tauna 'iheloheya masiha Debida 'ina susu 'alonega ,
45001004	ma muliyetega Yehoba yaluyaluwana 'ina waiwaiyega 'amasega 'i'abi hetoholo hileya 'ida Badaina , ta 'i'abi hemasaleheya 'abehega Yesuina Yehoba natuna .
45001005	Yesu Kelisoina tauna 'ihelauwegauwa ma 'ihesinuwegauwa 'abehega yahepwaila weyahina 'asa ganamuli mabwaiyadi 'oidiya , eema 'abehega sitagwala 'oina ma saninega sihemisa .
45001006	Ma 'omi meLoma Yehoba 'ihelau pwaigomiya ta 'ihesinuwegomiya 'abehega weteyage Yesu Keliso 'ina bodaina 'oina wamiyamiya .
45001007	Tamadai Yehoba ma 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'idi helauwega tuwa wamiya daumwala .
45001008	Nugeta , yaloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina Yesu Keliso saninega , weyahina baibaiwami 'omi 'imi hemisa tetelina 'i'edadana 'asa mabwaiyana 'oidiya .
45001009	Yehoba 'isanapugauwa , tuta mabwaiyana yanuwanuwa tuhugomi 'igu 'ahwanoi 'oidiya . Yehobaina 'ina paihowa 'oina yaguibiga hedada , Natuna tetelina 'ana hepwaila weyahina .
45001010	Cigu 'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina tuta mabwaiyana 'eguma togidega 'ida malamalai , ma yatauyawa yahabo'enegomi , 'eguma bewa gide 'ina nuwatuhu .
45001011	Weyahina nuwanuwagu ya'itegomi ma ya'abihetegomi eema Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina 'ebwaya 'oinega wahewaiwai .
45001012	Bewa 'oinega 'omi ma taugu tahe'abi 'abihetena , 'aneyage 'omi 'imi hemisega wa'abihetegau , ma taugu wete 'igu hemisega ya'abihetegomi .
45001013	Tasigwao , wanuwatuhuyahi tuta baibaiwadi 'oidiya yanuwanuwatuhu madouna togidega ma yahabo'enegomi , ma geya 'ida malamalaiya 'oiguwa , weyahina nuwanuwagu ma 'igu habo'ena 'e'enina 'ida hapwesa . Gide 'ane 'igu habo'enaedi taudi hali tupwa ganamuli 'oidiya bewa sauga 'e'enidi silagulagu .
45001014	Weyahina 'ilobwainegauwa gide ma boda mabwaiyadi 'oidiya yapaihowa , taudi 'asa baibaiwadi 'adi tomiyao , taudi wete pwatula 'adi tomiya , ma tonuwa sonosonogao ma tohemwagemwageyao .
45001015	Eeta 'igu nuwatuhu madouna ma meLoma 'omi wete 'oimiya tetela bwebwe'ana yaloguguyae .
45001016	Tetelaina 'ana loguguya weyahina geya yada debamwadina , weyahina Yehoba 'ina waiwai 'oina 'imiyamiya , eeta 'eguma taiyawedi sihemisa 'i'abihetedi , beno tauma meYudiya 'oima ma muliyetega 'omi tomiya ganamuli 'oimiya .
45001017	Ta moisa tuwa tetela bewa 'ihe'itegita 'abehega 'ida hemisamo tuwa 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita . Weyahina Yehoba 'ina buki 'ihepwaila , 'igwaeya , “ Todumwalu 'idi hemisega yawasidi siloba . ”
45001018	Yehoba wetenuge 'ina gamwasowala 'ihe'itaeyama galewega taudi mumugadi galadi mabwaiyadi 'oidiya , weyahina 'idi mumuga galana 'oinega mumuga dumwaluna sihegagaleya .
45001019	Ma Yehoba 'ana nuwatuhu 'i'abi hemasaleheya 'oidiya ta sisanapu pwaiya .
45001020	Yehoba geya tada 'iteya , mwalo hene bale'u 'ipaihoweya ma 'ana siga nige 'ina waiwai miyamiya hatayana tasanasanapu , beno ginaulaedi 'ipaihowediya 'oidiyega , 'abehega tauna Yehoba . Coinega tutaina mebale'u 'ihe'ewadi geya wete 'idi 'ebe gwaehilamo .
45001021	Ma sisanapuya tauna tuwa Yehoba , ma geya sida he'asisineya bo sida loyauwedowa 'oina , ma nuwatuhu besobeso 'oina sihewaiwai , 'oinega 'eda'eda guguyou 'atedi 'ilohemaheya .
45001022	Cabehega siboi si'ahwa'ahwa sonosonogaedi , ta sibuwa .
45001023	Weyahina Yehoba miyamiya hatayana si'ita guipaileya , ma tauna miyalaena beno 'idi 'ebe hemisao ginaula hagadi silagudiya , leleleidi sitagidiya 'adi 'ita gide tomota bo bwasumo bo hebahebai bo hebai 'awa'awalidi . Ginaulaedi sihemisaediya eeta sitapwatapwalolo 'oidiya .
45001024	Coinega Yehoba 'oidiya 'itagwala ma 'idi nuwatuhu dahwadahwanidi 'atediya simiyamiya sipaihowadi , eema nage 'oinega mahetediyao wahidiyega si'etala biyabiyaunedi 'eda'eda galana 'oidiyega .
45001025	Weyahina Yehoba 'ana he'ita moisa siguipaileya , ma 'e'abo'abo 'oinega sihemiyalaeneya , ta Yehoba ginaulaedi 'ipaihowediya 'oidiya si'etala he'asisi , ma hesi topaihowaina silogwahateya , tauna 'ana hepwatu miyamiya hatayana . Emeni .
45001026	Bewa 'oinega Yehoba 'itagwalediya ma 'idi nuwatuhu dahwanedi sipaihowadi . Cidi wahiwahineyao sipaihowa galagala , geya pui 'ana moisega , beno ma'idi 'ehewahiwahineyao silogwali hilediya .
45001027	Loheloheyaedi wete geya wahiwahine mahetediyao sida puiya , ma loheloheya daisidimo nuwanuwadi madouna , 'oinega mahetediyao pui 'ebe debamwadina sipaihoweya . Coinega 'eda galanaina 'ana maisa galana siboimo wahidiya silobaloba .
45001028	Bewa 'oinega Yehoba 'ana nuwatuhu geya nuwadi , eeta Yehoba 'itagwalediya ma nuwatuhu galadi 'ilohemahadi , ma ginaulaedi geya 'adi lobwaina tuwa sipaihowadi .
45001029	Ta gala mabwaiyana 'ilohemahediya , gide tobwatobwa 'ana henuhenuwa , ma mumuga galagala ma he'ipi'ipi ma lohe'amasa ma he'alagwaegwae ma 'e'abo'abo ma sosomane ma hetalapili ,
45001030	ma taudi 'iyadiyao sigwaegwae galagalaedi , ma taudi Yehoba silolo'alehe , ma todebapa'ala ma tonuwa hanehane ma togagasa ma taudi mumuga galana 'ana to'abi hemadouwao , ta weteyage taudi sinadiyao ta tamadiyao geya sida he'asisiyanediya .
45001031	Ta moisa geya 'i'iuna mumugadi 'ida bwebwe'ana , 'oinega geya wete 'adi hemisamo , ta geya 'eta wete helau nuwana 'atemuyamuya 'oidiya .
45001032	Ma hesi tomotaedi Yehoba 'ina loina sisanasanapu , 'abehega 'eguma taiyawedi bewa gide simumuga 'esa , 'amasamo tuwa 'ilobwainediya . Ma tuwa mumuga galaedi sipaipaihowedi , ta 'eguma 'iyadiyao wete sihe'au'aunedi beno si'ahwa bwebwe'anedi .
45002001	Tasigwao , sahena 'iyamiyao mumugadi weyahina wahehetalapili , weyahina 'eguma 'iyamiyao wahehetala piliyedi ma 'omi wete mumuga 'aigedaina wapaipaihowa , beno waboi tuwa wahehetala piliyegomi .
45002002	Ma tasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba tauna 'ana lobwaina ma topaihowa galagalaedi 'iloinaedi .
45002003	Ma 'iyagwao , 'omi hali tomota wahehetala piliyedi , 'imi nuwatuhu 'abehega nata geya Yehoba 'ina bwa'omatana walobaloba , ma hesiyage nata wete 'iloinaegomi , weyahina mumugaedi 'omi gide wete wapaipaihowadi .
45002004	Ma geya sowana Yehoba 'ina helau wasinasinali , weyahina 'i'atemuya muyaegomiya ta 'i'alama'i'itana ma 'abehega 'imi pui 'oidiyega 'i'abi lohihilegomi .
45002005	Ma tuwa debami sipa'ala hedada , 'oinega 'eguma tutaina Yehoba 'ina loina dumwaluna 'i'abi hemasalaha , 'igamwasowalegomi tuwa ,
45002006	weyahina mabwaiyada 'aigeda 'aigeda 'ihemaisegita to'aha gidemusa 'ida paihowa .
45002007	Ma 'eguma tuta mabwaiyana tapaihowa bwebwe'ana ma'ida he'alama'i'ita , ma gide tuwa tapaipaihowa 'esa , ma 'abehega 'ahwa bwebwe'ana ma nata yawasi miyamiya hatayana ta'ewa Yehoba 'oinega , beno moisa tuwa 'abwa yawasida miyamiya hatayana 'i'ebwaegita ,
45002008	ma tupwadi tomota sihe'ahwa pa'ipa'i'i hedada , ta mumuga bwebwe'ana silogwahateya , ta mumuga galana sipaipaihowadi , ee 'oinega Yehoba 'abwa 'igamwasowaledi ma 'iloinaedi .
45002009	Coinega taiyewedi sipaipaihowa galagala , loina mwauna ta muya madouna silobadi , meYudiya nata 'ihenugetedi ee 'abwa 'asa ganamuli .
45002010	Ma taiyawedi mumugadi ta 'idi paihowao bwebwe'adi , Yehoba nata hepwatu ma he'asisi ma miya daumwala 'i'ebwaedi , nugeta meYudiya 'oidiya 'i'ebwaya , ee 'abwa 'asa ganamuli 'oidiya .
45002011	Yehoba nata mabwaiyada 'iloinaegita mahemahetena .
45002012	Ma taiyawedi Mosese 'ina loina geya sisanapu ma sipaipaihowa galagala , 'iloinaedi 'idi puiyedi weyahidi . Wete gide taudi meYudiyaedi Mosese 'ina loinaina sisanapuya , 'eguma sipuiya , 'abwa loinaina 'oinega 'iloinaedi .
45002013	Geya 'abehega loinaina 'ana hesagohamo 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwegita , ma hesiyage 'ina loina 'ana paihowa 'oinega .
45002014	Ma taudi ganamuli Mosese 'ina loina geya 'oidiya , ma tuwa siboi 'idi nuwatuhuwega sipaipaihowa to'aha bwebwe'ana , beno tuwa siboimo 'idi loina .
45002015	Coinega 'idi paihowega tasanapu 'abehega 'atediya loina bwebwe'ana 'imiyamiya . Ma 'oinega siboidimo mumugadi sisanapuya , 'eta tuta galana , nuwana 'eta tuta bwebwe'ana .
45002016	Gide tuwa tetelaina bwebwe'ana yaloguguyaeya 'oimiya , 'abehega bwa'omatana 'ana tuta 'oina Yehobaina Yesu Keliso nata 'ihe'abeiye ma tauna 'ida nuwatuhu dahwadahwaidi weyahidi 'iloinaegita .
45002017	Ma 'omi togidega ? Waboi wa'abi'abi lagasihilegomi ma wagwaeya , “ Tauma meYudiya , Yehoba 'ina loina 'i'ebwaemaiya Mosese 'oinega . ”
45002018	Coinega Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu wasanapu pwaiya , weyahina loinaina 'i'abihe sanapuwegomiya mumuga bwebwe'ana hedada weyahina .
45002019	Ma waboi wa'ahwa tosanapuwegomiya 'abehega tomata gibugibu 'adi tohanugetao , ma taudi tomiya guguyou wa'atuhe 'asilalediya ,
45002020	ma toheyauyaule ta gwagwama 'oidiya wahetohe'ita , 'abehega 'omi Mosese 'ina loina 'oinega sanapu moisa wa'eweya .
45002021	Taiya 'owa hali tomota 'oidiya 'uhehe'ita , ma togidega 'owa ? Ceguma 'oidiya 'ugwae , “ Sahena yagaha ” , ma 'owa toyagaha 'aigeda .
45002022	Bo nuwana 'uhegwaedi , “ Sahena lowahine dadana , ” ma 'owa 'abwa tolowahineina 'aigeda . Ta 'owa 'ugwaeya , “ Taugu 'ebehemisa 'abo'abowedi yaguipailediya ” , ma hesiyage 'ebehemisaedi 'idi hadega 'uyagayagaha .
45002023	Comi moisa wagagasa hedadeya ta wagwaeya , “ Mosese 'ina loina 'oima ” , ma hesi loinaina geya wada muliyeya , 'oinega tupwadi tomota Yehoba si'ahwa 'abo'aboweya .
45002024	Gide Yehoba 'ina Bukiina 'igwaeya , “ Comi meYudiya mumugamiyega tomiya ganamuli Yehoba si'ahwa galegaleya . ”
45002025	Ta moisa tuwa 'omi meYudiya Ebalahamo 'ina 'ila'ilala 'wapi'upwa wahimiya , ma 'eguma Mosese 'ina loinaedi wamulimuliyedi , 'ila'ilalaina ginaula 'ausalana 'oimiya , ta 'eguma loinaedi geya wada muliya bwaibwainidiya , 'ila'ilalaina 'wapimiya beno 'iheginaula besobeso .
45002026	Ma taudi tomiya ganamuli Ebalahamo 'ina 'ila'ilalaina geya wahidiya , ma 'eguma loinaedi sihe'asisiyedi , taudi 'adi 'ita gide 'abwa 'ila'ilalaina 'oidiya .
45002027	Coinega 'omi meYudiya 'abwa tomiya ganamuli sibwa'omategomi , weyahina Mosese 'ina loinaina ta Ebalahamo 'ina 'ila'ilalaina 'wapimiya simiyamiya , ma geya loinaedi wada muliyediya , ma hesi taudi geya meYudiya bwagana Ebalahamo 'ina 'ila'ilala 'wapidiya geya 'ida miya , ma tuwa hesi loinaedi simulimuliyedi .
45002028	Ma gwama Yudiya moisa 'ana 'ila'ilala geya 'abehega ginaula hapwehapwesana wahidiya , ma hesi ginaula dahwadahwanina 'atediya Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'oinega ma geya tomota 'oidiyega , ta wete 'adi 'ahwabwebwe'ana geya wete tomota 'oidiyega , ma hesi Yehoba 'oinega .
45002029	
45003001	Ceguma gide , to'aha hede 'ana bwebwe'ana tauda sigwaegwaenegita sigwaeya meYudiya ? Ma wetenuge to'aha Ebalahamo 'ina 'ila'ilalaina 'ana bwebwe'ana wahida si'upwa'upwa ?
45003002	Ta ginaula bwebwe'adi baibaiwadi 'oida simiyamiya . Ma ginaula nugenugetaina beno Yehoba 'ina gwae 'oida 'ilaguyama .
45003003	Ma togidega , 'eguma tupwadi Yehoba siguipaileya , wanuwatuhuya 'abehega Yehoba wete nata 'iguipailegita , bo geya ?
45003004	Nata geya ! Weyahina bwagana tauda mabwaiyada to'e'abo'abo , ma Yehoba tuwa 'iboimo dumwadumwaluna . Yehoba tauna weyahina 'ina Buki gide 'ihepwaila 'esa , 'igwaeya Cabehega 'ina gwaeyega si'ahwamoisae , ma 'ina yatala 'oina 'ihewaiwai .
45003005	Ma 'eguma 'ida mumuga galana 'oinega Yehoba mumugana bwebwe'ana 'imasaleha bwaibwaina , to'aha nata tagwaene ? Bo nata tagwae , “ Yehoba yo , 'ima mumuga galana weyahina sahena 'uloiloinaemai . ” Moisa bewa yahegwaegwae besobeso tuwa gide tupwadi tomota sigwaegwae 'esa .
45003006	Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega Yehoba tauna toloina dumwadumwaluna , 'oinega bwa'omatana 'ana tuta 'oina nata 'ina loina dumwadumwalunega mabwaiyada 'iloinaegita .
45003007	Coinega tupwadi to'e'abo'abo sigwaegwaenegau , sigwaeya , “ Cino loguguya 'oina 'ugwaeya 'abehega 'igu 'abo 'oinega Yehoba mumugana dumwadumwaluna 'i'abihelatuya tomota 'oidiya ta Yehoba sihepwatuweya , ta nata Yehoba geya sowana 'i'ahwa'ahwa galagalaegau . Coinega 'ilobwainemaiya tauma wete 'apaihowa galagala , ma 'ane ginaula bwebwe'adi silatu . ” Taudi tomotaedi gwaenigu sigwaegwaene 'ilobwainediya Yehoba 'iloinaedi .
45003008	
45003009	Ma togidega tauda meYudiya 'ida miya 'ibwebwe'ana hedadeya , ta taudi tomiya ganamuli 'idi miya geya bwebwe'ana ? Geya ! Weyahina yahe'ita pwaigita 'abehega mabwaiyada topui .
45003010	Gide Yehoba 'ina Buki 'ihepwaila , 'igwaeya , “ Geya 'eta taiya mumugana dumwadumwaluna .
45003011	Ma geya 'eta wete taiya Yehoba 'isanapu , bo nuwanuwana ma 'ida sanapu . Tuwa geya uleulena !
45003012	Moisa tuwa , tomota mabwaiyadi sitauya puiya , ta pui 'ana 'eda 'oina silatuwa . Geya 'eta wete taiya 'ina paihowa bwebwe'ana .
45003013	Cahwadi gide galiha so'eso'ena , ma 'oinega 'e'abo'abowedi galadiyedi silatulatuma , Ma wete 'idi gwaeyao galadi gide mwata , nuwanuwadi 'oidiyega tomota silohe 'amasidi .
45003014	Ma tuta mabwaiyana heliya galadi 'ahwadiyega silatulatu .
45003015	Ma he'upwa ta lohe'amasa nuwadi 'i'eweya .
45003016	Ma to tupwa 'oina siha'esa 'idi 'abihegala leleyana 'imiyamiya .
45003017	Geya 'eta nuwadaumwala bo he'ahwa'iya'iyagu sisanapu .
45003018	Ma wete geya Yehoba 'ana matauta 'oidiya 'imiyamiya . ”
45003019	Ma tasanapu pwaiya 'abehega Mosese 'ina loinao beno meYudiya 'ada loina 'oinega geya sowana 'eta taiya 'igwaegwae hila tutaina Yehoba 'ina bwa'omatana 'ana tuta 'oina , weyahina tomiya bale'u mabwaiyada togala .
45003020	Yehoba 'ina 'ahwamoisa geya Mosese 'ina loina 'ana guibiga 'oinega tada lobeya , weyahina loina 'ina paihowa beno 'ida pui 'ihehepwailedi .
45003021	Coinega bewa tuta Yehoba 'ada 'ahwabwebwe'ana 'i'abihelatuya , 'abehega geya loina 'oinega , ma hali 'eda'eda 'oinega hesiyage . Ma 'eda'edainaina Mosese 'ina loina ta palopitao sihepwaila pwaiya ,
45003022	'abehega Yehoba mabwaiyada 'i'ahwa dumwaluwegita Yesu Keliso 'ana hemisa 'oinega , ma geya sowana 'eta taiya wete wataha 'i'abi'abihelatu tauda meYudiya ma tomiya ganamuli gamwagamwanida .
45003023	Weyahina mabwaiyada togala , ma tamiya bwagabwaga Yehoba 'ina 'asilala 'oinega .
45003024	Ma hesi Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyamuya ma 'ihelauwa 'oida , ta Yesu Keliso 'ina paihowega 'ilihasigita 'ida pui 'oidiyega , ma 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwegita .
45003025	Moisa tuwa , Yehoba natuna 'itagwaleya ma 'abehega 'ina 'amasega 'itoehilegita Yehoba 'oina , ma mahetedai tahe'iya'iyagu , beno 'eguma Yesu tahemisae . Bewa 'oinega Yehoba mumugana bwebwe'ana 'ihe'itegita , weyahina mwalo heneyage mumugada galana geya 'ida hemaisediya , ma tuwa 'i'alama'i'itana 'ana siga Yesu Keliso 'ihewasaeyama , 'isuluma 'oida .
45003026	Eeta tuta bewa 'ina mumuga bwebwe'ana 'ihe'itegita 'abehega tauna todumwalu , weyahina Yesu 'ana tohemisao tauda 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita .
45003027	Ma togidega , sowasowahida bewa ginaulina weyahina tagwae hanehane ? Geya ! Weyahina 'ida hemisa tuwa 'oinega 'i'ahwa'ahwa dumwaluwegita , ma geya loina 'ana hematamatana 'oinega .
45003028	Eeta nuwatuhu bewama 'ana lohegogona 'abehega tauda tomota 'ida hemisega Yehoba nata 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita , ma geya loina 'ana hematamatana 'oinega .
45003029	Bo hedeyage Yehoba tauda meYudiyamo 'ida Yehoba , ma hali 'asa geya ? Geya taboi damo ! Casa mabwaiyadi mahetedao 'ida Yehoba 'aigeda tuwa . Yehoba nata tauda meYudiya ma tomiya ganamuli wete 'i'ahwa dumwaluwegita 'ida hemisega .
45003030	
45003031	Coinega togidega bewama 'ana sanapu , loinaina 'abehega tabuiyahule ta hemisa tada 'abiyahi , 'awa ? Sahena ! Ma hesi sawasawahina loina tahe'asisiye ma 'oida 'ihemadou .
45004001	Coinega to'aha nata tagwaene Ebalahamo weyahina , 'iboi tuwa tubudaina mabwaiyada 'oinega tamasalehama ?
45004002	Ebalahamo ginaula bwebwe'adi 'ipaihowediya ta debanega sowasowahina 'igwae hanehane , ma geya 'ida gwae haneya Yehoba matana , ma 'ina hemisamo weyahina Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'aneya ma geya 'ina paihowa bwebwe'adi weyahina .
45004003	Ma Yehoba 'ina Buki gide 'igwaeya , 'igwae , “ Ebalahamo Yehoba 'ihemisaeya , bewa weyahina Yehoba 'ahwa bwebwe'ana Ebalahamo 'i'ebwaeya . ”
45004004	Gide tuwa 'eguma loheya 'ipaihowa ma 'ana maisa 'iloba , beno geya helau , ma hesi 'ina paihowaina huwaina .
45004005	Ma 'eguma taiya 'ina pui 'adi nuwasam weyahina geya 'ida paihowa , ma 'ihemisamo tuwa Yehoba 'oina , tauna tohemisaina 'ana hemisega nata 'ahwa bwebwe'ana Yehoba 'oinega 'iloba .
45004006	Ma Debida wete gide 'igwaeya mwalo , 'abehega taiyewedi Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anediya beno geya 'idi paihowa 'oinega , ma hesiyage 'idi hemisega 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anediya . Ta wete 'idi yaliyaya weyahidi 'ihepwaileya ,
45004007	'igwaeya , “ Toyaliyaya moisa taudi 'eguma 'idi puiyao Yehoba 'inuwasamudi ma 'ideulidi .
45004008	Ma nata geya wete 'i'ahwa'ahwa galagalaedi . ”
45004009	Ta yaliyayaina weyahina Debida 'igwae nugeteya , togidega tauda meYudiya 'wapida si'upweya taudamo weyahida . Geya taudamo . Taudi geya meYudiya mahetedao ta'ewa . Yehoba 'ina Buki 'ihepwaila pwaiya beno , “ Ebalahamo 'ina hemisega 'ahwa bwebwe'ana 'ilobeya . ”
45004010	Ma Yehoba Ebalahamo 'i'ahwa dumwaluweya tutaina 'abwa Ebalahamoina geya 'wapina si'upwa . Bewa sanina 'ila'ilala tuwa , ma 'ihe'itegita 'abehega Ebalahamo 'ina hemisega 'ahwadumwalu 'i'ewa nugeteya Yehoba 'oinega , muliyetega 'ila'ilalaina si'upweya 'wapina . Eeta taiyawedi geya 'ila'ilalaina wahidiya ma tuwa sihemisa , beno 'idi hemisaina weyahina nata Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwedi , ma 'oinega taudi Ebalahamo natunao moisa .
45004011	
45004012	Ma tauda wete Ebalahamo tamadai 'eguma 'ila'ilalaina ta'eweya 'wapida , ta geya 'abehega 'ila'ilala tuwa weyahina . Ma 'ida hemisa gide tuwa mwalo Ebalahamo 'ina hemisa , tutaina geya 'ila'ilala si'upwa wahina .
45004013	Ma Yehoba Ebalahamo 'igwae hemisaeya 'abehega tauna ma'ina susuwao bale'u mabwaiyana 'abwa siloinae . Ta 'ina gwae hemisa bewa geya 'abehega Ebalahamo 'ina guibiga loina weyahina , ma hesi 'ina hemisa weyahina , 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'aneya .
45004014	Moisa tuwa Yehoba 'ina helau 'oida geya 'abehega loina 'ana guibiga 'oinega , ma hesi 'ina gwaehemisa 'oida 'ana hemisa weyahina . Ceguma tagwae 'abehega Yehoba 'ihehelauwegita loina 'ana guibiga weyahina , beno 'ana 'ita gide hemisa ta'ita sinaliya , ma wete Yehoba 'ina gwaehemisa 'oida taheginaula besobesoweya .
45004015	Ma loina 'oinega Yehoba 'ina gamwasowala 'oida 'ilatuwa , weyahina loinaina taligehiya . Ma hesiyage 'eguma Mosese 'ina loinaedi geya 'ilagudi , geya sowana taligehidi .
45004016	Bewa 'oinega tasanapu 'abehega hemisa tuwa 'oinega gwae hemisaina 'ana bwebwe'ana 'abwa taloba . Ma bewa Yehobaina 'ina helau tuwa ma geya 'abehega 'ida paihowa 'ana maisa . Ta gwaehemisaina Ebalahamo tubunao mabwaiyada talobeya , geya 'abehega loina 'ana toguibigao siboidimo , ma weteyage taiyewedi 'idi hemisa gide Ebalahamo 'ina hemisa ee taloba . Ebalahamoina tauna gide mabwaiyada tamadai .
45004017	Gidemusa Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Cowa yahesani pwaigowa 'abehega 'asa mabwaiyadi tamadiu . ” Ta Ebalahamo 'ina hemisa 'ilaguya Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisaina 'oina , tauna Yehobaina sowasowahina to'amasa 'i'abihe toholohiladi , ma weteyage to'aha geya sida 'elomasaleha sowasowahina 'igwae ma si'elomasaleha .
45004018	Ma Ebalahamo 'inuwatuhu yahiya madouna gwae hemisaina 'abehega tauna 'asa mabwaiyadi tamadiu , ma 'abehega tuta 'inaonaoma 'abwa 'ilatu gide , ma bwagana tuta gala hedadena 'ilobeya tuwa 'i'alama'i'itana , weyahina bewa gide Yehoba 'ihegwae 'eseya , “ Cabwa muliyetega tubumwao baibaiwadi silatu . ”
45004019	Ebalahamo 'i'iunamo ma 'ana bolime handeledi 'iloba , ta wahina mabwaiyana si'elowe'a , ta 'ihetautaubada seheya , ma mwanenaina Sela wetenuge wahine 'aga'agalina , ma Ebalahamo bewa geya weyahidi 'ida nuwatuhuwa , ma 'ina hemisa beno 'ina 'ebetuhila madouna .
45004020	Cina hemisaina geya 'iguipaile , ma hesiyage Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa 'i'abiyahi momosiya , ta 'ina hemisaina 'ihewaiwaiya ma 'ihepwatu Yehoba 'oina .
45004021	Weyahina 'isanapuya moisa Yehoba sowasowahina 'ina gwae hemisaedi 'ipaihowadi .
45004022	Bewa 'oinega Ebalahamo 'ina hemisa weyahina Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluweya .
45004023	Ma 'ahwa dumwaluina Yehoba 'ina Bukiya geya 'abehega Ebalahamo 'iboimo weyahina ,
45004024	ma tauda weteyage weyahida sileleya , 'ida hemisa Yehoba 'oina talaguya , tauna Bada Yesu Keliso 'amasega 'i'abihetoholo hileya .
45004025	Tauda tuwa 'ida pui weyahina Yesu 'i'amasa , ma Yehoba 'i'abihetoholo hileya , ta beno 'oinega 'ideuligita ma 'i'ahwa dumwaluwegita .
45005001	Coinega bewa tuta 'ida hemisega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita ta Yehobaina mahetedai ta'ahwa 'iya'iyagu , beno 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'oinega .
45005002	Weyahina Yesu 'i'abihetegita ta Yehoba 'ina helau 'ilatuwa 'oida , ma 'oina tamiya bwebwe'ana . Coinega tanuwatuhuyahi ma'ida yaliyaya Yehoba 'ina wasawasa weyahina , tuta 'inaonaoma 'i'ebwaegita .
45005003	Ma wete tayaliyaya tuta mwau 'oidiya , ma 'eguma ta'alama'i'itana bewa mwauwedi 'oidiyega ,
45005004	nata 'oidiyega yaluyaluwada sihewaiwai . Nage 'oinega tanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'abwa Yehoba 'ihelauwegita .
45005005	Nuwatuhuyahina bewa geya 'ida 'abihenuwa galegita , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'itagwaleya 'oida . Yaluyaluwanaina 'ina helau madou hedadena 'oinega 'ateda 'ilohemahediya .
45005006	Weyahina Keliso 'ina tuta 'ilobeya ma 'i'amasa , ma tauda 'abwaulena tawe'awe'a dadana , ee 'oinega Kelisoina 'i'amasa 'ida pui weyahidi .
45005007	Tauda tomota geya tuta mabwaiyana tatagwalegita ma ta'amasa 'iyadao todumwalu weyahidi , ma tupwadi 'abwa sihewaiwai ma 'ane si'amasa tobwebwe'adi weyahidi .
45005008	Ma Yehoba 'ina helau 'ihe'itegita tutaina tauda togala , beno Keliso 'i'amasa weyahida ,
45005009	ta bweyahinega 'ideuligita , ma 'i'ahwa dumwaluwegita , ta sowasowahina 'i'etolemegita Yehoba 'ina gamwasowala 'oinega .
45005010	Ta moisa mwalo Yehoba talo'aleheya , ma bewa tuta Natuna 'ina 'amasa 'oinega mahetedai ta'ahwa 'iya'iyagu , ma 'abwa Natunaina yawasinega 'i'etolemegita moisa .
45005011	Ma ginaula 'aigeda bwebwe'ana wetenuge beno Yehoba mahetedai tayaliyaliyaya , weyahina 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso tauna 'itoegitama ta Yehoba mahetedai tahe'iya'iyagu hila .
45005012	Mwalo heneyage pui bale'uwa 'ilatuma loheya 'aigeda 'oinega , ta mumuga galana 'amasa 'itoeyama ee 'oinega 'amasa 'iyada tomota mabwaiyada 'oida , weyahina tomota mabwaiyada togala .
45005013	Ma mwalo Mosese 'ina loinao geya bale'uwa simiyamiya , ma pui 'imiyamiya , ma hesi Yehoba geya tomota 'i'ahwa galagalaedi , weyahina geya 'eta wete loina 'oidiya .
45005014	Ta moisa Adama 'ina tutega ma Mosese 'ina tuta 'oina 'amasa 'ihewaiwai hedada tomota mabwaiyadi 'oidiya . Adama 'ipuiya beno Yehoba 'ina loina 'iligehiya , ma hesi tupwadi 'idi pui hagadi , geya gide Adama , ma tuwa si'elo'amasa . Ta Adamaina tauna tuwa 'ebe'ita loheyaina mulinega 'itautauyama weyahina , loheyainaina sanina Yesu Keliso .
45005015	Weyahina mwalo Adama 'ina puiyao 'oinega 'amasa 'i'abi latuheya tomota mabwaiyadi 'oidiya , ma muliyetega Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyamuya 'oinega 'ina helau 'i'abi latuheya tomota mabwaiyadi 'oidiya , beno loheya heluwena 'oinega , tauna Yesu Keliso . Ma ginaula 'eluwaedi geya sihemahemahetena , weyahina galana 'amasa 'i'abi latuheya tomota mabwaiyadi 'oidiya , ma hesi helau 'ihewaiwai sineya .
45005016	Weyahina loheya 'aigeda tuwa 'ina pui 'oinega tomota mabwaiyadi sihetogala ma Yehoba 'i'ahwa galagalaediya , ma hesi 'ina helau bwebwe'ana hedada 'oinega tomota mabwaiyadi 'idi pui 'inuwasamudiya ma 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anediya .
45005017	Ta loheya 'aigeda tuwamo 'ina pui 'oinega 'amasa 'ilatuma , ta tomota mabwaiyadi 'i'abi hegalediya . Ma loheya heluwena hesi 'ina paihowa waiwai hedadena , tauna Yesu Keliso , Yehoba 'ina helau 'i'ebwaya daisidiya tomota mabwaiyadi weyahidi , eema 'ane taiyewedi sitagwala si'ewa helauina ma 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anedi , ma yawasidi bwebwe'ana 'i'ebwaedi .
45005018	Ma tasanasanapu 'abehega loheya 'aigeda 'ina puiyega tomota mabwaiyada 'ahwagala talobeya . Ta gide weteyage , loheya 'aigeda tuwa 'ina paihowa dumwalunega sowasowana 'i'etolihasigita , ta Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita ma yawasida 'i'ebwaegita .
45005019	Ma wete 'aigeda loheya loinaligeha 'oinega galanaina 'ilatuma ta tomota mabwaiyadi sigala , ma wete 'aigeda loheya bwebwe'ana 'ina tagwalega tomota mabwaiyadi 'ideulidiya , ma Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwediya .
45005020	Ta tutaina Mosese 'ina loina 'ilatuma pui tuwa 'ihehewaiwai , ma 'iyamo Yehoba 'ina helau 'ihewaiwai hedadeya .
45005021	Coinega tasanapuya 'abehega pui huwaina beno 'amasa , 'ihewaiwaiya tomota 'oidiya , ma Yehoba 'ina helau huwaina 'ihewaiwai hedadeya , beno 'etolihasa ma yawasi miyamiya hatayana 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina paihowa bwebwe'ana 'oinega .
45006001	Bo to'aha hede nata tagwaene ? Cabehega 'ilobwainegita 'ida mumuga galadiyedi 'oidiya tuwa tamiya hataya , ma 'ane Yehoba 'ina lemaina 'oida 'ihemadou ?
45006002	Caa nata geya ! Weyahina mumuga galana 'oidega 'igumwala pwaiya , ta geya nata wete 'oida 'imiyamiya .
45006003	Wanuwatuhuyahi mwalo tutaina tababitaisowa Yesu Keliso saninega , beno Yesu 'ina 'amasa 'oina tauna mahetedai tahemahemahetena pwaiya ,
45006004	weyahina 'ina babitaisoina 'oina gide tauda ma Yesu Keliso ba'idadai ta'amasa , ma sigalihegita , ma wete tatoholohila ba'idadai . Kelisoina Tamana 'ina waiwaiyega 'itoholo hilama , ma tauda wete gidemusa 'igihetoholo hilegita , 'oinega yawasida 'ehauna talobeya .
45006005	Weyahina 'eguma 'ina 'amasaina tauda gidemusa ta'amasa , eema 'ane tatoholo hila gidemusa tauna 'amasega 'itoholo hila .
45006006	Ta wanuwatuhuyahi beno mumugada miyamiyaidi 'ana kelose 'oina 'ilohe'amasa pwaiya , ma 'ane tauda 'ida loina 'igumwala , ma 'oinega geya'abwa wete mumuga galana 'ina loina 'alona tamiyamiya ,
45006007	weyahina tutaina 'oina ta'amasa , geya sowana wete puiina 'ina loina 'oida 'imiyamiya .
45006008	Ma 'eguma tasanapuya 'abehega ta'amasa pwaiya Keliso mahetedai , ee tahemisae ma 'ane mayawasida mahetedai tamiya hataya .
45006009	Weyahina tasanapuya Keliso 'amasega 'itoholo pwaiya , ma geya sowana wete 'i'ama'amasa hila , weyahina tauna 'amasa 'ihewaiwai sineya .
45006010	Kelisoina ma'aigeda 'i'amasa 'ida pui weyahina , ta bewa tuta mayawasina Yehoba 'oina 'imiyamiya .
45006011	Eeta 'omi wete gide wasanapu 'abehega Yesu Keliso mahetedai ta'amasa pwaiya , 'oinega mumuga galana 'oidega 'ilolaguwa , ma mayawasida Yesu Keliso mahetedai Yehoba 'oina tamiyamiya .
45006012	Coinega bewa tuta pui geya sowana yahumi 'iloiloinaedi , ma geya'abwa 'imi nuwatuhu dahwana wamulimuliyedi .
45006013	Geya sowana 'eta wete to'wehimi , nimami nuwana matami , watagwatagwaledi paihowa galadi weyahidi , ma hesiyage watagwalegomi Yehoba 'oina , weyahina 'i'abihetoholo hilegomiya , ta bewa tuta mayawasimi , ee 'oinega wahimi mabwaiyana watagwale Yehoba 'ina paihowa dumwaluna 'oina .
45006014	Coinega bewa tutaina pui nata geya wete 'iloiloinaegomi , weyahina Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyamuya 'alona wamiyamiya , ma geya Mosese 'ina loina 'alona .
45006015	Coinega togidega tamumuga 'esa ? Mwalo loinaina taligehiya ma muliyetega Yehoba 'ida puiyedi 'inuwasamudiya , togidega , sowasowahina pui tuwa tapaipaihowa ? Caa nata geya !
45006016	Ma hesiyage wanuwatuhuyahi 'eguma taiya 'eta 'ina loina 'oina watagwalegomi , tauna tuwa 'enana wahematamatane . Ceguma pui wahematamatane nata 'amasa waloba , ma 'eguma Yehoba 'ana hemisa wahematamatane , beno mumuga bwebwe'ana waloba .
45006017	Ma 'amo'isamo tuwa , 'omi mwalo mumuga galana 'ana topaihowao , ma tetela bwebwe'ana wahesagoheya , ta 'atemi watagwalediya 'oina , ta 'imi puiyedi 'i'ewa yahulediya . Ma Yesu 'ilihasigomiya ma 'abehega mumuga bwebwe'ana weyahina wahetopaihowa . Coinega 'ilobwainegita taloyauwedo madouna Yehoba 'oina , yaliyaya bewa weyahina .
45006018	
45006019	Bewa , bale'u nuwatuhuidi 'oidiyega yahe'itegomiya , weyahina nuwami 'abwa potapotadi . Ta mwalo to'wehimi watagwalediya ma 'abehega simumuga galagala , ma weteyage 'abehega 'imi paihowa galadi sihemadou bwaibwaina . Coinega tuta bewa sowasowana to'wehimi watagwaledi ma sipaihowa dumwalu , ma 'imi paihowa wete 'ibwebwe'ana bwaibwaina .
45006020	Weyahina mwalo 'omi galana 'ana topaihowao , ma geya mumuga dumwaluna wada paihoweya ,
45006021	ee 'oinega bewa tutaina 'imi puiyedi weyahidi wadeba mwadina . Weyahina geya 'eta to'aha bwebwe'ana 'oidiyega wada lobeya , ma hesiyage 'ana maisa 'amasamo .
45006022	Eeta bewa tutaina pui 'ina loina 'oimiyega 'igumwala , ta 'omi bewa tutaina Yehoba 'ina topaihowao . Coinega maisa bwebwe'ana walobeya , beno mumuga bwebwe'ana ma muliyetega yawasimi miyamiya hatayana .
45006023	Weyahina pui 'ana maisa 'amasa , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina helau beno yawasida miyamiya hatayana , 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'oinega .
45007001	Ciyagwao , Mosese 'ina loina wasanapuya loheya yawasina 'ina tautauya weyahina . Tutaina loheyaina 'i'amasa loinaina geya'abwa wete 'oina 'imiyamiya .
45007002	Cebe'ita bewa 'aigeda ta'ita hai weyahina . Mosese 'ina loina 'igwaeya gide , 'abehega 'eguma wahine 'ihai mamwanena simiyamiya ee 'ana siga 'amasa , ma 'eguma mwanenaina 'i'amasa nata geya 'eta wete loina 'oinega 'ilobaloba .
45007003	Ma 'eguma wahineina mwanena 'imiyamiya ma 'ihaibala hali loheya 'oina , beno pui 'ipaihoweya . Ma 'eguma mwanenaina 'i'amasa ma hali loheya 'oina 'ihaibala , beno geya pui , weyahina mwanena nugenugetanaina 'ina loina 'oinega 'igumwala .
45007004	Ciyagwao , he'ita bewa 'ilobwainegomiya , weyahina Keliso 'ilihasigomiya Mosese 'ina loina 'oinega . Weyahina Kelisoina wahina mahetemiu wa'amasa , ta mahetemiu wete watoholo hila 'amasega . Ma tauna totoholo hilamaina beno 'ida Bada 'ehauna , ma 'ane mahetedai Yehoba 'ina paihowa 'oina taguibiga bwaibwaina .
45007005	Weyahina mwalo tauda mumugada gide gogo gabulena mumugana , bwagana Mosese 'ina loina tasanapuya , ma nuwatuhu galadiyedi 'oida sihewaiwaiya ma yahuda mabwaiyadi simumuga galagala , ta 'ana maisa 'amasa 'abwa nata taloba .
45007006	Ma bewa tuta loinaina 'oida 'igumwala , weyahina mwalo loinaina 'oinega gide 'ipaigita ma ta'amasa Keliso mahetedai , 'oinega Kelisoina 'ada paina 'oidega 'ilihasiya , ma bewa tutaina sowasowahida tapaihowa bwaibwaina . Weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ina waiwai 'oida 'imiyamiya , ma hesi Mosese 'ina loina leleleinaina geya 'ina waiwaimo , geya sowasowahina 'i'abi hedumwalugita .
45007007	To'aha nata tagwaene Mosese 'ina loinaina weyahina ? Cabehega 'ina loinaedi galadi bo geya ? Geya galadi . Ma hesi 'eguma geya loinaedi sida latulatu , geya sowana wete pui 'ilatulatu . Ta nuwana 'eguma geya 'eta loina 'igwae gide , “ Sahena matalolo ” , beno geya sowasowahina wete tasanapu to'aha matalolo .
45007008	Ta loinaina 'oinega 'igu pui 'i'abi hemadouya , ee 'abwa hesi yamatalolo ginaula baibaiwadi weyahidi . Ta 'eguma loina geya , 'igu pui wete geya .
45007009	Taugu wete gide , mwalo mayawasigu yamiyamiya , geya 'eta wete loina 'oiguwa , ma tuta loina 'oiguwa 'ilatuwa , ee pui 'oiguwa 'ihewaiwaiya ,
45007010	eeta loinaina 'ilohe'amasigauwa . Loinaina bwebwe'ana ma wete yawasi lamuna , ma hesi yaboi tuwa loinaina geya yaguibiga bwaibwaini .
45007011	Weyahina pui 'i'abowegauwa , eeta loinega 'ilohe'amasigauwa .
45007012	Loinaina tasanapuya 'abehega 'ausalana , ma 'ana lohatotowedi mabwaiyadi wete 'ausaladi , ma dumwaludi , ta mabwaiyadi bwebwe'adi , geya 'eta galana .
45007013	Ma togidega hede ta loinaina 'ausalanaina 'ilohe'amasigauwa ? Ma hesi geya ! Geya sowasowahina ginaula bwebwe'ana 'ilohe'amasi daidaisigita , ma hesi to'aha galana 'ateguwa loina 'ausalana 'ihe'abeyeya , ma 'oinega 'ilohe'amasigauwa . Coinega tasanapuya 'abehega mumuga galadi 'ateda simiyamiya , ma loina 'oinega tasanasanapu 'abehega gala hedadena .
45007014	Tasanapuya 'abehega Mosese 'ina loinaina Yehoba 'oinega 'i'eweya , ma taugu mumuga bale'u 'iloinegauwa eeta yagala .
45007015	Ma hesi geya yada sanapuya to'aha weyahina ginaula galadi yapaipaihowadi , weyahina to'aha gide 'abehega yaguipailedi beno yapaipaihowadi , ma weteyage ginaulaedi nuwanuwagu yapaihowadi ma geya yada paihowediya .
45007016	Ta moisa , Mosese 'ina loinaedi ya'ahwa moisaediya , weyahina galanaina yapaihoweya geya bwebwe'ana 'oiguwa ,
45007017	ta geya taugu tuwa 'igu paihowa , ma hesiyage lotohona galana 'ateguwa 'ina paihowa .
45007018	Yasanapuya 'abehega geya 'eta mumuga 'ausalana wahiguwa , weyahina mumuga bwebwe'ana nuwanuwagu , ma hesi geya sowasowahigu yapaihowa .
45007019	Nuwanuwagu madouna ma mumugagu 'ibwebwe'ana , ma 'iyamo geya gide yada 'esa , weyahina galanaina yalolowahi'wate ma tuwa yapaipaihowa .
45007020	Bewa 'oinega tasanapuya 'abehega puiina yapaihoweya geya yaboi tuwa 'oiguwega , ta hesi lotohona galanaina 'ateguwa 'ina paihowa .
45007021	Ginaula bewa 'oidiyega sihe'ita bwaibwainigauwa 'abehega 'eguma to'aha bwebwe'ana nuwanuwagu ma yapaihowa , nata galanaina mane gide tuwa ma yapaihowa .
45007022	Ta yasanapuya 'abehega yaluyaluwagu nuwanuwana ma Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu yapaihowa ,
45007023	ma hesi hali loinao taudi wahiguwedi 'oidiya siloinaegauwa . Tuta mabwaiyana lotohona galana 'ateguwa 'ihehewaiwai hedade ma 'igu nuwatuhu bwebwe'ana 'i'abi'abihewe'a , ma wahigu 'ina paihowa galana 'oinega pai ma 'amasa yalobediya .
45007024	Ta moisa , nuwagalagalaigu ! Weyahina geya 'eta taiya sowasowahina ma wahigu 'ina paihowa galana 'oinega 'i'abihetegau .
45007025	Ma hesiyage yaloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , weyahina 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ilemegauwa . Ta bwagana 'ateguwa yatagwala moisa Yehoba 'ina loina 'oina , ma 'iyamo wahigu nuwanuwana loina galana .
45008001	Coinega 'eguma Yesu Keliso mahetedai , nata geya 'eta taiya 'ina gwae mwauna 'oida 'ilagulagu .
45008002	Yesu Keliso mahetedai , 'oinega Yehoba Yaluyaluwanaina 'ilihasigita pui ma 'amasa 'idi loina 'oidiyega , ma yawasida 'ehauna talobeya .
45008003	Ta lihasaina Mosese 'ina loina geya sowasowahina , weyahina tauda tomota mumugada we'awe'ana , ma hesi Yehoba lihasaina 'ipaihoweya , beno Natuna moisa 'itagwaleya , 'idobima bale'uwa tauda togala wahida 'isoheya , ta 'ida pui weyahina 'ipwaoliyeya 'iboi , ta 'ida puiyedi 'ihewaiwai sinediya .
45008004	Ma bewa tutaina sowasowahida loina bwebwe'ana tamuliye , beno Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ina 'abihetenega , ma geya tomota mumugadiyega .
45008005	Weyahina 'eguma taiyewedi mumuga bale'u simulimuliye , beno siboi weyahidi sinuwanuwatuhu , nata mumugainaina 'oinega 'amasa siloba , eeta taiyewedi Yehoba Yaluyaluwana sihematamatane , taudi Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhuina sipaipaihowa , ma 'ane yawasi bwebwe'ana ta miya daumwala siloba .
45008006	
45008007	Ta 'eguma bale'u mumugana tahematamatane beno Yehoba talolo'aleha , eema geya wete sowasowahida ma Yehoba 'ina loina tamuliye ,
45008008	ma geya sowasowahina Yehoba ta'abihe yaliyaya .
45008009	Ma 'omi Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'iloiloinegomi , ta 'oimiya wete 'imiyamiya , eeta waboi 'imi nuwatuhu geya 'ida loinegomiya . Weyahina 'eguma taiya Keliso Yaluyaluwana geya 'oina , tauna geya Keliso 'ina boda .
45008010	Ta moisa wahidaedi 'ama'amasidi mumuga galana 'ina loinega , ma 'eguma Keliso 'oida beno yaluyaluwada geya sowana si'amasa , ma hesi mayawasidi simiya bwebwe'ana , weyahina 'i'abi hedumwalu pwaigita .
45008011	Ma Yehoba Yaluyaluwanega Yesu 'amasega 'i'abi hetoholo hileya , ma 'eguma 'oimiya 'imiyamiya , nata 'omi Yehoba Yaluyaluwanaina 'oinega yawasi 'ehauna 'i'ebwaya wahimi 'ama'amasidi 'oidiya .
45008012	Coinega 'iyagwao , geya 'ilobwainegita ma mumuga tomotai tamuliye , nata gide ta'amasa . Ma hesiyage 'eguma mumuga bale'uwa talogwahate ma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana tamuliye , beno nata Yaluyaluwanaina 'oinega wahida mumugana talohe'amasi , ma yawasida bwebwe'ana taloba .
45008013	
45008014	Ma 'eguma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana tamuliye , beno nata 'i'ahwa natunegita .
45008015	Eeta Yehoba sahena tamatamataute weyahina 'i'ahwa natunegita , ta tauda geya gide 'ina topaihowao , ma hesi gide natunao ma ma'ida 'atepatu tagwaegwae 'oina , “ Tamagu ! ”
45008016	Ma weteyage Yaluyaluwanaina 'oinega sanapu 'i'ebwaya yaluyaluwada 'oida , ma 'abehega tasanapu tauda Yehoba natunao .
45008017	Eema helauwedi 'i'atububuya natunaina Yesu Keliso weyahina , nata Yesu mahetedai helauwedi talobadi Yehoba 'oinega . Weyahina 'eguma Keliso mahetedai muya ta'ahali , nata wete mahetedai wasawasa taloba .
45008018	Ma muyaedi bewa tuta talobalobadi yasanapuya geya ginaula madouna , weyahina 'abwa muliyetega miya bwebwe'ana hedada taloba ,
45008019	weyahina ginaula mabwaiyana Yehoba 'ipaihowediya siyamwayamwana , ma nuwanuwadi madouna 'abehega tauda natunaowedi 'i'abihe latuhegita ma si'itegita .
45008020	Ma Yehoba 'ina paihowao geya galadi , ma hesiyage 'igwaeya ta bewa tuta siheginaula besobesowa , ma hesi ma'idi hemisa wete ,
45008021	weyahina 'abwa weteyage Yehoba 'i'abi'ehau hiladi , ma geya sowasowahina simwahulu , ma hesiyage 'idi miya bwebwe'ana 'i'ebwaedi , gide tauda natunaowedi .
45008022	Ta moisa , Yehoba 'ina paihowaedi siwelawelaha tuta mabwaiyana muya 'oidiyega , gide wahine 'ana muya henatuna 'oina .
45008023	Ma tauda Yehoba Yaluyaluwana lotohona bwebwe'ana 'i'iuna 'i'ebwaegita ee 'abwa muliyetega miya bwebwe'anaina taloba moisa . Coinega bewa tuta ma'ada muya tawelawelaha , ma tayamwayamwa tolahisa 'abwa wahida 'i'abi'ehau hila , ma 'i'ahwa natunegita moisa .
45008024	Ma 'abihetenaina hemisega talobaloba , weyahina bewa tuta wahida 'idi 'ehau geya tada lobeya , eeta ma'ida hemisa tayamwayamwa 'ana siga 'ida hemisaina huwaina taloba , ma 'ane 'ida hemisaina 'ilolagu .
45008025	Ma 'eguma 'ida hemisaina 'e'enina geya tada lobeya , tuwa 'alama'i'itanega tayamwayamwana ee 'ana siga taloba .
45008026	Ta Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ida we'a 'oidiyega , tauna 'i'abi 'abihetegita , weyahina 'ida 'ahwanoi 'oidiya geya tasanapu togidega ta'ahwanoi 'esa , ma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana hesiyage weyahida 'ihetahetapewa ta ma'enana ma'ina welaha 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi waiwai Yehoba 'oina .
45008027	Yehoba tauna 'ida nuwatuhu 'isanapudiya , ma weteyage 'iboi Yaluyaluwana 'ina nuwatuhu 'isanasanapudi , weyahina Yaluyaluwanaina Yehoba 'ina tomotai weyahida 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwanaina mahetena 'idi nuwatuhu 'aigeda .
45008028	Eeta tasanapuya 'eguma Yehoba tahelauwe nata ginaula mabwaiyadi 'i'abihe dumwaludi weyahida , beno tauna 'ina nuwatuhu gide ta 'ibwauwegita .
45008029	Eeta taiyawedi tauda 'ibwauwe pwaigita , beno 'igwae hemisegita ta tauda natunao , gide tuwa natunaina , eeta tauna 'ada tautuwa ma tauda 'ana 'alomauwao .
45008030	Ta Yehobaina 'ihesinuwegita , ta 'ibwauwegita , ta 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita , ma weteyage 'ida 'ebemiya wasawasa 'i'ebwaegita .
45008031	Ma moisa Yehoba 'ina helau 'imadou hedadeya . Ta 'eguma Yehoba mahetedai , nata 'i'abihetegita , eeta geya sowana 'eta taiya 'ilolo'alehegita .
45008032	Weyahina Yehoba natuna moisa geya 'ida nuwahiya , ma hesiyage 'itagwaleya weyahida , 'abwa ginaula mabwaiyadi wete 'i'ebwaegita .
45008033	Coinega nata geya wete taiya 'ihehe'ewegita , weyahina tauda Yehoba 'ihesinuwegita ta 'i'ahwa dumwaluwegita .
45008034	Geya wete nata 'eta taiya 'ina gwae pa'alina 'oida 'ilagulagu , weyahina Yesu Keliso tauna weyahida 'i'amasa pwaiya ta wete 'itoholohila , 'oinega bewa tuta Yehoba 'ina 'ebeulega 'imiyamiya ma weyahida 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi .
45008035	Coinega geya 'eta ginaula sowasowahina ma Keliso 'ina helauina 'oidega 'i'ewa yahule , mwauwedi gidemusa muya bo woya bo gomale bo hewewelohe bo hesilae ma wete 'amasa .
45008036	Mwauwedi weyahina Yehoba 'ina Bukiya 'aigeda gwae gide 'igwaeya , “ Sauga mabwaiyana 'ebe 'amasa 'oina 'amiyamiya , gide guyai bawedi sabi lohe'amasimai , beno 'ino paihowa weyahina . ”
45008037	Ma hesi ginaula mabwaiyadi bewa 'oidiyega tahewaiwaiya , weyahina Yesu 'ina helau ma 'ina 'abihetena 'oida 'imadou hedada .
45008038	Moisa yasanapu bwaibwainiya 'abehega geya 'eta ginaula wete sowasowahina ma Yehoba 'ina helau 'i'ewayahule 'oidega , nuwana mayawasida , nuwana ta'amasa , nuwana 'eta anelose bo 'eta Tomudulele 'ina boda 'idi paihowega , bewa tutaina nuwana tuta 'inaonaoma 'oina , bo toloinao galewa nuwana bale'uwa 'idi waiwaiyega . Weyahina Yehoba 'ina helauina , 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'oinega , geya 'eta taiya sowasowahina ma 'i'ewayahule 'oidega .
45008039	
45009001	Ciyagwao , geya ya'abo , nuwagu 'igala moisa 'igu susuwao meIsileli weyahidi , ma tuta mabwaiyana 'ategu 'imuyamuya weyahidi , weyahina Keliso geya sida hemisaeya . Cigu gwae bewa Keliso ma Yaluyaluwana Tabuna sisanasanapu 'abehega yagwaegwae moisa .
45009002	
45009003	Ma weyahidi yanuwanuwatuhu madouna 'eguma togidega ma Yehoba 'ina helauina 'i'ebwaegauwa , beno Yesu Keliso , 'oiguwega 'i'ewa ma 'i'ebwaedi 'igu bodaedi , ma taugu 'ana mwau yaloba , taudi weyahidi .
45009004	Ta moisa 'igu bodaedi beno mwalo Yehoba 'ihesinuwa pwaidiya ta 'i'ahwa natunediya . Cina wasawasa ma 'ina gwae hemisao eema 'ina loinao bwebwe'adi 'i'ebwaediya . Ma wete tapwalolo ta ginaula 'ausaladi 'igwae hemisaeya babada nugenugetadi 'oidiya . Taudi gide Ebalahamo ma Aisake ma Yakobo , eeta muliyetega Ebalahamo 'ina susuina 'oinega Keliso 'ilatuma . Tauna Yehobaina tahepwatuwe tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya , 'iboi 'ihane hedadeya . Emeni .
45009005	
45009006	Yehoba 'ina gwaeyedi bewa geya 'ehetete , ma hesiyage huwaina 'i'abihelatuya susu Isileli moisa 'oidiya , ta geya wete susu Isileli mabwaiyadi 'oidiya , ma tuwa hesihesinuwadimo .
45009007	Ta 'ana moisa beno Ebalahamo 'ina susuwao mabwaiyadi Yehoba geya 'ida 'ahwa natunedi , weyahina Yehoba Ebalahamo 'ihegwae pwaiya , 'igwaeya , “ Cino susuwao beno natuina Aisake natunao , ” ma geya wete taiyawedi tasina natunao 'oidiyega .
45009008	Gwae bewa 'ana sanapu 'ihe'ita pwaigita moisa , beno Yehoba natunao geya Ebalahamo 'ina susu 'oinega , ma hesiyage taiyawedi taudi Yehoba 'igwae hemisaediya .
45009009	Weyahina mwalo Yehoba Ebalahamo 'oina 'igwae hemisa , 'igwaeya , “ Cabwa tuta yahesinuwaneya matada 'oina yahilama ma natuu loheyana ya'ebwaego mwaneu Sela 'oinega . ”
45009010	Ta gide wete tubumai Aisake 'iheloheya ma Libeka 'ihaiya , ta natudiyao didiluwaluwa 'i'elagatediya , ta 'abwa 'ina tuta 'ahalaina ma Yehoba Libekaina 'ihegwaeya , 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma natumwaowedi 'uhenatunedi , 'alomau 'abwa tolenugetainaina 'iloinae . ” Eeta bewa Yakobo ma Iso 'oidiyega tasanapu bwaibwainiya 'abehega gwagwamaidiyedi geya 'idi paihowa bwebwe'ana nuwana galana 'oidiyega 'ihesinuwedi , ma hesi 'iboi 'ina gwae hemisa 'oinega . Weyahina Yehoba 'ihesihesinuwa geya tomota 'idi paihowega ma hesi 'iboinamo 'ina nuwatuhuwega .
45009011	
45009012	
45009013	Yehoba gide wete 'ihepwaila 'ina Bukiya 'igwaeya , “ Yakobo yahelauweya madouna , geya Iso . ”
45009014	Cabwa to'aha hede nata tagwaene Yehoba 'ina paihowa bewa gidemusa , galana bo geya ? Geya galana !
45009015	Weyahina Mosese 'ina loina 'oina Yehoba 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma taiya nuwanuwagu yahelauwe nata yahelauwe , ma 'eguma taiya wete ya'atemuyamuyae , nata wete ya'abihete . ”
45009016	Ma bewa 'ihe'itegita 'abehega Yehoba 'ina helau geya 'ida latu daitama tauda 'ida nuwatuhuwao nuwana paihowao 'oidiyega , ma hesiyage tauna tuwa 'ina 'atemuyemuyega .
45009017	Ma bewa wete 'aigeda 'ebe'ita Pelo 'oinega , weyahina mwalo Yehoba 'ina gwae Peloina weyahina , 'igwaeya , “ Cebe loina ya'ebwae pwaigowa 'abehega 'ulo'alehegau , eema 'ane taugu 'igu waiwai 'u'ita , eema 'ane sanigu 'i'edadana bale'u mabwaiyana 'oina . ”
45009018	Eeta , 'eguma Yehoba nuwanuwana taiya 'ihelauwe , nata 'ihelauwe tuwa , ma 'eguma nuwanuwana wete taiya 'i'abihedeba pa'ali , nata tuwa 'ideba pa'ala sehe .
45009019	Nuwana tupwami nuwatuhu bewa weyahina wanuwanuwatuhu 'abehega 'eguma mabwaiyada mumugadaina Yehoba 'ina hesinuwega , to'aha hede weyahina 'ihe'ewegita ?
45009020	Ciyagwao , tauda geya 'ilobwainegita ma Yehoba 'oina tagwae hila , eema 'ebe'ita gide towalata'abi , 'aigeda tuta loheyainaina walata 'i'abidiya , ma 'aigeda walataina 'ihegwaeya to'abiina , 'igwaeya , “ To'aha weyahina geya 'u'abigau gide 'iyaguina ? ”
45009021	Ta 'ana dumwalu hesi beno to'abiina 'iboi 'ina 'abi 'iloinae , 'eguma nuwanuwana bale'u 'aigedaina 'oinega walata 'eluwa 'i'abidi , ma 'aigeda 'ana 'ita 'ausalana , ta 'aigedaina geya . Bewa bwebwe'ana !
45009022	Ta Yehoba wete gidemusa 'ina paihowa 'iboi 'iloinae , weyahina tuta mabwaiyana togala 'oidiya 'ihe'alama'i'ita madouna 'abehega 'idi pui weyahina sahena 'ida hemahemaisedi , ma tuwa geya sida hematamataneya , ma 'inuwatuhuwa 'abehega sowasowana tuwa 'iloinaedi , 'ina gamwasowala ta 'ina waiwai matadiyega si'ita .
45009023	Ma nuwanuwana wete 'ina wasawasaedi mwalo 'i'atububudiya tauda 'ihelauwegita weyahida , 'ihe'itae .
45009024	Coinega boda 'eluwa 'oidiyega 'ibwauwegita , tauma boda Yudiya ma 'omi tomiya ganamuli .
45009025	Gidemusa palopita Hoseya 'ina bukiya 'ihepwaila , 'igwaeya , “ Tomotaiyedi taudi geya 'igu bodao taudi nata yabwauwedima 'igu boda 'oina siluhuma , weyahina mwalo taudi geya 'igu helau 'alona sida miya , ma bewa tuta yahelauwediya .
45009026	Mwalo Yehoba 'ihegwaediya , 'igwaeya , ‘ Comi geya 'igu bodao ’ , nata bewa sibuihila ta sibwauwedi , sigwae , ‘ Taudi Yehoba miyamiya hatayana natunao . ’ ”
45009027	Aiseya gidemusa wete meIsileli weyahidi 'igwaeya , “ Cabwa , susu Isileli sihenatuna yadayada gide namonamowedi hola lasalasa , ma 'iyamo 'oidiyega nata tupwatupwadimo Yehoba 'i'etolemedi .
45009028	Weyahina Yehoba nuwanuwana gogo gabulena mabwaiyana 'iloina mwamwayauwe . ”
45009029	Ma Aiseya wete gide 'ina hepwaila 'igwaeya , “ Yehoba 'iboimo Tohewaiwai , 'oinega 'eguma geya 'eta 'ina boda tupwatupwadi 'i'atemuyamuyaedi , nata mabwaiyada 'ilamanigita , gide 'aneyage Sodoma ma Gomola , mabwaiyadi 'imutudiya . ”
45009030	Bewa 'oinega tasanapu 'abehega taudi tomiya ganamuli geya sitohotoho ma Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwedi , ma hesi 'idi hemisa tuwa 'oinega 'i'ahwa dumwaluwediya .
45009031	Ma Isileliyedi hesiyage si'ai'aipate ma 'abehega loina 'ana muliya 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwedi , ta si'aipate 'asaya .
45009032	Taudi 'idi nuwatuhu 'abehega 'idi paihowa weyahina Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwedi , ma geya sihemisa 'oina , eeta beno 'idi pui gidemusa da'ule 'oina sihetupediya .
45009033	Ma Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina da'ule 'ebe tupaina weyahina 'ihepwaila , 'igwaeya , “ Wa'itayahi bwaibwainigomi , weyahina da'uleina nata Saiyoni 'oina yalagu , ma tomota nata 'oina situpa ma sibe'u , ma 'eguma taiyawedi tauna tuwa da'uleinaina sihemisaeya nata geya'abwa siwe'awe'a . ”
45010001	Ma 'iyagwao , moisa 'igu bodaowedi yanuwanuwa tuhuyahidi madouna togidega ma 'etolema siloba , ee 'oinega tuta mabwaiyana weyahidi ya'ahwa'ahwanoi waiwai Yehoba 'oina .
45010002	Ta yasanapu bwaibwainidiya Yehoba weyahina sihematamatana madouna , ma hesiyage geya 'ana 'eda moisa 'oinega sida tauya .
45010003	Cedaina sihemata hwadiyeya , 'oinega siboidimo 'idi nuwatuhu simuliyediya ma 'abehega 'oidiyega Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwedi , ta si'aipate 'asaya , weyahina Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhuina 'adi 'ahwadumwalu weyahina geya sihemise .
45010004	Ma Keliso 'ina paihowega Mosese 'ina loina 'oidega 'igumwala , eeta bewa tutaina tauna 'ina loina 'ihegaineya ma 'eguma taiya Kelisoina 'ihemisae , nata Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwe .
45010005	Bewa gide Mosese 'igwae 'esa 'ada 'ahwadumwalu weyahina ma 'ilelediya , 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma taiya loina mabwaiyana 'imuliyedi , nata yawasi bwebwe'ana 'iloba , bewa tutaina ma wete tuta 'inaonaoma 'oidiya . ”
45010006	Ma bewa tutaina tauda 'ida hemisa 'abehega Yehoba tauna 'i'abi 'ehaugita , ma tauna weyahina Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina 'ihepwaila , 'igwaeya , “ Geya sowana 'eta taiya 'oimiyega 'inuwatuhu ma 'igwae , ‘ Taiya nata 'ihane Galewa ? ’ ” Bewa gwaeina 'ana sanapu 'abehega , “ Taiya nata Keliso 'itoeyama . ”
45010007	“ Ta wete geya sowana 'eta 'oimiyega 'igwae , ‘ Taiya nata 'idobi bale'u dudunina ? ’ ” Gwae bewa 'ana sanapu 'abehega “ Taiya nata Keliso 'amasega 'i'abihetoholo hileyama ? ”
45010008	Ma he'ita moisa Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina bewa gide , “ Gwaeina deimiya tuwa 'imiyamiya beno 'ahwamiya ma wete 'atemiya . ” Gwaeinaina beno hemisa weyahina 'alologuguyae 'oimiya ,
45010009	ma 'abehega Yehoba 'i'etolemegita 'eguma 'ahwadega tatagwatagwala ma tagwae , “ Yesu 'owa 'igu Bada ” , ma 'atedega tahemisae 'abehega Yehoba Yesu 'i'abihe toholohileya 'amasega .
45010010	Weyahina 'atedega tahemiseya eeta Yehoba 'i'ahwa dumwaluwegita . Ta wete tahetohepwaila weyahina , ma 'i'etolemegita .
45010011	Gide Yehoba 'ina Bukiya 'ihepwaila , 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma taiyawedi sihemisa , nata geya'abwa siwe'awe'a . ”
45010012	Ta geya 'eta wataha 'omi tomiya ganamuli ma tauma meYudiya gamwagamwanida , weyahina mabwaiyada tauna 'ida Bada , 'oinega 'eguma ta'ahwanoi 'oina , nata 'ihelau bwaibwainigita .
45010013	Weyahina 'eguma taiya Badaina 'oina 'i'ahwanoi , nata 'etolihasa 'iloba .
45010014	Moisa , tomota geya sowasowahina ma 'etolihasa weyahina si'ahwanoi 'oina , 'eguma geya sihemisae . Geya sihemisae weyahina geya Badaina sanina sihesagohe . Ma geya sihesagohe weyahina geya 'idi tologuguyamo .
45010015	Ta 'eguma Bada tologuguya 'ihewasaedi sitauya 'oidiya , nata Yesu wasana sihesagohe ma sihemisae , eema 'eguma saninega si'ahwanoi nata 'i'abihetedi , weyahina Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina gide wete 'ihepwaila pwaiya , 'igwaeya , “ Tologuguyaowedi taudi tetela bwebwe'ana si'eweyama weyahidi tayaliyaya . ”
45010016	Ma tupwadi geya sihemisa , weyahina Aiseya 'ihepwaila pwaiya weyahidi , 'igwaeya , “ Bada yo , 'ino gwaeina weyahina geya si'ahwa moisaegau . ”
45010017	Eeta 'eguma Keliso weyahina taloguguya , nata hisahisadimo sihesagoha ma sihemisa .
45010018	Ma togidega meYudiyaedi 'ina gwaeina sihesagoheya , bo geya ? Cehe sihesagoheya , ta Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina 'ihepwaila pwaiya , 'igwaeya , “ Cidi loguguyaina 'asa mabwaiyadi sihesagoheya , weyahina gogo gabulena mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'i'edadana . ”
45010019	Ta gwae bewama togidega weyahina meIsileli sinuwa sabwalena , bo geya ? Cehe , sinuwa sabwalena , weyahina Yehoba mwalo Mosese 'oina 'ihepwaila 'igwaeya , “ Comi meIsileli nata 'igu paihowega hali tomota matahwadi wahe'ipi'ipiyedi , ma nata wete wagamwasowaledi weyahina 'abehega taudi geya 'igu bodao moisa . ”
45010020	Ma Aiseya Yehoba 'ina gwaeina wete 'igwae waiwaiya , 'igwaeya , “ Tomotaiyedi taudi geya si'ebesegau , nuwana sihesilalegau , 'oidiya yalatuwa , ma ba'idagwao 'ahe'iya'iyaguwa . ”
45010021	Ma 'ina gwae wete pa'alina meIsileli weyahidi 'igwaeya , “ Tuta mabwaiyana yabwaubwauwedi eema 'abehega sitauyama 'oiguwa , ma hesi si'ita'ita guipailegau , weyahina taudi tuwa mumugadi gide , toheguipaila . ”
45011001	Ta bewa 'igu hesilala , togidega Yehoba 'ina boda meIsileli 'iguipailediya , bo geya ? Geya ! Weyahina taugu 'aigeda gwama Isileli , susu Beniyamina 'oinega , ma 'ima susu madouna 'ima babadega , sanina Ebalahamo .
45011002	Coinega yasanapuya 'abehega tauma Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao , mwalo hene 'ihesinuwanemaiya ma 'abehega 'ina bodao , ee 'oinega nata geya 'ilolososomanemai . Ma mwalo heneyage , Ilaitiya meIsileli 'ilomugiyediya Yehoba 'oina , ta 'ina Bukiya 'ileleya , 'igwaeya ,
45011003	“ Bada yo , 'ino palopitao mabwaiyadi silohe'amasidiya , ma 'ino pwaoli bwasaina si'abihegaleya , ma yaboigumo yatupwa , ma nuwanuwadi bewa tuta wete silohe'amasigau . ”
45011004	Ma Yehoba Ilaitiya 'ihegwaeya , “ Geya 'abehega 'uboimo 'umiyamiya , beno wete 'igu bodao site sebeni tausani simiyamiya , taudi Ba'ala 'oinega yahahegagaledi , eeta geya 'oina sida tuluha . ”
45011005	Bewa sauga wete gide Yehoba 'ina bodao meYudiya , 'ai'aigedamamo 'ihesinuwemaiya 'ina helauwega , eeta tauma bewa 'atupwa 'amiyamiya .
45011006	Cetolihasaina 'alobeya , geya 'abehega 'ima paihowa 'oidiyega ma hesi Yehoba 'ina helau 'oinega , weyahina 'eguma helau ma'ana maisa , beno geya helau moisa .
45011007	Bewa lamuna 'oinega meIsileli mabwaiyadi 'etolihasaina si'ebesa 'asaeya , ma tauma tupwatupwamamo hesiyage Yehoba 'ina bodao hesihesinuwama 'etolihasaina 'alobeya , weyahina meIsileliyedi mabwaiyadi deba pa'apa'alidi eeta geya siloba .
45011008	Ma Yehoba 'ina Buki wete gide 'ihepwaila 'esa , 'igwaeya , “ Nugeta hene 'ana siga nige bewa Yehoba 'idi nuwatuhu 'i'e'abi buidiya , ta matadi 'igihegibudiya , ma tenadi 'igihetuidiya . ”
45011009	Ma Debida wete gide 'ina hepwaila 'igwaeya , “ Sawasawahina 'idi guyai 'oidiyega 'adi loina siloba , ma gide si'wa 'oidiyega sisi'wediya , ma wete gide sa'e 'oidiya sibe'uwa .
45011010	Ta 'ilobwainediya tuwa simata gibugibu , ma 'ane geya sowana to'aha si'ita'ita , ma wete tuta mabwaiyana 'adi 'aha'ahala mwauna 'oidiyega tuluhadi silotayohu hataya . ”
45011011	Taudi Yudiyaedi situpa eeta togidega 'adi loina ? Cabehega nage sibe'u hataya ma nata geya wete sitohotoholo hila , bo ? Nata geya ! Cabwa sitoholo hila ! Ma hesiyage wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega taudi sipuiya , eeta 'omi tomiya ganamuli 'etolema walobeya , ma meIsileliyedi nata sihe'ipi'ipiyegomi .
45011012	Ta moisa , 'omi geya meYudiya 'etolemanaina walobeya , weyahina meYudiyaedi si'elobe'uwa , ma 'eguma sitoholo hilama beno 'ebe yaliyaya madouna mabwaiyada 'oida .
45011013	Cigu hegwaegwae bewa 'omi tomiya ganamuli weyahimi . Taugu Yesu Keliso 'ana tohepwaila mabwaiyami 'oimiya , eeta 'igu paihowaina weyahina yagwae hane ,
45011014	ma 'omi tomiya ganamuli nata taudi meYudiya sihe'ipi'ipiyegomi , ma 'ane 'idi he'ipi'ipiina weyahina nuwadi sibuidi ma 'etolema siloba Yehoba 'oinega .
45011015	Ma Yehoba meYudiya 'iguipailediya ma 'abehega 'omi tomiya ganamuli 'i'ahwa 'iya'iyaguwegomi , eeta tolahisa 'eguma meYudiyaedi si'auta hilama , beno 'ausala hedade , ma 'ana 'ita nata gide 'abwa taudi 'amasega sitoholo hila .
45011016	Ma tubudiuina Ebalahamo moisa Yehoba 'ina loheya , eeta taudi wetenuge Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao . Eema 'ebe'ita 'aigeda bewa ya'ebwaegomi . Ceguma 'wateya ma'ehauna wa'ita ma 'ausalana , beno wasanapu pwaiya 'abehega 'e'etahi nata bwebwe'ana . Gide wete 'eguma 'aiwe 'eta lamuna wa'ita ma 'ausalana , beno wete wasanapu pwaiya 'abehega lahalahanaowedi bwebwe'adi .
45011017	Eeta taudi meYudiya gide tuwa Yehoba 'ina 'aiwe lahanao tupwadi silotalasa , ta 'omi 'oimiyega 'ihemiyalaenediya , weyahina 'omi hali 'aiwe lahanao ma 'ihesinuwegomiya , ta 'ina 'aiweina 'oina 'ilagu hepa'igomiya , ma 'ina 'aiweina 'oinega 'ana we'ahega wanumanuma , beno Yehoba 'ina helau walobeya .
45011018	Ma hesiyage 'ina helauina sahena weyahina wagwaegwae hanehane , weyahina laha geya sowasowahina lamu 'iloinae , ma lamu hesiyage sawasawahina laha 'iloinaedi .
45011019	Weyahina 'eguma wanuwahane , ma wagwae , “ Yehoba 'ina 'aiwe lahanao 'ilasa pwaidiya , eema tauma 'oimega 'ihemiyalaediya . ”
45011020	Beno moisa . Ma hesiyage wanuwatuhuyahi beno lagalagaedi 'ilasediya weyahina geya sida hemisa , ma 'omi 'imi hemisega yawasimi bwebwe'ana walobeya . Eeta 'ami lobwaina Yehoba wamataute ma sahena wanuwanuwa hanehane .
45011021	Nata gide lahalahaedi 'ane Yehoba 'ina 'aiwe moisa 'oinega 'ilasalasa yahulediya , 'i'ewahiladi ma 'ihemiyalaenegomi , ma 'omi 'i'ewa yahulegomi .
45011022	He'ita bewama ta'iteya Yehoba 'ina helau ta 'ina loina pa'ala , weyahina tobe'u 'oidiya 'ina loina pa'alina 'ilagulagu , ma hesi 'omi 'ihelauwegomiya , ma 'eguma 'ina helauina walogwahate , 'omi wete 'ilasa yahulegomi .
45011023	Ta 'eguma meYudiyaedi sinuwabui ma sihemisa hila , nata wete Yehoba 'oina 'ilaguhepa'i hiladi , weyahina Yehoba sowasowahina ma gide 'ipaihowa 'esa .
45011024	Ma 'omi geya meYudiya wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega mwalo 'omi hali 'aiwe lahanao , ta geya Yehoba 'ina 'aiwe 'oina wada miya , ma 'ina paihowa 'ebe henuwanainaida madouna 'oimiya 'ipaihoweya , weyahina 'ina 'aiwe 'oina 'itubwegomiya , ma meYudiyaedi taudi Yehoba 'ina 'aiwe lahanao moisa sawasawahina wete 'ilagu hepa'ihiladi 'ina 'aiweina 'oina .
45011025	Ciyagwao , nuwanuwagu ginaula 'aigeda dahwadahwaina meIsileli weyahidi yahepwaile 'oimiya ma 'ane sahena wanuwanuwa hanehane , ma ginaula bewa wasanapu 'abehega nata meIsileliyedi sidebapa'ala 'ana siga 'omi tomiya ganamuli hesihesinuwami mabwaiyami 'abihetena wa'ewa .
45011026	Ma 'ane meIsileli mabwaiyadi 'abihetena 'abwa siloba . Weyahina Yehoba 'ina buki 'oina 'ihepwaila , 'igwaeya , “ To'abihetenaina , gwama Saiyoni , 'abwa 'ilatuma , ma susu Yakobo 'idi puiyedi 'i'ewayahuledi .
45011027	Ma tutaina 'eguma 'idi puiyedi ya'ewayahuledi , nata gwae hemisa 'ausalana ya'ebwaedi . ”
45011028	Ma bewa tutaina moisa meYudiyaedi Yehoba silolo'alehe , weyahina tetela bwebwe'ana siguipaileya , 'oinega 'omi tomiya ganamuli 'abihetena wa'eweya , ma hesiyage wanuwatuyahi 'abehega meYudiyaedi Yehoba 'ihelauwediya , weyahina mwalona tubudiyaowedi Yehoba 'ihesinuwediya 'ina bodao .
45011029	Ma geya sawasawahina Yehobaina mumugana , ma 'ina hesinuwa , nuwana 'ina helau , 'oidiyega 'ibui .
45011030	Ma 'omi geya meYudiya hesiyage mwalo geya Yehoba wada muliyeya , ma bewa tutaina Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyamuya walobeya , weyahina meYudiyaedi Yehoba siguipaileya .
45011031	Wete gide taudi 'abwa Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyamuya siloba , gide 'omi tuta bewa walobeya .
45011032	Eema tologuipaila mabwaiyada bewa gide Yehoba 'imumuga 'esegita ma 'abehega 'ina 'atemuyamuya 'ihe'itegita .
45011033	Ma moisa , Yehoba 'ina loina ta 'ina sanapuwao sihemadou hedada , ta geya 'eta wete taiya 'oidega sawasawahina Yehoba 'i'epatei ma 'ina nuwatuhuwao ta 'ina paihowao 'isanapudi , nata tahiya'asae .
45011034	Cina sanapuina 'imadou hedada , ta geya sawasawahida tahututao ma 'abehega 'eta to'aha nata 'oina tahe'ita ,
45011035	nuwana 'eta to'aha weyahina 'ana haga talagu ma 'ihemaisa 'oida .
45011036	Weyahina tauna ginaula mabwaiyana 'adi topaihowa , ma tauna wete 'ina waiwaiyega 'iboi weyahina 'ipaihowediya . Eeta Yehobaina tauna tahepwatu hatae . Emeni .
45012001	Tasigwao , wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyamuya 'oida 'imadou hedada , ee 'oinega bewa 'igu loguguya 'oimiya , tuta bewa mayawasimi wamiyamiya wapwaoliyegomi Yehoba 'oina , weyahina Yehoba nuwanuwana wahimi mabwaiyadi watagwaledi 'ina paihowa 'oina . Bewa gide paihowa 'esaina beno tapwalolo moisa 'ina 'eda Yehoba matana .
45012002	Sahena bale'u mumugana 'oina watagwa tagwalegomi , ma hesi wahimi mabwaiyana watagwaledi Yehoba 'oina . Coinega 'imi nuwatuhuwao Yehoba 'i'abi hehauhaudi , ma 'ina nuwatuhu bwebwe'adi ta yaliyaliyayadi ma dumwadumwaludi wasanapudi .
45012003	Camo'isamo tuwa Yehoba 'oinega 'atemuyamuya yalobeya , ma sawasawahigu wete yaloguguya 'oimiya eema sahena wanuwanuwa hane , ma hesi ma'imi sanapu wanuwatuhu bwaibwaina , weyahina Yehoba 'ina heguheguyai 'oida 'ida hemisa talobediya ,
45012004	eeta wahidaina 'aigeda tuwa , ma yahudi 'idi paihowa hagana ma hagana .
45012005	Tauda gidemusa Yesu Keliso yahunao , ma 'aigeda 'aigeda 'ida paihowao hagana ma hagana , ma hesiyage mabwaiyada Keliso 'oina taheboda 'aigeda ma tahe'abi 'abihetena .
45012006	Tauda 'aigeda 'aigeda sanapu ma waiwai Yehoba 'iheguyaigita , eeta tupwadi 'adi heguheguyai hagana 'iyadiyao 'oidiyega . Weyahina 'eguma taiya ma'ina hemisa , ma Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu 'igwaehapwese , beno tuwa 'ana lobwaina ma gidemusa 'ipaihowa 'ese .
45012007	Ma 'eguma taiya 'abihetena 'isanapuya , nata 'iyanao 'i'abihetedi . Ma 'eguma taiya he'ita 'isanapuya , 'ihe'ita tuwa .
45012008	Eema 'eguma taiya tuta baibaiwana 'iyanao 'i'abi'abi hewaiwaiyedi , ee 'ipaihowa gidemusa . Ma taiya wete tuta baibaiwana 'i'ehe'ehele , beno ma'ina 'atetagwala 'i'ehele . Ma 'eguma taiya 'ihetohanugeta , 'ida paihowa bwaibwaina . Ma 'eguma taiya ma'ina 'atemuyamuya , ee 'iyanao 'i'abi'abihetedi ma'ina yaliyaya .
45012009	Wahelau moisa . Pui waguipaile , ma mumuga bwebwe'ana hesiyage wa'abiyahi .
45012010	Ciyamiyao wahelau bwaibwainidi , ma wete wahe'asisiyanedi ,
45012011	ma Yehoba 'ina paihowa 'oina sahena walologuipaila , ma hesi ma'imi 'atetagwala wapaihowa .
45012012	Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tuta 'inaonaoma Yehoba 'ina 'abihetena 'ilatuma , ma weyahina wayaliyaya , 'oinega 'imi miyamwau 'oidiyega wa'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina , ma'imi 'alama'i'ita .
45012013	Ma 'eguma tasimiyao 'eta to'aha mwau 'ilatu 'oidiya , beno 'imi tobwatobwega wa'abihetedi , ma wete wabwauwedi 'imi hada .
45012014	Ma 'eguma taiyawedi siguipailegomi geya sowana waheheliyedi , ma hesi wagwae helau 'oidiya .
45012015	Ma 'eguma toyaliyaya wa'itadi , mahetemiyao wayaliyaya . Wete gide 'eguma tohedoudou wa'itadi , mahetemiyao wahedoudou ,
45012016	eema 'ane waboi wahelau hilegomi . Ma sahena wanuwanuwa hanehane , nuwana watohotoho ma wahetoloina , ma hesi taudi geya sanidimo wa'ahwa 'iya'iyaguwedi .
45012017	Ma 'eguma taiyawedi silo'alehegomi , sahena mumuga galana 'oinega wahehemaisedi , ma hesi wahemaisedi mumugaedi gide tomotai mabwaiyadi si'ahwa'ahwa bwebwe'ane 'oidiyega .
45012018	Eema wete watoho waiwai ma mumuga bwebwe'ana 'oinega tomota mabwaiyadi mahetemiyao wamiya daumwala .
45012019	Ma sahena wahehetoloina togala 'oidiya ma 'abehega 'idi pui wahemaisedi , weyahina bewa ginaulaedi Yehoba tauna 'ana toloinaina , ta Yehoba 'ina buki 'oina gide 'ihepwaila 'esa , 'igwaeya , “ ‘ Tomotai 'idi pui weyahina yaboigumo 'abwa yaloinae . ’ Yehoba 'ina gwae gide . ”
45012020	Ma 'eguma 'ami 'alehao sigomale 'e'ahai wa'ebwaedi , bo 'eguma tani'odi 'iyahala we'aha wa'ebwaedi , eema 'ane 'idi puiyedi weyahidi sideba mwadina ma sinuwabui .
45012021	Eeta sahena pui watagwatagwale ma 'oimiya 'ihewaiwai , ma 'omi hesiyage wahewaiwai sine mumuga bwebwe'ana 'oinega .
45013001	Mabwaiyada 'ilobwainegita ma 'ada toloinao tahe'asisiyanedi , weyahina 'idi paihowaina Yehoba 'i'ebwaediya . Ma 'eguma 'idi paihowaina geya Yehoba 'oinega , geya sawasawahidi sihetoloina 'oida .
45013002	Eeta 'eguma taiya toloinaedi 'isinalidiya beno Yehoba 'ina paihowa 'isinaliya , eeta 'abwa maisa galana 'iloba Yehoba 'oinega .
45013003	Ta toloinaedi 'idi paihowa geya 'abehega tobwebwe'adi si'ehematautedi , ma topui hesiyage si'ehematautedi 'idi puiyao weyahidi . Ta 'eguma geya nuwami toloinaedi wamatautedi , mumugami hedeyage sidumwalu , eema 'ane si'ahwa bwebwe'anegomi .
45013004	Weyahina taudi Yehoba 'ina topaihowao ma 'ane si'abihetegomi . Ma 'eguma mumugami galana , nata wa'ateyoho , weyahina taudi toloinao 'abwa siloinegomi . Weyahina Yehoba loina 'i'ebwaediya ma topui siloinaedi .
45013005	Eeta 'ilobwaineya ma toloinao tahe'asisiyanedi , tabu ta loina taloba , beno 'eguma mumuga bwebwe'ana nuwanuwada .
45013006	Sawasawahina wete 'ida takesi ta'ebwaedi , weyahina taudi Yehoba 'ihesinuwediya ta 'ina paihowa sipaipaihowa .
45013007	Coinega takesi 'adi tuta 'ewa 'oina ma'ida tagwala tatakesi , ma weteyage toloinao ma babada tahe'asisiyanedi ma weyahidi tayaliyaya .
45013008	Cami buki wahemaisa hegumwalidi , eema 'ane buki 'aigeda tuwa weyahina wanuwanuwatuhu beno helau , tauna geya sawasawahida tahemaisa hegumwali , weyahina 'eguma 'iyadao tahelauwedi beno loina mabwaiyadi tapaihowediya ,
45013009	loinaedi 'ane gide sigwaeya , sahena logwali , sahena lohe'amasa , sahena yagaha , sahena matalolo , eema tupwadi wete . Ma loinaedi 'adi bwagila , bewa gide 'igwaeya , “ Ciyamwao 'uhelauwedi gide 'uboi 'uhehelauwego . ”
45013010	Ceguma loina bewa 'upaihowa , 'ana gwae gide beno Mosese 'ina loinao mabwaiyadi 'upaipaihowadi , weyahina 'eguma taiya 'atena helau 'imiyamiya , nata geya sowana 'iyanao 'idi miya 'i'abihegala .
45013011	Ee 'oinega bewa tutaina sawasawahina tuwa 'eguma gide wapaihowa 'esa , weyahina 'ida tuta 'i'iunamo ma 'igumwala . Yesu bo'i wahemiseya , ee 'oinega sahena wa'eno'eno ma hesi wa'o'oyatola , weyahina 'ida tuta 'i'iunamo ma 'ada To'abiheteina 'ilatuma .
45013012	Ta moisa tuwa 'i'iunamo gona 'i'adale , eema 'ane nihuwana 'ana paihowa ta'ebesine , ma ta'atububugita sabwelo 'ana paihowa weyahina .
45013013	Coinega ta'ita yahigita ma sahena we'aha waiwaina tanumanuma ma taheyauyaule , sahena wete talologwali , ma sahena wete tahe'ahwa panapanawa , nuwana tahe'upwa besobeso .
45013014	Sahena bale'u mumugana weyahina tanuwanuwatuhu , ma hesiyage 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso mumuganega tatauya .
45014001	Tupwadi tomota 'idi hemisa we'ana , sawasawahina tatagwala ma 'ida boda 'oina siluhuma ma tahe'iya'iyagu , ma hesi sahena mahetedao tahe'ohe'ohe .
45014002	He'ohe'oheina gide 'eguma tupwami wagwae , “ Ce'ahai mabwaiyadi sawasawahina ta'aidi . ” Ma tupwami 'imi hemisa we'awe'ana wagwae , “ Cuibai ta'etala he'asisiye , sahena ta'ai'ai . ”
45014003	Sahena taudi to'e'uibai sisinasinala to'etala he'asisiyedi 'oidiya , eema to'etala he'asisiyedi wete , sahena to'e'uibaiyedi si'ahwa'ahwa galagalaedi , weyahina Yehoba 'ihesinuwediya 'abehega tauna natunao ,
45014004	ma wete tauna 'ina topaihowao , eeta tauna tuwa 'adi to'itayahina , ma 'owa geya . Coinega 'eguma 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anedi bo 'i'ahwa galagalaedi 'iboi 'ina 'ebeloina , weyahina tauna sawasawahina 'i'abihe waiwaiyedi ma geya sowana siwe'awe'a .
45014005	Tupwadi tomotai 'idi nuwatuhu wete gide 'abehega sabwelo tupwadi ma'adi he'asisi madouna , ma 'iyadiyao tupwadi 'idi nuwatuhu 'abehega sabwelowedi mabwaiyadi tuwa mahemahetena . Ceguma nuwatuhu bewa gide talobeya , 'ilobwaineya ma 'aigeda 'aigeda taunamo 'eguma to'aha 'eta 'isanapuya 'abehega bwebwe'ana , beno 'imuliye tuwa .
45014006	Ma 'eguma 'eta taiya sabwelo tupwadi 'ihe'asisiyanedi , tauna 'ipaipaihowa gidemusa Yehoba weyahina . Wete gide 'eguma 'eta taiya 'e'ahai mabwaiyana 'i'ai'ai besobeso , tauna 'iboi 'ina nuwatuhu beno 'abehega 'ina 'aiyega Yehoba 'ihe'asisiye , eema 'e'ahaiyedi weyahidi 'iloloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina . Wete gide 'eguma 'eta taiya 'e'ahai tupwadi 'i'etala he'asisiyanedi , tauna 'iboi 'ina nuwatuhu ma 'abehega Yehoba 'ida he'asisiye , ma weyahina 'iloyauwedo 'oina .
45014007	Ma geya 'eta taiya 'oidega sawasawahina ma 'iboi 'iloinae yawasina bo nuwana 'ina 'amasa weyahina .
45014008	Ma 'ida Badaina hesiyage tauna yawasida mabwaiyana ma 'ida 'amasa 'iloiloinaedi , weyahina tauda 'ina bodao .
45014009	Bewa weyahina Keliso 'i'amasa ma 'itoholohila , ta 'abehega to'amasaedi ma tauda mayawasida mabwaiyada 'oida 'ihetoloina .
45014010	Coinega wanuwatuhuyahi ma sahena wagwaegwae hesinuwa bo tasimiyao walolomugiyedi , weyahina tuta 'inaonaoma 'abwa mabwaiyada Yehoba matana tatoholo ma 'iloinaegita ,
45014011	gide Yehoba 'ina Bukiya 'ihepwaila , “ Yehoba 'igwaeya : Taugu miyamiya hatayagu , eeta 'abwa tomota mabwaiyadi si'etuluha 'oiguwa , ma si'ahwa Badaegau . ”
45014012	Eema 'aigeda 'aigeda nata taboi mumugada tahepwailedi Yehoba 'oina .
45014013	Coinega sahena 'iyadao ta'ahwa'ahwa galagalaedi , ma hesiyage taboi mumugada ma 'ida paihowa ta'itayahi , ma 'ane gesowana 'iyadai 'aigeda ta'abi'abi hewe'a 'ina 'etala he'asisi weyahina .
45014014	Cida Badaina Yesu nuwagu 'i'abi hemaedaneya moisa , ta yasanapuya 'abehega geya 'eta 'e'ahai 'eto'etobodana , ma 'eguma 'eta loheya 'ina nuwatuhu 'abehega 'e'ahai tupwadi 'eto'etobodadi , beno 'etobodaina tauna tuwa 'iboi weyahina .
45014015	Bo nuwana 'eguma tupwadi 'iyadao sigwaeya 'abehega 'uibai tupwadi he'ahe'asisidi , ma 'eguma 'u'ai nata tomotaedi sinuwagala . Beno geya helau 'ana 'eda . Ma 'unuwatuhuyahi hesiyage 'abehega tomotaedi weyahidi Keliso 'i'amasa , ee 'oinega sahena ginaulaedi he'ahe'asisinidi matadiya 'u'ai'ai , nata gide 'u'abi hewe'adi .
45014016	Ta 'owa 'oiuwa 'e'ahainaina bwebwe'ana , ma hali tomota 'oidiya galana , eeta 'eguma si'itago 'u'ai'ai nata si'ahwa yaliyego .
45014017	Ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi beno Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina geya 'e'ahai nuwana we'aha weyahidi , ma hesi mumuga bwebwe'ana , ma nuwadaumwala ma yaliyaya , beno Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega .
45014018	Ta 'eguma mumugaedi 'oidiyega Keliso 'ina paihowa tapaipaihowa nata Yehoba weyahida 'iyaliyaya , ma tomota weteyage si'ahwa bwebwe'anegita .
45014019	Eeta tatoho ma tamiya daumwala eema 'ane tahe'abi 'abihetena mahetedao .
45014020	Sahena 'e'ahai 'oinega Yehoba 'ina paihowa wa'abi'abi hegala , weyahina 'e'ahai mabwaiyana 'ausalana , ma 'eguma 'eta 'e'ahai 'oinega 'iyadaina tagihegala , 'e'ahainaina sahena ta'ai'ai hila .
45014021	Coinega bewa tutaina 'ilobwainegita ma ginaulaedi 'iyadaowedi sihehe'asisiyanediya , beno 'uibai bo nuwana bwasi waiwaina , sahena ta'abi'abi tohodi , 'amuge 'iyadaowedi tagihegaladi .
45014022	Ta moisa 'imi paihowaedi wahemisediya 'abehega 'ausaladi Yehoba matana , ma 'aigeda tuwa , 'eguma sahena 'iyamiyao wagihegihe galadi beno 'ebe yaliyaya 'oimiya .
45014023	Ma 'eguma ma'ida henuwanaluwa 'e'ahaiyedi ta'aidi , beno tapuiya Yehoba matana , weyahina geya tahemisa . Eeta tasanapu pwaiya 'abehega 'eguma to'aha 'eta tapaihowa ma geya tahemisa , beno pui .
45015001	Taiyawedi tauda 'ida hemisa waiwaina sawasawahina ma 'iyadao taudi 'idi hemisa we'awe'ana ta'abihetedi . Gesowana taboidamo weyahida tanuwanuwatuhu .
45015002	Eeta 'aigeda 'aigeda sawasawahina 'iyadao ta'abihetedi ma 'ane 'idi hemisa 'ihewaiwai .
45015003	Weyahina Keliso wete gide geya 'iboinamo weyahina 'inuwatuhu , ma hesi 'ana mwauwedi Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina 'ihepwailediya 'igwaeya , “ Tomotaiyedi si'ahwa'ahwa galegalegowa , beno taugu 'oiguwa gwaeina si'ina'inana . ”
45015004	Ma wete 'ebe'itao baibaiwadi Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina 'ihepwailediya Yehoba 'ina 'abihetenaedi weyahidi , 'eguma 'ebe'itaedi tahemisaedi , ta'alama'i'itana ma'ida nuwatuhuyahina 'ane 'etolema 'abwa ta'ewa .
45015005	Coinega tanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega Yehoba 'iboi to'alama'i'ita ma to'abihepa'ala , 'oinega tauna sawasawahina 'i'abihe pa'aligita , ma 'ida nuwatuhu talo'aigede gide Yesu Keliso 'ina nuwatuhu .
45015006	Eema 'ane mabwaiyada nuwatuhu 'aigeda 'oinega Yehoba tahepwatuwe , tauna 'ida Yehoba ma wete 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso Tamana .
45015007	Coinega 'iyamiyao wabwauwedi 'imi he'iya'iyagu 'oidiya , gide Yesu Keliso tauda 'i'ahwa 'iya'iyaguwegita , ma 'ane Yehoba 'ana hepwatu 'ihemadou .
45015008	Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega Keliso wete meYudiya 'oidiya 'ihetopaihowa , 'abehega Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisaedi babada nugenugetadi 'oidiya 'igwaeneya , 'adi moisa 'ida latu ,
45015009	ma wete 'abehega taudi geya meYudiya gogo mabwaiyana 'oidiya simiyamiya , Yehoba sihepwatuwe 'ina 'atemuyamuya 'oidiya weyahina . Weyahina Yehoba 'ina Buki 'oina 'aigeda lele 'imiyamiya , 'igwaeya , “ Bewa lamuna 'oinega tomiya ganamuli mahetegwao nata 'ahepwatuwego , ma wete Saniu weyahina ma'ima hepwatu 'awaliwali 'oiuwa . ”
45015010	Ma wete 'ina gwae 'aigeda 'igwaeneya , “ Comi tomiya ganamuli Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao mahetemiyao 'abwa wayaliyaya . ”
45015011	Ma wete 'igwae hila , 'igwaeya , “ Comi geya meYudiya , Badaina wahepwatuwe , ma wete mabwaiyami wa'ahwa bwebwe'ane . ”
45015012	Wete gide Aiseya 'ina Buki 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Ci'iunamo Desi 'ina bodao 'oinega loheya 'aigeda 'itauyama , ma gogo mabwaiyana 'iloinaedi , ma taudi tomiya ganamuliyedi nata sihemisa 'abehega tauna 'adi To'abihetena . ”
45015013	Ta Yehoba 'iboinamo ma'ana hemisa , weyahina 'iboi tuwa 'oinega lema bwebwe'adi talobaloba , 'oinega nuwanuwagu ma ma'imi yaliyaya wahemisa eema 'ane 'imi miyamiya sibwebwe'ana , ma wete Yehoba Yaluyaluwanega 'i'abihe waiwaiyegomi , ma 'imi hemisaina 'ihemadou bwaibwaina .
45015014	Ciyagwao , yasanapu bwaibwainigomiya 'omi tomota bwebwe'ami ma sanasanapumi , sawasawahimi wete 'iyamiyao 'oidiya 'eda'eda bwebwe'ana wahe'ita .
45015015	Ma 'imi leta bewa ma'igu 'atepatu ya'etoladiyawa ma 'ane tupwadi ginaula wanuwatuhu yahidi , weyahina 'igu paihowaina Yehoba 'i'ebwaegauwa ,
45015016	ta 'abehega Yesu Keliso weyahina yahetohalewasa 'omi tomiya ganamuli 'oimiya . Cigu paihowa Yehoba 'oina gide pwaoli , ma 'oinega Yesu wasana wahesagohe , 'abwa muliyetega ya'ebwayaegomi Yehoba 'oina , weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ideuligomiya , ta weyahimi Yehoba 'iyaliyaya madouna .
45015017	Ta moisa ma'igu yaliyaya Yehoba 'ina paihowa yapaipaihowa weyahina Yesu Keliso mahetegu 'apaipaihowa .
45015018	Coinega taugu yaboigumo 'igu paihowa weyahidi tuta bewa yahehepwailedi 'oimiya , ta geya hali tomota 'idi paihowa weyahidi . Ma yahepwaila dumwalu 'oimiya , beno 'igu loguguya tomiya ganamuli sihesagohediya eeta sihematamatanaediya , weyahina Yesu Keliso 'ina waiwai 'oiguwa 'imiyamiya .
