45015019	Ma wete 'igu paihowaedi waiwaidi ma 'ebenuwa henainaida si'itediya , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ina waiwaiyega Keliso wasana yaloguguya sakowasiyeya Yelusalemega ta 'ana siga Ililikomi .
45015020	Nuwanuwagu tupwa 'ehaudimo 'oidiya yaloguguya nugeta , 'asaedi taudi geya Keliso wasana sihesagohe , weyahina geya nuwagu hali tologuguyao 'idi paihowa yaloheposeyane .
45015021	Yehoba gide 'ina Bukiya 'ihepwaila 'esa , 'igwaeya , “ Taiyawedi To'abihetenaina tetelina geya sihesagohe , ee 'abwa sihesagohe ma sisanapu . ”
45015022	Bewa lamuna 'oinega geya yada habo'enegomiya . Ma moisa bolime baibaiwa hedade 'oidiya nuwanuwagu ma yahabo'enegomi , ma hesi geya sawasawahigu . Ma 'asa bewa 'oina 'igu paihowao yalosalohiya ,
45015023	
45015024	ee 'oinega bewa tutaina nuwana yabo'ene nugetegomi ma tupwana tayaliyaya toyawa , ee 'abwa wahegelugau ma yatauya Sipeini .
45015025	Hesi muliyetega 'abwa yatauyawa 'oimiya , nuwanuwagu ma yatauya nugeta Yelusalema , ma tohekalesiya 'adi lema ya'ebwaedi , beno meEsiya 'idi helau .
45015026	Weyahina meMasidoniya ma meGilisi nuwanuwadi 'idi helauina yatauye tohekalesiyao wewelohedi Yelusalema 'oina .
45015027	Weyahina bewa 'idi nuwatuhu madouna . Ta moisa tuwa lemaina sawasawahina meYelusalema siloba meEsiya 'oidiyega , weyahina nugeta meYelusalema 'oidiyega Esiyaedi Keliso tetelina sihesagoheya , yaluyaluwadi 'ana lema weyahina , ee 'oinega taudi wete bale'u tobwatobwaidi 'oidiyega si'e'ehele meYelusalema 'oidiya .
45015028	Ee 'eguma 'igu paihowaina yalosalohi , beno helauina mabwaiyana meYelusalema ya'ebwaedi , 'abwa yatauyawa 'oimiya , eema 'oimiyega yagelu hila yatauya Sipeini .
45015029	Ma yasanapuya 'abwa 'igu habo'enaina 'oimiya bwebwe'ana weyahina Keliso 'ina helau madouna 'oiguwa 'imiyamiya , eeta 'abwa tayaliyaya mahemahetena .
45015030	Ciyagwao , 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega ma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ina helauwega ya'ahwanoi 'oimiya , ma 'omi mahetegwao Yehoba 'oina ta'ahwanoi waiwai ,
45015031	ma 'ane taudi Yesu 'ana tologwahataedi Yudiya 'oina geya sowana si'abi'abi hegalegau , eema tohekalesiyao wewelohedi Yelusalema 'oina wete weyahidi , eema helauina yatauye 'oidiya 'ane siyaliyaya weyahina , ma sahena siguiguipaila .
45015032	Ta 'eguma Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu gide , nata ma'igu yaliyaya yatauyawa 'oimiya , ma nobwa tupwana ya'aiyawasi .
45015033	Yehoba mahetemiu , tauna nuwadaumwala moisa lamuna . Emeni .
45016001	Nuwamiya yalagu nuhudai Pibe weyahina , tauna 'i'abi'abihetena 'asa Kenikiliya 'idi hekalesiya 'oina ,
45016002	ma 'eguma to tuta 'itauyawa 'oimiya nuwanuwagu watoe 'imi hada 'ida Bada saninega , weyahina mumuga bewa gide Yehoba 'ina topaihowao 'ilobwainediya , ma wete Pibeina 'eguma to'aha 'oinega 'ito'uto'upa wa'abihete , weyahina tauna gide 'ipaipaihowa 'esedi tohekalesiyao baibaiwadi 'ihehelauwedi , taugu gide 'lemegauwa .
45016003	Cigu helau wete wahepwaile Pilisila ma Akuila 'oidiya , taudi mahetegwao mwalo Yesu Keliso weyahina 'ahetopaihowa ,
45016004	ma wete yawasidi sitagwaleya weyahigu saugaina 'ebe hesilae 'oidiya . Ta weyahidi yaloyauwedo madouna , ma geya 'abehega taugumo 'igu loyauwedo , ma tohekalesiya 'asaidi 'atamanega wete mahetegwao 'ima loyauwedo siteluwaedi weyahidi .
45016005	Ta 'igu helau wete wahepwaile tohekalesiyaedi si'eto'eto'auta Akuila 'ina hada . Ma 'iyagu Epinito weteyage 'oina yahelauwa , tauna Yesu Keliso 'ana tohemisa nugenugetaina Esiya 'ina 'ebeloina 'oina .
45016006	Meli wete 'oina yahelauwa , tauna weyahimi 'i'ala'i'iwasa madouna .
45016007	Ciyagwao Anidaloniko ma Diuniya wete 'oidiya yahelauwa , taudi meYudiya , mwalo mahetegwao deliya 'amiyamiya , siteluwaedi ma'adi 'amayaba Yesu 'ana tohepwailao 'oidiyega , weyahina taudi tohekalesiya nugenugetadi 'abwa muliyega taugu .
45016008	Ta wete 'iyagu moisa Amipiliya 'oina yahelauwa , tauna 'ida Bada 'ana tohemisa 'aigeda .
45016009	Ma wete 'igu helau Ulibano 'oina , tauna mahetedai Keliso weyahina tapaipaihowa . Ta wete 'iyagu Sitakisi 'oina yahelauwa .
45016010	Cigu helau wete Apeli 'oina , tauna Keliso 'ana tohemisa moisa . Ma Alisitobulo ma'ina susuwao 'oidiya wete yahelauwa ,
45016011	Ta Helodiyami weteyage , tauna 'igu susu gwama Yudiya 'aigeda , eema tohekalesiyaedi taudi Nakiso ma 'ina susuwao wete 'oidiya yahelauwa .
45016012	Cigu helau wete Talipina ma Taliposa , taudi 'ida Bada 'ina topaihowao 'oidiya . Ta 'iyagu Pelisi wete 'oina yahelauwa , tauna Bada 'ina paihowa weyahina 'i'ala'i'iwasa madouna .
45016013	Ta wete Lupuso 'oina yahelauwa , tauna topaihowa bwebwe'ana 'ida Bada weyahina , ma sinanaina weteyage 'oina yahelauwa , tauna 'agu tohelau , gide 'abwa taugu natuna moisa .
45016014	Cigu helau weteyage Asinikilito ma Pilegoni ma Helimi ma Pataloba ma Helimasi , ta tohekalesiyaedi mahetediyao wete 'oidiya .
45016015	Weteyage yahelauwa Pilologo ma Diuliya 'oidiya , ta wete Neliusa manuhuna 'oidiya . Wete Olimipasi ma Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyedi mahetediyao 'oidiya yahelauwa .
45016016	Caigeda 'aigeda 'iyamiyaowedi mahetemiyao he'iya'iyagu 'ana moisega wa'atusapwalidi . Ta wete tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi tupwa baibaiwana 'oidiyega , 'idi helau tohekalesiyao tupwa Loma 'oimiya .
45016017	Tasigwao bewa 'igu 'ahwanoi madouna 'oimiya , beno wa'itayahigomi towatahao 'oidiyega , weyahina he'itaedi wa'ewediya taudi 'adi wahi'wata , 'oinega ta si'ahwa'ahwa galegale ma weteyage tomota 'idi hemisa si'abi'abi hewe'adi .
45016018	Ceguma taiyawedi 'idi paihowa bewa gidemusa taudi geya 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso weyahina sida paihowa , ma beno siboi tuwa 'idi nuwatuhu si'e'epaihowadi , weyahina 'idi gwaeyao hoto hedada , ma tomota we'awe'adi si'e'e'abo'abowedi ma silisilisi hiledi .
45016019	Ma 'omi hesiyage tomota mabwaiyadi sisanapugomi 'abehega tetela bwebwe'ana 'ana tohematamatanao , ta weyahimi yayaliyaya madouna . Eema nuwanuwagu mumuga bwebwe'ana mabwaiyana wasanapu bwaibwainidi ta mumuga galadi walogwahatedi .
45016020	Moisa Yehoba tauna daumwala huhuna , ta nata Seitani 'i'ahusepale mwayamwayauwe 'oimiyega . Cida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina helau 'oimiya .
45016021	Bewa Timoti ma taugu 'ima helau 'oimiya , Timoti tauna mahetegu 'apaipaihowa , ma tupwana wete 'iyamayao meYudiya taudi Lukiyo ta Yesoni , ta Sosipateli .
45016022	Leta bewa taugu Talitiyasi yalele , Paulo weyahina , ma yahelauwa 'oimiya 'ida Bada saninega .
45016023	Ma loheyaina bewa 'ina hada 'amiyamiya , sanina Geyo , 'ihelauwa 'oimiya , hada bewama tohekalesiyao 'idi 'ebe 'eto'auta . Ma Elasito wete , 'asa madouna bewa 'ana mane 'ana to'itayahina , ta tasidai Kwatasi sihelauwa 'oimiya .
45016025	Coinega tuta bewa Yehoba tahepwatuwe , weyahina tauna sawasawahina 'i'abihe waiwaiyegomi , 'igu loguguyaina 'oinega , Yesu Keliso tetelina weyahina . Mwalona tetelaina dahwadahwaina ,
45016026	ta bewa tutaina 'i'abi latuheya 'oida , palopitao 'idi leleyao 'oidiyega , ma wete Yehoba miyamiya hatayana 'igwaeya 'abehega tetela bewa 'asa mabwaiyadi 'ana tomotaiyao sida sanapu , ma 'ane sihemisa ma simuliye .
45016027	Yehoba taunamo tosanapu moisa , 'oinega sawasawahina Yesu Keliso saninega tahepwatuwe tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya . Emeni . Taugu Paulo .
46001001	Taugu Paulo , Yehoba 'ihesinuwegauwa 'abehega Yesu Keliso tetelina 'ana tohepwaila . Cimi leta bewa tasidai Sositeni 'ilemegauwa ma yaleleyawa 'omi meKolinita tohekalesiyao 'oimiya . Weyahina 'omi Yesu Keliso 'i'abihe 'ehaugomiya , ta 'ina boda hesihesinuwadi 'oidiya waluhuma ma wamiyamiya , taudi wete Yesu Keliso saninega mahetemiyao wa'ahwa'ahwanoi , taudi tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiyega mahetedao 'ida Bada 'aigeda tuwa , tauna Keliso .
46001002	
46001003	Cida Badaina Yesu Keliso ma Tamada Yehoba 'idi helauwega tuwa wamiya daumwala .
46001004	Moisa , Yehoba 'ihelauwegomiya ma ginaula mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana 'i'ebwaegomiya , gidemusa 'imi gwae bwebwe'adi ta 'imi sanapu bwebwe'adi Yesu Keliso 'oinega . Eeta tuta mabwaiyana weyahimi yaloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina .
46001005	
46001006	Ta wete yaloyauwedoweya weyahina Kelisoina wa'ahwa moiseya ma tetelina wahemisaeya .
46001007	Ta wete Yehoba 'ina 'ebwaya bwebwe'adi mabwaiyadi 'oimiya simiyamiya , tuta bewa wayamwayamwana 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina latu hilama weyahina .
46001008	Ma tauna 'i'abi'abi hepa'aligomi , ta geya 'eta 'imi puimo , ma 'ana siga sabweloina 'ilohihilama .
46001009	Yehobaina ma'ana hemisa madouna eeta 'ibwauwegomiya ma natunaina tauna 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso ba'idamiu wahe'iya'iyagu .
46001010	Tasigwao , bewa 'igu lohatoto 'oimiya 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega ma 'abehega wanuwatuhu hegogona ma wagwae hegogona , ma hesi sahena wahehe'ohe'ohe nuwana wawatawatahigomi .
46001011	Weyahina tupwadi Kiloe 'ina bodao sihegwae pwaigauwa 'imi he'ohe'ohe weyahidi .
46001012	Eeta tupwami wagwae , “ Tauma Paulo 'ina boda . ” Ma tupwami wagwae , “ Tauma Apolosa 'ina boda . ” Ma tupwami wagwae , “ Tauma Pita 'ina boda . ” Ma tupwami wagwae , “ Tauma Keliso 'ina boda . ”
46001013	Sahena Keliso wahina tahwatahwatahidi , weyahina 'iboinamo weyahimi si'abi hekeloseya , geya taugu weyahimi . Wete Keliso tauna saninega wababitaisowa , ma geya saniguwega .
46001014	Cigu loyauwedo Yehoba 'oina bewa , weyahina geya mabwaiyami ya'abi'abihe babitaisogemi . Beno tuwa Kilisipo ma Geyo .
46001015	Sahena wanuwanuwatuhu ma wagwae , “ Tauma Paulo 'ina boda , weyahina Paulo 'i'abihe babitaisomaiya . ”
46001016	Geya ! Kilisipo ma Gayo , eema wete Sitipana 'ina susu ya'abihe babitaisowediya , nuwana siboidimo .
46001017	Weyahina 'igu paihowa Keliso 'i'ebwaegauwa tetela bwebwe'ana 'ana lohatotomo weyahina , ta geya 'abihebabitaiso . Ma wete loguguyaina geya 'igu sinasinapuwega , tabu ma Keliso 'ina 'amasa kelose 'oina tetelina ya'abihewe'a .
46001018	Kelose tetelinaina tomota tupwadi si'ahwa 'abo'aboweya , taudi yaluyaluwadi 'ama'amasidi , ma hesi tauda tahemisaeya 'abehega Yehoba 'ina waiwai tetelaina 'oina 'imiyamiya , ma 'oinega 'ilemegita .
46001019	Yehobaina Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaileya 'igwae , “ Taudi tosanapuwao ma tosonogao 'idi nuwatuhu yalogwahatediya ma ya'abihe galediya . ”
46001020	Coinega togidega taudi tosanapuwao bo nuwana tohe'itao ? bo nuwana taudi tologuguyao bewa tuwa bale'uwa simiyamiya ? Moisa , Yehoba 'idi sanapuina 'i'ahwa ginaula bwagabwagaediya .
46001021	Weyahina sanapu bale'uwa gesowana 'oinega Yehoba tasanapu , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu ta 'ina tetela 'ana lohatotomo 'oinega 'ana tohemisao tauda 'ilemegita . Tetelinaina mebale'u siheginaula bwagabwagaeya .
46001022	Weyahina meYudiya nuwanuwadi 'ila'ilalao sida 'itadi , ma taudi geya meYudiya , sanapu sibesebese .
46001023	Ma tauda hesiyage tetelinaina talohatotoweya , Keliso 'ina 'amasa kelosemo 'oina weyahina , eema meYudiya silogwahateya ma wete tomiya ganamuli si'ahwa ginaula bwagabwagaeya .
46001024	Ma hesi tauda Yehoba 'ana tohemisao 'ihesinuwanegita boda Yudiya ma hali bodao 'oidiyega , ma Keliso 'oinega Yehoba 'ina waiwai ta 'ina sanapu 'i'ebwaegita .
46001025	Weyahina to'aha Yehoba 'ina paihowa we'awe'ana bo 'i'iuna , tomota tauda 'ida waiwai madouna 'ihewaiwai sineya .
46001026	Ma tasigwao , wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega taudi Yehoba 'ihesinuwanediya 'oimiyega , baibaiwadi geya bale'u 'ana tosanapuwao , nuwana tohewaiwaiyao , nuwana 'ana babadao .
46001027	Ma hesiyage baibaiwadi yauyauleidi 'ihesinuwediya ma yauyauleidiyedi bale'u 'ana tosanapuwao si'abihedeba mwadinidiya , ma wete bale'u 'ana tobeluwao Yehoba 'ihesinuwediya ma taudi wete tohewaiwaiyao sihewaiwai sinediya .
46001028	Ta wete gogo gabulena Yehoba 'ina paihowa si'ahwa ginaula bwagabwagaediya , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina paihowao 'oidiyega 'idi ginaula mabwaiyana 'i'ahu sepalediya .
46001029	Coinega geya 'eta wete loheya sowasowahina ma 'igwae hane Yehoba matana .
46001030	Weyahina Yehoba tauna 'ina paihowega Yesu Keliso mahetedai tahe'aigeda , 'oinega Yehoba 'ina sanapu Yesuina 'ilagu balaheya 'oida , weyahina Yesu tauna wahina 'ipwaoliyeya weyahida , ta 'oinega 'i'abihe 'ehaugita ma 'i'abihe dumwalugita .
46001031	Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwaila ginaula bewa weyahina 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma taiya nuwanuwana ma 'ihepwatu , 'ida Badamo 'ida hepwatuwe . ”
46002001	Tasigwao , wanuwatuhu tutaina mwalo Yehoba tetelina ya'eweyawa ma yahepwaileya 'oimiya , geya 'igu gwae waiwaiyega , gide 'abehega taugu tosanapu moisa .
46002002	Ta hesi nuwanuwagu ma Yesu Kelisomo weyahina yada guguya 'oimiya tauna silohe'amasiya kelose 'oina .
46002003	Coinega 'igu latuma 'oimiya gide towe'a , ma'igu dedela ta ma'igu 'ateyoho .
46002004	Ma wete 'igu guguya 'oimiya geya gwae waiwaidi nuwana sanapu 'oidiyega , ta hesi Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina waiwaiyega .
46002005	Coinega 'igu guguyaina wahesagoheya ma wada hemisae 'abehega geya tomota 'idi sanapu 'oinega , ta hesi Yehoba 'ina waiwaiyega .
46002006	Sanapu moisa Yehoba 'oinega yahehepwaile tohemisa pa'alidi 'oidiya , ma hesi geya gogo gabulena bewa 'ana sanapu bo toloinao bewa tuwa 'idi sanapu , taudi simiyamiya tuta to'uto'upana tuwa .
46002007	Ma hesi sanapuina Yehoba 'oinega mwalo dahwadahwaina , ta bewa tuwa 'i'abilatuheya , weyahina muliyetega ma gogo gabulena 'ihemasaleheya , nugeta nuwanuwana ma 'ida 'ebeyaliyayaina 'ida 'ebwaegita .
46002008	Ta gogo gabulena bewa 'ana toloinao sanapuina geya sisanasanapu , ma 'eguma nuwana sida sanapu nugeteya , sahena 'ida Bada galewega silolohe'amasi kelose 'oina .
46002009	Ta hesi 'ida yaliyayaina weyahina Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwaila 'igwaeya , “ Sahena tagwaegwae Yehoba 'ana tohelauwao 'adi lema bwebwe'ana hedadena 'i'atububuya . Geya 'eta loheya 'ida 'iteya bo 'ihesagohe ma 'ida nuwasabwalena lemaina , weyahina bwebwe'ana hedada . ”
46002010	Ta hesi Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega Yehoba sanapuina 'i'abilatuheya 'oida , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana ginaula mabwaiyana 'isanapudiya . Coinega Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu dahwadahwaidi wete 'isanapudiya .
46002011	Tanuwatuhuyahi tauda tomota weyahida , 'eguma taiya loheya ma'ina nuwatuhu dahwadahwaina loheyaina tauna yaluyaluwana 'isanasanapu hile . Gidemusa wete Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'iboinamo 'ina nuwatuhu 'isanasanapu hile .
46002012	Yehoba Yaluyaluwana geya gogo gabulena yaluyaluwadi gide , ma hesi Yehoba 'i'ebwaegita Yaluyaluwanaina , 'oinega tanuwa sabwalena 'ina helauwedi taudi 'iheguyaiyediya .
46002013	Coinega 'ida gwae , nuwana 'ida he'ita , geya gogo gabulena 'idi sanapu 'oinega , ta hesi Yehoba Yaluyaluwanega . Coinega taiyewedi taudi Yaluyaluwaina 'oidiya 'imiyamiya sowasowahidi ma gwaeyedi sihesagohedi ma wete sisanapudi .
46002014	Ta hesi 'eguma geya , geya'abwa wete sisanasanapu , weyahina 'oidiya 'abehega ginaula yauyauledi tuwa . Coinega geya sowasowahidi ma ginaulaedi sisanapudi , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana geya 'i'abihenuwa sabwalenidi .
46002015	Ta hesi tauda ginaula mabwaiyadi tasanasanapudi , to'aha bwebwe'ana ma to'aha galana , 'oinega geya 'eta taiya sowasowahina ma 'i'ahwa galagalaegita .
46002016	“ Moisa , geya 'eta taiya Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu 'isanapu ma 'abehega 'ida he'ita , ” ma tauda hesi Keliso 'ina nuwatuhu 'oinega tanuwanuwa .
46003001	Ma tasigwao , geya sowasowahina ma sanapu moisa yahehepwaile 'oimiya , weyahina yaluyaluwami geya simatuha , ta 'imi nuwatuhu 'abwa tuwa gogo gabulena 'idi nuwatuhu gidemusa . Weyahina 'omi wahegaina tuwa Keliso 'ana hemisa 'oina , gide sedaseda 'i'iudi .
46003002	Coinega geya sowasowahimi ma 'e'ahai ya'ebwaegomi ma hesi susumo 'oinega yahe'aigomiya , weyahina mwalona ma nige geya sowasowahina 'e'ahai wa'ai .
46003003	Moisa , mumugami 'abwa tuwa gogo gabulena gidemusa , weyahina 'abwa wahe'ohe'ohe ma wahe'ipi'ipi tuwa .
46003004	Ta tupwami wagwae , “ Tauma Paulo 'ina boda . ” Ta tupwami wete wagwae , “ Tauma Apolosa 'ina boda . ” Cimi gwaeyedi gidemusa gogo gabulena 'idi gwae .
46003005	Togidega taugu ma Apolosa weyahima wahehe'ohe'ohe ? Tauma topaihowa tuwa , 'ida Bada weyahina . Cida Badaina 'ima paihowa 'i'ebwaemaiya hagadi ma hagadi 'apaipaihowadi , ma 'oinega 'omi Keliso wahemisaeya .
46003006	Taugu 'igu paihowa todauna tuwa , ma Apolosa to'itayahi . Ma Yehoba hesi 'iboimo 'ina waiwaiyega 'e'ahai 'iyada .
46003007	Coinega Yehoba 'iboimo tahepwatuwe , ma tauma sahena . Weyahina tauma todauna ma to'itayahina .
46003008	Ma hesi 'abwa tauma tanoha 'ana topaihowao 'ama maisa 'aigeda 'aigeda 'ada loba gidemusa 'ima hetapewa 'ana madou .
46003009	Bewa tuwa Yehoba ba'idamai 'ina tanoha 'apaipaihowa , ta 'ina tanohina beno 'omi tomota tuwa . Ma wete 'omi Yehoba 'ina hada .
46003010	Weyahina Yehobaina 'ihelauwegauwa ma 'ihesumanegauwa ma 'abehega 'ina to'abi hada , 'oinega 'ohola yalagu bwaibwainidiya ma 'oinega tupwadi topaihowa 'oholaedi 'oidiya ma si'abi , 'ilobwainediya ma sida 'abi bwaibwaina .
46003011	Cida 'oholaina 'imiyamiya , tauna Yesu Keliso , 'oinega geya sowasowahina ma hali 'ohola tahetoholo .
46003012	Ma hesi 'oholaina tabwanina 'ida yowayowana talagudi . Tupwadi tomota 'idi yowayowana bwebwe'adi si'ewedima , gidemusa 'ulabwa nuwana sagumo nuwana kasikasi , ma tupwadi 'idi yowayowanedi we'adi si'ewe'ewedima , gidemusa keipoki bo 'aulaha bo mulumulu .
46003013	Coinega 'abwa bwa'omatana 'ana sabwelo 'oina 'ida Badaina hadaedi 'ihadadadi ma 'ida tohodi , nuwana bwebwe'adi bo galadi .
46003014	Taudi si'abi bwaibwaina 'adi maisa si'ewa .
46003015	Ma taudi 'idi 'abi galadi , 'idi hadaedi 'igabu yahuledi ma loheloheyamo 'i'abihetedi , ma gesowana 'eta wete 'idi tobwatobwa 'itupwatupwa .
46003016	Eema wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tauda Yehoba 'ina Hada He'asisi , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'oida 'imiyamiya .
46003017	Ceguma taiyawedi Yehoba 'ina hadaina si'abihegaleya , Yehoba wete 'ida 'abihegaladi . Weyahina 'ina hadaina 'asi'asilalana ma taudi si'abi hegaleya . Cina hadaina tauda .
46003018	Gesowana taiya 'owa 'uboi 'u'abowego 'abehega 'owa 'aigeda tosanapu , weyahina 'eguma bale'u bewa 'ana sanapumo 'usanapuya , 'ilobwainegowa ma sanapuina 'ulogwahate ma 'oinega sanapu moisa Yehoba 'oinega 'uloba .
46003019	Weyahina sanapu bewa bale'uwa gide yauyaule Yehoba matana . Weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaila gidemusa 'igwaeya , “ Yehoba tosanapuwao 'i'onediya ma sida hesilae siboi 'idi gomanega . ”
46003020	Ma wete 'igwaeya , “ Badaina tosanapuwao 'isanasanapudi 'abehega sinuwatuhu besobeso . ”
46003021	Ma sahena wagwaegwae hanehane 'imi tohanugetaowedi bale'uwa weyahidi , weyahina Keliso ginaula mabwaiyadi 'i'ebwae pwaigomiya .
46003022	Gidemusa taugu ma Apolosa ma Pita wete 'ilagumaiya 'ami to'abihetenao , ma bale'u wete mabwaiyana 'i'ebwaegomiya , ma wete yawasimi ta 'imi 'amasa , wete ginaula mabwaiyana tuta bewa 'oina ma tuta sinaonaoma 'oidiya 'i'ebwaegomiya .
46003023	Weyahina 'omi Keliso 'ina tomotaiyao , ta Kelisoina Yehoba 'oinega .
46004001	Sowasowana ma wasanapumai 'abehega tauma Keliso 'ina topaihowao , weyahina tetelaina Yehoba 'oinega mwalo dahwadahwaina ma bewa tuwa 'ahehepwaile 'oimiya .
46004002	Cima paihowaina 'oina 'ilobwaineya ma 'apaihowa bwaibwaina .
46004003	Cigu paihowa bewa weyahina , 'eguma wa'ahwa bwebwe'anegauwa bo nuwana wa'ahwa galagalaegau , 'imi nuwatuhuwedi bo hali tomotaiyao 'idi nuwatuhu weyahigu , geya to'aha 'oiguwa .
46004004	Ta wete taugu 'igu nuwatuhu 'abehega 'igu paihowaina bwebwe'ana , ma hesi geya yasanapu bwaibwaini , nuwana bwebwe'ana bo galana , Yehobamo 'isanasanapu .
46004005	Bewa tuwa sahena 'eta taiya 'iyanao 'oidiya 'ihesihesinuwa 'abehega bwebwe'adi bo galadi , weyahina 'abwa 'ida Bada 'inaoma ma 'iboinamo 'iloinaegita . Ta 'ina loinaina dumwaluna weyahina 'ida nuwatuhu galadi 'ateda Yehoba 'i'abilatuhedi ma 'iloinaegita , eema 'ida nuwatuhu bwebwe'adi 'i'abilatuhedi , ma weyahidi 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita .
46004006	Cebe'ita bewa taugu ma Apolosa 'oimega wa'ita , ma 'oinega 'eda'eda bwebwe'ana sahena wa'ebe'ebesine , ma sahena wagwaegwae hanehane 'imi tohanugetao weyahidi , 'abehega 'aigeda 'imi tohanugeta 'ibwebwe'ana hedada .
46004007	Sahena wanuwanuwa hanehane ma 'abehega 'iyamiyao wabwebwe'ana sinediya , weyahina to'aha bwebwe'ana 'oimiya simiyamiya mabwaiyana Yehoba 'oinega walobeya , 'oinega sahena wagwaegwae hanehane .
46004008	Cana 'ita geya bwebwe'ana weyahina wagwaegwae 'abehega wahewaiwai pwaiya , ma ginaula mabwaiyadi sowasowahimi , 'oinega wala'wemaiya . Moisa , nuwanuwagu ma wada hewaiwai ma tapwalolo 'oinega wada hewasawasa , ma 'oinega 'omi ma tauma tada hemahemahetena .
46004009	Ta hesi bewa tuwa 'ana 'ita gide Yehoba 'ana tohepwailao tauma miya mwauna 'i'ebwaemaiya , gidemusa taudi paipaidi sabi lohe'amasidi , ma 'oinega aneloseyao ma loheloheyao ma ginaula mabwaiyana si'e'ebubumai .
46004010	Ta 'ama 'ita gidemusa yauyauleima Keliso weyahina , ma hesi 'ami 'ita gidemusa taudi Keliso 'ana tosanapuwao , weyahina tauma we'awe'aima ma 'omi waiwaimi , ta ma'ami he'asisi , ma tauma hesi ma'ima debamwadina .
46004011	Tuta baibaiwana ma'ama gomale ta ma'ama tani'o yahala , ta geya 'ama 'ale'omo , ma wete geya 'ima hadamo , 'oinega 'ama 'ita gide tomiya nanaewa .
46004012	Tauma nimamega 'apaipaihowa , ma 'eguma taiyewedi si'ahwa galagalaemai gwae helauwega 'ahemaisadi , ma wete 'eguma si'abi hemuyamuyaemai tuwa 'a'alama'i'ita .
46004013	Ta wete 'eguma sigamwasowalemaiya , ma'ima nuwa bwebwe'ana 'ahe'iya'iyaguwedi . Moisa , tauma gide mohomoho , 'oinega tomota silogwahatemaiya .
46004014	Gwae bewa yaleleyawa geya 'abehega ya'abihedeba mwadinegomi , ma hesiyage sabi hedumwalugomi gide natugwao moisa 'omi .
46004015	Moisa , 'imi tohe'itao boda hedada Keliso 'ina 'eda'edao weyahina , ma yaboigumo tuwa tamamiu , weyahina tetela bwebwe'ana 'ana guguya 'oinega ya'ewegomiya Yesu Keliso 'oina .
46004016	Coinega natugwao , ya'ahwanoi 'oimiya ma wahe'au'aunawegau .
46004017	Ma natugu Timoti yahewasaeyawa ma 'ane 'ihepwaile 'oimiya , 'igu hemisa Keliso 'oina weyahina , gidemusa tohekalesiyao yahe'itediya 'asa mabwaiyana 'oidiya , ta 'oinega sahena wanuwanuwa naidedi . Timotiina yahelauweya ma yahemiseya , weyahina 'ida Bada 'ina paihowa 'oina 'ihetapewa hedada , ma bewa tuwa 'inaonaowa 'oimiya .
46004018	Ta hesi tupwadi 'oimiyega sinuwatuhuya 'abehega taugu sahena yanaonaowa . Coinega sinuwanuwahane ma sigagagagasa .
46004019	Geya ! Ma hesi 'eguma 'ida Bada 'itagwala , 'abwa yalomwayamwayau ma yanaowa 'oimiya , ma taudi togagasaedi yatohodi geya 'abehega 'idi gwaemo 'oidiyega ma 'idi paihowao wete ya'itadi , waiwaidi bo we'awe'adi .
46004020	Weyahina Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'oina geya gwae namo , ma hesi waiwaiyega .
46004021	Togidega 'imi nuwatuhu ? Ma'igu loina pa'alina yanaowa , bo ma'igu helau ma ma'igu nuwabiga yanaowa ? Waboi wahesinuwa .
46005001	Cimi pui yahesagoheya weyahina 'aigeda loheya 'oimiyega tamana mwanena mahetena sipuiya . Pui beno gala hedada . Taudi tomiya ganamuli gogo baibaiwana 'oidiya geya gidemusa sida mumuga 'esa .
46005002	Sahena wanuwanuwahane , ma hesi mumuga bewa weyahina wadou , ma topuiina 'imi boda 'oinega wapa'i .
46005003	Bewa tuwa taugu yamiya bwagabwaga , ma hesi 'igu nuwatuhu 'oimiya 'imiyamiya , gidemusa taugu mahetemiu , 'oinega topuiina 'ana loina 'oimiya yahepwaileyawa , beno 'ida Bada Yesu saninega .
46005004	Cana loinaina bewa gidemusa , miya hegogona wapaihowa 'ida Bada Yesu saninega , ta 'igu nuwatuhu wete mahetemiu ma Badaina Yesu 'ina waiwaiyega .
46005005	Topuiina wa'ebwae Seitani 'oina ma 'abehega wahina 'i'abihegala ma 'oinega muliyetega 'ida Bada 'ina sabweloina 'oina loheyaina yaluyaluwana 'ida 'abihete .
46005006	Ma sahena wanuwanuwahane , ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'eguma puiina muhemuhena 'oimiya 'imiyamiya nata mabwaiyami 'i'abihe galegomi .
46005007	Coinega puiina 'oimiyega wapa'i ma waheboda bwebwe'ana , weyahina Keliso 'ina 'amasa 'oinega 'ideuligemi ma Kelisoina tauna gidemusa 'ida Hataona Guyaina baweina , tuwa weyahida silohe'amasiya .
46005008	Eeta 'ida guyai tapaihowa , geya ma'ida 'eda'eda miyamiyana galana 'oinega , ta hesi 'eda'eda bwebwe'ana ma dumwadumwaluna 'oidiyega .
46005009	Mwalona 'imi leta 'aigeda 'oina yahepwaila 'abehega geya'abwa topuiyedi mahetemiyao wa'ahwa 'iya'iyagu ,
46005010	ma hesi geya yaloiloina 'abehega tologwaliyedi ma tobwatobwa 'ana tohamwao ma toyagahao ma tolonabwasuwao walogwahatedi , weyahina bale'u bewa 'oina taudi gidemusa baibaiwa hedade , geya sawasawahida ta'ebesinedi .
46005011	Ma bewa tuwa 'igu loina 'oimiya gide , 'eguma taiya 'ihekalesiya ma 'ilogwali , 'eguma tomata tobwatobwa , bo tolonabwasuwa , bo toheliya , bo tonuma bwasi waiwai , bo toyagaha , geya'abwa wa'ahwa 'iya'iyaguwe bo nuwana mahetemiu wa'ai .
46005012	Ta 'igu 'ebeloina tohekalesiyaomo 'oidiya , ma geya'abwa hali boda 'oidiya .
46005013	Weyahina taudi muliyetega Yehoba 'iloinaedi , ma hesi tologwaliina 'aigeda 'omi 'imi boda , 'oinega 'ilobwaineya ma waloinae , ma 'oimiyega wapa'i .
46006001	Caigeda wete ginaula 'ebedeba mwadina 'oimiya 'imiyamiya , beno 'imi yatala 'oidiya toloinaedi taudi geya totapwalolo 'oidiya watautauya , ma hesiyage 'ilobwainegomiya tohekalesiyaowedi 'oidiya watauya .
46006002	Wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tauda Yesu 'ana tohemisao muliyetega ginaula baibaiwadi tada loinaedi , 'oinega sawasawahimi ma ginaula 'i'iudi yatala 'oidiya waloinaedi .
46006003	Cabwa galewa aneloseyedi wete taloinaedi , 'oinega bewa tuwa sawasawahida ma paihowa bale'uwa taloinaedi .
46006004	Geya'abwa watautauya toloinao taudi geya sihekalesiya 'oidiya .
46006005	Beno ginaula 'ebedeba mwadina . Ma hesi 'eguma taiya 'oimiyega nuwanuwana ma 'iyana mahetena siyatala , 'ilobwainediya ma 'aigeda tosanapu boda hekalesiya 'oinega si'ebesa ma tauna yatalaina 'iloina .
46006006	Comi 'imi paihowa geya bwebwe'ana , weyahina taudi geya Keliso 'ana tohemisao matadiya wayatayatala .
46006007	Comi tohekalesiyao 'eguma wayatala , 'ana 'ita geya bwebwe'ana , ma hesi 'eguma mwau 'oimiya sihapwehapwesa , 'ilobwainegomiya ma 'ami to'e'abo'abowedi wahe'alama'i'itanedi ma geya'abwa waheheyataladi .
46006008	Ma hesiyage 'omi tohekalesiyao tasimiyao wa'abo'abowedi ta 'oidiyega wayagayagaha .
46006009	Ceguma mumugami gidemusa geya'abwa Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'oina waluhuluhu , weyahina topuiyedi mabwaiyadi Yehoba 'i'etobodediya , gidemusa tolonabwasuwaedi ma tologwaliyedi , toganawalaedi wahiwahinedimo matasidiyao sipaipaihowa , loheloheyadimo wete mahetediyao sipaipaihowa ,
46006010	ma toyagahao ma tomata tobwatobwaedi , ma tonuma bwasi waiwai , ma tolomugiyao ma to'e'abo'abowao .
46006011	Weyahina tupwami mwalona mumugami gidemusa , ta hesi tuwa Yehoba 'ideuli pwaigomiya , ta wa'ehauwa , weyahina 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega ma Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina paihowa 'oinega 'i'abihedumwalu pwaigomiya .
46006012	Gwae 'aigeda yahesagoheya tomota tupwadi sigwaeya 'abehega , “ Mumuga mabwaiyana sawasawahina yapaihowadi . ” Moisa tuwa , sawasawahida ginaula mabwaiyana tapaihowadi , ma beno tuwa 'abehega mumugaedi geya sida lemegita , ta hesi ma'idi waiwai ma sawasawahina sipaigita .
46006013	Wanuwatuhuyahi 'e'ahai weyahina . Moisa , 'e'ahai gamwada weyahina , ma wete gamwada 'e'ahai weyahina , ma hesi muliyetega 'e'ahai ma gamwada Yehoba 'ilohegumwalidi . Ma wahida Yehoba 'i'ebwaegita geya ganawala weyahina , ma tauna hesiyage weyahina , ma tauna tauda weyahida ,
46006014	ta wete tauna 'ina waiwaiyega 'amasega 'i'abihe toholo hilegita , gidemusa 'ida Bada Yesu 'amasega 'i'abihe toholo hileya .
46006015	Wahida beno Keliso yahuna , 'oinega geya'abwa taiya 'owa toganawala maheteu wamumuga galagala .
46006016	Weyahina 'eguma taiya loheya toganawala mahetena sipui , beno silo'aigeda pwaiya , gidemusa Buki He'asisi 'igwaeya , “ Siteluwa silo'aigeda , gidemusa tuwa wahidi 'aigeda . ”
46006017	Ta hesi 'eguma 'ida Bada maheteu walo'aigeda , yaluyaluwami wete silo'aigeda .
46006018	Sahena waganawala , weyahina ganawala geya gidemusa hali mumuga galadi . Moisa , hali mumuga galadi geya wahida si'abihe galadi , ma ganawala hesi wahida 'i'abihe galadi .
46006019	Coinega wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega wahida Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina hada , weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuina Yehoba 'oinega 'itauyama ma 'aloda 'imiyamiya , ma geya'abwa taudamo taloiloinegita , ma hesi Yehoba 'ida loinegita .
46006020	Weyahina 'ihemaisa pwaigita , 'oinega 'ilobwainegita ma wahida 'oidiyega sanina ta'abihe madou .
46007001	Nuwatuhuina hai weyahina 'igu leta 'oina wahesilaleya . Cigu hemaisa bewa : Bwebwe'ana tuwa 'eguma meloheyadi geya'abwa sihaihai .
46007002	Ma hesi geya sawasawahimi ma mabwaiyami gidemusa wamiyamiya , weyahina baibaiwa hedade taudi wewelohe sipaipaihowa besobeso . Nuwana 'ilobwainegomiya wa'elohai ma 'aigeda 'aigeda mamwanena , ma geya'abwa paihowa besobeso 'imadomadou 'oimiya .
46007003	Ma 'oinega loheloheyaemi mwanemiyao 'idi nuwatuhu wamuliyedi . Wete gide 'omi wahiwahine mwanemiyao 'idi nuwatuhu wamuliyedi .
46007004	Weyahina 'eguma wahine 'ihai , geya sawasawahina ma tauna wahina 'iloinae ma hesiyage loheya 'iloinae . Wete loheya , geya sawasawahina ma tauna wahina 'iloinae ma hesiyage wahine 'iloinae .
46007005	Ma wete geya'abwa wa'eno'eno wasiwasi mwanemiyao 'oidiyega . Beno tuwa 'eguma tohai siteluwaedi 'idi nuwatuhu mahemahetena ma sabwelo tupwadimo 'oidiya sida 'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina ma muliyetega wete si'enoluwa hila , ta geya'abwa wamiyamiya wasiwasi hedade tabu ta nuwatuhu dahwanaedi 'oimiya sihapwesa ma 'oidiyega Seitani 'itoho ma 'imi hai 'i'abihegaladi .
46007006	Ceguma nuwanuwami ma wahai , bwebwe'ana , ta geya'abwa yaloinaegomi 'abehega mabwaiyami wahai ,
46007007	weyahina nuwanuwagu 'abehega geya'abwa wahaihai , gidemusa taugu geya yahai , ma hesi mabwaiyada 'ada loina hagana ma hagana Yehoba 'i'ebwae pwaigita , ma tupwama 'amiyamiya wewelohe ma'ima yaliyaya , ta tupwami wahaiya .
46007008	Coinega 'omi wewelohe ma hiwahiwape 'ami henuwalagu bewa , 'eguma geya wahai , nuwana bwebwe'ana tuwa gide wamiyamiya , taugu gidemusa .
46007009	Ma 'eguma geya sawasawahimi wa'alama'i'itanegomi , ta nuwanuwami wahai , beno bwebwe'ana wete , wada hai tuwa , ma 'oinega geya'abwa nuwatuhu dahwana 'i'abi'abihe galegomi .
46007010	Ma 'omi tohai yahepwaila 'oimiya geya taugu 'igu loina , ma hesi Badaina 'ina loina 'abehega sahena wahine mwanena 'isa'isa'ile .
46007011	Ma hesi 'eguma taiya wahine mwanena mwalona 'isa'ileya 'ana 'eda 'eluwa bwebwe'adi simiyamiya , beno 'abwa wahineina 'iboi 'imiyamiya ma sahena 'ihaihai , ta bwebwe'ana wete 'eguma 'ihila mwanenaina 'oina . Ma hesi loheloheya mwanediyao sahena sisa'isa'iledi .
46007012	Bewa wete nuwatuhu tupwana taugu 'oiguwega , geya 'ida Badaina 'ina loinega , beno 'eguma taiya 'owa loheya mwaneu geya 'ihemisa Yehoba 'oina , ta 'ina nuwatuhu gidemusa ma maheteu wamiyamiya tuwa , geya'abwa 'usa'isa'ile .
46007013	Wete gidemusa 'eguma 'aigeda wahine 'owa mwaneu geya 'ihemisa Yehoba 'oina , ma nuwanuwana maheteu tuwa wamiyamiya geya'abwa 'usa'isa'ile .
46007014	Ceguma taiya loheya bo wahine mwanena geya 'ihemisa Yehoba 'oina , ma hesi mahetena tuwa simiyamiya , nata tohemisaina mwanena 'i'abihe bwebwe'ane , ma 'oinega natudiyao tupwa 'asi'asilalaina 'oina simiyamiya . Ta 'eguma sisa'ila beno natudiyao 'idi miya 'igala .
46007015	Ta 'eguma taiya 'owa mwaneu geya Yehoba 'oina 'ihemisa ma nuwanuwana ma 'isa'ilego , 'u'abisine ta sahena 'unuwanuwahi . Weyahina Yehoba nuwanuwana wamiya daumwala , ta genuwana he'ohe'ohe .
46007016	Cowa loheya bo wahine 'abwa togidega mwaneu 'u'abihe nuwabui 'ese , 'eguma 'u'abiyahi ? Geya tasanapu , 'awa ?
46007017	Cida paihowa Yehoba 'iheguyai pwaiya 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oida , 'oinega 'ebe paihowaedi 'oidiya tada miyamiya . Bewa gidemusa 'igu loina tohekalesiyao tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiya .
46007018	Ceguma taiya 'owa gwama Yudiya ma meYudiya 'ida 'ila'ilala mwalo si'upweya 'wapiu ma muliyetega Yesu Keliso 'oina 'uhemisa , sahena 'unuwanuwagala meYudiya 'ida 'ila'ilalaina weyahina . Ta wete 'eguma geya 'ila'ilalaina 'oiuwa , geya'abwa 'upwaina 'u'ewa ,
46007019	weyahina 'upwaina geya ginaula madouna , ta ginaula madouna hesi Yehoba 'ina loina 'adi hematamatana .
46007020	Sahena 'imi miya bo 'imi paihowa bale'uwa weyahidi wanuwanuwagala ma 'abehega waluhu hali paihowa 'oina .
46007021	Ceguma taiya 'owa 'aigeda loheya madouna weyahina 'upaipaihowa tutaina 'uhekalesiya , sahena 'unuwanuwagala 'ino paihowaina weyahina , ma hesi 'eguma 'ino taubadaina 'abwa 'itagwalego ma 'uhila 'ino 'asa , bwebwe'ana tuwa 'uhila .
46007022	Moisa , topaihowa bale'uwa 'eguma Keliso 'oina sihemihemisa , Yehoba sawasawahina 'idi puiyao 'oidiyega 'ilihasidi , ta wete loheya madoudi 'eguma Keliso 'oina sihemisa , sihe'ali'e tauna weyahina .
46007023	Weyahina Kelisoina 'ihemaisegita ma tauda 'ina bodao . Gesowana watagwalegomi hali taubadao 'oidiya .
46007024	Ciyagwao , gesowana 'imi 'ebe miyaina walogwahatedi . Ceguma to'aha 'imi 'ebemiya tutaina Yehoba 'ibwauwegomiya ma wahekalesiya , 'ebemiyaedi tuwa 'oidiya wada miyamiya , Yehoba mahetemiu .
46007025	Geya 'aigeda wete loina Yehoba 'i'ebwaegauwa gumalaulau taudi geya sihai weyahidi , ta hesiyage 'ihelauwegauwa ma nuwatuhu dumwalunega 'i'ebwaegauwa loinaina weyahina .
46007026	Bewa tuwa tuta 'ebe hesilae 'ida miya 'oina , tuwa 'abwa 'oina tamiyamiya .
46007027	Ma 'eguma taiya 'owa 'uhaiya , mamwaneu tuwa wamiyamiya . Ta 'eguma taiya 'owa geya 'uhai , gesowana wete wahine 'u'ebe'ebese .
46007028	Ma hesi 'eguma loheya 'ihai beno geya pui , wete 'eguma gumalaulau 'ihai beno geya pui , ta hesi haihainidi 'idi paihowa madouna , 'oinega nuwanuwagu ma ya'abihe malamalaiyegomi .
46007029	Weyahina tuta mwauna bale'u 'ihahoho pwaiya , ma 'omi mehaihai 'ilobwainegomiya mumugami gidemusa taudi geya sihai .
46007030	Ta 'omi todou wamumuga gidemusa taudi geya sida douwa , ta wete 'omi toyaliyaya wamumuga gidemusa tonuwagala . Wete 'omi tohegimwane wamumuga gidemusa wewelohedi ,
46007031	ma wete gesowana bale'u bewa ginaulaedi weyahidi wanuwatuhu hedade , weyahina tuta 'i'iuna sisawala ma bale'u bewa 'igumwala .
46007032	Nuwanuwagu ma gesowana ginaula bale'u weyahidi wanuwanuwatuhu hedade , ma hesi mumugami gide taudi geya sihai . Weyahina taudi geya sihai Yehoba 'ina paihowamo weyahina sinuwanuwatuhu madouna , ma nuwanuwadi Badaina si'abihe yaliyaya .
46007033	Ta taudi haihainidi bale'u ginaulaedi nuwanuwadi ma 'abehega 'oidiyega mwanediyao si'abihe yaliyayadi .
46007034	Coinega geya sawasawahina ma 'eda 'eluwaedi 'oidiyega sitautauya . Ta wete gumalaulau ma wahiwahine taudi geya sihai sawasawahidi ma Yehoba weyahina sinuwatuhu madouna , ma 'oinega wahidi ma yaluyaluwadi si'abi he'ehaudi , ma hesi haihai nidi sinuwanuwatuhu ginaula bale'u weyahidi ma 'abehega 'oidiyega mwanediyao si'abihe yaliyayadi .
46007035	Cigu hepwaila bewa 'oinega geya hai ya'ausi , ma hesi sabi 'abihetegomi , ma Yehoba 'ina paihowa 'oidiya wada paihowa bwaibwaina , ta gesowana hali ginaula ma hali ginaula weyahidi wanuwanuwatuhu .
46007036	Ceguma taiya loheya natuna gumalaulauina 'i'ausi ma sahena 'ihaihai , ma hesi 'eguma natunaina 'inuwagala , weyahina 'ihewahine pwaiya ma nuwanuwana ma 'aigeda loheya ba'idana sihai , tamana 'itagwala tuwa 'idi hai weyahina , weyahina hai geya ginaula galana .
46007037	Ta hesi 'eguma loheya nuwana 'ipa'ala ma 'abehega natunaina sahena 'ihaihai ta 'eguma natunaina sawasawahina ma 'i'alama'i'itana ma geya 'ihai ta wete 'eguma geya taiya 'oidiyega 'inuwagala 'etobodaina weyahina , beno bwebwe'ana hedada , 'eguma gumalaulauina geya 'ihai .
46007038	Ceguma taiya 'ina gumalaulau 'itagwale ma 'ihai , beno bwebwe'ana , ta 'eguma 'i'etobode beno wete bwebwe'ana hedada .
46007039	Ma 'eguma taiya wahine haihainina mwanena ba'idana sihe'aigeda pwaiya ta 'eguma loheya 'i'amasa , wahineina sawasawahina ma 'ihai hila . Ta hesi 'ilobwaineya Yehoba 'ina loheya 'aigeda mahetena sihai .
46007040	Ta yanuwatuhuya 'abehega 'eguma wahine 'iboi namo 'imiyamiya , ma sahena 'ihaihai hila , beno bwebwe'ana hedada . Nuwana Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ina nuwatuhu bewa gidemusa .
46008001	Caigeda wete hesilala 'igu leta 'oina wahepwaila pwaiya , beno pwaoliyedi nuwana 'e'ahaiyedi tomota si'ebwa'ebwaya 'idi 'ebe hemisa da'ule bo 'aiwe 'oidiya . Ginaulaedi 'idi 'abo wasanasanapu , ma hesi sahena wanuwanuwahane 'imi sanapuina 'oina , ma 'ilobwainegomiya ma 'iyadao mabwaiyadi 'atemiyega wahelauwedi , weyahina helau ginaula madouna , ma sanapu hesi geya ginaula madouna .
46008002	Ceguma tanuwatuhu 'abehega tauda tosanapu , beno geya tasanapu bwaibwaini ,
46008003	ma hesiyage 'eguma Yehoba tahelauwe , tauda Yehoba 'isanapugita ma 'ihesinuwanegita .
46008004	Ma 'e'ahaiina tomota si'ebwa'ebwae 'idi 'ebe hemisa 'abo'abowao 'oidiya , sowasowana ta'ai , bo geya ? Cebe hemisa 'abo'abowedi geya 'ebe hemisa moisa , weyahina Yehoba 'iboimo 'imiyamiya , ma hali 'ebe hemisao ginaula besobeso .
46008005	Ta tomota baibaiwadi sinuwatuhuya 'abehega 'ebe hemisao bo nuwana yabowahine baibaiwadi galewa ma bale'uwa simiyamiya .
46008006	Ma tauda Yehoba tasanapuya 'abehega Tamadaina , ma 'iboinamo , ma ginaula mabwaiyadi 'ipaihowediya , ma wete tauda 'ipaihowegita , tauna weyahina . Ta wete 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso tasanapuya 'abehega tauna 'iboimo , ma Kelisoina Yehoba 'ilemeya ma 'ipaihowegita , ma wete ginaula mabwaiyadi 'ipaihowediya .
46008007	Tauda ma'ida sanapu , ma hesi tupwana tohekalesiyao 'idi sanapu we'awe'aidi , weyahina sihenuwanaluwa 'abehega hali 'ebe hemisao wete 'ebe hemisa moisa , 'oinega 'eguma tomotaedi 'ebe hemisa 'abo'abowao 'adi pwaoli si'ai nata simatauta 'oidiya .
46008008	Ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega geya 'e'ahai 'oinega Yehoba 'ida 'abihe bwebwe'anegita , weyahina geya 'eta 'e'ahai yaluyaluwada 'ida 'abihe bwebwe'aneya , bo 'ida 'abihegaleya .
46008009	Coinega 'e'ahai mabwaiyana sawasawahina ta'aidi , ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi ma sahena 'ami he'ahe'asisiina wa'ai'ai tohekalesiyao we'awe'aidi matadiya , ma 'oinega wa'abi'abi hebe'udi .
46008010	Weyahina 'eguma taiya 'owa 'usanasanapu 'abehega hali 'ebe hemisaowedi ginaula besobeso , ma geya 'aigeda 'idi waiwaimo , 'oinega 'eguma 'adiwa he'ahe'asisiina 'u'ai , ma tasiu 'aigeda 'ina hemisa we'awe'ana 'i'itago , nata tauna wete 'i'ai , ma hesi ma'ina 'ateyoho .
46008011	Moisa tuwa , 'owa ma'ino sanapu , ma hesi 'ino sanapu 'oinega 'abwa tasiuina we'awe'ana 'u'abihegala . Coinega wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega Keliso 'i'amasa tasimiu we'awe'ana sabi 'abiheteina .
46008012	Ta 'eguma tasimiu we'awe'ana wa'abihebe'u beno 'imi pui Keliso 'oina .
46008013	Ma taugu hesi genuwagu ma 'aigeda tasida ya'abihebe'u , 'oinega 'e'ahaiyedi yaguipailediya moisa , ma sahena yalolotohodi , tabu ta 'oidiyega tasidao ya'abihebe'udi .
46009001	Sahena tomota sitohotoho ma siloinaegau , nuwana silomugiyegau , ma hesi wanuwatuhu 'abehega taugu Bada Yesu 'ina topaihowa 'aigeda , ma Badaina ya'ita pwaiya , ta he'ote'otetelina wete 'oimiya yahepwaileya , ma wahemisaeya .
46009002	Coinega wasanapugauwa taugu Yesu 'ana tohepwaila moisa . Ma tupwana tomota silomugiyegauwa 'abehega taugu geya Yesu 'ana tohepwaila . Ma geya ! Comi wanuwatuhuyahi taugu 'igu lohatotowega 'ida Badaina 'oina 'imi hemisa walaguya .
46009003	Ta bewa gide yagwae 'esa 'agu tolomugiyedi 'oidiya ,
46009004	'abehega taugu gidemusa taudi Keliso 'ana tohepwaila moisa . Weyahina tohepwailaedi taudi 'adiwa ta 'adi we'aha wa'ebwa'ebwaedi , 'oinega 'ilobwaineya ma taugu wete gidemusa wada 'ebwaegau .
46009005	Ma wete taudi tohepwailaedi ta 'ida Bada Yesu tasinao ta Pita wete , 'idi sakowasi 'oidiya mwanediyao sitoetoedi ma wa'itayahidi . Coinega taugu wete 'eguma yahai ma mamwanegu 'ada sakowasi , 'ilobwaineya ma ba'idagu wa'itayahimai .
46009006	Taugu ma Banaba geya hesi 'oima gidemusa wada paihowa 'esa . Tauma 'aboi 'a'ita'ita yahimai , 'ima paihowa 'ana maisa 'oidiyega .
46009007	Caigeda hesilala yahesilalegomi ma wanuwatuhu weyahina . Hesilalaina bewa : Tolo'alehao ta'eha 'oinega 'adi maisa silobalobadi ? Gabemani 'oidiyega , bo siboidimo tuwa 'oidiyega ? Wete 'aigeda 'igu hesilala : Ceguma loheya 'e'ahai 'ibeguli , ma 'eli'eli 'ana tuta , togidega nata 'e'enina 'i'ai bo geya ? Caigeda wete 'igu hesilala : Togidega 'eguma loheya ma'ina baweyao 'i'itayahinamo , ma geya 'aigeda 'ida hunuya 'ina guyai weyahina , to'aha 'ina 'itayahina 'ana bwebwe'ana ?
46009008	Cebe'ita bewa 'ida gogowega ,
46009009	ma Mosese 'ina loina ba'idana sihemahemahetena , 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma bulumakau witi 'alona 'ipaipaihowa 'ilobwaineya ma witiyedi 'oidiyega 'ida 'ai . ” Yehoba geya 'inuwanuwatuhu madouna bulumakau weyahidi ,
46009010	ta hesi 'igwaegwae 'ina topaihowao tauda weyahida . Loina bewa 'ilaguya ma tada hemisa ma 'abehega 'ima paihowa 'oidiyega 'ama 'e'ahai 'ada loba , gidemusa taudi todauna ta wete to'eli'eli sihehemisa ma 'e'ahaiyedi 'idi tanohega sida 'ai .
46009011	Tauma wete gide yaluyaluwami 'adiwa 'adauna pwaiya , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma 'wapima 'adiwa wa'ebwaemai .
46009012	Hali tohepwailao wahe'aidi , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma wete wahe'aimai . Tuwa 'a'alama'i'ita madouna , weyahina tabu ta 'ahohopa'ala 'oimiya ma Keliso tetelina walogwahate .
46009013	Ta wete Hada He'asisi 'ana topaihowao wanuwatuhuyahi tomota 'idi helauwao 'oidiyega 'adiwa silobaloba . Topwaoliyedi 'adiwa hebahebaiyedi 'ebepwaoli 'oina sihunuhunudi 'oidiyega si'ewa'ewadi , ma si'ai'aidi .
46009014	Yehoba 'ina loina bewa gide 'abehega Yesu Keliso tetelina 'ana tohepwailao 'adiwa sida lobadi 'idi paihowao 'oidiyega .
46009015	Ma hesi geya yahegwaegomi ma wahe'aigau , ma wete sahena 'imi letaedi yaleledi ma 'abehega wahe'aigau . Sahena yagwaegwae 'e'ahai weyahina . Ceguma gomaleyega ya'amasa , beno bwebwe'ana , weyahina genuwagu ma 'ami ya'ewadi .
46009016	Cigu paihowa bewa tetela bwebwe'ana 'ana hepwaila weyahina , ma geya 'abehega paihowaina 'oinega 'agu hepwatu yaloba , weyahina bewa tuwa 'igu paihowaina , ta 'ilobwainegauwa ma yapaihowa . Ma 'eguma yaguipaila nata mwau madouna 'oiguwa 'ilatu .
46009017	Yehoba 'agu loinaina bewa 'ilaguya 'igu paihowa weyahina , ta geya taugu 'igu nuwatuhuwega , 'oinega sahena maisa yada 'ewa'ewa paihowaina weyahina .
46009018	Beno tuwa yayaliyayamo weyahina tetela bwebwe'ana helauwega ya'ebwaegomi , ma hesi sahena yanuwanuwatuhu maisa weyahina .
46009019	Ta sahena wete tomota 'agu loina silagulagu ma hesi tomota mabwaiyadi weyahidi yapaihowa ma yada 'abihetedi .
46009020	Yamumuga meYudiya 'idi mumugega ma 'oinega 'abehega meYudiya yada 'abihetedi , ma taudi Mosese 'ina loina simulimuliye , 'eguma mahetegwao 'amiyamiya yamumuga 'esa taudi gidemusa , ta 'abehega yalemedi . Ma hesi geya sowana loinaina 'oina yada tagwalegau .
46009021	Ta wete taudi Mosese 'ina loinao geya 'oidiya 'eguma ba'idagwao 'amiyamiya yamumuga 'esa taudi gidemusa ma 'abehega yalemedi . Ta hesi geya'abwa 'agu loina Keliso 'oinega yaligeligehi .
46009022	Ma wete 'eguma taudi 'idi hemisa we'awe'ana ba'idagwao 'amiyamiya , yamumuga 'esa taudi gidemusa ma 'abehega ya'abihetedi . Coinega tomota mabwaiyadi ba'idagwao weyahidi yatoho waiwai ma yamanasamwedi , ma 'oinega tupwadi 'oidiyega 'abihetena siloba Keliso 'oinega .
46009023	Cigu paihowaina tetela bwebwe'ana weyahina , ma 'abehega 'omi mahetegwao 'abihetena taloba tetelaina 'oinega .
46009024	Wanuwatuhuyahi 'eguma hepili 'oina mabwaiyadi sihehepili , ma hesi 'aigeda tuwa 'oidiyega 'inugeta , 'oinega 'ilobwainegita ma tatoho waiwai ma tanugeta .
46009025	Ma taudi tohepiliyedi bale'uwa sitoho waiwai ma si'alama'i'itana 'idi tohoina 'oinega ma 'abehega maisa sawasawalina siloba . Ta hesi tauda tatoho waiwai ma maisa miyamiya hatayana galewa taloba .
46009026	Bewa weyahina yapili waiwai , nuwana yahetapewa waiwai , ma sahena yahehetapewa besobeso .
46009027	Coinega wahigu yaloina pa'ale ma 'oinega sahena yamumuga besobeso , tabu ta 'igu guguya hali tomota 'oidiya mulina taugu yabe'u .
46010001	Ciyagwao , tubudao wanuwatuhu yahidi 'abehega nugeta tutaina tupwa yoho 'awawa sitautauya ma yaloha 'oinega Yehoba 'ihanugetediya , ta wete hola 'alonega 'idi 'eda 'ipaihoweya ta 'oinega sihabala hali tupwa .
46010002	Ma yaloha ta hola 'oidiyega 'idi babitaiso silobeya 'abehega Mosese 'ana tomuliyao .
46010003	Ta wete 'adiwa ma 'adi we'aha mabwaiyana galewega silobeya yaluyaluwadi weyahina , ta 'adi we'aha si'ewa'ewa da'ule 'aigeda 'oinega , ma da'uleina galewega mahetediu sitautauya , sanina Keliso .
46010004	
46010005	Ta hesi Yehoba geya 'iyaliyaya tubudaowedi weyahidi , 'oinega pwatulaina 'oina baibaiwadi si'amasa . Ma wawanidi nobwa si'ebesinediya .
46010006	Ma taudi 'ebe'ita 'oida ma 'abehega sahena galana weyahina tanuwanuwatuhu .
46010007	Wete sahena ta'e'etuluha hali 'ebe hemisao 'oidiya , gide taudi yoho 'awawa 'oina sipaihoweya . Buki He'asisi 'oina taudi weyahidi 'ihepwaila 'igwaeya , “ Tomotaedi simiyatoiya ta si'ai'ai , sinumanuma , muliyetega sitoholo ma siyaliyaya besobeso . ”
46010008	Ta wete silologwali , 'oinega sabwelo 'aigeda 'oina site tuweniti teli tausani 'oidiyega Yehoba 'ilohe'amasidiya . Bewa 'ebe'ita 'oida ta 'abehega sahena taganaganawala .
46010009	Ma wete Yehoba 'ana wahi'wata silaguya ta mwata 'oinega 'ilohe'amasidiya . Bewa 'ihe'itegita 'abehega sahena tauda gide tapaipaihowa 'esa .
46010010	Wete Yehoba silomugiyeya , ta 'oinega 'aigeda anelose 'ihesumaneya ma 'i'abihe galediya 'idi lomugiyedi weyahidi . Cebe'ita bewa 'oida ma 'abehega sahena talolomugi .
46010011	Cebe'itaedi bewa mabwaiyadi Buki He'asisi 'oina silelediya 'abehega bewa tuwa mehau tauda hemaisaedi mwaudi tanuwatuhu yahidi ma sahena puiyedi tapaipaihowadi .
46010012	Ceguma taiya 'owa 'unuwatuhuya 'abehega ma'ino waiwai 'utotoholo , 'u'itayahigo ma sahena 'uwe'awe'a .
46010013	Weyahina 'ebe tohowedi 'oidiyega Seitani 'itohotohogomi , mabwaiyada wete 'itohotohogita , ta hesi Yehoba tahemisaeya weyahina 'ina loina 'ilaguya ma sahena Seitani 'itohotoho hedadegita . Eema 'eguma tahe'alama'i'itana nata 'eda bwebwe'ana 'ihe'itegita ma 'oinega 'ebe tohowedi tahewaiwai sinedi .
46010014	Ciyagwao nuwanuwagu madouna ma hali 'ebe hemisao waguipailedi .
46010015	Comi ma'imi sanapu , 'oinega 'igu gwae bewa weyahina wanuwatuhuyahi madouna .
46010016	Ceguma sakalemeni weyahina taloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina ma tanuma , beno Keliso bweyahinega 'i'abihe bwebwe'anegita ma Keliso mahetedai tahe'aigeda . Gide beledi 'eguma tahisi ma ta'ai , belediina 'oinega Keliso mahetedai tahe'aigeda , weyahina tauna wahina ta'ai'ai .
46010017	Belediina 'aigeda 'oinega mabwaiyada ta'ai'ai , 'oinega Keliso wahina 'oina taheboda 'aigeda .
46010018	Gidemusa tuwa meIsileli baibaiwadi 'idi pwaoliyao sihunudi Yehoba weyahina ma si'aidi , 'oinega Yehoba ba'idadiu siheboda 'aigeda .
46010019	Moisa , 'e'ahaiyedi taudi tomiya ganamuli si'ebwa'ebwaya hali 'ebe hemisao 'oidiya , ma wete 'idi 'ebe hemisaowedi , nuwana 'aiwe bo dimwa , tuwa ginaula besobeso , ma geya 'idi waiwaimo .
46010020	Ta wete paihowaedi taudi tomiya ganamuli ginaulaedi weyahidi sipaipaihowa , geya Yehoba weyahina sinuwanuwatuhu , ta hesi Tomudulele ma'iyanao weyahidi . Ma hesi 'omi genuwagu ma hali 'ebe hemisao weyahidi wapaipaihowa , tabu ta Tomudulele 'iyanao mahetemiyao waheboda 'aigeda .
46010021	Cana 'ita geya bwebwe'ana 'eguma Bada 'ana biyo 'oinega wanumanuma ta 'ina 'ebe'ai 'oinega wa'ai'ai , ma wete Tomudulele 'ina paihowa wapaipaihowadi .
46010022	Weyahina 'ida Badaina 'atena wa'abi hedohedou . Badaina tohewaiwai hedade , 'oinega sahena ta'abi'abi hegamwasowali , tabu ta 'imutugita .
46010023	Ginaula mabwaiyadi sawasawahida ma tapaihowadi , ma tupwana ginaula nata geya si'abi 'abihetegita .
46010024	Cilobwainegita ma paihowaedi tapaihowadi 'iyadao 'adi lema weyahina ma hesi sahena taboidamo 'ada lema weyahina .
46010025	Ceguma hebahebai hesiyona hali tomota 'oidiyega wagimwane , sahena wahehesilala hesiyoina weyahina ma hesi tuwa wa'ai , ma sahena wanuwanuwagala to'aha mwalo 'e'ahaiina 'oina sipaihoweya .
46010026	Weyahina bale'u mabwaiyana ta ginaula mabwaiyana bale'uwa Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloinao .
46010027	Ta hesi 'eguma tomiya ganamuli 'aigeda 'ibwauwego ma 'utautauya 'ina hada ma 'au 'ilagu weyahiu , tuwa 'u'ai , ma sahena 'uhesilala to'aha mwalo 'ipaihoweya 'e'ahaiina 'oina , ta sahena wanuwanuwagala weyahina .
46010028	Ma hesi 'eguma taiya 'ihepwaila latu 'e'ahaiina weyahina ma 'oimiya 'igwae , “ Taudi 'idi paihowa Tomudulele weyahina 'e'ahai beno 'oinega sipaihoweya , ” sahena 'e'ahaiina 'u'ai'ai , tabu ta tohepwailaina 'inuwagala , nuwana 'imatauta , 'oinega 'owa wete 'unuwagala ,
46010029	geya 'uboi 'ino matautega , weyahina 'owa geya Tomudulele 'uda matauteya , ma hesi tohepwailaina 'ina matautega . Ta tomota tupwana sigwaeya , “ Sahena 'agu loina walagulagu taudi towe'a 'idi nuwatuhu weyahina ,
46010030	ta wete sahena taudi silolomugiyegau . Caguina weyahina yaloyawedo pwaiya Yehoba 'oina , ta geya 'aigeda wete 'ana galamo 'oiguwa . ”
46010031	Taudi 'idi gwaeina 'adi maisa bewa , 'abehega 'ilobwainegita ma 'ida paihowa mabwaiyana , 'ada 'e'ahai , 'ada numa , bo to'aha wete , eema mabwaiyana 'oidiyega Yehoba sanina ta'abi hemadou .
46010032	Sahena hali tomota wa'abi'abi henuwagaladi , nuwana meYudiya , bo tomiya ganamuli , bo nuwana Yehoba 'ina tohekalesiyao .
46010033	Gidemusa taugu yatohotoho ma 'abehega sahena taugu 'igu nuwatuhuwega yapaipaihowa , ma hesi to'aha tomota 'idi nuwatuhu gide tuwa yapaihowa 'esa , ma siyaliyaya , ta 'oinega 'adi lema siloba Yehoba 'oinega .
46011001	Cilobwainegomiya ma 'igu mumuga bewa wahe'au'aunaowe , gide taugu Keliso mumugana yahehe'au'aunaoweya .
46011002	Yauwedo 'iyagwao , weyahina he'itaowedi ya'ebwae pwaigomiya wanuwatuhu yahidiya ma wa'abiyahidi .
46011003	Nuwanuwagu ma wasanapu 'abehega Keliso loheloheya 'ida Bada , ma hesi wahiwahine 'idi badao beno mwanediyao . Ta Keliso 'ina Bada Yehoba .
46011004	Ceguma loheya debana ma'ana hewanu 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi bo 'ipalopisai Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhuwega , beno 'ebe debamwadina 'ina Bada Keliso 'oina .
46011005	Ma 'eguma wahine deba daisinamo tapwalolo 'oina 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi bo 'ipalopisai , beno 'ebe debamwadina 'ina badaina , tauna mwanena , 'oina . Moisa tuwa , 'ana 'ita galana , gide 'eguma debana mabwaiyana sino'i .
46011006	Weyahina 'eguma wahine sahena debana 'i'ahu'ahusam debana wa'upwa , ma 'imwadina debana no'ino'ina weyahina , 'oinega 'ida 'ahusam ta 'ana 'ita 'ibwebwe'ana tapwalolo 'oina .
46011007	Tapwalolo 'alona loheya geya sawasawahina debana 'i'ahusam , weyahina loheya 'ana 'ita Yehoba gidemusa , ta wete 'ana hepwatu Yehoba 'ana hepwatu gidemusa . Wahine wete 'ana hepwatu loheya 'ana hepwatu gidemusa .
46011008	Ma loheya nugenugetaina geya wahine 'oinega 'ihapwesama , ma hesi wahine loheya 'oinega 'ihapwesama .
46011009	Wete Yehoba loheya 'ihemasaleheya geya wahine weyahina , ma hesi wahine loheya weyahina 'ihemasaleheya .
46011010	Coinega wahiwahine 'ilobwainediya ma debadi sisamudi tapwalolo 'ana tuta 'oina , ma wahiwahineyedi 'idi hematamatana mwanediyao 'oidiya aneloseyao si'ita .
46011011	Ma hesi 'eguma Bada 'ina 'eda tamulimuliye geya sawasawahina ma wahine 'iboi 'iloiloina . Wete gesowana loheya 'iboi 'iloiloina .
46011012	Weyahina wahine loheya 'oinega 'ilatuwa ta loheya wahine 'oinega 'ili'uwa , ta mabwaiyada Yehoba 'oinega talatuwa .
46011013	Wanuwatuhuyahi , 'eguma wahine debadaisinamo 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina , togidega 'ana 'ita bwebwe'ana bo galana ? Galana 'awa ?
46011014	Mabwaiyada bale'uwa tamiyamiya , 'eguma loheya ta'ita debana dudulena , 'ana 'ita wahine gidemusa , beno 'ebe debamwadina ,
46011015	ma 'eguma wahiwahine debadi dudulena beno 'adi 'ebe hepwatu ma wete 'ana 'ebe 'ahusam .
46011016	Cada loina bewa gide , ma geya 'eta wete hali loina tohekalesiyao mabwaiyada 'oida , 'oinega sahena 'eta taiya loinaina weyahina 'igwaegwae hila .
46011017	Caigeda wete mumugami weyahina geya yada yaliyaya , beno geya bwebwe'ana .
46011018	Weyahina tupwana tomota sihegwaegauwa 'abehega 'imi 'eto'auta 'oidiya wawatawatahigomi hali boda ma hali boda 'oidiyega , ma tupwana 'idi gwae yahemisaeya .
46011019	Ta hesi 'imi 'ewatawatahaina 'ana bwebwe'ana beno 'abehega taiyewedi taudi tohekalesiyao moisa ta'inanadi .
46011020	Ma wete 'imi 'eto'auta 'oidiya 'eguma 'ida Badaina 'ina Cai He'asisi wa'ai , 'ana 'ita geya bwebwe'ana .
46011021	Weyahina tupwami waboi 'amiwa wa'ai'ai , ma tupwadi 'iyamiyao ma'adi gomale , ta wete tupwami wa'ai'ai ma wanumanuma hedada 'oinega waheheyauyaule .
46011022	Cilobwainegomiya ma waboi 'imi hada 'oidiya wa'ai ma wanuma ta sahena Yehoba 'ina tapwalolo wa'abi'abi hegala ma wete taudi wewewewelohedi wa'abi'abihe debamwadinedi . Bewa weyahina gesowana yahehepwatuwegomi .
46011023	Cida Bada Yesu 'ina 'ai 'ana sanapu 'ihe'ita pwaigauwa ta taugu yahe'itegomi , beno nihuwanaina 'oina Yudasa 'itebaeya , Yesuina beledi 'i'eweya ,
46011024	ta 'iloyauwedowa Yehoba 'oina ma 'ihisiya , ta 'igwaeya “ Bewa wahigu 'omi 'ami 'abihetena weyahina . Coinega bewa gide 'agu 'ebe nuwatuhuyahina wapaihowa 'ese . ”
46011025	Si'aiya 'igumwala , ma biyo wete Yesu 'i'eweya ta 'igwaeya , “ Biyo bewa loina 'ehauna weyahina , ma loinaina hauhauna bweyahiguwega ya'abihe latuheyama . Ceguma 'abwa to tuta 'oidiya wanuma wanuwatuhu yahigau . ”
46011026	Belediina 'ana 'ai ma biyoina 'ana numa 'oidiyega Badaina 'ina 'amasa weyahina tahehe'ita tuta mabwaiyana ma 'ana siga 'ihilama .
46011027	Ma hesi 'eguma taiya 'e'ahaiina 'i'ai besobeso , nuwana Badaina 'ina biyoina 'oinega 'inuma besobeso , loheyaina beno 'ina pui , weyahina 'ida Bada wahina ma bweyahina 'oidiya 'ipaihowa besobesoweya .
46011028	Ceguma nuwanuwada ma Bada 'ina 'ai ta'ai , nugeta mumugada weyahina tanuwatuhu , ma wete tada 'abihe dumwalugita , ma muliyetega 'e'ahaiina ta'ai , ma wete biyoina 'oinega tanuma .
46011029	Weyahina 'eguma taiya 'i'ai besobeso nuwana 'inuma besobeso , ma geya 'inuwatuhu Keliso wahina weyahina , 'abwa 'ana loina 'iloba .
46011030	Bewa lamuna 'oinega 'ami lohala ta 'imi we'ao tupwana baibaiwana silatulatu 'oimiya , ma wete tupwana 'ami boda si'amasa pwaiya .
46011031	Cilobwainegita ma mumugada tauda ta'abihe bwebwe'anedi tabu ta Yehoba 'iloinaegita .
46011032	Ma hesi 'eguma tuta bewa 'oina Yehoba 'iloinaegita , beno 'i'abi'abihe dumwaluwegita , ma 'abwa bwa'omatana 'oina mebale'u 'iloinaedi ma tauda geya .
46011033	Ciyagwao , 'eguma tutaina Bada 'ina 'ai wa'ai , 'iyamiyao wayamwadi .
46011034	Ma 'eguma taiya 'igomale , 'ina hada nobwa 'i'ai nugeta , ta 'oinega gesowana 'i'ai'ai hedade tapwalolo 'alona , tabu ma Yehoba 'igamwasowalegomi 'imi tapwalolo 'ana 'ita galana weyahina . Beno tuwa , loinaina weyahina . Ma hesi tupwana 'ami loina wete simiyamiya . Ceguma tutaina yanaowa loinaedi wete ya'abihe dumwaludi 'oimiya .
46012001	Ciyagwao , nuwanuwagu ma Yehoba 'ina heguyai yaluyaluwada weyahidi yalihasi ma wasanapu .
46012002	Weyahina mwalo tupwa guguyou 'oina wamiyamiya ta hali 'ebe hemisao 'oidiya watagwalegomiya , taudi geya sawasawahidi ma sigwae , ma hesi si'abowegomiya .
46012003	Ta bewa tutaina 'eguma taiya Yehoba yaluyaluwana 'oina 'imiyamiya , geya Yesu 'ida heliyeya , ma hesi 'i'ahwa Badae ; weyahina geya 'eta taiya sawasawahina ma Yesu 'i'ahwa Badae , 'eguma geya Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oina 'imiyamiya .
46012004	Yaluyaluwa Tabuina 'aigeda tuwamo , ma hesi 'ina heguyai 'oida hagana ma hagana .
46012005	Cida Badaina wete 'aigeda tuwa , ma hesi 'ina paihowa tapaipaihowadi hagana ma hagana ,
46012006	ma lamudi 'aigeda tuwamo , beno Yehoba , weyahina tauna 'ina heguyaiyedi 'adi paihowa 'i'abihe latuwediya .
46012007	Ma Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina 'ehele 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oida beno mabwaiyada 'ada lema weyahina ,
46012008	ta hesi hagadi , weyahina loheya 'aigeda 'ana heguheguyai nuwatuhu , ma 'aigeda sanapu , ginaula dahwadahwaina weyahina ,
46012009	ta 'aigeda hemisa , ma 'aigeda to'abi hebwebwe'ana ,
46012010	ta 'aigeda ginaula 'ebe nuwahenainaida 'ana paihowa , ma 'aigeda Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu 'ana palopisai , ma 'aigeda yaluyaluwao 'adi 'inana 'abehega bwebwe'ana bo galana , ma 'aigeda wete hali 'enana 'oidiyega 'ihegwaegwae , ta 'aigeda wete 'enanaedi 'ana tobui .
46012011	Heguheguyaiyedi Yaluyaluwa Tabuna tauna 'ana hesinuwa , ma 'iheguheguyai 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oida , ta 'i'ebwaegita ma gide tapaihowa 'ese .
46012012	Tauda gide wahi 'aigeda weyahina tasanapuya 'abehega wahi 'aigeda , ma yahunao baibaiwadi . Wahiina beno Keliso , ma yahunaowedi tauda .
46012013	Weyahina mabwaiyada tababitaiso , Yaluyaluwa 'aigeda 'oinega eeta taheboda 'aigeda . Tauma meYudiya ta 'omi hali tupwao 'oidiyega , ta tomiya mwau ma tomiya bwebwe'ana , ta mabwaiyada taheboda 'aigeda pwaiya Yaluyaluwa Tabuina 'oinega , tauna 'oida 'imiyamiya .
46012014	Eeta wahi yahunao geya 'aigeda , ma hesi baibaiwadi hagadi ma hagadi .
46012015	Ceguma 'ahe 'igwae , “ Taugu geya wahi 'ina boda 'oina yamiyamiya , weyahina taugu geya nima , ” 'ina gwaeina geya gwae moisa .
46012016	Wete gide 'eguma tena 'igwae , “ Taugu geya wahi 'ina boda , weyahina taugu tena , ta geya mata , ” tena 'ina gwaeina geya gwae moisa .
46012017	Weyahina 'eguma matamo beno geya sawasawahina ma 'ihesagoha , ma wete 'eguma tenamo geya sawasawahina ma mahai 'iniso ,
46012018	ta Yehoba bewa gide 'inuwatuhuya ta yahu baibaiwadi 'idi paihowa 'i'ebwaediya .
46012019	Weyahina 'eguma yahu 'aigeda tuwa , beno geya wahi mabwaiyana .
46012020	Coinega wahi 'aigeda 'ipaihoweya , ma hesi yahunao baibaiwadi .
46012021	Geya sawasawahina ma mata nima 'oina 'igwae , “ Genuwagu 'owa . ” Ma wete geya sawasawahina ma deba 'ahe 'oina 'igwae , “ Genuwagu 'owa . ”
46012022	Ta tupwadi wete wahi yahunao 'adi 'ita gide we'adi , ma hesi 'idi paihowa madouna wahi 'ana lema weyahina .
46012023	Tupwana wete yahudao geya tahepwatuwedi , ma weyahidi tahedeba mwadina , ma hesi ta'itayahidi ta ta'ahusamudi ,
46012024	ta geya yahudao mabwaiyadi 'adi 'itayahina gide . Weyahina Yehoba wahida 'ihemasaleheya ma 'abehega yahunaowedi taudi geya 'adi hepwatumo ta'itayahi bwaibwainidi .
46012025	Ma 'oinega sahena wataha 'ilatulatu wahida yahunao 'oidiya . Ma hesi mabwaiyadi sihemahemahetena ma mabwaiyadi sihelemalema 'idi paihowao 'oidiya .
46012026	Weyahina 'eguma yahuda 'aigeda 'imuya , beno wahida mabwaiyana simuya . Wete 'eguma wahida 'aigeda ma'ina yaliyaya , beno wahida mabwaiyana siyaliyaya .
46012027	Coinega 'aigeda 'aigeda tauda Keliso yahunao ,
46012028	weyahina 'ida paihowao hekalesiya 'alona hagana ma hagana . Yehoba 'iheguyaiyediya 'oida , nugeta tauma Keliso 'ana tohepwailao , ta muliyetega palopitao taudi Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhuwao sihehepwaile nugete , muliyetega tohe'itao , ma ginaula 'ebe henainaida 'adi topaihowao , ma to'abi hebwebwe'ana , ma to'abihetenao , ma tohanugetao , ta taudi hali 'enana 'adi tohegwaegwaeyao .
46012029	Weyahina geya sawasawahina ma mabwaiyada paihowa 'aigeda tuwa 'oina tahetopaihowa Keliso weyahina , nuwana Yesu tetelina 'ana tohepwailao , nuwana palopitao , nuwana tohe'itao , nuwana ginaula 'ebe henainaida 'adi to'abihelatuwao ,
46012030	nuwana to'abihe bwebwe'ana , nuwana hali 'enana 'ana togwaeyao , nuwana hali 'enanaedi 'adi tobui .
46012031	Paihowaedi mabwaiyana Yehoba 'iheguyaiyeya 'oida , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma heguheguyai bwebwe'adi nuwami 'i'ewa , ma wete 'eda 'ausalana moisa yahe'itegomi , beno helau .
46013001	Ceguma 'igu gwaeyao bwebwe'adi , gide tologuguyao ma aneloseyao 'idi gwae , ta 'eguma helau geya 'ateguwa 'imiyamiya , 'igu guguyaedi ginaula bwagabwaga , gide sinaha silahulahusi besobeso , nuwana yoguli simu'amu'a besobeso .
46013002	Ta wete 'eguma taugu Yehoba 'ina palopita , ta ma'igu sanapu ma sawasawahigu yahepwaila ginaula dahwadahwanidi , ma 'eguma yahemisa moisa Yehoba 'oina ma 'oinega yagwae 'oya 'oidiya , sawasawahina sitau hali tupwa , ta 'eguma geya helau 'ateguwa , taugu tuwa loheya bwagabwaga .
46013003	Ta 'eguma 'igu tobwatobwa mabwaiyana yaheguyaiye tomota 'oidiya ma wahigu wete yatagwale ma sigabu 'idi pwaoli weyahina , ta 'eguma geya helau 'ateguwa 'imiyamiya , 'igu paihowaedi huwaidi geya'abwa yalobaloba .
46013004	Moisa , helau ginaula madouna , weyahina 'eguma helauina 'ateda 'imiyamiya , sawasawahina ma tahe'alama'i'itana ma tomota ta'ate muyamuyaedi , ta sahena tahehe'ipi'ipiyedi . Ta sahena wete tanuwanuwahane , nuwana tagagagagasa ,
46013005	ma hesiyage 'iyadao tahe'asisiyanedi , ma sahena 'enuwanuwaha bo hegamwagamwagu bo 'aleha 'oidega si'ita'ita .
46013006	Ta sahena mumuga galana weyahina tayaliyaliyaya ma hesi mumuga dumwaluna weyahina tayaliyaya .
46013007	Ceguma helau 'ateda 'imiyamiya sauga baibaiwana ta'alama'i'itana moisa , eeta tahemisa moisa , ma'ida nuwatuhuyahina 'ada 'abihetena Yehoba 'oinega 'abwa taloba , ma tuta mabwaiyana tatoholo pa'ala .
46013008	Helau sahena 'igumwagumwala , ta hesi taudi Yehoba 'ina palopitao 'abwa 'idi hepwailao sigumwala . Wete taudi hali 'enana ma hali 'enana 'oidiyega sigwaegwae , 'abwa 'enadiyedi sigumwala . Ma tosanapuwao 'abwa 'idi sanapu sisawala .
46013009	Weyahina bewa tuwa 'ida sanapu tupwana tuwa , 'oinega 'ida hepwaila tupwana wete ,
46013010	ta tuta sinaonaoma 'oidiya sanapu hauhauna mabwaiyana 'ilatuma , ma sanapu miyamiyana tanuwanaide .
46013011	Gidemusa taugu mwalo hene gwama tuwa , ma hesi bewa tuwa yaheloheya pwaiya ta gwagwama 'idi gwaeyao ta 'idi paihowao ta 'idi nuwatuhuwao 'oiguwega sigumwala pwaiya .
46013012	Bewa tuwa 'ida sanapu geya madouna , gide 'alu'aluwa nuwana 'ainuwadawada gidemusa , ma hesi 'abwa 'ana moisa 'ida hapwesa 'oida . Ma taugu sanapu tupwana tuwa yasanapuya , hesi 'abwa mabwaiyana yasanapu , gidemusa bewa tuwa Yehoba 'isanapu bwaibwainigauwa .
46013013	Ginaula madouna 'etoi simiya hataya , 'aigeda tahemisa , 'aigeda tanuweya , 'aigeda tahelau , ma mabwaiyadi 'oidiyega helau 'imadou hedadeya .
46014001	Coinega 'ilobwainegita ma tatoho waiwai ma tahelau moisa , ma wete tatoho waiwai ma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ina heguyai 'oida talobadi , ma hesi heguheguyai 'aigeda bwebwe'ana hedada , beno palopisai Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu sowasowana tahepwaila nugete .
46014002	Ta 'aigeda wete heguyaiina tomota 'oidiya , beno hali 'enanao 'adi tala weyahidi . Ceguma hali 'enana 'oidiyega tagwaegwae , beno tuwa Yehoba 'oina tagwaegwae , ta geya tomota 'oidiya , 'oinega gwaeyedi 'adi sanapu tomota 'oidiya palipalina , ma bewa Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina waiwaiyega sanapu dahwadahwaina tahehegwaegwae , eeta tomota geya sida nuwasabwalena .
46014003	Ta 'eguma tapalopisai tomota 'oidiya , eema 'ida gwaeyega sinuwa sabwalena , beno 'adi lema , ma 'ane 'atepatu ta yaliyaya siloba .
46014004	Ta 'eguma taiya hali 'enana 'oinega 'ihegwaegwae , beno 'iboinamo tuwa 'i'abi'abihete hila , ma hesi 'eguma palopitaedi sigwae hekalesiyao 'enadiyega beno mabwaiyadi 'adi lema .
46014005	Taugu nuwanuwagu ma mabwaiyami hali 'enana 'oidiyega wagwaegwae . Ta wete nuwanuwagu madouna ma wapalopisai Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu , weyahina palopitao 'idi paihowa ginaula madouna . Ta gwae hali 'enanao 'oidiyega geya ginaula madouna , ma hesi 'eguma 'aigeda tobui 'imiyamiya , ma gwaeyedi tauna 'igibuidi , beno ginaula bwebwe'ana tohekalesiyao 'adi lema weyahina .
46014006	Ciyagwao , wanuwatuhuyahi 'eguma yanaowa 'oimiya , ma hali 'enana 'oinega yagwaegwae 'oimiya , gesowana lema waloba . Ma hesi 'eguma yanaowa 'oimiya ma lotohona 'ehauna bo sanapu bo palopisai bo he'ita ya'ebwaegomi , bewa 'ami lema .
46014007	Gidemusa 'eguma sinaha tomota silahusa besobeso bo gita sihunu besobeso , geya sawasawahina ma siwali bwaibwaina .
46014008	Ma wete 'eguma taiya yoguli 'imu'amu'a besobeso , 'enana 'ana sanapu geya hene tada sanapuya , nuwana 'aleha , bo nuwana to ginaula 'ana bwau weyahina .
46014009	Tauda wete gidemusa , 'eguma geya tagwaegwae dumwalu nata gesowana wete tomota 'ida gwaeyedi sinuwa sabwalenidi , weyahina 'ida gwaeyedi gide hedagadaga bwagabwaga .
46014010	Ta moisa , bale'uwa 'enana baibaiwa hedada simiyamiya , ma tupwa 'aigeda 'aigeda toni'asa taudi 'enadi sisanasanapudi .
46014011	Ceguma hali tupwa 'enadi geya yasanapu , taugu gide taumana yahenainaida , ta geya sowasowahigu ma 'enadi yasanapudi . Ta taudi wete geya sawasawahidi 'enagu sisanapu .
46014012	Yauwedo 'iyagwao , nuwanuwami ma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ina heguyai 'oimiya wa'ewadi , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma watoho ma 'ami heguheguyaiyedi 'oidiyega tohekalesiyao wa'abihe waiwaiyedi .
46014013	Ceguma taiya 'oimiyega hali 'enana 'oidiyega 'igwaegwae , 'ilobwaineya ma 'i'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina ma sanapu 'ida loba , ta 'oinega 'ina gwae 'ibui .
46014014	Weyahina 'eguma hali 'enana 'oinega ya'ahwa'ahwanoi , 'enanaina 'ana sanapu geya yasanapu , weyahina yaluyaluwagumo 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi , ma hesi 'igu gwaeyedi geya yasanapudi , to'aha weyahina yagwaegwae .
46014015	Cilobwainegauwa ma ma'igu sanapu ta wete yaluyaluwaguwega ya'ahwa'ahwanoi , ma weteyage yawali hepwatu Yehoba 'oina yaluyaluwaguwega ta wete ma'igu sanapu .
46014016	Ceguma taiya 'owa yaluyaluwamo 'oinega 'uhehepwatu hali 'enanega , ma geya 'usanapu , ma 'iyamwao wete geya sinuwa sabwalena , taudi sahena silolo'emeni .
46014017	Hepwatuina bwebwe'ana , ta hesi 'iyadao geya 'ida lemediya .
46014018	Taugu yaloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina weyahina hali 'enana 'oidiyega yagwaegwae hedada .
46014019	Ta hesi tapwalolo 'oina , nuwanuwagu ma gwaeina yasanasanapu 'oinega yada hepwaila to'uto'upana tuwa , ma tomota yahe'itadi . Ta geya nuwagu hali 'enana 'oidiyega tapwalolo 'oina yagwaegwae hedada , weyahina gwaeyedi tomota geya sisanapu .
46014020	Ciyagwao , sahena 'imi nuwatuhu gwagwama gidemusa , ma hesi wanuwanuwa loheya madouna gide . Ta sahena mumuga galana weyahina wanuwanuwatuhu ma 'abehega wasanapudi .
46014021	Buki He'asisi 'alona Yehoba 'ina loina 'aigeda 'imiyamiya , 'igwaeya , “ ‘ Taumanao 'abwa sinaoma ma hali 'enanao 'oidiyega 'igu bodao 'oidiya 'igu gwae sida hepwailedi , ma hesi sahena wete 'igu gwaeyedi simulimuliyedi . ’ Yehoba 'ina gwae bewa gidemusa . ”
46014022	Ceguma hali 'enana 'oinega tagwaegwae , beno 'ila'ilala geya taudi tohemisao weyahidi ma hesiyage taudi geya sihemisa weyahidi . Ta Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu 'ana palopisai beno tohemisao 'adi lema weyahidi .
46014023	Coinega tauda tohekalesiyao 'eguma tapwalolo weyahina tadeli 'autama ma hali 'enanao 'oidiyega tagwaegwae , ma tupwadi taudi geya Yesu 'ana tohemisao siluhu ma 'enada palipalidi sihesagohedi , nuwana sinuwatuhu 'abehega taheyauyauleya , 'awa ?
46014024	Ta 'eguma mabwaiyada Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu tapalopisai ma tupwadi taudi geya Yesu 'ana tohemisao siluhuma , ma taudi 'enadiyega sihesagoha , nata sinuwabui ma si'ahwa moisa .
46014025	Ma 'oinega 'idi nuwatuhu dahwana weyahina sinuwagala ma'idi deba mwadina , ma Yehoba matana sibe'u talutalubu'i ma 'oina si'etuluha ma si'ahwa moisae , ma 'oinega sigwae , “ Moisa , Yehoba ba'idamiu wamiyamiya . ”
46014026	Ciyagwao , 'eguma tapwalolo weyahina waluhuluhu , 'aigeda tomota wali 'i'ahala lagasi , 'aigeda 'ihe'ita , 'aigeda lotohona hauhauna 'ihepwaila hapwese ; ma 'aigeda hali 'enana 'oinega 'igwae , ma 'aigeda gwaeina 'igibui , eeta paihowaedi 'oidiyega boda silemedi .
46014027	Ta 'eguma hali 'enanao 'adi togwaeyao simiyamiya , bwebwe'ana 'eguma siteluwa nuwana sitetoimo 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oidiyega sigwae . Ta wete tobuiyao sida miyamiya ma gwaeyedi sida buidi .
46014028	Ta 'eguma 'enanaedi geya 'adi tobuimo , sahena 'aigeda taiya hali 'enana 'oinega 'igwaegwae latu tapwalolo 'ana tuta , ma hesi 'iboinamo 'oina ma wete Yehoba 'oina sowasowana 'igwae .
46014029	Ta wete palopitao 'eluwa nuwana 'etoi sida gwae ma 'oinega mabwaiyami 'idi gwaeyedi wada hesagohedi ta weyahidi wanuwatuhu ma wahesinuwa .
46014030	Ma 'eguma 'aigeda tomota tapwalolo 'alona 'imiyamiya ma lotohona 'ehauna 'iloba , 'ida toholo ma ginaulaina 'ida hepwaila hapwese , ta tologuguyaina 'ida 'alahenono .
46014031	Ta mabwaiyami sawasawahimi ma 'aigeda 'aigeda wapalopisai ma wa'abihe pa'aligomi , ma nuwami 'ibwebwe'ana .
46014032	Ta palopitaedi sowasowana yaluyaluwadi siboidimo siloiloinaedi ,
46014033	weyahina Yehoba 'iloiloina dumwaluwegita , 'oinega ma'ida yaliyaya talotapwalolo .
46014034	Ta wahiwahine 'omi , 'ilobwainegomiya ma 'ebe tapwalolo baibaiwadi 'oidiya wa'ala henono tuwa , ma gwae wahesagohedi . Weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina Mosese 'ina loina wahiwahine weyahidi bewa gidemusa , ta wete gidemusa tohekalesiyao 'adi loina tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiya .
46014035	Ta 'eguma wahiwahine nuwanuwadi ma to'aha sisanapu , sowasowahidi siboi 'idi hadao 'oidiya sihesilala mwanediyao 'oidiya , ma taudi sihe'itadi . Weyahina 'eguma wahiwahine sigwae tapwalolo 'oina , 'ebe debamwadina 'oida .
46014036	Ma geya'abwa wanuwanuwahane 'abehega waboi 'oimiya Yehoba 'ina gwae 'ihapwehapwesa , nuwana waboimo 'oimiya 'imiyamiya .
46014037	Ma wete 'eguma taiya 'inuwatuhuya 'abehega tauna palopita ma Yehoba yaluyaluwana 'oina 'imiyamiya , nugeta 'ida sanapu 'abehega 'igu gwae leta bewa 'oina , beno Yehoba 'ina loina 'oimiya .
46014038	Ta 'eguma taiya gwaeyedi genuwana , tuwa hede ma'ina henainaida 'ida miyamiya .
46014039	Coinega 'iyagwao , 'ilobwainegomiya ma watoho waiwai ma Yehoba 'ina nuwanuwa wapalopisai , ta hali 'enana 'adi gwaeyao weyahidi sahena wa'au'ausi tapwalolo 'oina .
46014040	Ma wete ginaula mabwaiyana dumwaludi ta bwebwe'adi 'imi tapwalolo 'oidiya wada paihowadi .
46015001	Ciyagwao , tetelaina yahepwaila pwaiyeya 'oimiya , wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega mwalo 'atemi watagwaleya tetelaina 'oina , ma 'i'abihe pa'aligomiya ta 'oinega 'ami 'abihetena walobeya , 'eguma tetelina wa'abiyahiya . Ta 'eguma geya wa'abiyahi pa'alina , 'imi hemisaowedi gide ginaula bwagabwaga .
46015002	
46015003	Tetelaina lamuna ya'ita lobeya 'oinega yahepwaile 'oimiya 'abehega Keliso 'ida puiyao weyahidi 'i'amasa , gidemusa Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwaila ,
46015004	ta galiha silaguya , ma sabwelo hetoina 'oina 'itoholo hila , gidemusa Buki He'asisi 'ihepwaila 'esa .
46015005	Citoholo hila ma Pita 'i'iteya ta wete 'ana tohepwailao site tuwelo si'iteya .
46015006	Caigeda tuta 'oina 'iyadao wete site paibi handeledi si'iteya . Bodaedi 'oidiyega baibaiwadi bewa tuwa simiyamiya , ma tupwadi si'amasa .
46015007	Yemesa wete 'i'iteya , ta wete Keliso 'ana tohepwailao mabwaiyadi si'iteya .
46015008	Ta 'ebe losaloha taugu wete ya'iteya , ma hesi taugu 'igu tole 'ebe henainaida , geya gidemusa taudi 'idi tuta silobeya ta sitoleya .
46015009	Ta wete taugu loheya galagu . Weyahina Yehoba 'ana tohemisao ya'abihe muyemuyediya , 'oinega Keliso 'ana tohepwailao mabwaiyadi sibwebwe'ana sinegauwa .
46015010	Ma hesi Yehoba 'i'atemuya muyaegauwa ta 'ilemegauwa . Coinega geya 'i'abihete daidaisigau , weyahina yahemisa bwaibwaina ma tohepwailao mabwaiyadi 'idi paihowa ya'ebesineya , geya taugu 'igu waiwaiyega , ta Yehoba 'ina helau 'oinega .
46015011	Coinega tohepwailaedi 'oimiya siloguguya pwaiya , ma taugu wete 'oimiya yaloguguya pwaiya , ta Keliso wahemiseya .
46015012	Cima guguya 'oimiya 'ahepwaileya 'abehega Keliso 'amasega 'itoholo hila , ta wahemiseya . Ma to'aha weyahina tupwami wagwae 'abehega tomota geya sawasawahidi ma 'amasega sitoholo hilama ?
46015013	Weyahina 'eguma tomota sahena 'amasega sitotoholo hila , Keliso wete 'amasega gesowana 'itoholo hila .
46015014	Coinega 'ima loguguyaedi tuwa ginaula bwagabwaga , eeta 'imi hemisaina Keliso 'oina beno hemisa bwagabwaga .
46015015	Wete tauma Yehoba 'ana tohepwailao 'a'abowegomiya 'ima gwaeyedi 'oidiyega , weyahina 'agwaeya , “ Yehoba Keliso 'amasega 'i'abi hetoholo hileya , ” ta to'amasaedi geya sida toholo hila .
46015016	Coinega Keliso wete gesowana 'itoholo hila .
46015017	Ta Kelisoina wete wahemisa bwagabwaga , ma 'oinega 'imi puiyao tuwa 'abwa simiyamiya 'oimiya .
46015018	Ma 'iyadaowedi taudi mwalo Keliso sihemisaeya ta si'amasa pwaiya , beno ta'eha simiyamiya ?
46015019	Ta wete tauda Keliso 'ana tohepwailao nuwa'ole'oleda , 'eguma Keliso 'ina 'abihetena 'oida tuta bewa bale'umo weyahina , ta geya tuta 'inaonaoma 'ida 'amasa mulina weyahina .
46015020	Ta 'ana dumwalu hesi beno Keliso 'amasega 'itoholo hila , tauna 'ihanugeta ma muliyetega to'amasao mabwaiyadi .
46015021	Weyahina loheya 'aigeda tuwa 'oinega 'amasa 'ilatuwa bale'uwa , beno Adama , ta wete gidemusa loheya 'aigeda 'ina paihowega toholo hila 'i'abilatuheya .
46015022	Tasanapu pwaiya 'abehega Adama 'ina pui 'oinega tauda 'amasa 'oida 'ilatuwa , ma hesi Keliso 'oinega yawasida hataya talobeya .
46015023	Ta yawasi hataya 'ina tauya bewa gidemusa , nugeta Keliso 'itoholo hila , ma 'abwa tutaina 'ihilama tauda taiyawedi 'ina bodao wete tatoholo hila .
46015024	Ma muliyetega Kelisoina nata toloinao mabwaiyadi 'ihewaiwai sinedi gide welabana ma hi'ahi'a ma yaluyaluwa galadi mabwaiyadi 'ihewaiwai sinedi , ma tuta 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'oina Keliso 'ina 'ebeloina 'i'ebwae Tamana 'oina .
46015025	Weyahina Kelisoina nata ma'ina waiwai 'iloiloina eema 'ana siga 'ana 'alehaowedi mabwaiyadi 'ihewaiwai sinedi ,
46015026	eeta 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'amasa 'ihewaiwaisine ma 'igumwala .
46015027	Weyahina Yehoba loina mabwaiyana Keliso 'i'ebwaeya . Beno tuwa Keliso gesowana To'ebwayaina 'iloiloinae .
46015028	Coinega 'abwa tutaina Keliso ginaula mabwaiyadi 'iloinaedi , muliyetega tauna 'itagwala Tamana 'ina loina 'oina , weyahina Tamana Keliso 'ina loina mabwaiyana 'ana to'ebwaya , 'oinega Yehobaina 'ihane hedade .
46015029	Ta 'eguma to'amasa sahena sitohotoholo hila , to'aha weyahina tomota sibabitaiso to'amasao weyahidi ?
46015030	Ma wete togidega taugu ? Ceguma gesowana 'amasega yatoholo hila to'aha weyahina 'ebe hesilae 'oina tuta mabwaiyana yapaipaihowa Keliso weyahina ?
46015031	Moisa , sabwelo 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oidiya gide ya'ama'amasa , ma hesi ma'igu yaliyaya 'omi 'imi toholo pa'ala weyahina , 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'oina .
46015032	Ta wete mwalo Epeso 'oina loheloheya gamwagamwasowalidi totopwatula gide silolo'alehegau , ma hesi lo'alehaina geya 'ana bwebwe'anamo 'oiguwa 'eguma geya 'amasega yatoholo hila ! Coinega tupwana tomota sigwae 'abehega 'ilobwainegita ma tuta bewa bale'uwa tayaliyaya 'ida 'ai ta 'ida numa 'oidiyega , weyahina nata 'amasa 'ana tuta , gesowana 'aigeda wete to'aha talobaloba .
46015033	Ta hesi gwaeyedi beno 'abo tuwa , 'oinega sahena 'oidiyega si'abowegomi , tabu ta mumugadi galana wahe'au'aunaowedi .
46015034	Nuwana tupwami Yehoba wahenainaideya . Bewa 'ebe debamwadina 'oimiya , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma wada sanapu , ma mumuga galana walolagu .
46015035	Ma tupwami geya wanuwanuwa sabwalena toholo hila weyahina , 'oinega wagwae . “ To'amasaedi to 'wapi 'oinega sitoholo hila ? ”
46015036	Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma wada sanapu 'abehega 'eguma patu ta'uma ma 'ibwala 'abwa patuina 'imwahulu .
46015037	Wasanapuya 'abehega 'eguma pegapega nuwana 'aigeda patu tadauni , 'wapina 'oinega 'ibwala , geya patu nugenugetaina 'ana 'ita gidemusa , ma hesi hagana ,
46015038	weyahina toloina tauna Yehoba , ma 'aiwe ta pwatula 'aigeda 'aigeda 'adi 'ita 'ina nuwatuhu gidemusa , ta 'ilagudiya .
46015039	Ta wete wahi Yehoba 'iloinaeya , tomota wahida hagana ma hagana , hebahebai wahidi hagana , bwasumo wahidi hagana , ma silahana wete wahidi hagana .
46015040	Ta wete megalewa wahidi hagana ma gogo gabulena wahida hagana , wete 'adi 'ebe hepwatu hagana tauda 'oidega .
46015041	Ta wete hala 'ana hepwatu hagana , ma wai'ena 'ana hepwatu hagana , ma 'ipwala wete 'adi hepwatu hagana ma hagana .
46015042	Cida toholo hila wete gidemusa , wahida mwahumwahuludi sigaligalihedi , ma 'abwa 'eguma tatoholo hila wahida gesowana simwahumwahulu .
46015043	Moisa , wahida 'ebe debamwadina ma we'awe'aidi sigaligalihedi ma 'iyamo wahida galewa tatotoholo hila , ma wahidaedi ma'adi hepwatu ta waiwaidi ,
46015044	weyahina wahi bale'uwa sigaligalihedi ta wahi galewa sitotoholo hila , weyahina wahi bale'u hagana ma wahi galewa hagana .
46015045	Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwaila wete gidemusa 'igwaeya , “ Loheya nugenugetaina , Adama wahina mayawasina ; ma loheya heluwena yaluyaluwana 'oinega sowasowana yawasida 'i'ebwaegita . ”
46015046	Loheya yaluyaluwana geya 'ilatu nugeta , ma hesi wahida 'ihapwesa nugeta ma yaluyaluwa muliyetega .
46015047	Weyahina loheya nugenugetana Yehoba 'ipaihoweya bale'u 'oinega , ta loheya heluwena galewega 'isuluma .
46015048	Mabwaiyada Adama tubunao bale'uwa tamiyamiya , 'ada 'ita mebale'u gidemusa , ma wete wahida hauhaudi galewega 'abwa ta'ewadi , 'adi 'ita gidemusa Keliso wahina hauhauna .
46015049	
46015050	Ciyagwao wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega wahida bale'uwa 'imwahumwahulu gesowana 'iluhu galewa , weyahina wahi bale'uwa mwahuluna , ta wahi galewa geya 'ida mwahuluwa .
46015051	Ma wete sanapu hauhauna yahe'itegomi 'abehega gesowana tohekalesiyao mabwaiyada ta'ama'amasa , ma hesi tupwada 'abwa mayawasida tamiyamiya ma Yehoba wahida 'ida buidi .
46015052	Weyahina tuta 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'oina yoguli 'ida mu'a madouna , ma Yehoba wahida 'ida bui mwayamwayauwedi , ma wete to'amasao mawahi hauhaudi sitoholo hila , ta tauda mayawasida wahida wete 'ibuidi .
46015053	Weyahina Yehoba sawasawahina wahi mwahumwahuludi ma 'ama'amasidi 'ibuidi ma si'ehau ta miyamiya hatayadi .
46015054	Ma 'abwa tuta nage 'oina Buki He'asisi 'ana 'ahwa moisa 'ilatu , beno 'igwaeya , “ Tauna 'abwa 'ihewaiwai moisa ma 'amasa 'igumwala .
46015055	Weyahina gesowana 'amasa 'ihehewaiwai , ma hesi 'amasa 'ina gala 'oida 'igumwala . ”
46015056	Camasaina 'ina waiwai 'ilatuwa mumuga galana 'oinega , eeta mumuga galagala 'ina waiwai beno Mosese 'ina loinao 'adi ligeha 'oidiyega .
46015057	Ma hesi 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'i'abihetegita ma galanaina 'oinega tahewaiwaisine , eeta Yehoba 'oina taloyauwedo madouna .
46015058	Ma wete 'iyagwao yaloyauwedo madouna 'oimiya ta yaguguyegomi ma watoholo pa'ala ma tuta mabwaiyana wada hetapewa Bada 'ina paihowa 'oina , weyahina 'abwa Bada 'ina paihowaina 'oinega huwaina taloba .
46016001	Ginaula 'aigeda wete , helau Yehoba 'ina tomotaedi Yelusalema 'oina 'adi lema weyahina . Mwalo meGaletiya 'idi helau weyahina yahegwaediya , 'oinega 'omi wete gidemusa wada paihowa 'esa ,
46016002	beno Sabati 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oidiya 'imi helau mabwaiyana walagulagu . Ceguma 'imi mane madouna , helau madouna , ta 'eguma 'imi mane 'i'iuna 'imi helau 'i'iuna wete , ma tutaina yatauyawa , 'imi helauina 'imiyamiya .
46016003	Coinega tutaina yanaowa 'oimiya tupwadi 'iyamiyao wahesinuwedi ma 'imi helauina sitauye Yelusalema 'oina , ta wete meYelusalema 'idi leta yada lele ma helauina mahetena sitauyedi .
46016004	Ceguma nuwanuwami , taugu wete taudi mahetegwao 'atauya Yelusalema .
46016005	Bewa tuwa nuwanuwagu ma yatau Masidoniya ma muliyetega yanaowa 'oimiya ,
46016006	ta nobwa ya'aiyawasi ma tupwana yamiya 'amana , nuwana 'ana siga gogai 'ana tuta 'igumwala , ma wahegelugau to tupwa 'oina nuwanuwagu yatau .
46016007	Weyahina genuwagu tuta to'uto'upana tuwa ba'idami tamiyamiya , ma hesi 'eguma Yehoba 'itagwala , ma tuta tupwana dudulena ba'idami nobwa tamiyamiya .
46016008	Bewa tuwa Epeso 'oina yamiyamiya 'ana siga Penitikosi Guyaina 'igumwala , muliyetega yatauyawa .
46016009	Weyahina 'asa bewa 'oina sawasawahina ma Yesu 'ina paihowa madouna yapaihowa , bwagana 'agu sahiyao baibaiwadi simiyamiya .
46016010	Ta Timoti wete 'eguma 'inaowa 'oimiya wabwauwe 'imi hada ma wahelauwe madouna , weyahina tauna 'ida Bada weyahina 'ipaipaihowa , taugu wete gidemusa .
46016011	Ma sahena taiya Timotiina 'ilohesohesoiye , ta tutaina 'ihilama 'oiguwa wa'abihete ma ma'ina yaliyaya 'ida hilama , weyahina tauna ma tupwadi wete 'iyadao yayamwayamwadi .
46016012	Apolosa wete tauna tasidai 'aigeda , ma mwalo Apolosaina ya'ahwanoiyeya ma 'abehega 'iyadao mahetenao sinaowa 'oimiya , ta 'iguipaila , ma 'abehega 'eguma to tuta 'oina bwebwe'ana 'itauyawa .
46016013	Ciyagwao wa'itayahigomi , ma ma'imi hemisa moisa watoholo pa'ala ma wahewaiwai ,
46016014	ta wete 'imi paihowa mabwaiyana 'oidiya wahehelau hilegomi .
46016015	Sitipana 'ina bodao wasanapudiya 'abehega taudi Keliso 'ana tohemisa nugenugetadi tupwa Akaya 'oina , ma sitagwala pwaidiya Yehoba 'ina tomota 'adi 'abihetena weyahina ,
46016016	'oinega yahenuwa lagugomi ma 'idi gwaeyao wamuliyedi , ma taiyawedi wete mahetediyao Keliso weyahina sipaipaihowa taudi wete wamuliyedi .
46016017	Tuta bewa yayaliyaya madouna weyahina Sitipana ma Potuneto ma Akeiko sitauya pwaima , ta taudi gide 'omi 'ami miyalaenao , taudi si'abi'abihe yaliyayegomi .
46016018	Gidemusa 'omi mwalo wete si'abihe yaliyayegomiya , 'oinega bewa tuwa 'ada lotohona bwebwe'ana hedada . Loheloheyaedi wahe'asisiyanedi , ta wete taiyewedi taudi gidemusa .
46016019	Tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi tupwa Esiya 'oinega 'idi loyauwedo 'inaonaowa 'oimiya . Ma wete Akuila ma Pilisila , ta wete tohekalesiyao taudi 'idi hada sitapwatapwalolo 'ida Badaina saninega , 'idi helau 'oimiya .
46016020	Tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi wete 'idi helau 'oimiya . Ciyamiyao helauwega wa'atusapwalidi .
46016021	Bewa 'igu loyauwedo 'oimiya taugu nimaguwega yaleleyawa .
46016022	Ceguma taiya geya Bada 'ihelauwe nata 'imiya mwau . Bada yo , nuwanuwagu ma 'unaoma .
