46016023	Cida Bada Yesuina 'ina helau 'oimiya 'ida miyamiya .
46016024	Ta wete 'igu helau Yesu Keliso saninega 'inaonaowa mabwaiyami 'oimiya . Taugu Paulo
47001001	Yauwedo meKolinita 'omi Yehoba 'ina tohekalesiyao ma 'omi wete Yehoba 'ana tohemisao tupwa Akaya mabwaiyana 'alona , 'imi leta bewa tasidai Timoti 'i'abihetegauwa ma 'aleleyawa , taugu Paulo 'oiguwega , weyahina Yehoba 'ina hesinuwega yahetohepwaila Yesu Keliso weyahina .
47001002	Tamadai Yehoba ma 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'idi helauwega tuwa wamiya yaliyaya .
47001003	Yehoba tauna 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso Tamana 'oina taloyauwedo weyahina 'iboinamo tauna 'atemuyamuya huhuna ,
47001004	ma 'ima miyamwau 'oidiyega 'i'abihe yaliyayemaiya , 'oinega sowasowahima taudi tomiya mwau wete 'a'abihe yaliyayadi , weyahina 'ima 'ebe yaliyayaina Yehoba 'oinega 'alobeya sowasowahina 'alagubale 'oidiya ma taudi wete siyaliyaya .
47001005	Moisa , Keliso 'ana muyao tauma 'alotohodiya , ma 'oinega Keliso 'ina yaliyaya 'i'ebwaemaiya , tauna 'ina yaliyaya gide .
47001006	Ma 'eguma tauma muya 'aloba , beno 'omi 'ami 'abi he'atepatu ma 'ami 'abihetena weyahidi . Ma wete 'eguma 'ama 'ebe 'abihe'atepatu 'aloba , beno 'omi 'imi 'atepatu weyahina , 'eguma 'imi miyamwau gide tauma 'ima miyamwau , ma wete 'eguma 'oidiyega wa'alama'i'ita nata 'omi wa'atepatu .
47001007	Coinega 'ima hemisa 'omi weyahimi 'ihewaiwai pwaiya , weyahina 'asanapugomiya 'abehega wamuyamuya tauma gide , ma wete wa'atepatu gide tauma .
47001008	Ciyagwao , nuwanuwagu ma wasanapu 'ima muyamuyao weyahidi , tutaina Esiya 'oina 'amiyamiya , beno 'ima nuwagala madou hedade 'anuwatuhuya 'abehega nata 'a'amasa .
47001009	Cana 'ita gide 'ama 'alehaowedi sida lohe'amasimai , ma hesi Yehoba tuwa sowasowahina ma to'amasa 'i'abihe toholodi , ta miyamwauina 'alobeya , 'oinega 'anuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega geya tauma 'ima waiwai , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina waiwai 'oinega 'i'abihetemaiya .
47001010	Ma 'i'abihete pwaimaiya 'ebe hesilaeina 'oinega , ma wete 'anuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega 'abwa 'i'abihetemai tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya .
47001011	Comi wete 'imi 'ahwanoiyega walememai ma 'oinega maisa bwebwe'ana Yehoba 'oinega nata 'aloba , mabwaiyada 'ida 'ahwanoi 'oidiyega , 'oinega mabwaiyada taloyauwedo 'abihetenaina 'alobeya weyahina .
47001012	Caigeda nuwatuhu weyahina yayaliyaya madouna , beno yasanapuya moisa 'ima mumuga 'ausalana ma dumwaluna tomota 'oidiya , geya sanapu bale'u 'oidiyega , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina helau 'oima 'oinega , ma gide 'apaihowa madouna 'oimiya .
47001013	Cimi leta bewa 'aleleyawa mabwaiyana sowasowahina wahasilidi ma wasanapudi , 'oinega nuwanuwagu ma wanuwa sabwalena ,
47001014	gide wasanapu pwaiya tupwana , ma 'abwa Bada Yesu 'ina sabwelo madouna 'oina wayaliyaya tauma weyahima , ma tauma wete 'ayaliyaya weyahimi .
47001015	Comi yasanapugomiya 'imi hemisa 'oima , 'oinega mwalo nuwanuwagu yahabo'enegomi maluwa ma 'ane yaliyaya waloba .
47001016	Caigeda 'igu 'adau Masidoniya weyahina 'ana sauga , ma heluwena beno Masidoniyega yada hilama 'oimiya , ma 'oinega 'igu 'adau weyahina wada lemegau ma yada tauya Yudiya .
47001017	Sahena wanuwanuwatuhu 'abehega 'igu gwaeina mwalo weyahina yahenuwa naluwa . Geya . Sahena yatagwatagwala 'abo'abo gide taudi mumuga bale'u 'ana tomuliyao .
47001018	Gide tuwa Yehoba 'ina gwae moisa , taugu wete 'igu gwae 'oimiya gwae moisa , ma sahena yatagwatagwala 'abo'abo .
47001019	Gidemusa Yehoba Natuna Yesu Keliso , tauna weyahina Silibenosi ma Timoti ba'idagwao 'alohatotowa 'oimiya , 'abehega Yesuina geya 'itagwala 'abo'abo , ma hesi tuta mabwaiyana 'itagwala bwaibwaina .
47001020	Weyahina Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa mabwaiyadi talobaloba Yesu 'iboimo 'oinega . Coinega Yesuina saninega tatagwalegita , ma Yehoba tahepwatuwe .
47001021	Cida miya bwebwe'ana Keliso ba'idadai Yehoba 'i'ebwaegita , 'omi ma tauma , ta tauma 'ima paihowa 'i'ebwaemaiya ,
47001022	ma 'ina 'ila'ilala 'oida 'ilaguya , beno Yaluyaluwana 'ateda , ma 'oinega tasanapugita 'abehega tauda 'ina tomotaiyao .
47001023	Bewa Yehoba 'isanapuya yagwaegwae moisa 'abehega mwalo geya yabo'enegomi 'imi tupwa Kolinita 'oina weyahina geya nuwagu ma yaloina pa'alegomi 'imi mumuga galana weyahina .
47001024	Geya 'abehega 'ahetoloina pa'alina 'oimiya 'imi hemisa ta 'imi tapwalolo weyahidi , weyahina 'imi hemisega watoholo pa'ala pwaiya , ma hesi sabi lemegomi 'imi yaliyaya weyahina .
47002001	Moisa , tutaina mwalo yanuwatuhuya 'abehega sahena yabo'ebo'enegomi ma yaheheliyegomi ta debamwadina ya'ebwa'ebwaegomi 'iyamiuina 'ina mumuga galana weyahina . Beno namo 'imi leta yaleleyawa .
47002002	Coinega yanuwatuhuya 'abehega 'eguma 'igu gwaeyega ya'abihenuwa galegomiya , 'oimiyega taiya 'i'abihe yaliyayegau ?
47002003	Ma 'imi letaina yaleleyawa ma'igu 'atemuya ma ma'igu nuwagala ma 'igu dou , ma 'oinega tutaina 'eguma yabo'enegomi wa'abihe yaliyayegau , ma sahena yanuwanuwagala , ma hesi mabwaiyami yahemisaegomiya ma yanuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega taugu 'igu yaliyayega 'omi wete wayaliyaya . Coinega 'imi letaina yaleleyawa , geya 'abehega ya'abihe nuwa galegomi ma hesi 'igu helau madou hedade 'oimiya wasanasanapu .
47002004	
47002005	Ma 'iyamiu galanaina 'i'abihenuwa galegauwa tupwana tuwa , ma hesi 'omi nuwagala madouna 'i'ebwaegomiya , ma geya nuwagu ma yaheliye ,
47002006	weyahina galana 'ana maisa 'ilobeya mabwaiyami 'oimiyega , tuwa sowasowahina .
47002007	Sahena mwau madou hedade talagulagu 'oina , 'oinega 'oimiya ya'ahwanoi ma 'ina puiina wanuwasam ma wa'abihe yaliyaya hila ma wete ba'idamiu wahe'iya'iyagu hila .
47002008	
47002009	Bewa weyahina 'imi leta yaleleyawa ma 'abehega yatohogemi , nuwana loina mabwaiyana wamuliyedi , bo geya .
47002010	Ceguma taiya 'ina pui wanuwasam taugu wete yanuwasam , ma to'aha taugu yanuwasamuya beno 'omi 'imi bwebwe'ana weyahina , Keliso matana ,
47002011	'amuge ma Seitani 'ihewaiwai 'oida , weyahina 'ina nuwatuhu galana tasanapu pwaiya .
47002012	Mwalo yatauya Tilowasi , Keliso tetelina sabi lohatotoina , ma Yehoba 'eda bwebwe'ana 'iso'eya , 'igu lohatotoina weyahina ,
47002013	ma hesi yanuwatuhuya madouna weyahina tasigu Taito geya yaloba . Coinega meTilowasi ya'ebesinediya ma yatauya Masidoniya .
47002014	Coinega Yehoba 'oina yaloyauwedo , weyahina Keliso 'ina waiwaiyega tuta baibaiwana 'i'abi'abi hewaiwaiyemai ma 'ima paihowega Keliso 'ana sanapu tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'idabalala gide hoya mahaina 'ausala hedade 'idabalala ma tomota sinisoniso ,
47002015	beno Keliso 'ina paihowa Yehoba 'oina , ta weyahina 'alolohatoto gide hoya mahaina 'ausalana 'alelewane taudi Yehoba 'i'abi'abihetedi 'oidiya , ta wete taudi nata sihesilae hataya 'oidiya .
47002016	Taudi tohesilae 'oidiya mahainaina 'ana lotohona tuwa gide to'amasa mwahuluna , ma hesi taudi Yehoba 'i'abihetediya mahainaina 'ana lotohona tuwa gide yawasi 'ausalana mahaina gide . Hisa tomota sowasowadi paihowa bewa ? Geya baibaiwana .
47002017	Ma tauma geya gide tolohatoto 'abo'abowao , taudi 'idi wasawasa tuwa weyahina silolohatoto , ma hesi tauma ma'ama hemisa , gide Yehoba 'iloinemaiya , 'oinega tauna matana Keliso tetelina 'agwaegwaene moisa .
47003001	Togidega , 'abehega 'agwae gagasa mumugama 'ausalana weyahina ? Geya'abwa . Ma hesi tomota tupwadi nuwanuwadi 'idi leta 'igwaeya , “ Leta bewa 'ana to'ewa'ewa mumugana 'ausalana . ” Genuwama 'ima letaina walele gidemusa , bo nuwana tomota hagadi 'ima letao sileledi gidemusa .
47003002	Weyahina 'omi tuwa 'ima letaowedi , ma tomota mabwaiyadi 'oimiyega sihasili , ma 'oinega 'imi mumuga 'ausalana si'ita ma 'ima paihowa 'oimiya sida sanapu 'abehega 'ausalana ,
47003003	ma nage 'oinega wahe'itadi 'abehega 'omi tuwa leta Keliso 'oinega , Yehoba tauna mayawasina Yaluyaluwanega 'ileleya , geya 'ebelele 'oinega , nuwana dimwa tabatabadi 'oidiya , ma hesi tomota 'atena , ma 'omi gide leta , ta 'a'ebwayaegomiya tomota mabwaiyadi 'oidiya .
47003004	Bewa weyahina Keliso 'ina 'abihetenega 'a'atepatuwa Yehoba matana .
47003005	Geya 'abehega tauma weyahima 'agwaegwae hanehane ma 'agwae , “ Tauma 'ima bwebwe'ana 'oinega paihowa 'apaipaihowadi , ” ma hesiyage Yehoba 'iboimo 'i'abi'abi hewaiwaiyemai ,
47003006	ma sowasowahina 'ina loina hauhauna weyahina 'ahehetopaihowa . Loinaina hauhauna geya lelelelena , ma hesi Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega , weyahina loina lelelelena 'amasa 'i'ebwaegita , ma tuwa loinaina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega yawasida miyamiya hatayana 'i'ebwaegita .
47003007	Ma loina miyamiyana 'amasa weyahina , ma dimwa tabatabadi 'oidiya silelediya ta Yehoba Mosese 'i'ebwaeya , 'asilala madouna 'alona , ta Mosese manina 'oinega 'asilala 'isaesae ma tupwana 'imiya 'amana , ma 'oinega wete 'isawala , ma tutaina Mosese manina 'isaesae meIsileli geya sowasowahina ma si'ebubu .
47003008	Coinega tasanapuya 'abehega loina hauhauna Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega 'ina wasawasa madou hedade 'asilalaina .
47003009	Loina miyamiyana 'oinega tomota yatala siloba ma hesi loina ma'ina wasawasa 'asi'asilalana . Loina hauhaunaina mumuga dumwaluna 'i'ebwaegita ta 'ina wasawasa 'asilala hedade .
47003010	Wete loina miyamiyana 'ina 'asilala 'ana 'ita gide sawasawalina , ma hesi loina hauhauna 'ina 'asilala bwebwe'ana hedade .
47003011	Loina miyamiyana geya 'ida miyahataya , ma hesi 'asi'asilalana , 'oinega tasanapuya 'abehega loina hauhauna tauna miyamiya hatayana ma 'asilala hedade .
47003012	Tanuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega loina hauhauna 'oinega tabwebwe'ana hataya , ma weyahina ta'atepatu ,
47003013	ma Mosese geya gide tauda , weyahina Mosese manina 'asilalana nata 'isawala , ma 'i'ahu 'au'ausiya ta 'abehega sahena meIsileli si'ita'ita .
47003014	Moisa , meIsileliyedi nuwa potapotadi , mwalohene ta nige , weyahina 'abwa tuwa bewa 'eguma loina miyamiyana 'ana hasila sihesagohe , nuwadi sitala 'au'ausidi 'idi nuwa potepotega , ma sahena sinuwanuwa sabwalena , ma Keliso 'iboimo sowasowahina tala'ausina 'i'ewa yahuledi .
47003015	Moisa , mwalohene ta nige 'eguma Mosese 'ina loinao sihesagohedi , nuwadi sitala'au'ausidi ma geya sinuwa sabwelenidi ,
47003016	ma hesi 'eguma 'aigeda taiya 'i'itahila 'ida Badaina 'oina 'ihemisa , beno tala'au'ausina 'i'ewayahule .
47003017	Ma Bada tauna Yaluyaluwa , ma Badaina Yaluyaluwana 'ada tolihasa .
47003018	Coinega geya 'aigeda 'ahubodaboda manida 'imiyamiya , ma Bada 'ina wasawasa 'asi'asilalana 'oina ta'e'ebubuna , ta tupwana ma tupwana 'ibuibuigita tauna 'ana 'ita 'asi'asilalana gide . Paihowa bewa Badaina 'oinega , tauna yaluyaluwa tuwa .
47004001	Cima paihowa bewa Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyemuyega 'i'ebwaemaiya , 'oinega sahena 'awe'awe'a .
47004002	Mumuga galadi ta 'abo'abowedi 'alogwahata pwaidiya , ma wete sahena Yehoba 'ina gwae 'abuibui 'abehega he'ita 'abo'abo 'oinega 'ahehe'ita , ma hesi he'ita moisa 'agwaegwae latuwe , ma 'omi mabwaiyami tauma 'ima mumuga 'ausalana Yehoba matana wa'ita .
47004003	Ma 'eguma tupwana tomota 'ima he'itao geya sisanapu , siboidimo hesilae 'ina 'eda 'oinega sitautauya .
47004004	Taudi geya sihemisa , weyahina bale'u bewa 'ina bada 'i'abihegibu pwaidiya , ma 'oinega 'asilala sahena si'ita'ita , beno Keliso 'ina wasawasa tetelina , tauna 'ana 'ita Yehoba gidemusa .
47004005	Cima lohatoto geya tauma weyahima , ma hesi Yesu Keliso tauna 'ida Badaina weyahina , ma tauma 'imi topaihowao tuwa Yesu weyahina .
47004006	Weyahina Yehobaina 'igwaeya , “ Guguyou 'oina 'asilala 'ida saehane , ” ma Yehoba 'atema 'isaesaehane , 'oinega tauna 'ina 'asilala Keliso manina 'a'ita'ita .
47004007	Cima wasawasa galewega 'wapima we'awe'adi 'oidiya 'imiyamiya , gide tobwatobwa wasawasa walata miyamiyana 'alona , 'oinega tomota sisanapumai 'abehega 'ima waiwai madouna geya tauma 'oimega , ma hesi Yehoba 'oinega .
47004008	Tomota 'ama mwau baibaiwadi si'ebwaemaiya ta hesi geya sowasowadi ma si'abihe galemai , 'oinega 'ima nuwatuhu baibaiwana ta geya 'abe'u .
47004009	Cama mwau loheloheya si'ebwaemaiya , ma tuwa Keliso 'abwa ba'idamai 'amiyamiya . Wete sihunuhunumai , ma hesi geya silohe'amasimai .
47004010	Tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'ana 'ita gide wahima si'ama'amasa , gidemusa Yesu 'i'amasa , ma 'oinega tomota si'ita Yesu yawasina 'oima 'ipaipaihowa .
47004011	Moisa , mayawasima tuta bewa bale'uwa , ma Yesu weyahina tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'ama 'alehao silolohe 'amasimai ma hesi Yesu yawasina 'wapima we'awe'adi 'alodi 'ihehetapewa .
47004012	Gide tuwa 'amasa tauma 'aloma 'ipaipaihowa , ma 'oinega 'omi yawasi bwebwe'ana 'oimiya 'ipaihowa .
47004013	Mwalo 'aigeda loheya 'ileleya 'igwaeya , “ Taugu yahemisaeya , 'oinega yagwae latuweya . ” Tauma wete 'ima hemisa tauna gide , ta 'oinega 'ima hemisega 'ahehepwaila ,
47004014	ma Yehoba 'asanapuya 'abehega 'ida Bada Yesu 'amasega 'i'abihe toholo hileya , ma tauma wete Yesu ba'idamai 'i'abihe toholo hilemai , ma 'omi wete ba'idamayao 'itoegita tauna matana .
47004015	Bewa mabwaiyana 'omi weyahimi , ma 'oinega Yehoba 'ina helau 'ilelelelewana tomota mabwaiyadi 'oidiya , taudi ba'idadao taloyauwedo madouna , ma wete Yehoba 'ana hepwatu ta 'ina wasawasa 'imadou hedada .
47004016	Coinega geya 'awe'a . Bwagana wahida siwe'awe'a , ma hesi tuwa 'aloda tahehe'ehau sabwelo 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oidiya .
47004017	Muyamuyaedi bewa meyameyahadi tuwa , ma tuta to'uto'upanamo 'oidiya talobalobadi , ta hesi si'abihe waiwaigita ma 'abehega 'ida wasawasa bwebwe'ana hedade ma miyamiya hatayana 'abwa ta'ewa .
47004018	Weyahina 'ida 'ebemasi ginaulaedi geya ta'ita'itadi 'oidiya . Moisa , ginauledi ta'ita'itadi sawasawalidi tuwa , ma hesi ginaulaedi geya tada 'itediya taudi ginaula miyamiya hatayadi .
47005001	Wahida gide 'ida hada bale'uwa , tasanapuya 'eguma 'ilotaligeha , 'ida hada hauhauna taloba galewa , geya tomota nimadiyega sipaipaihowa , ma hesi miyamiya hatayana Yehoba tauna 'oinega .
47005002	Bewa bale'uwa ma'ida nuwagala tayamwayamwa , nuwanuwada 'ida hada galewa ta'ewa ,
47005003	gide 'ada 'ale'o hauhauna ma 'ausalana ta'ote , ma sahena talolobugewa .
47005004	Moisa , 'abwa hada bale'uwa 'oina tamiyamiya ma'ida muyamuyao , ta 'ida nuwatuhu baibaiwadi tuwa , ma geya 'abehega 'ada 'ale'owao tahalolodi , ma hesi 'abehega 'ada 'ale'o hauhauna ta'ote , ma 'oinega wahida talatala sawalidi sibui yawasida hauhauna 'oina .
47005005	Bewa mabwaiyana Yehoba 'i'atububuya ma 'i'ebwaegita , ta 'ila'ilala 'i'ebwaegita ma 'oinega 'ana moisa tasanasanapu beno Yaluyaluwa Tabuna .
47005006	Coinega tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya ta'ate'atepatu , ma tasanapuya 'abehega 'eguma 'ida hada bale'uwa 'oina tamiyamiya beno geya Bada 'ina tupwa ,
47005007	weyahina 'ida hemisa 'oinega tatautauya ma geya 'ebubunega .
47005008	Coinega ta'ate'atepatu , ma nuwanuwada ta'amasa ta wahida ta'ebesinedi , ma Bada 'ina tupwa talatu .
47005009	Ma 'eguma wahida tamiyamiya bo nuwana 'eguma ta'amasa , 'ida 'ebemasi tuwa to'aha Badaina nuwanuwana .
47005010	Weyahina 'abwa 'eguma tutaina Keliso 'ina wagahata wasawasa 'oina 'imiyatoi sabi loinegita , mabwaiyada 'ada maisa 'oinega taloba , nuwana 'ausalana nuwana galana , gide 'ida paihowao bale'uwa .
47005011	Bewa weyahina tauna Badaina 'amatauteya ta tomota 'oidiya 'alohatotowa . Yehoba 'ima mumuga 'isanasanapu ma yanuwatuhu yahiya 'omi wete wasanasanapumai 'abehega bwebwe'ama .
47005012	Geya 'a'ahwa bwebwe'anemai tauma 'ima gwae bewa 'oidiyega , ma hesi taudi sinuwanuwatuhu hewasawasa weyahina , ma geya 'atedi weyahina , 'eguma wagwae hila 'oidiya wahe'itadi 'abehega tauma 'ima mumuga 'ausalana .
47005013	Ceguma 'ima gwae bewa gide gwae yauyaule beno Yehoba weyahina , ma hesi 'eguma 'ima gwae dumwaluna beno 'omi weyahimi .
47005014	Keliso 'ina helauwega 'agwaegwae , weyahina tauna tuwa 'ama toloina . Moisa tuwa , tauna mabwaiyada weyahida 'i'amasa , 'oinega mabwaiyada gide to'amasao .
47005015	Ta 'ina 'amasa mabwaiyada weyahida huhuna , 'abehega 'abwa mayawasida , geya tauda 'ida paihowao sabi paihowaidi , ma hesi Keliso weyahina , tauna weyahida 'i'amasa ta wete 'itoholo hila .
47005016	Mwalo , 'igu nuwatuhu 'abehega Keliso loheya galana ma hesi yanuwabui pwaiya , 'oinega sahena tahesihesinuwa tomota 'oidiya 'abehega bwebwe'adi bo galadi , beno mebale'u 'idi nuwatuhu gide ,
47005017	ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega taiya Keliso 'oina 'imiyamiya , tauna 'ihetomota hauhauna . Cina mumuga miyamiyaina 'igumwala pwaiya , ma hauhauna 'ilatuwa .
47005018	Cehele bewa Yehoba 'oinega , tauna Yehobaina Keliso 'ina paihowega 'itoegita tauna 'oina ta ba'idadai tahe'iya'iyagu hila , ma wete 'ida paihowa 'i'ebwaegita ma tomota ta'ewedima he'iya'iyaguina 'oina .
47005019	Moisa , Yehoba gide Keliso 'alona 'imiyamiya , ta mebale'u 'itoegita tauna 'oina sabi he'iya'iyagu hila , ma 'ida puiyao 'inuwasamudiya ma sahena tahehemaisadi , 'oinega he'iya'iyagu hila tetelina 'i'ebwaegita ma tahehepwaila tomota 'oidiya .
47005020	Tauma Keliso 'ana tohepwailao ta Yehoba 'oimega 'ilolohatoto 'oimiya , ma Keliso weyahina 'a'ahwanoiyegomi ma Yehoba 'oina wahe'iya'iyagu hila .
47005021	Yehobaina tauda weyahida Keliso 'iloineya , tauna geya 'eta 'ina pui , ma hesi Yehoba 'itagwaleya ma Kelisoina weyahida 'ihetogala , ma 'ane tauna ba'idadai Yehoba 'ina mumuga bwebwe'ana ta'ewa .
47006001	Coinega Yehoba ba'idamai 'apaipaihowa , ta 'oimiya 'a'ahwanoi ma sahena 'ina helau wa'ahwa ginaula bwagabwagae ,
47006002	weyahina 'igwaeya , “ Tuta bwebwe'ana 'oina 'enau yahesagoheya , 'oinega 'abihetena 'ana tuta 'oina ya'abihete pwaigowa . ” Moisa , bewa tuta bwebwe'ana ma 'ami 'abihetena waloba .
47006003	Cabihetena bewa tomota mabwaiyadi weyahidi , genuwama ma 'aigeda taiya 'ilolomugiyemai 'ima paihowao weyahidi . Geya 'aigeda wete 'ebe'etoboda 'alagulagu ,
47006004	ma hesi 'ima paihowao mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana 'ahe'itaeya 'abehega Yehoba 'ina topaihowao bwebwe'ama . Cima paihowa bewa : 'alama'i'ita madouna , muyamuya , miyamwau , hesilae ,
47006005	sapi , 'ebepai , 'aleha , paihowa , 'oyatola masala , gomale ,
47006006	mumuga 'asilalana , sanapu , 'atemuyamuya , he'iya'iyagu , Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ateda , ta wete helau moisa ,
47006007	ta 'ima gwae moisa , ma wete Yehoba 'ina waiwai 'oima , ma 'ima 'ebe'aleha 'ebeulaulamega ma 'adigeyegeyemega , beno 'ima mumuga bwebwe'ana .
47006008	Tuta tupwana tomota si'ahwa bwebwe'anemai ma tuta tupwana si'ahwa galagalaemai . Wete si'ahwa 'abo'abowemai ma hesi geya 'a'abo .
47006009	Tomota geya sisanapumai ma hesi Yehoba 'isanapumaiya . Tauma gide 'ama'amasima ma hesi yawasima 'ausalana . Si'abi'abi hegalemaiya ma geya silohe'amasimai .
47006010	Tauma ma'ima nuwagala ma hesi 'atema 'ayaliyaliyaya . Tauma gide wewelohe , ma hesi wasawasa 'aheheguyai tomota baibaiwadi 'oidiya . Geya wete 'ima tobwatobwamo ma hesiyage ginaula mabwaiyana 'oima simiyamiya .
47006011	Ciyagwao meKolinita 'omi , 'agu lotohona mabwaiyana yahepwaila latuwa 'oimiya ,
47006012	ta 'ateguwa yahelauwegomiya , ma hesi geya wayaliyaya 'oiguwa .
47006013	Coinega natugwao , 'ilobwaineya ma 'atemiyega wahelauwegau .
47006014	Sahena watubwetubwegomi taudi geya sihemisa Keliso 'oina ba'idamiyao , weyahina geya sowana mumuga bwebwe'ana ma galana ma'aigeda wapaihowa . Wete geya sowana 'asilala ma guguyou ba'idana sihe'iya'iyagu .
47006015	Wete geya sowana Keliso ma Tomudulele ba'idana sihe'iya'iyagu . Ceguma Kelisoina 'uhemiseya , geya sowasowahina tomota taudi geya sihemisa ba'idamwao wapaihowa mahemahetena .
47006016	Wete geya sowasowahina hali 'ebe hemisao talagu luhuwedi Yehoba 'ina hada 'alona . Yehoba tauna mayawasina ta 'ina hada tauda , ma 'igwaeya , “ ‘ Taugu taudi 'oidiya yalo'asa ma 'alodiya yayawala dadana ma taugu 'idi Yehoba ma taudi 'igu tomotao ! ’
47006017	Coinega Yehoba wete 'igwaeya , ‘ Hali boda 'oidiyega walatu ma wa'ebesinedi , ma sahena ginaula bi'ibi'idi wa'abi'abitohodi , ma yatoegomi 'igu tupwa ,
47006018	ma 'oiguwa wa'ahwa tamana ma 'omi natugwao meloheyami ma mewahinemi . ’ Bewa Yehoba Tohewaiwai tauna 'ina gwae . ”
47007001	Ciyagwao , Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisaedi tahesagohediya , 'oinega wahida ma yaluyaluwada ta'abihe 'asilaladi ginaula bi'ibi'idi 'oidiyega , ma tahe'ehau moisa ta ma'ida he'asisi Yehoba 'oina .
47007002	Ciyagwao wahelauwemai , weyahina 'ima mumuga mabwaiyana 'ausalana . Geya 'aigeda wete nuwami 'ada 'abihe galeya , bo 'a'abihe 'wanigomi , bo 'a'abowegomi .
47007003	Cigu gwae bewa geya sabi heliyegomi , weyahina nuwama wa'ewa pwaiya , mwalo gide yahegwaegomiya ma 'abehega 'omi ba'idagwao tamiya 'ama'amasa .
47007004	Yayaliyaya pwaiya weyahimi ma yahehepwatu , ta 'igu nuwatuhu 'ibwebwe'ana pwaiya weyahimi . Bewa tuwa 'ima miyamwau , ma hesi tuwa weyahimi yayaliyaya madouna .
47007005	Mwalo 'atauyama 'ebwa Masidoniya , geya 'aigeda wete 'ebe'aiyawasi 'aloba , ma wete tuwa miyamwau mabwaiyana , beno 'aleha , tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiya , ma matauta 'atema .
47007006	Ma Yehoba , tauna tonuwagala 'adi to'abiheyaliyaya , tauma 'i'abihe yaliyayemaiya ginaula 'eluwa 'oidiyega , beno Taito 'ina tauyama 'oinega ,
47007007	ma wete tetelimi 'oinega , weyahina Taito 'ihegwaegauwa , 'igwaeya , “ MeKolinitaedi nuwanuwadi ma 'utauya 'uhabo'enedi . Ma 'ino gwae weyahina sitagwala pwaiyediya , ta 'idi pui 'oinega sinuwabuiya ma'idi dou . Bewa ya'iteya ta yayaliyaya madouna . ”
47007008	Mwalo 'imi leta yaleleya , ta 'i'abihenuwa mwauwegomiya , ma taugu wete weyahimi yanuwagala , ma tuwa sahena yanuwanuwagala letaina weyahina , weyahina 'omi 'imi nuwagala tuta to'uto'upanamo 'oina .
47007009	Coinega taugu yayaliyaya , geya 'imi nuwagala weyahina , ma hesi weyahina 'imi nuwagala 'oinega wanuwabuiya 'imi puiyao 'oidiyega . Cimi nuwagalaina walotohoya 'abehega Yehoba 'oinega 'inaoma , ma geya 'eta wete 'oimiya galana yapaihowa .
47007010	Moisa , nuwagala Yehoba 'oinega ginaula 'ausalana ma 'i'abihe nuwabuigita , ma 'oinega 'abihetena taloba . Coinega sahena nuwagalaina talologwahate . Ma hesi hali nuwagala bale'u 'oinega 'abwa 'ilohe'amasigita .
47007011	Wa'ita , 'imi nuwagala bewa 'oinega Yehoba bo'i 'i'abihetegomiya , ma wahetapewa , ta wahewaiwaiya ta 'imi mumuga 'ibwebwe'ana mabwaiyana , 'oinega galanaina weyahina wagamwasowala pwaiya , ma wamatauta , ma nuwanuwami yatauyawa 'oimiya , ma wahewaiwaiya ma togalaina 'ana loina wa'ebwaeya . Ginaula mabwaiyana 'oidiyega 'imi paihowa 'ausalana wahe'itaeya .
47007012	Cimi leta mwalo yaleleyawa geya 'iyamiu topuimo weyahina , ma geya loheyaina 'ipuiya 'oina weyahina , ma hesi 'omi mabwaiyami weyahimi , ma 'abehega Yehoba matana wahe'itae 'igu gwae 'ana hematamatana bwebwe'ana .
47007013	Coinega yayaliyaya pwaiya madouna . Wete Taito 'ina yaliyaya tauma 'ima yaliyaya 'ilohepoiya , weyahina Taitoina 'imi mumuga 'ausala 'oinega 'iyaliyaya .
47007014	Mwalo Taito 'imiyamiya ta yahepwatuwegomiya , ma Taito matanega 'i'ita pwaiya , 'oinega geya wete 'ebe debamwadina 'oiguwa . Ma hesi 'igu gwae mabwaiyana 'omi weyahimi 'ana moisa 'ilatu pwaiya .
47007015	Taito 'imi hematamatana mabwaiyana 'inuwatuhu yahiya , tutaina tauna 'oina watagwalegomiya ma'imi 'ateyoho , 'oinega nuwana wa'ewa bwaibwainiya .
47007016	Ma taugu wete yayaliyaya 'imi mumuga mabwaiyana 'ausalana weyahina .
47008001	Ciyagwao , nuwanuwama ma tohekalesiyao Masidoniya 'alona wasanapudi 'abehega Yehoba 'i'abihetediya 'ihenuwa laguwediya ta 'ehele 'awawa 'ausalana silaguya .
47008002	Taudi towewelohe gide tuwa 'ebetohona silobeya 'idi miya 'ana mwau 'oinega , ma hesi tuwa ma'idi yaliyaya helau bwebwe'ana hedade silaguya .
47008003	Yagwaeya moisa , meMasidoniyaedi 'atedi sitagwalediya ta 'idi ginaulao si'ehele 'awawediya ma'ana loheposeyana .
47008004	Ma si'ahwa'ahwanoi waiwai 'oima ma 'eguma sowasowahina sihelau Yelusalema 'ana tohekalesiyao 'adi sagu weyahina .
47008005	Tauma 'ima nuwatuhu ma sihelau , ma'iyamo 'idi 'ehele madou hedade , weyahina Bada 'oina sitagwala nugetediya , 'oinega wete sitagwalediya tauma 'oima , gide Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu .
47008006	Coinega Taito 'ahegwaeya , 'agwaeya , “ Mwalo 'uhegaina ma meKolinita 'u'abihetediya 'idi 'ehele 'ana paihowa weyahina , 'oinega 'u'abihetedi wete ma silosalohi . ”
47008007	Comi wamumuga 'ausala pwaiya 'imi paihowa baibaiwana 'oidiyega , beno hemisa ma hepwaila ma sanapu ma hepwatu ma wete 'imi helau 'oima , 'oinega sowasowahimi ma 'ehele 'ausalana wete wapaihowa .
47008008	Bewa 'igu gwae tuwa ma geya 'abehega yaloinegomi , ma yanuwatuhuya tohekalesiyao tupwana sihehetapewa 'ehele 'awawa weyahina , 'oinega 'ebetohona bewa yalaguya ma ta'ita nuwana wa'ehele bwaibwaina , bo geya .
47008009	Comi 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina helau wasanapuya , tauna 'ina wasawasa madouna 'i'ebesineya ma 'iheweweloheya sabi 'abihetegomi , ta 'abehega 'ina hewewelohe 'oinega 'omi wahewasawasa .
47008010	Coinega nuwatuhu ya'ebwaegomi . Bolime 'igumwala nuwanuwami ma wahelau , 'oinega wahelau nugeta , ta hali boda mulimiya .
47008011	Coinega sowasowahina ma walosalohi . Mwalo wahetapewa ta wahegaineya , 'oinega nata wete 'imi 'atetagwalega to'aha 'oimiya simiyamiya 'oidiyega helauina walosalohi .
47008012	Sahena wagwaegwae ma wagwae , “ Geya 'eta ginaula 'oima ma 'oinega 'ahelau . ” Hesi tuwa wahetapewa ma to'aha 'oimiya 'imiyamiya 'oidiyega wahelau , ma Yehoba wa'abihe yaliyaya .
47008013	Bewa geya 'abehega 'omi 'imi helau 'ana mwau madouna ma hali 'asa 'idi helau 'ana mwau muhemuhena , ma hesiyage mahemahetena tuwa .
47008014	Ceguma bewa tuwa 'imi tobwatobwa baibaiwana , sowasowahina ma hali 'asa wa'abihetedi 'idi miyamwau 'oidiyega , ma 'eguma to tuta taudi 'idi tobwatobwa baibaiwana si'abihetegomi wete , 'eguma wamiya mwau . Coinega wada hemahemahetena .
47008015	Gidemusa gwae 'imiyamiya Buki He'asisi 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Taudi sihe'auta madouna 'adi 'e'ahai geya 'ana tupwamo , ma taudi sihe'auta 'i'iuna 'adi 'e'ahai tuwa sowasowahidi , eeta sihemahemahetena . ”
47008016	Yehoba 'oina yaloyauwedo , weyahina Taito 'ina nuwatuhu madouna 'i'ebwae pwaiya , ma tauna 'i'abihetegomi , gide tauma wete 'ima nuwatuhu .
47008017	Coinega tutaina 'ahegwaeya ma 'ihabo'enegomi 'itagwala bwaibwaineya , weyahina beno tauna 'ina nuwatuhu madouna .
47008018	Coinega wete tasidai 'aigeda Taito ba'idana 'ahetunediwa , tauna tologuguya 'aigeda wasa bwebwe'ana weyahina , ma sanina madouna tohekalesiyao 'oidiya ,
47008019	ma tohekalesiyao 'ina paihowa si'ebwaeya ta tauna ba'idamai 'asakosakowasi 'ehele weyahina sabi 'abihetegomi , ma 'oinega tomota Yehoba sihepwatuwe .
47008020	Geya nuwama ma 'eta taiya 'ilomugiyemai 'igwae , “ Helau 'awawaina madouna ma geya sida 'itayahi bwaibwainiya . ”
47008021	Ma hesi nuwanuwama tuta baibaiwana 'oidiya 'ada paihowa dumwalu Yehoba matana , ma wete tomota matadiya .
47008022	Tasidai wete 'aigeda ba'idadiu 'ahesumaneyawa , tauna 'asanapuya 'abehega tohemisa moisa 'ina paihowa baibaiwana 'oidiyega , ma bewa tuwa 'omi 'imi mumuga bwebwe'ana 'ihesagoha pwaiya ta 'ihemiseya , 'oinega nuwanuwana madouna 'ihabo'enegomi sabi 'abihetegomi wete .
47008023	Taito wasanapuya 'abehega ba'idagu 'apaihowa mahemahetena 'ami lema weyahina , ma tasidaowedi taudi tohekalesiyao weyahidi sipaipaihowa , ta weyahina tomota Keliso sihepwatuweya .
47008024	Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma tasidaowedi wahelau bwaibwainidi , ma boda hekalesiya baibaiwadi si'ahwa moisaegomi , ma wete si'ahwa moisaemai 'ima hepwatu 'imi helauina weyahina .
47009001	Sahena leta 'oinega yahenuwa laguwegomi 'imi 'ehele tohekalesiyao weyahidi , weyahina wasanapu pwaiya ,
47009002	ma wete yasanapugomiya 'abehega 'eheleina weyahina wayaliyaya , 'oinega 'omi ya'ahwa bwebwe'anegomiya meMasidoniya 'oidiya , yagwaeya , “ Tupwa Akaya 'oina taudi meKolinita sihetapewa pwaiya ta 'idi helau si'atububuya bolime 'igumwala 'oina . ” Coinega baibaiwadi 'oidiyega wete gide sipaipaihowa 'ese .
47009003	Geya nuwagu ma 'igu hepwatu weyahimi tomota si'ahwa 'abo'abowegau , 'oinega tasidaowedi yahesumanediwa sabi 'abihetegomi ma 'imi helauina wa'atububu , gide 'imi hetapewa yahepwaileya 'oidiya .
47009004	Ceguma 'abwa tupwana meMasidoniya ba'idagwao 'atauyawa ma si'italobegomi 'imi helau geya wa'atububu , bewa 'ebedeba mwadina 'oiguwa ma wete 'oimiya , 'igu hepwaila nugetaina weyahina .
47009005	Coinega yanuwatuhuya 'abehega 'ilobwaineya ma tasidaowedi sida tauyawa nugeta sabi 'abihetegomi 'imi helauina wagwae hemisaeya 'ana 'atububu weyahina , ma taugu tuta muliyetega wete yatauyawa . Weyahina sahena lohesuhesumana 'oinega wahehelau ma hesi 'atetagwalega .
47009006	Cehele 'ana nuwatuhu gide tanoha . Tauna 'idauna 'i'iuna 'i'etahi 'i'iuna , ma tauna 'idauna madouna 'i'etahi madouna .
47009007	Coinega 'omi 'aigeda 'aigeda tauna 'ina nuwatuhu 'oinega 'i'ehele , geya 'abehega lohesuhesumanega nuwana he'i'imega , ma hesi 'atetagwalega , ta bewa Yehoba 'ina 'ebe yaliyaya .
47009008	Ma Yehobaina sowasowahina ma 'ehele mabwaiyana 'ida losiwa 'oimiya , eema tuta baibaiwana sowasowahimi , ma wete ma'ana tupwa madouna 'imi 'ehele weyahina .
47009009	Caigeda gwae lelelelena Buki He'asisi 'oina Yehoba weyahina 'igwaeya , “ Ceheleyao 'isaweyaneya towewelohe hali tupwa ma hali tupwa 'oidiya , tauna mumugana dumwaluna ta miyamiya hatayana . ”
47009010	Tauna hewana ma 'e'ahai 'adi To'ehele 'imi ginaulao 'i'ebwaegomi ma simadou bwaibwaina , ma mumugami bwebwe'ana 'oinega 'etahi madouna waloba ,
47009011	ma 'imi wasawasa 'oinega sowasowahimi tobwatobwa madouna waheguyaiyedi , ma wete 'imi helauina tauma 'abwa 'a'ehele tohewewelohe 'oidiya , ta 'oinega taudi siloyauwedo madouna Yehoba 'oina .
47009012	Cimi helau bewa 'oinega tohekalesiyao wewelohedi 'adi lema silobaloba , ma wete Yehoba 'ana hepwatu madouna 'ilatu .
47009013	Ma toweweloheyedi sida yaliyaya 'adi lema weyahina , ma hali boda wete 'adi lema 'ausaladi 'oimiyega weyahina , ma 'imi hematamatana Keliso wasana 'oina weyahina sida 'ahwa moisa , ma wete Yehoba sida hepwatuwe ,
47009014	ma wete sida 'ahwa'ahwanoi ma'idi nuwa'ewa weyahimi , Yehoba 'ina helau madouna 'atemiya 'ilaguya weyahina .
47009015	Moisa , Yehoba 'oina taloyauwedo 'ina helau madou hedade weyahina .
47010001	Taugu Paulo ya'ahwa'ahwanoi 'oimiya , gide Keliso 'ina mumuga nuhana 'oinega , weyahina 'omi wagwaeya , “ Paulo 'ina mumuga nuhana 'eguma ba'idadai tada hegwaegwae , ma hesi bwagega 'iheliyegita . ”
47010002	Coinega ya'ahwanoi 'oimiya ma wamumuga dumwalu , 'amuge ma 'igu tauyawa 'oimiya 'oina yaheliyegomi , gidemusa nata yaheliyedi taudi sigwaeya , “ Paulo tauna 'ina nuwatuhu 'ipaipaihowa gide tuwa mebale'u 'idi paihowa . ”
47010003	Moisa , bale'uwa tamiyamiya , ma hesi 'ida paihowa geya mebale'u gide .
47010004	Wete 'ida tobwatobwa geya mebale'u 'idi tobwatobwa 'aleha gidemusa , ma hesi 'ida tobwatobwa hagana ta 'oidiyega Tomudulele 'ina 'ebeloinao tahewaiwai sinedi , Yehoba 'ina waiwaiyega .
47010005	Cida tobwatobwaedi 'oidiyega sowasowahida tahewaiwaisine mumuga galana , he'ohe'ohe , ma gwae hane , beno ginaulaedi Yehoba 'ana hemisa si'etobodeya , ma hesi tomota 'idi nuwatuhuwao tagibuidi ma Keliso 'ina gwae sida hematamatanedi .
47010006	Coinega 'eguma tutaina wahematamatana bwaibwaina , taudi tologwahataowedi 'adi loina 'oidega siloba .
47010007	Comi tomota 'adi 'itamo 'oina wa'e'ebubuna , ma to'aha 'atediyega geya wasanapu . Ceguma taiya 'igwae hane 'abehega tauna Keliso 'ina boda , sowasowana 'inuwatuhu yahimai 'abehega tauma wete Keliso 'ina bodao ,
47010008	ta loina Yehoba 'i'ebwaemaiya sabi 'abihetegomi ma hesi geya sabi 'abihegalegomi , ma 'eguma yagwaehane hedade 'igu loinaina weyahina , sahena wete 'ebedeba mwadina yalobaloba .
47010009	Sahena leta waiwaidi 'oidiyega ya'abi'abihe matautegomi ,
47010010	gide tupwana tomota sigwae , “ Paulo 'ina leta 'oidiyega 'iheliyegita ma hesi 'eguma matada 'igwaegwae , 'ana 'ita we'ana tuwa , ma 'ina gwae geya bwebwe'ana . ”
47010011	Coinega togwaeyedi sowasowana sinuwatuhuyahi 'abehega to'aha bwagega 'igu leta 'oidiyega yahehegwaegwae nata yapaihowa tuwa , 'eguma to tuta yatautauyawa 'oimiya .
47010012	Sahena yahehegwaegomi yagwae , “ Taugu Paulo 'igu mumuga 'ausalana , ” gide tupwana tomota sigwae , “ Tauma 'ima mumuga bwebwe'ana hedada , ta 'iyamayao geya bwebwe'ana . ” Cidi gwaeyedi gide tuwa yauyauledi 'idi gwae .
47010013	Ma taugu sahena yagwaegwae hane ginaula baibaiwadi weyahidi , beno namo 'igu paihowaina Yehoba 'i'ebwaegauwa weyahina yagwae hanehane , ma 'igu paihowaina 'asa tupwana 'oidiya ma 'omi wete 'oimiya .
47010014	Coinega sowasowagu ma 'oimiya yaloina . Moisa , 'omi 'igu 'ebeloina 'alona , weyahina taugu wasa bwebwe'ana Keliso weyahina ya'ewa nugeteya 'oimiya .
47010015	Geya 'abehega hali tomota 'idi paihowa 'oimiya weyahina yagwae hane , taugu tuwa 'igu paihowa weyahina , ma yanuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega 'eguma 'imi hemisa 'imadou , nata 'igu paihowa 'oimiya wete 'imadou hedade ,
47010016	'oinega nuwanuwagu wasa bwebwe'ana yalohatotowe taudi 'asa bwagabwaga 'oidiya , ma hesi gesowana yagwaehane 'eguma yapaihowa tuwa taudi wasa bwebwe'ana sihesagoha pwaiya 'oidiya .
47010017	“ Ceguma taiya nuwanuwana ma 'igwae hanehane , 'ilobwaineya ma Bada namo weyahina 'ida gwae , ”
47010018	Wete 'eguma taiya taunamo 'i'ahwa bwebwe'ane , Yehoba geya'abwa 'iyaliyaliyaya weyahina . Ma hesi 'eguma Yehoba tomota 'i'ahwa bwebwe'ane , nata 'ebeyaliyaya .
47011001	Cigu gwae bewa gide yauyaule yagwaegwae , ma hesi 'eguma wa'alama'i'ita , 'igu nuwatuhu yahepwaila latuwe 'oimiya .
47011002	Weyahina nuwanuwagu 'omi , gidemusa Yehoba nuwanuwana tauda , 'oinega yagwae hemisaegomiya Keliso 'oina , 'omi gidemusa gumalaulau 'aigeda 'ina mumuga bwebwe'ana mabwaiyana , ma loheya ba'idana sihai .
47011003	Ma hesi ya'ateyohowa weyahimi , 'amuge ma 'imi nuwatuhu si'wani ma 'imi 'atetagwala Keliso 'oina wa'ebesine , gide mwalo mwata Ibe 'i'aboweya 'ina gwae hotohoto 'oinega , ta Ibeina 'iwe'a .
47011004	Coinega 'eguma taiya 'itautauyawa ma Yesu tetelina 'oimiya 'ilohatotowe ma geya tauma 'ima lohatoto gide , tauna 'oina watagwa tagwalegomi . Comi wasa bwebwe'ana 'oina watagwala pwaiyegomiya ta Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oimiya walotohoya , ma tuwa hali tetela ma hali yaluyaluwa 'oidiya watagwa tagwalegomi .
47011005	Cimi tologuguyao hauhaudiyedi 'omi wanuwatuhuya 'abehega sihane sinegauwa , ma hesi geya sowasowahidi .
47011006	Ceguma geya yada gwae bwaibwaina , ma hesi yasanapu moisa ma tuta mabwaiyana 'igu sanapuina yahe'ita pwaidiya 'oimiya .
47011007	Mwalo Yehoba wasana 'oimiya yalohatotoweya , ma geya 'eta maisa weyahina yagwaegwae 'oimiya , 'oinega wanuwatuhuya yalopuiya weyahina taugu ya'abi suluhegauwa ma 'abehega 'omi wahane .
47011008	Cana 'ita gide yayagayagaha hali hekalesiyao 'oidiyega , weyahina mane si'ebwaegauwa ma 'abehega 'omi weyahimi yapaihowa .
47011009	Wete tutaina 'imi tupwa yamiyamiya ma yagomagomale geya yada 'ahwanoiya 'oimiya , ma hesi tupwana tasidao Masidoniya 'oinega sitauyama ta lema si'ebwaegauwa ; weyahina geya nuwagu ma mwau 'oimiya yalagu 'agu 'e'ahai weyahina . Mwalo geya 'aigeda mwau 'oimiya yalagu , ma tuta sinaonaoma 'oidiya wete sahena yalagulagu .
47011010	Cigu gwae hane bewa gwae moisa Keliso 'oinega , ma sahena 'aigeda taiya 'igu gwae bewa 'i'eto'etobode Akaya tupwanao mabwaiyadi 'oidiya .
47011011	Ma to'aha huhuna ? Nuwana 'igu gwae bewa weyahina ta yalogwahategomiya ? Sahena ! Yehoba 'isanapu bwaibwainigauwa yahelauwegomiya .
47011012	Wete 'igu paihowa weyahimi tuwa 'abwa yada paipaihowa , ma 'oinega ya'abihe lolagudi taudi togwae gagasa sigwaeya 'abehega 'idi paihowa 'oimiya gide taugu 'igu paihowa .
47011013	Weyahina to'abowedi 'adi 'ita gide Keliso 'ana tohepwailao ma hesi galana sipaipaihowa .
47011014	Taudi gide Seitani , mumugana galana , ma hesi 'ana 'ita 'ibuiya gide anelose 'asi'asilalana .
47011015	Coinega sahena nuwami 'ihehenainaida 'eguma Seitani 'ina topaihowao wete 'adi 'ita sibuidi ma topaihowa dumwaludi gide . Ma tuwa , tuta 'ebelosaloha 'oina 'idi mumuga galadi weyahidi taudi nata sigala hedade .
47011016	Yada hegwaegomi wete sahena wa'ahwa'ahwa yauyaulegau , ma 'eguma wa'ahwa yauyaulegau tuwa , 'ausala , ma 'igu gwae yauyaule wahesagohe , ma 'oinega tupwana yada gwae gagasa .
47011017	Cigu gwae gagasa bewa geya 'ida Bada 'ina loinega , ma hesi yauyaulegu tuwa .
47011018	Weyahina tomota mabwaiyadi sigwaegwae gagasa ginaula bale'u weyahidi , 'oinega taugu wete yada gwae gagasa taudi gide .
47011019	Ma 'omi hesi sanasanapumi ta tomota yauyauleidi 'oidiya wa'atetagwala ,
47011020	'eguma paihowa mwaudi si'ebwaegomi , ma 'oinega 'oimiyega siyagayagaha , ma si'abowegomiya , ma ma'idi nuwahane manimiya sisapi .
47011021	Ma taugu we'awe'agu , 'oinega geya yada sapigomiya , ta bewa 'ebedeba mwadina 'oiguwa . Ta 'eguma 'imi tologuguyaedi to'aha weyahidi sigwaegwae gagasa , hesi tuwa taugu yahetohe yauyaule ma yagwae gagasa ginaulaedi weyahidi .
47011022	Ceguma taudi meIbeliu , taugu gide . Ceguma taudi Isileli 'ina susuwao , taugu gide . Ceguma taudi Ebalahamo tubunao , taugu gide .
47011023	Ceguma taudi Keliso 'ina hewahewaliyao bwebwe'adi , taugu 'ina hewali bwebwe'ana hedade . Cigu gwae bewa gide yauyauleigu . Cigu guibiga 'oinega yanugeta sinediya , 'igu luhu deliya baibaiwa hedade , 'agu sapiyao wete baibaiwana ta tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiyega 'abehega tuwa nata ya'amasa .
47011024	MeYudiya balaeyega sisapigauwa , 'ana baibaiwa teti naini , ta sapiina bewa gide ma nima 'ai'aigeda yalobediya .
47011025	Matoi wete sihunugauwa 'aiwe 'oidiyega , ma'aigeda dimwega sihunu dadanegauwa , matoi waga 'oinega yadamana ni'u 'awawa , ma sabwelo 'aigeda ma nihuwana 'aigeda 'idoegauwa .
47011026	Ma wete 'igu 'adau 'oidiyega 'ebehesilae yalobediya we'aha madoudi ma toyagahao 'oidiyega , ma 'igu bodao meYudiya 'oidiyega , ma taudi geya meYudiya 'oidiyega , ta 'asa madoudi 'oidiyega , ta pwatula 'oidiya , ta wete ni'u 'awawa , ma wete tasidao 'abo'aboidi 'oidiyega ,
47011027	'ima paihowa madouna , ma miyamwau 'adi tuta 'oidiya , nihuwana geya yada 'enowa , ma gomale ta tani'oyahala , wete tuta tupwana baibaiwana geya 'agumo , ta geya 'igu hadamo , ma geya 'agu 'wamamo tuta gogai 'oidiya .
47011028	Ma wete sabwelo mabwaiyana 'oidiya yanuwanuwatuhu madouna tohekalesiyao tupwa baibaiwadi weyahimi .
47011029	Coinega 'eguma taiya 'iwe'a , taugu wete gide yawe'a , ma 'eguma taiya 'ebetupa 'oina 'ibe'u , beno 'igu 'ebe nuwagala .
47011030	Ma wa'ita , 'igu gwae gagasa 'igu we'aomo weyahidi .
47011031	Yehoba tauna 'ida Bada Yesu tamana tada hepwatuwe hataya , ma tauna 'isanasanapugau 'abehega 'igu he'ote'otetela bewa gwae moisa .
47011032	Mwalo , kini Alesitasi 'ina tuta toloina 'aigeda 'asa Damasiko 'oina 'itoho waiwai ma 'abehega ma'ina tolo'alehao si'abiyahigau ,
47011033	ma hesi 'iyagwao si'abihetegauwa , ta 'ali 'ana 'ahwa'eda tabwaninega siso'eya , ta 'oinega silagu suluhegauwa kodowega bale'uwa , ta 'agu 'alehaowedi 'oidiyega yadena .
47012001	Sowasowahigu ma yagwae gagasa , ma gagasa geya wete 'eta 'ina lemamo , ma hesi tuwa yagwae gagasa 'igu 'eno'ita'ita weyahina 'ida Bada 'oinega .
47012002	Caigeda Keliso 'ina loheya yasanasanapu , tauna bolime potini sigumwala 'oina Yehoba 'itoeya galewa , nuwana 'wapina bo yaluyaluwanamo , 'iyamuge , Yehobamo 'isanasanapu . Citoeya ta 'ihaneya galewa 'aigeda 'oina , ta 'ihaneya wete galewa heluwena , ma wete 'ihaneya galewa hetoina 'oina .
47012003	Yasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba loheyaina 'itoeya 'ina tupwa bwebwe'ana ta wasawasaina 'oina , ma nuwana 'wapina bo yaluyaluwanamo , geya yasanapu . Yehobamo 'isanasanapu .
47012004	Ma loheyaina megalewa 'idi gwae tupwana 'ihesagohediya , ma geya sowasowahina ma 'igwae latuwedi weyahina he'ahe'asisidi .
47012005	Sanapuina weyahina yagwae gagasa , ma sahena taugu weyahigu yagwaegwae gagasa . Beno namo 'igu we'ao weyahidi yada gwae gagasa .
47012006	Ma hesi 'eguma to tuta yagwae gagasa , beno gwae moisa ma geya gwae yauyaule . Ma tuwa sahena yagwaegwae gagasa , weyahina nuwanuwagu ma wanuwanuwatuhu to'aha 'igu paihowa wa'itediya , nuwana 'igu gwae wahesagohediya , bewa namo weyahidi , ma sahena to'aha wete weyahigu .
47012007	Ma Yehoba geya nuwana ma yanuwahane 'igu 'eno'ita'ita bwebwe'adi weyahidi . Coinega ginaula 'aigeda Seitani 'oinega 'i'ebwaegauwa , ta 'alogu 'ana lotohona gide ma'ana 'aliliya , ta yanuwanuwagala , ma geya sowasowahigu yanuwahane .
47012008	Mwauina bewa weyahina matoi Yehoba ya'ahwanoiyeya ma 'i'ewayahule .
47012009	Ma 'igu 'ahwanoiina 'ihemaiseya 'igwaeya , “ Sahena . Ma hesi 'igu helaumo sowasowahiu , ta 'ino we'a 'oina 'igu waiwai 'ulotohoya 'abehega sowasowahina . ” Coinega 'igu we'ao weyahidi yayaliyaliyaya ma yada gwae gagasa , weyahina 'igu tuta we'a 'oidiya Keliso 'ina waiwai 'oiguwa 'imiyamiya .
47012010	Coinega Keliso weyahina yatagwatagwala mwau baibaiwana 'oidiya , gide we'a 'ahwa galagala , tuta mwau , 'aleha , hesilae . Weyahina 'eguma yawe'a bewa 'igu 'ebehewaiwai !
47012011	Moisa , 'omi 'imi gwae weyahina yahepwaila pwaiya gide yauyauleigu . Cilobwainegomiya wa'ahwa bwebwe'anegau , ma hesi wa'ahwa galegalegauwa , eeta 'imi tohepwailao hauhaudi wa'ahwa bwebwe'anediya .
47012012	Cila'ilalaedi matamiya ma'igu he'alama'i'ita yapaihowediya , beno ginaula 'ebehenainaida ma paihowa waiwaidi , ma 'oidiyega wada sanapugau 'abehega taugu Keliso 'ana tohepwaila moisa .
47012013	Wete 'igu paihowa weyahimi tuwa gide 'igu paihowa hekalesiyao mabwaiyadi weyahidi , ma 'aigedamo ginaula geya 'oimiya yapaihowa , 'agu lema mane ya'ewa'ewa hekalesiyao baibaiwadi 'oidiyega , ma 'omi 'oimiyega geya . Ciyagwao , ya'ahwanoi 'oimiya ma 'igu pui bewa wanuwasam .
47012014	Tuta 'i'iuna ma yatauyawa 'oimiya . Mwalo sauga 'eluwa yahabo'enegomiya , ma bewa nata hetoina yatauya , ma sahena 'aigeda wete mwau yalagulagu 'oimiya 'agu lema weyahina , ma hesi 'omi tuwa nuwanuwagu , ma geya nuwagu 'imi tobwatobwa . Gwagwama geya lema sida 'ebwaediya tamadiyao 'oidiya , ta tamadiyao hesi si'e'ehele natudiyao 'oidiya , 'oinega taugu 'ilobwainegauwa ma 'omi natugwao 'oimiya yada 'e'ehele .
47012015	Yatagwala pwaiya ma 'igu tobwatobwa ma 'igu tuta mayawasigu wete yada 'eheleya yaluyaluwami sabi 'abihetedi . Taugu 'igu helau 'oimiya madouna , 'oinega togidega ta 'oinega 'omi 'imi helau 'oiguwa 'i'iuna tuwa ?
47012016	Ma tupwami wagwae , “ Paulo 'ima tobwatobwa geya 'ida 'ewediya , ma hesi 'ina sanapu madouna 'oinega 'i'abowemaiya . ”
47012017	Geya ! Loheloheyaedi yahesumanediwa , 'igu loinega togidega si'abo 'esa ? Geya , 'awa ?
47012018	Mwalo Taito yaloineya ta tasidai 'aigeda ba'idana yahesumanediwa 'oimiya . To'aha Taito 'ina 'abo 'oimiya ? Taito ma taugu 'ima nuwatuhu ta 'ima mumuga 'oimiya mahemahetena 'awa ?
47012019	Ciyagwao , sahena wanuwanuwatuhu 'abehega 'igu gwae bewa 'oidiyega ya'ahwa bwebwe'anegau matamiya . Geya , ma hesi mabwaiyana Yehoba matana Keliso 'ina gwae yagwaegwaeneyawa sabi 'abihe waiwaiyegomi .
47012020	Moisa , ya'ateyohowa , ta geya nuwagu yatauyawa ma 'imi mumuga ya'ita lobeya 'abehega geya bwebwe'ana , ma 'igu tauyawa weyahina wanuwagala , 'eguma taumimo wahe'ohe'ohena ma wahe'ipi'ipi ma wagamwasowala , nuwana walotobwatobwa hedade , ma 'iyamiyao wa'ahwa galagalaedi , ma wanuwahane , nuwana wapaihowa bwagabwaga .
47012021	Cigu 'ateyohoina 'abehega 'eguma yatauya hilawa 'oimiya ma Yehoba 'ebedeba mwadina 'i'ebwaegau matamiya , ma taudi mwalo sipuiya , ma 'idi mumuga bi'ibi'ina ta pui ta ganawala 'oidiyega geya wanuwabui , taudi si'abihenuwa mwauwegau , ma weyahidi yada dou .
47013001	Nata yahabo'enegomi , beno hetoina 'igu habo'ena 'oimiya . Ceguma taiyawedi nuwanuwadi ma 'iyadaina 'aigeda 'oina siyatala , 'ilobwaineya ma tomota 'eluwa bo 'etoi sihepwaila mahemahetena 'ina pui weyahina .
47013002	Mwalo 'igu habo'ena heluwena 'oina 'imi topuiyedi ma baibaiwami yalohatotogomiya , gidemusa tuwa bewa bwaga yamiyamiya ma yahenuwa laguwegomi 'abehega 'eguma yatauya hilawa 'oimiya loina mwauna ya'ebwaedi topuiyedi mwalo ma tupwadi wete ba'idadiyao .
47013003	Beno 'ebe'ita 'oimiya ma 'oinega wasanapugau 'abehega Keliso 'oiguwega 'igwaegwae . Tauna Kelisoina 'ina paihowa 'oimiya geya we'ega ma hesi waiwaina .
47013004	Moisa si'abi hekeloseya gide loheya we'awe'ana , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina waiwaiyega mayawasina 'imiyamiya . Tauma wete wahima we'adi tauna wahina gide , ma Keliso yawasina 'oinega sowasowahima 'aloinegomi , Yehoba 'ina waiwaiyega .
47013005	Coinega waboi watohogemi , togidega Keliso 'ana hemisa wa'abiyahiya , bo geya . Togidega , wasanapuya 'abehega Keliso 'atemiya 'imiyamiya , ma 'eguma geya , beno weyahina geya 'imi hemisamo .
47013006	Yahemisa wete ma 'eguma watohomai wasanapumai 'abehega geya 'ada we'a .
47013007	Tauma 'a'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina ma 'abehega sahena wapuipui , geya 'abehega wa'ahwa tohepwaila moisemai , ta 'eguma tomota geya si'ahwa tohepwaila moisemai , 'ada yaliyaya tuwa 'omi 'imi mumuga dumwaluna weyahina .
47013008	Weyahina tauma geya sowasowahima mumuga dumwaludi 'a'etobodedi , ma hesi ginaula dumwaludi weyahidi 'apaipaihowa .
47013009	Coinega 'ima we'ao 'oidiya 'ayaliyaliyaya 'eguma 'omi wahewaiwai , ma wete 'a'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina ma watoholo pa'ala bwaibwaina .
47013010	Cimi leta bewa bwagega yalelediwa ma 'eguma tutaina yatauyawa sahena yaloiloina pa'ala 'oimiya , weyahina loinaina 'ida Badaina 'i'ebwaegauwa geya sabi 'abihegalegomi , ma hesi sabi 'abihe waiwaiyegomi .
47013011	Ciyagwao kaiyoni . Cigu lohatoto wada hesagohe ma wanuwabui . Wete 'imi nuwatuhu 'aigeda 'oinega wada miya siwaloha , ma Yehoba tauna helau ma nuwadaumwala huhudi ba'idamiu wada miya yaliyaya .
47013012	Ciyamiyao ba'idamiyao wa'atusapwaligomi lotohona bwebwe'ana 'oinega .
47013013	Keliso 'ana tohemisao 'ebwa 'idi helau 'oimiya .
47013014	Bada Yesu Keliso mabwaiyami 'i'atemuyemuyegomi ma Yehoba 'ihelauwegomi ma Yaluyaluwa Tabuna wete ba'idamiu wahe'iya'iyagu moisa . Taugu Paulo .
48001001	Taugu Paulo Yesu Keliso 'ana tohepwaila 'aigeda , ta 'igu hetohepwaila geya tomota 'idi hesinuwega ma hesi Yesu 'ina hesinuwega , ma Tamada Yehoba wete 'ina hesinuwa . Tauna Yesu Keliso 'amasega 'igihetoholo hileya .
48001002	Ma baibaiwadi tasidaowedi mahetegwao 'ebwa 'amiyamiya , 'imi leta 'ahewasaeyawa 'omi totapwalolo , boda 'aigeda 'aigeda tupwa Galetiya 'alona , 'oimiya .
48001003	Tamada Yehoba ta 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'idi helauwega tuwa wamiya bwebwe'ana .
48001004	Weyahina Tamada Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu bewa gidemusa , eeta Yesu tauna 'itagwaleya ta 'i'amasa 'ida puiyao weyahidi , ma 'oinega tuta bewa galana 'ina waiwaiyega sowasowana 'i'abihetegita .
48001005	Eeta weyahina Yehoba 'oina tada hepwatu hataya . Emeni .
48001006	Cebe nuwahenainaida bewa 'oiguwa , weyahina mwalo Yehoba 'ihesinuwegomiya ma 'abehega helau Keliso 'oinega waloba , 'oinega tetelinaina wahemisaeya , ma hesi walomwayamwayauwa bewa tuwa ta walogwahateya , ta hali tetela wahemisaeya .
48001007	Moisa , Tetela Bwebwe'ana 'aigeda tuwa , ma geya wete 'eta tetela 'imiyamiya , ma hesi tupwana tomota sigihe'wanigomiya weyahina nuwanuwadi ma Keliso tetelina sigibuidi ma 'oinega si'abowegomi .
48001008	Keliso tetelina wahesagohe nugeteya beno moisa , 'oinega geya'abwa 'aigeda taiya hali tetela 'ida 'ebwa'ebwaegomi . Tauma , bo aneloseyao galewega geya'abwa hali tetela 'a'ebwa'ebwaegomi . Ma 'eguma taiya tetela bwebwe'ana 'ilagubui nata mwau 'iloba Yehoba 'oinega .
48001009	Mwalo 'ahepwaila pwaiya 'oimiya , ma bewa wete yahepwaila hila 'abehega 'eguma taiya hali tetela 'i'ebwaegomi , nata muya 'iloba Yehoba 'oinega .
48001010	Togidega , tomota 'adi hepwatu weyahina yanuwanuwatuhu , bo Yehoba 'ana hepwatu ? Ta 'eguma tomota 'idi nuwatuhu yapaipaihowa , geya sawasawahigu ma Keliso weyahina yahetopaihowa .
48001011	Ciyagwao , wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tetela bwebwe'ana yahepwaileyawa geya tomota 'oidiyega ,
48001012	weyahina geya tomota 'idi hepwailao , nuwana 'idi he'itao 'oidiyega , ma hesi Yesu Keliso 'ina he'ita 'oiguwa 'oinega .
48001013	Ta 'igu mumuga mwalo , tutaina meYudiya 'idi boda 'alona yamiyamiya , wahesagoheya , 'abehega Yehoba 'ina tohekalesiyao ya'abihemuya hedadediya ta nuwanuwagu yamutudi .
48001014	Coinega 'iyagwao Yudiya 'alona yahewaiwai sinediya , weyahina tubudao 'idi mumuga weyahina yahetapewa madouna ta 'iyagwao 'idi hetapewa tupwana tuwa .
48001015	Tutaina geya yatole , ma mwalo hene Yehoba 'ina helauwega 'ihesinuwa nugetegauwa ,
48001016	eeta tauna 'ina nuwatuhuwega Natuna 'oiguwa 'ihe'itaeya , ma yahetohepwaila weyahina tupwa ganamuli 'oidiya . Coinega geya yatautauya tomota 'oidiya sabi hesilala tetela bewa weyahina .
48001017	Geya yatauya Yelusalema Keliso 'ana tohepwaila nugenugetadi 'oidiya , ma hesi yatauya Alebiya , eeta nobwa yamiyamiya 'ana siga yalohihila Damasiko 'oina .
48001018	Coinega bolime 'etoi mulina yahaneya Yelusalema ta Pita yahabo'eneya , eeta nobwa mahetegu sabwelo pipitini 'amiyamiya .
48001019	Ma Keliso 'ana tohepwailao baibaiwadi geya ya'itadi . Beno tuwa Yemesa , tauna 'ida Badaina tasina .
48001020	Cigu gwae bewa Tamada matana yaleleyawa , geya 'aigeda wete 'abo .
48001021	Coinega Yelusalema ya'ebesineya ma yatauya Siliya ma Silisiya 'idi tupwa 'oidiya .
48001022	Ta tutaedi 'oidiya Keliso 'ina tohekalesiyao Yudiya tupwanao 'oidiya manigu geya sida sanapuya .
48001023	Beno tuwa teteligu sihesagoheya 'abehega “ Tauna mwalo 'igihegihe muyegita , ma 'inuwabui pwaiya , ta tetelina mwalo 'i'etobodeya tuta bewa 'iloguguyaeya . ”
48001024	Coinega tohekalesiyaowedi Yehoba sihepwatuweya 'igu nuwabui weyahina .
48002001	Coinega bolime potini sigumwala , Banaba mahetegu 'ahanehila Yelusalema , ta wete Taito yatoeya , ba'idamai 'ahaneya .
48002002	Ta 'igu tauya lamuna weyahina Yehoba 'ihe'itegauwa 'abehega 'ilobwainegauwa ma yahane Yelusalema , ee yahaneya , yatauya tohekalesiyao 'idi tohanugetao 'oidiya , eeta 'aboimamo 'ahehegwaegwae , ta tetelaina yaloguguyaeya tupwa ganamuli toguguyou 'oidiya yahepwaileya tohanugetaowedi 'oidiya , weyahina genuwagu ma 'igu guguyaina mwalo gide loguguya besobeso , eeta tohanugetaedi sitagwala 'igu loguguyaina 'oina .
48002003	Ma Taito 'i'wayabumaiya ta 'ahaneya Yelusalema , tauna gwama Gilisi 'aigeda , geya gwama Yudiya , ma hesi tohanugetaowedi geya Taitoina siloinae ma 'abehega 'wapina si'upwa 'ana 'ila'ilala gidemusa meYudiya taudi .
48002004	Ma 'iyadao tupwadi 'abo'abodi silugu pwaima , nuwanuwadi si'ita 'ida miya bwebwe'ana Yesu Keliso mahetemai , ta taudi geya tohemisa moisa , weyahina nuwanuwadi ma loina mwauna si'ebwaemai .
48002005	Coinega 'idi loina mabwaiyana 'alogwahatediya , ma geya 'eta to'aha 'oina 'atagwala . Geya'abwa 'ida tetelaina moisa weyahimi silagulagubui .
48002006	Ma wete taudi tohekalesiyao sihesaniyediya 'abehega 'idi tohanugetao , taudi geya 'eta wete loheposeyana silagulagu 'igu guguya 'oina . Ma taugu 'igu nuwatuhu 'abehega geya ginaula madouna 'eguma taudi sihesaniyediya tohanugetao bo to'aha , weyahina tomota mabwaiyada mahemahetena Yehoba matana .
48002007	Moisa , tohanugetaedi Yehoba 'ina heguheguyai 'oima si'ita lobeya 'abehega taugu tetela bwebwe'ana yalologuguyae taudi toguguyou 'oidiya , ma Pita hesi meYudiya daisidimo 'oidiya 'ilologuguya .
48002008	Weyahina Yehoba Pita waiwai 'i'ebwaeya 'ina paihowa meYudiya weyahidi , ma taugu wete gidemusa waiwai 'i'ebwaegauwa 'igu paihowa toguguyou weyahidi .
48002009	Coinega tohanugetaedi , Yemesa ma Pita ma Yoni , taudi Yehoba 'ina helau 'oiguwa si'ita lobeya , eeta sitagwala Banaba ma taugu 'oima , ta mahetemayao 'anima'abiya . Ee , sitetoiyedi tohekalesiyao si'ahwa tonugetaediya , sitetoiyedi sitagwala 'oima ma 'abehega taugu ma Banaba 'atauya tomiya ganamuli 'oidiya , ma taudi hesi sitauya meYudiya dimo 'oidiya .
48002010	Ta 'aigeda nuwatuhu weyahina sihenuwatuhu yahimaiya , beno wewelohe 'adi lema , ma to'aha 'oinega sito'uto'upa 'a'ebwaedi . Nuwatuhu bewa 'ibwebwe'ana hedadeya eeta tuta mabwaiyana yahetahetapewa waiwai weyahina .
48002011	Ta muliyetega tutaina Pita 'itauyama Anitioki 'oina , ma nobwa 'ina mumuga geya 'idumwalu , 'oinega yagwae debeya 'ina mumuga galana weyahina .
48002012	Moisa , 'ina tauya nugetama 'oina 'ina mumuga bwebwe'ana , eeta tohekalesiyao taudi 'asa ganamuli tomotaedi 'i'ahwa 'iya'iyaguwediya ma ba'idanao si'ai'ai , ma hesi muliyetega tupwadi Yemesa 'ina bodao meYudiya sinaoma , ta Pita meYudiyaedi 'imatautediya , eeta 'oinega 'ina 'ai'ai taudi 'asa ganamuli tomotaedi mahetenao 'ilogwahateya , ta 'i'ebesinediya . Beno Pita 'ina pui .
48002013	Coinega meYudiya baibaiwadi wete si'abowa , ta Banaba wete 'idi 'aboina 'imuliyeya , beno 'abehega tohekalesiyao taudi 'asa ganamuli 'oidiyega geya'abwa sida 'ai'ai mahetediyao .
48002014	Coinega taugu yasanapuya 'abehega Pita ma bodaedi Keliso tetelina geya simuliya moisa , eeta mabwaiyadi matadiya Pita yahesilaleya , yagwaeya , “ Ciyagu , 'owa Yudiya gwamaina ma tupwana tuta meYudiya 'idi mumuga wa'ebe'ebesine , ma 'asa ganamuli mumugadi 'umulimuliyedi , 'oinega togidega ma taudi hali 'asa tomotaedi 'ugilohihili 'esedi 'abehega Yudiya mumugaina simuliye ? ”
48002015	Taudi geya meYudiya 'asa ganamuli 'oidiya togala tuwa , ma hesi tauda meYudiya ,
48002016	eeta tasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba sowasowana mabwaiyada 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita geya Mosese 'ina loina 'ana hematamatana 'oinega , ma hesi Yesu Keliso 'ana hemisa 'oinega . Weyahina tauda 'ida hemisa Yesu Keliso 'oina talaguya ma 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita . Ma hesi 'ida hemisa geya Mosese 'ina loina 'ana hematamatana 'oina talagulagu , weyahina Yehoba geya 'eta tomota 'i'ahwa'ahwa bwebwe'ane Mosese 'ina loina 'ana hematamatana 'oinega .
48002017	Mabwaiyada meYudiya nuwanuwada ma Keliso 'ina paihowa 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita . Ma 'eguma 'eta tuta tawe'a bo tapui , togidega bewa , nuwana Keliso 'i'abihe puiyegita ? Geya !
48002018	Taugu 'eguma yalohihila ta 'igu hemisa Mosese 'ina loinao 'oidiya yalagu , beno yagala .
48002019	Weyahina Mosese 'ina loina 'ilohe'amasi pwaigauwa , eeta muliyetega 'ina waiwai 'oiguwega 'igumwala , ma 'abehega yawasi moisa yaloba Yehoba weyahina .
48002020	Moisa , Keliso mahetegu si'abihe kelose pwaimaiya , 'oinega 'ama'amasigu , ma geya taugu yawasiguwega ma hesi Keliso yawasina 'oiguwa 'imiyamiya . Beno tuwa yamiyamiya , yawasiguina lamuna beno 'igu hemisa Yehoba Natuna 'oina . Weyahina Yesuina 'ina helauwega tauna 'itagwaleya ta weyahigu 'i'amasa .
48002021	Coinega geya'abwa Yehoba 'ina helauina yalologwahate . Geya'abwa tanuwanuwatuhu 'abehega Mosese 'ina loinao 'adi hematamatana 'oinega Yehoba 'ida 'ahwa bwebwe'anegita . Beno gide Keliso 'ina 'amasaina 'iheginaula besobeso .
48003001	Comi meGaletiya yauyauleimi ! Taiya hede 'obega 'i'abihe 'wanigemiya ? Mwalo 'ahe'itegomiya ta nuwami 'isabwalena moisa Yesu Keliso weyahina , 'abehega keloseya 'i'amasa , ma 'iyamo wanuwanaideya ! Coinega wanuwanuwatuhu 'abehega Mosese 'ina loina 'ana hematamatanega 'abihetena waloba ?
48003002	Coinega 'aigeda hesilala yahesilalegomi , “ To 'eda 'oinega Yaluyaluwa Tabuna wa'eweya ? Mosese 'ina loina 'ana paihowao 'oinega ? bo Keliso tetelina wahesagoheya ta wahemisaeya ? ”
48003003	Yauyauleimi ! Cimi tapwalolo 'ina hegaina wasanapuya 'abehega Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega , 'oinega geya'abwa watohotoho ma 'imi tapwalolo wada losalohi waboi 'imi paihowamo 'oinega !
48003004	Nata togidega ginaula mabwaiyana waloba 'asaediya , eeta Keliso 'ana hemisa 'oina wa'aipate 'asaeya ?
48003005	Caigeda wete hesilala : Yehoba tauna Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'i'ebwa'ebwaya 'oimiya ta 'ina waiwaiyega 'imi paihowa waiwaidi wapaipaihowadi . Togidega 'ina 'ebwayaedi 'oimiya Mosese 'ina loinao 'adi paihowa 'oinega bo Keliso tetelina 'ana hemisa 'oinega ?
48003006	Wanuwatuhuyahi Ebalahamo 'abehega tauna Yehoba 'ihemisaeya , 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'aneya ,
48003007	eeta wasanapu Yehoba 'ana tohemisao 'abehega taudi gidemusa Ebalahamo natunao .
48003008	Mwalo hene Yehoba Ebalahamo 'ihegwaeya , 'igwae , “ Cowa 'oiguwega 'abwa taudi hali 'asa tomotaedi 'idi 'ebe yaliyaya siloba . ” Ma Yehoba 'ina gwae bewa Buki He'asisi 'alona 'ihepwaila nugeteya , 'asa ganamuli baibaiwadi 'adi 'abihebwebwe'ana weyahina , 'eguma Yehoba 'oina sihemisa .
48003009	Coinega tasanapuya tohemisao mabwaiyadi 'abehega tohemisaina Ebalahamo ba'idadiyao 'idi 'ebe yaliyaya siloba .
48003010	Ma hesi 'eguma taiyawedi sinuwatuhuya 'abehega Mosese 'ina loina 'ana hematamatana 'oinega sibwebwe'ana , 'ahwa galagalamo nata siloba , weyahina Buki He'asisi 'igwaeya , “ Loina mabwaiyadi buki bewa 'alona 'eguma taiya geya 'imuliya bwaibwainidi , nata 'ahwa galagala 'iloba . ”
48003011	Moisa , geya sawasawahina ma Yehoba tomota 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita 'eguma Mosese 'ina loinamo tahematamatane . Weyahina 'ina gwae 'igwaeya , “ Todumwalu 'idi hemisega yawasidi siloba . ”
48003012	Ma hesi Mosese 'ina loina 'ana 'eda hagana , ta hemisa 'ana 'eda hagana . Loina 'ana 'eda Buki He'asisi 'oina bewa gide sileleya , 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma taiya loina mabwaiyana 'ihematamatanedi yawasina bwebwe'ana 'iloba . ”
48003013	Ta geya sawasawahina loina mabwaiyana tahematamatanedi , 'oinega Kelisoina 'ihemiyalaenegita ta 'i'abihetegita loina 'ana mwau 'oinega . Loina 'ana mwau bewa , 'eguma geya tada hematamatanediya ta'amasa , 'oinega Keliso tauda weyahida 'i'amasa gidemusa taudi togala madoudi 'adi lohe'amasa kelose 'oidiya . Buki He'asisi mwalo 'ina gwae bewa weyahina 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma taiyawedi kelose 'oidiya silagudi ma si'amasa , to'amasaedi 'ahwa galagala siloba Yehoba 'oinega . ” Eeta Keliso tauda weyahida mwauina 'ilobeya .
48003014	Ma Yesu Keliso 'oinega taudi hali boda 'asa ganamuli tomotaedi yaliyaya siloba , gidemusa yaliyayaina Yehoba 'igwae hemisaeya Ebalahamo 'oina , 'abehega mabwaiyada 'ida hemisega to'aha Yehoba 'igwae hemisaeya 'i'ebwaegita , beno Yaluyaluwa Tabuna .
48003015	Ciyagwao , 'aigeda 'ebe'ita 'ida mumuga 'oinega ya'ebwaegomi , bewa gidemusa : Ceguma loheya 'i'iunamo 'i'amasa , ta 'ina tobwatobwa nuwana 'ina 'ebeloina 'i'ebwae wahana 'oina , 'ina gwaeyedi geya sowasowana 'eta taiya wete weyahina 'igwae .
48003016	Gidemusa wete Yehoba 'ina gwae Ebalahamo ma 'ina susu 'i'ebwaediya 'imiya hataya . Geya 'abehega Buki He'asisi 'igwaeya “ Susuwao 'oidiya , ” ma hesi 'ina susu 'aigeda tuwamo , beno Keliso .
48003017	Cana sanapu bewa Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa 'ilagu nugeteya Ebalahamo 'oina , 'oinega bolime powa handeledi ma teti muliyetega Mosese 'ina loina 'ilatuwa . Ma geya sawasawahina ma gwae hemisaina 'iligehi bo nuwana 'ibui loinaina 'oinega , ma hesi gwae hemisaina 'ina waiwai 'abwa 'imiyamiya .
48003018	Wanuwatuhuyahi 'eguma 'ida 'ebe yaliyaya taloba Mosese 'ina loinega , beno 'abehega geya Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa 'oinega . Geya ! Weyahina mwalo Yehoba 'igwae hemisa Ebalahamo 'oina .
48003019	Ma to'aha weyahina loina 'ilatuwa ? Loinaina 'i'abilatuheya 'oida 'ida puiyao weyahidi , ma 'oida 'imiyamiya 'ana siga Ebalahamo 'ina susu tauna Yehoba 'igwae hemisaeya 'ilatuma . Ma loinaina aneloseyao 'oidiyega Yehoba Mosese 'i'ebwaeya , ta Mosese 'i'ebwaeya tomota 'oidiya .
48003020	Ta Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisaina 'ina 'ebwaya hagana , weyahina Yehoba tauna 'i'ebwaeya dumwaluweya Ebalahamo 'oina .
48003021	Geya'abwa wanuwanuwatuhu 'abehega Mosese 'ina loina 'ilo'aleheya Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa . Geya . Weyahina geya 'eta wete loina sawasawahina ma yawasida 'i'ebwaegita , bo 'ida mumugao 'ida 'abihe bwebwe'anedi . Geya .
48003022	Ma hesi Buki He'asisi mabwaiyada 'i'ahwa galaegita , 'oinega Yesu Keliso 'ana tohemisaomo Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa siloba .
48003023	Mwalo tutaina 'oina hemisa geya tasanapu , tauda Mosese 'ina loina 'ipaigita eeta tamiyamwauwa , ma 'ana siga Yehoba hemisa 'igihelatuheya 'oida .
48003024	Cana 'ita gide loinaina 'i'itayahigita ta 'ana siga Keliso 'ilatuwa , eeta 'eguma tahemisa Keliso 'oina , nata Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita .
48003025	Bewa tuwa Keliso 'inao pwaima , 'oinega loinaina 'ana 'itayahi 'oida 'igumwala ,
48003026	ma hesi 'ida hemisega Yehoba mabwaiyada 'i'ahwa natunegita , Yesu Keliso mahetedai .
48003027	Weyahina taiyawedi 'omi wababitaiso Yesu Keliso saninega Kelisoina mahetemiu wamiya pwaiya .
48003028	Weyahina mabwaiyada Keliso mahetedai , ma geya 'eta wete wataha solada 'imiyamiya . Coinega meYudiya ma hali bodao mahemahetena , ma babadao ma 'idi topaihowao mahemahetena , ma wete meloheyadi ma mewahinedi mahemahetena , weyahina mabwaiyada Yesu Keliso 'oina taheboda 'aigeda ,
48003029	ma mabwaiyada Ebalahamo 'ina susuwao , weyahina mabwaiyada Keliso 'ina bodao , 'oinega ta'eweya Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa , beno Ebalahamo 'oina mwalo 'i'ebwaeya .
48004001	Coinega wanuwatuhuyahi 'eguma taiya 'ina tuta gwama 'oina ma tamana 'ina 'ebeloina 'i'ebwaeya , gwamaina geya'abwa 'ihehetoloina , ma hesi 'ihetopaihowa ,
48004002	ma 'oinega tohe'itao 'enadi 'ida 'ihematamatana nugetedi , ee 'ana siga to tuta tamana 'itagwale ee natuna 'ihetoloina .
48004003	Tauda gidemusa , weyahina mwalo 'ida 'ebe hemisao nugenugetaidi weyahidi tapaipaihowa ,
48004004	ma muliyetega Yehoba natuna 'ina tuta bwebwe'ana 'ilobeya , eeta natuna 'ihewaseyama , ta sinana 'ihenatuneya ta 'iheloheya masiha 'oima , beno tauma Mosese 'ina loinao sipaipaimai , ma 'oidiyega 'ilihasimai , ma 'omi wete 'ilihasigomi , ma Yehoba mabwaiyada 'i'ahwa natunegita .
48004005	
48004006	Coinega wete Yehoba Natuna Yaluyaluwana 'ateda 'ilaguya ma Yehobaina 'i'ahwa tamaneya 'igwae , “ Tamagu ! ”
48004007	Moisa , 'omi geya 'abehega 'ina topaihowamo , ma hesi natunao , 'oinega 'abwa 'ina tobwatobwa 'i'ebwaegomi , gidemusa 'ina gwae hemisa .
48004008	Comi mwalo Yehoba geya wasanapu , ta 'imi 'ebe hemisao taudi gidemusa Yehoba 'abo'abodi .
48004009	Ma bewa tuwa Yehoba wasanapuya , nuwana tagwae Yehoba 'isanapugomiya . Coinega to'aha weyahina Yehobaina walogwahateya ma wanuwahila 'imi 'ebe hemisaowedi belubeluidi 'oidiya , ta nuwanuwami weyahidi wapaihowa hila .
48004010	Coinega wapaipaihowa hemisa miyamiyaina weyahina , tupwana sabwelo bo wai'ena , bo bolime , bo hali tuta ma hali tuta weyahidi 'idi paihowao wapaipaihowadi .
48004011	Bewa weyahina ya'ateyohowa , nata gide 'igu paihowaedi 'oimiya waheginaula besobesowedi .
48004012	Tasigwao , 'ami boda 'oina yaluhu pwaiya eeta taugu gidemusa 'omi , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma wamumuga gide taugu . Geya 'eta gala 'oiguwa wapaihowa .
48004013	Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega mwalo yatauya nugetawa 'oimiya ma'igu lohala , ma tuwa tetela bwebwe'ana yaloguguyaeya 'oimiya .
48004014	Ma geya walososomanegauwa wahigu 'ina we'a weyahina , ma hesi watagwalegomiya 'oiguwa ma watoegauwa gidemusa Yehoba 'ina anelose 'aigeda , nuwana gide Yesu Keliso .
48004015	Eeta wa'ahwa 'iyaguwegauwa moisa , ma 'eguma sawasawahina matamiyega wada 'iwayahuledi ma wa'ebwaegau , matagu hogahogadi 'adi miyalae . Ma bewa tuwa togidega 'ida 'ahwa 'iya'iyaguina ?
48004016	Cana 'ita walo'aleha pwaigauwa weyahina hepwaila moisa ya'ebwaegomiya .
48004017	Cimi nuwabui lamuna 'imi tohe'itao hauhaudi bo'i sipaipaihowa waiwai weyahimi , ma hesi si'abo'abowegomi . Taudi nuwanuwadi ma 'igu loina walogwahatedi ta 'idi loina nuwami si'ewa .
48004018	Cigu loina bewa 'eguma taugu mahetemiu tamiyamiya , bo 'eguma bwaga yamiya 'oimiyega , loinaina 'aigeda tuwa , beno 'ilobwainegomiya ma wahetapewa waiwai paihowa 'ausala weyahina .
48004019	Natugwao , tuta mabwaiyana 'imi 'italohihila weyahidi 'ategu 'imuyamuya , eema 'ana siga Keliso 'oimiya 'ilatu hila , ma 'atemiya 'ida miya , ma 'oinega 'agu lotohona 'ida bwebwe'ana hila .
48004020	Ceguma 'omi mahetegwao tamiya , ma 'oinega wanuwabui ma 'agu lotohona 'ibwebwe'ana , ma hesi yanuwanuwatuhu madouna 'imi pui weyahina .
48004021	Comi nuwanuwami ma Mosese 'ina loinao wamuliyedi , ma hesi soladiya 'adi nuwasabwalena geya wasanapu .
48004022	Wanuwatuhuyahi Ebalahamo tetelina leleleleina , beno natunao meloheyadi 'eluwa , 'aigeda 'ina 'ali'e mewahinena 'oinega , ma heluwena mwanena moisa 'oinega .
48004023	Cina 'ali'eina sanina Hega , ta mwanena Sela , ma Hega 'ina gamwa mumuga bale'u 'oinega , ta Sela 'ina gamwa Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa 'oinega , eeta Selaina natuna sanina Aisake . Ma hesi Hega natuna sanina Isimeli .
48004024	Ta wahiwahineyedi tetelidi 'oinega 'ebe'ita taloba bewa : Hega natunao 'ihenatunediya topaihowa paipaidi ,
48004025	ta 'idi 'asa Alebiya 'alona , 'oya 'aigeda , sanina Sainai , ta Sainai 'ana sanapu 'abehega gide taudi meYelusalema sauga bewa , weyahina taudi paipaidi Mosese 'ina loinao 'oidiyega .
48004026	Ma hesi tauda geya paipaida , eeta 'ida 'asa Yelusalema galewa , gide sinadai 'ihenatunegita Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa 'oinega .
48004027	Ginaula bewa weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina sileleya 'igwaeya : “ Wahine 'owa 'aga'agalaiu 'uyaliyaya . Mwalo geya 'uda gamwa ma nata hesi 'uhenatuna , ma wete 'uyaliyaya madouna natumwao baibaiwa hedada weyahidi , ma hesi wahineina mamwanena simiyamiya manatudiyao , ta geya baibaiwadi . ”
48004028	Ciyagwao , tauda Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa weyahina 'ihenatunegita , Aisake gidemusa , weyahina Aisake sinana me'aga'agalina , ta muliyetega Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa weyahina ta 'ihenatuna .
48004029	Ta Isimeli Aisake 'ilo'aleheya . Cebe'ita bewa , tauna mumuga bale'u 'oinega 'itoleya 'ilo'aleheya tauna gwae hemisa 'oinega 'itoleya . Mwalo taudi siteluwaedi gidemusa , eeta nige wete gidemusa tomota 'iyadiyao simumuga 'esedi .
48004030	Ma Buki He'asisi 'alona loina leleleleina 'igwaeya , “ Cali'eina manatuna 'upa'i latuhedi . Geya'abwa 'ali'e natuna ma natuu moisa siloiloina mahemahetena . Ma hesi Aisakemo 'ebeloina 'i'ewa . ”
48004031	Tauda geya Isimeli gidemusa , weyahina topaihowa paipaina natuna , ma tauda Aisake gidemusa eeta tamiya bwebwe'ana .
48005001	Tamiya bwebwe'ana weyahina Keliso 'ilihasigita 'ada paiyao 'oidiyega , 'oinega watoholo pa'ala ma geya'abwa watagwatagwala hilegomi Mosese 'ina loina paipaina 'oina .
48005002	Taugu Paulo yaloguguya 'oimiya , ma 'eguma Mosese 'ina loinao 'oidiya watagwalegomi , nuwana 'eguma meYudiya 'idi 'ila'ilala 'wapimiya si'upwa , beno Keliso 'ina lema 'oimiya walohe'wadaleleya .
48005003	Weyahina 'eguma taiya 'oimiyega 'itagwale ma 'wapina si'upwa , 'ilobwaineya Mosese 'ina loinao mabwaiyadi wete 'ihematamatanedi ,
48005004	ma 'eguma taiya 'owa nuwanuwau ma Mosese 'ina loinao 'adi hematamatana 'oinega 'ahwa bwebwe'ana 'uloba , beno Keliso 'ina helau 'oiuwa 'uhebe'u pwaiya , eeta tauna 'u'ebesineya .
48005005	Weyahina tauda Yehoba tahemisaeya ma 'abehega 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita . Bewa 'ida nuwatuhuyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega , eeta tauna weyahina tayamwayamwa .
48005006	Moisa , Yesu Keliso 'oina meYudiya 'adi 'ila'ilala geya 'i'abihe dumwaluwegita , beno 'wapidi si'upwa'upwa , ma wete 'eguma 'wapi 'upwaina talogwahate geya'abwa 'ada 'ahwadumwalu talobaloba . Beno tuwa 'eguma Yesu tahemise ma tahelauwe , tauna 'ada to'abihedumwalu .
48005007	Comi mwalo wapili waiwaiya hemisa 'ina 'eda moisa 'oinega , ma taiya 'ilagu bodegomiya ?
48005008	Cetobodaina geya Yehoba 'oinega , weyahina mwalo Yehoba 'ibwauwegomiya tauna 'ina 'eda 'oina , ma hesi 'etobodaina hali tomota 'oidiyega .
48005009	Bewa gide 'aigeda ginaula muhemuhena , ma hesi galana , ma sawasawahina 'igihegala madouna .
48005010	Taugu Bada yahemisaeya ma 'igihenuwa sabwalenigomi , ma 'igu loinamo wamuliya , ma 'eguma loheyaina 'ami tolohe'wadalele 'ana maisa galana 'abwa Yehoba 'oinega 'iloba .
48005011	Ciyagwao , geya'abwa wanuwanuwatuhu yaloguguya 'abehega 'wapimi si'upwadi ma 'ane meYudiya 'idi loina wamuliyedi , ma hesi 'igu loguguyaina Keliso 'ina 'amasa kelose 'oina weyahina . Cigu loguguya bewa weyahina meYudiya sinuwamwauwa ta silo'alehegauwa .
48005012	Moisa , 'ilobwaineya ma taudi 'ami tolohe'wadalele siboimo si'elo'ewa yahuledi ma 'ewa'ewaidi .
48005013	Ciyagwao , Yehoba 'ihesinuwa pwaigomiya ta lihalihasimi . Lihalihasimi ma hesi geya'abwa mumuga bale'u wamulimuliyedi . Mumugami hesi helau 'ina loinega watauya , ma waboimo wahelemalema hilegomi .
48005014	Weyahina loina mabwaiyana 'adi 'uina loina 'aigeda bewa 'igwaeya , “ Ciyamwao 'uhelauwedi gidemusa 'uboi 'uhehelauwego . ”
48005015	Ceguma loina bewa wa'ebesine ma waboi 'oimiya walo'aleha , 'abwa 'ami boda walohesawali .
48005016	Coinega sowasowana Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ihanugetegomi ma 'oinega geya'abwa nuwa'ubuna siloiloinegomi .
48005017	Weyahina nuwa'ubunao Yaluyaluwa Tabuna silo'aleheya , ma 'iyamo Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ida nuwa'ubunao 'ilo'alehediya . Coinega 'aloda silolo'aleha , eema to'aha bwebwe'ana nuwanuwada tapaihowa geya sawasawahina ma tapaihowa .
48005018	Beno tuwa 'eguma Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ihanugetegomi , Mosese 'ina loinao sigumwala 'oimiyega .
48005019	Wahida 'ina paihowa tasanapudiya , beno pui , ma loyawe , ganawala ,
48005020	'oba , balahu , he'ahwa panapanawa , lo'aleha , he'ipi'ipi , gamwasowala , 'aiduma , wataha , sinala ,
48005021	lohesohesoi , ma wete 'ebe yaliyaya galana bwasi waiwai 'ana numa 'oinega , ma wete tupwana mumuga galadi . Mumuga bewa mwalo yahemataluwegomiya , ma nige yahemataluwe hilegomi 'abehega 'adi topaihowao geya'abwa Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'oina siluhuluhu .
48005022	Ma 'iyamo Yaluyaluwa Tabuna huwaina bwebwe'ana 'ateda bewa : helau , yaliyaya , miya daumwala , toholo pa'ala , lema , mumuga dumwaluna , hemisa ,
48005023	mumuga nuhana , 'alama'i'itana . Ma geya 'eta wete loina 'imiyamiya ma ginaulaedi 'i'ausidi .
48005024	Ta wete 'eguma Yesu Keliso 'iloinegita , wahida 'ina mumuga galadi ma nuwa'ubunao 'ilohe'amasidiya 'ana kelose 'oina .
48005025	Ma yawasida bwebwe'ana 'i'ebwaegita Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega , ta sowasowana ma Yaluyaluwaina 'ihanugetegita .
48005026	Ma geya'abwa tanuwanuwahane bo 'iyadao talowahi'watedi , bo tahe'ipi'ipiyedi .
48006001	Ciyagwao , 'eguma tasidai 'aigeda 'ina pui 'oinega 'ibe'u , 'omi yaluyaluwami pa'alidi watoho ma tasidaina wa'abihedumwalu hila , ma hesi ma'imi mumuga nuhana , ma waboimo wa'itayahigomi nata gide 'omi wete wabe'u .
48006002	Cami 'aha'ahalao 'oidiya wahelemalema ma'iyamiyao , weyahina bewa gide 'ada loina Keliso 'oinega , eeta 'ilobwaineya tapaihowa .
48006003	Ceguma taiya wewelohe , ma 'inuwatuhuya 'abehega tohewasawasa , 'iboinamo 'i'abo hileya .
48006004	Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma 'aigeda 'aigeda 'iboi 'ina paihowa 'ida toho ma 'isanapu mane paihowa bwebwe'ana ma mane galana , 'oinega 'eguma bwebwe'ana , 'ana hepwatu 'iboi 'ina nuwatuhu 'ana lotohona 'oinega , ma geya 'iyana 'aigeda 'ina gwae 'oinega .
48006005	Ta 'ada 'aha'ahalao 'aigeda 'aigeda taboidamo ta'ahalidi .
48006006	Tapwalolo 'ana tohe'itao , 'eguma sinasinapu sihe'itegita , 'ilobwainegita ma tobwatobwa ta'ebwaedi , 'eguma to'aha 'oidiya 'ito'uto'upa .
48006007	Geya'abwa 'uboi 'u'abo'abowego , weyahina geya sawasawahida ma Yehoba ta'abowe . To'aha loheya 'ibeguliya , muliyetega 'ida 'eli .
48006008	Ceguma mumuga wahi 'oinega 'idauna 'abwa 'eli'eli 'oina galana 'iloba , ma hesi 'eguma Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega 'idauna , 'abwa yawasina miyamiya hatayana 'i'elidi .
48006009	Geya'abwa 'ida paihowa bwebwe'adi 'oidiyega ta'ala'ala 'i'iwasa , weyahina 'eguma geya'abwa tawe'a , 'abwa 'eli'eli bwebwe'ana taloba .
48006010	Coinega 'ilobwainegita ma tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya tomota baibaiwadi talemedi , ma hesi Yehoba 'ana tohemisao talemedi madouna .
48006011	Lele bewa matana madouna taugu nimaguwega yaleleya .
48006012	MeYudiya 'idi 'ila'ilala 'wapidiya 'ana to'upwao geya nuwadi 'igu loguguyaina bewa : 'ada 'abihebwebwe'ana taloba Keliso 'ina 'amasamo 'oinega , ma geya 'wapi 'upwa 'oinega . Coinega sihe'i'imigomiya ma 'idi 'wapi 'upwaina wa'ewa , ta 'adi boda 'ida hemadou , ma wete lo'aleha Keliso 'ina 'amasa kelose 'oina weyahina 'igumwala .
48006013	Ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'wapi 'upwaina 'ana to'ewao 'ilobwainediya ma Mosese 'ina loinao mabwaiyana simuliyedi , ma hesi geya sida muliyediya . Beno tuwa nuwanuwadi 'wapimi wa'upwadi ma bewa 'idi 'ebe gagasa 'imi luhu 'adi boda 'alona weyahina .
48006014	Ma taugu hesi geya'abwa yagwaegwae hane . Beno tuwa 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ana kelose weyahina yagwaehane , weyahina Keliso 'ana kelose 'oinega mumuga bale'u 'ilohe'amasiya ta 'ina loina 'oiguwa 'igumwala , ma wete taudi mumuga bale'u 'ana tomuliyao silogwahategauwa , tuwa gide taugu to'amasa .
48006015	Moisa , 'wapi 'upwa geya ginaula madouna , ma 'eguma geya ta'upwa beno wete geya ginaula madouna . Ginaula madouna 'aigeda tuwamo , 'eguma Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'igihe'ehaugita .
48006016	Ma mabwaiyada 'eguma loina bewa tamulimuliye , eema Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'igihe'ehaugita , tauda Yehoba 'ina susu meIsileli moisa , ta 'ina helauwega tamiya daumwala .
48006017	Bewa tuwa ma tuta 'inaonaoma 'oidiya geya'abwa wete 'eta taiya 'igihe 'wate'wategau , weyahina wahiguwa Yesu 'ina 'ila'ilala simiyamiya , beno weyaedi yalobediya 'ina paihowa 'oina .
48006018	Tasigwao 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina helau yaluyaluwami 'oidiya . Emeni . Taugu Paulo .
49001001	Yauwedo tohekalesiyao 'omi Yesu Keliso 'ana tohemisao , 'imi leta bewa taugu Paulo 'oiguwega . Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu 'oinega yahetohepwaila To'abihetena Yesu weyahina .
49001002	Tamada Yehoba ma Bada Yesu Keliso 'idi helau 'oimiya , ma 'oinega wamiya yaliyaya .
49001003	Ciyagwao , taloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , tauna 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso Tamana , ma Kelisoina 'oinega yaluyaluwada 'ihelauwediya beno wasawasa galewa mabwaiyadi 'i'ebwaegita .
49001004	Weyahina mwalo hene 'abwa bale'u geya 'ihemasalehe ma 'ihesinuwa nugetegita ma 'abehega taheboda 'aigeda Keliso mahetedai , ta Yehobaina matana mumugada 'ehauna , ma geya 'ada 'ebe he'ewamo .
49001005	Ma 'oinega Yehoba nuwanuwana ta 'ina helauwega 'ihesinuwegita ma Yesu Keliso 'oinega 'i'ahwa natunegita ,
49001006	ma Yehoba tahepwatuwe bewa helau bwebwe'ana hedada weyahina , tauna Natuna moisaina 'i'ebwae daisiya weyahida .
49001007	Eeta Natuna bweyahinega 'ilihasigita 'ida puiyao 'oidiyega ta Yehoba 'inuwasamudiya , beno tauna 'ina helau madou hedada 'i'ebwaegita . Ta 'ana madou geya 'ana lihemo .
49001008	
49001009	Wete sonoga ma sanapu mabwaiyadi 'i'ebwaegita , eeta tauna 'ina nuwatuhu dahwadahwanidi tasanapudiya weyahina bewa 'iloina nugeteya ma 'abehega Keliso 'oinega 'ilosalohidi ,
49001010	ta 'ina loinaina bewa 'abehega tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'oina Keliso ginaula mabwaiyadi 'ihegogonedi ma sihe'aigeda , beno ginaula galewa ma wete ginaula bale'uwa mabwaiyadi 'ilagu hegogonedi tauna matana .
49001011	Ma Yehobaina tauna 'ina nuwatuhuwega 'iloiloina , ta 'ina paihowa mabwaiyana 'ipaipaihowadi ,
49001012	ta tauda 'ihesinuwegita ta 'iloinaegita 'abehega Keliso 'ana tohemisa nugetao , ta sabwelo 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oina 'ida paihowao weyahidi tomota sida hepwatuwe , ma sida 'ahwa bwebwe'ane .
49001013	Ma wete 'omi Keliso 'oinega tetela moisa ma bwebwe'ana beno 'ami 'abihetena weyahina wahesagoheya eeta tauna wahemisaeya , ma wete Yaluyaluwa Tabuna tauna 'igwae hemisaeya ta 'i'ebwaegomiya ,
49001014	gide 'ila'ilala , ma 'oinega tasanapuya 'abehega 'ada maisa galewa Yehoba 'oinega 'abwa ta'ewa , ma weyahina tahepwatuwe , ta wete ta'ahwa bwebwe'ana .
49001015	Coinega tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'omi weyahimi yaloloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , ma ya'ahwa'ahwanoi weyahimi , weyahina tetelimi yahesagoheya 'abehega Bada Yesu wahemisaeya , ta wete 'ana tohemisao mabwaiyadi 'atemiyega wahehelau 'oidiya .
49001016	
49001017	Ma 'igu 'ahwanoi weyahimi 'abehega 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina Yehoba , tauna Tamada ta Tohewasawasa madouna , 'igihesanapugomi , ma tauna wada sanapu bwaibwaini ,
49001018	ma wete 'atemiyega ginaulaedi bwebwe'adi weyahidi 'ibwauwegomiya wada sanapudi , ma wahemisa 'abehega 'abwa walobadi , ma wada sanapu wete 'ina heguyai madouna 'ina tomotaiyao tauda 'oida , beno tauna 'ina wasawasa 'oinega ,
49001019	ma wete wada sanapu Yehoba 'ipaipaihowa waiwai tauda 'ana tohemisao weyahida .
49001020	Cina waiwaiina Keliso 'oinega 'ihe'itaeya tutaina 'amasega 'igihetoholo hileya , ta 'ina 'ebemiya galewa 'i'ebwaeya , Yehobaina 'ina 'ebeulega ,
49001021	'oinega Keliso 'ina loina , loinao mabwaiyadi 'ihane sinediya , nuwana aneloseyao 'idi loina bo yaluyaluwa bi'iyao 'idi loina , bo taudi sanidi madoudi 'idi loinao , bewa tuta ma tuta sinaonaoma 'oidiya .
49001022	Weyahina Yehoba Keliso 'ina 'ebeloina 'i'ebwaeya ginaula mabwaiyadi 'abehega 'iloinaedi , ma tohekalesiyao tauda wete mabwaiyada 'iloiloina 'oida ,
49001023	weyahina tohekalesiyao tauda gide Keliso wahina yahunao , weyahina Kelisoina ginaula mabwaiyana sawasawahina tupwa mabwaiyadi 'oidiya .
49002001	Ma 'omi mwalo gide 'ama'amasimi 'imi puiyao 'oidiyega ma Yehoba 'igihetoholo hilegomiya .
49002002	Moisa , mwalo mumuga bale'u wapaipaihowadi , weyahina yaluyaluwa galadi ma waiwaidi 'idi bada , tauna tomiya 'atamana 'awawa wahematamataneya . Ma tauna yaluyaluwaina taudi loina 'ana toligehao simulimuliye ma 'atediya 'imiyamiya .
49002003	Mwalo wete tauda gidemusa , ta wahida 'ina nuwa'ubuna tamulimuliyedi , ma to'aha tauda 'ida nuwatuhuwega tapaipaihowadi . Coinega 'ana lobwaina ma Yehoba 'igamwasowalegita , weyahina mumugada tauda galagalaina , gidemusa mebale'u mabwaiyadi .
49002004	Eema 'oinega 'ida puiyao silohe'amasigita , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyamuya tomadou hedada , ta 'ina helau 'oida madouna wete , ma 'oinega 'igihetoholo hilegita , Keliso mahetedai . Yehoba tauna 'ina 'eheleina 'oinega 'i'abihetegita ,
49002005	
49002006	ma wete Keliso mahetedai , 'igilagasigita , eeta 'ebemiya galewa Yesu Keliso 'oinega 'i'ebwaegita , tauna Yehobaina mahetedai .
49002007	Bewa 'ipaihoweya ma 'abehega tuta sinaonaoma 'oidiya 'ina 'ehele madou hedadena 'ihe'itae , beno 'ina 'atemuyamuya ma 'ina 'abihetena Yesu Keliso 'oinega .
49002008	Moisa , 'ina 'eheleina 'oinega 'i'abihetegomiya 'imi hemisa weyahina ma geya waboi 'imi paihowa 'oidiyega , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina helau 'oinega .
49002009	Cida 'abiheteina geya hene 'ida paihowa 'oinega taloba , nata gide tanuwahane 'abehega tauda tuwa 'ida waiwaiyega .
49002010	Ma hesi Yehoba 'iboimo 'ina paihowa 'ateda 'i'atububudiya Yesu Keliso 'oinega , ma 'abehega tapaipaihowa paihowaedi bwebwe'adi Yehoba mwalo hene 'ihesinuwediya weyahida .
49002011	Comi geya meYudiya ta 'asa ganamuli tomotainao , ma meYudiyaedi taudi natudiyao loheloheyadi 'wapidi si'upwa'upwadi , 'adi 'ila'ilala sipaipaihowa , ma sisinaligomiya , weyahina geya wahimi 'adi 'ila'ilalamo .
49002012	Wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tutaina mwalo Keliso 'oinega wamiya wasiya , ma Isileli 'ina 'ebeloina 'oinega wamiya ganamuliya , ma ginaula bwebwe'adi Yehoba 'igwae hemisaeya Buki He'asisi 'alona geya 'eta to'aha 'omi weyahimi 'i'inana , 'oinega geya'abwa 'eta to'aha bwebwe'ana 'abwa walobaloba ma 'abehega tauna weyahina wada hemisa , geya wete 'imi Yehobamo tutaina bale'uwa wamiyamiya .
49002013	Mwalo wamiya wasiya , ma bewa tuwa Yesu Keliso 'oinega , beno Kelisoina bweyahinega 'itoegomiya deina .
49002014	Tauna weyahida daumwala 'ipaihoweya , weyahina 'aliupa sanina lo'aleha 'ihwategita ma Keliso 'aliupaina 'iligeha yahuleya eeta 'ina 'amasa 'oinega taheboda 'aigeda pwaiya .
49002015	Tauna wahina 'ana lohe'amasa 'oinega Mosese 'ina 'etobodao mabwaiyadi 'igibodeya , eeta tauna 'ihegogonegita ma taheboda 'aigeda tauna mahetedai , ta geya gidemusa mwalo boda 'eluwa simiyamiya , eema bewa tuwa tamiya daumwala ,
49002016	ma wete 'ida wataha 'oidiyega 'ilihasigita ta 'itoegitama Yehoba 'oina , ma tauna mahetedai tahe'iya'iyagu hila ; ee 'ina paihowaina , tauna wahina 'aigeda tuwamo kelose 'oina situtu hepa'ineya , eeta 'oinega lo'alehaedi sigumwala .
49002017	Coinega Yesuina 'itauyawa ta daumwala 'iloguguyaeya 'omi tomiya bwagabwaga 'oimiya , ma tauma wete deina 'amiyamiya 'oima .
49002018	Eeta tauna 'oinega , 'omi ma tauma Yaluyaluwa 'aigeda 'oinega 'itoegita Tamada 'oina .
49002019	Comi mwalo taumanao wamiyawasiya , ma sauga bewa hesi wahetoni'asa pwaiya Yehoba 'ina bodao mahetemiyao , ta waheboda 'aigeda Yehoba 'ina susu 'oina .
49002020	Comi wete si'abigomiya , 'oinega tauda gide tuwa hada , ma Yesu Keliso tauna 'ida wahuwahu , tauna 'oina logidi madoudi beno Yesu 'ana tohepwailao ma palopitao ,
49002021	ma 'oinega tauda mabwaiyada tahehada 'ana yowayowana , ma Yesu 'i'abigita ma tahehada madouna ma 'ehauna ,
49002022	ma wete 'omi geya meYudiya gide wahe yowayowana , ta 'oimiyega hadaina 'i'abi'abi , ma 'abehega hadaina 'oina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ilo'asa .
49003001	Bewa weyahina taugu Paulo ya'e'etuluha ma ya'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina , tauna 'igu paihowa 'i'ebwaegauwa 'omi tomiya ganamuli 'oimiya , ma bewa tuwa Keliso 'ina paihowa weyahina deliya silagu luhuwegauwa ta yamiyamiya .
49003002	Nuwana mwalo 'igu paihowa tetelina wahesagoheya , ta 'igu paihowaina Yehoba 'i'ebwaegauwa , ma 'abehega tauna 'ina helauwega 'omi 'ami lema waloba .
49003003	Ma 'igu paihowa bewa sanapu mwalo dahwadahwaina weyahina , ma hesi 'ana sanapu Yehoba 'ihe'ita pwaigauwa , gidemusa yaleleyawa 'imi leta to'uto'upana bewa 'oina ,
49003004	ma 'eguma wahasili wada sanapu 'abehega sanapuina dahwadahwaina Keliso weyahina beno yasanapu pwaiya .
