49003005	Ma sanapuina tomota nugenugetadi geya sisanapu , eeta bewa tuwa Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'igihelatuheya 'ina tohepwailao hesihesinuwadi ma palopitao 'oidiya ,
49003006	'abehega 'omi geya meYudiya sawasawahina ma Yehoba 'ina 'abihetena waloba , tauma meYudiya gidemusa . Cina 'abihetenaina mwalo 'igwae hemisaeya , eeta Yesu Keliso tetelina 'oinega talobeya , ta taheboda 'aigeda .
49003007	Ma Yehoba 'ina waiwaiyega ta 'ina helauwega paihowa bewa 'i'ebwaegauwa , ta 'abehega tetela bwebwe'ana Keliso weyahina yahepwaila latuwe .
49003008	Ma taugu gide wewelohe tohekalesiyao 'alodiya , ma tuwa 'ina helauwega paihowa bewa 'i'ebwaegauwa , 'omi tomiya ganamuli 'oimiya Keliso tetelina yaloguguyae , ma 'oinega 'ina wasawasa madou hedade wada 'italoba ,
49003009	ma wete tomota mabwaiyadi sida sanapu 'abehega Yehoba tauna ginaula mabwaiyadi 'adi to'abihemasalaha , ma tuta dudulena 'oidiya 'ina nuwatuhu 'idahweya , ta sauga bewa 'igihe hapwesa pwaiya ,
49003010	'abehega 'ebe'ita tauda tohekalesiyao , ma 'oidega Yehoba 'ina sanapu mabwaiyana 'ihe'itae galewa 'ana yaluyaluwa waiwaidi 'oidiya .
49003011	Bewa Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu mwalo hene ta nige , ma bewa sauga 'igihelatuheya 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'oinega ,
49003012	ma 'eguma Kelisoina tahemisae ta'atepatu , 'ane sawasawahina taluhu Yehoba tauna matana , ma ta'ahwanoi 'oina .
49003013	Coinega 'igu 'emuyamuyao bewa weyahimi sahena weyahidi 'atemi siwe'awe'a , ma hesi wada sanapu 'abehega 'igu 'emuyamuyaowedi 'omi 'imi bwebwe'ana weyahina .
49003014	Coinega taugu ya'ahetulasa Tamada matana ,
49003015	tauna susu mabwaiyadi galewa ma bale'uwa lamudi ,
49003016	ta ya'ahwa'ahwanoi 'oina ma 'abehega 'ina wasawasa ma 'ina waiwai 'itagwala 'oimiya , ma 'ane Yaluyaluwana 'atemi 'igihewaiwaiyedi ,
49003017	ma 'ane wete 'imi hemisega Keliso 'atemiya 'ida miyamiya , ta mumugami mabwaiyana helau tuwa ,
49003018	'oinega tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi mahetemiyao sawasawahimi Keliso 'ina helau wada sanapu bwaibwaini , 'ana tabataba , 'ana dudula , 'ana hane , 'ana sulu , geya 'ana lihemo , Keliso 'ina helau madou hedade , ma wete Yehoba tauna Tohewaiwai hedada 'ina mumugega 'ida lohemaha bwaibwainigomi .
49003019	
49003020	Moisa , 'ina waiwai solada 'ipaipaihowa , ma 'eguma to'aha weyahina ta'ahwa'ahwanoi ma'ida hemisa , tauna sawasawahina ma 'ipaihowa , ma 'ana loheposeyana madouna weyahida .
49003021	Coinega tohekalesiyao mabwaiyada Yesu Keliso saninega tahepwatu hatae , sauga mabwaiyana 'oidiya . Emeni .
49004001	Coinega ya'ahwanoi 'oimiya ma mumugami wa'itayahi , bewa tuwa taugu deliya silagugauwa Badaina 'ina paihowa weyahina , ma 'omi Badaina 'ibwauwegomiya tauna 'ina paihowa weyahina , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma to'aha 'ina paihowaina 'ana lobwaina wamuliye ,
49004002	ma ma'imi nuwadobi , ta ma'imi 'ate tagwala , ta ma'imi 'alama'i'ita , ma mahetemiyao wahelau hilegomi , ma wa'atemuyamuya 'iyamiyao 'oidiya ,
49004003	ma wahetapewa waiwai , ma 'oinega Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'i'uinigomi , ma ma'imi nuwadaumwala wamiya yaliyaya .
49004004	Moisa , wahida 'aigeda , Yaluyaluwa Tabuna wete 'aigeda tuwamo , ma 'ibwauwegitama 'omi ma tauma , ma tanuwanuwatuhu 'ada lema 'aigeda tuwamo 'abwa taloba weyahina .
49004005	Cida Bada wete 'aigeda tuwamo , 'ida hemisa 'aigeda tuwamo , 'ida babitaiso wete 'aigeda tuwamo .
49004006	Tamada Yehoba 'aigeda tuwamo , ma ginaula baibaiwana tabwanidiya ma 'oidiya , ma wete 'oida 'imiyamiya .
49004007	Ma Keliso 'ina wasawasa 'oinega 'ada heguheguyai 'i'ebwaegita .
49004008	Bewa weyahina Buki He'asisi 'ina gwae 'igwaeya : “ Tutaina 'ihaneya tabwana 'ana 'alehao 'ihewaiwai sinediya , eema tomota 'adi heguheguyai 'i'ebwaedi . ”
49004009	Gwae bewa “ Cihaneya tabwana . ” 'ana sanapu bewa nugeta 'idobi hedada bale'u duduna .
49004010	Ma tauna tosuluina 'ihaneya wete ta galewa 'ihanesineya , ma 'oinega tauna tupwa mabwaiyadi 'oidiya 'imiyamiya .
49004011	Ta 'ina heguheguyai bewa gidemusa , 'abehega tomota tupwadi sihetohepwaila , ma tupwadi sihepalopita , ta tupwadi sihetologuguya , ma tupwadi sihetohanugeta , ma tupwadi sihetohe'ita .
49004012	Ma mabwaiyada 'ida paihowa 'aigeda 'aigeda beno tohekalesiyao 'adi lema ma sihewaiwai , beno Keliso wahina 'ina sinasinabwa weyahina ,
49004013	ma 'ane mabwaiyada tahemisa mahemahetena , ta wete Yehoba Natuna tada sanapu , ma'ida mumuga matuhadi , gidemusa Keliso 'ina mumuga matuhana , ma bwebwe'ana mabwaiyana .
49004014	Bewa 'oinega gwama mumugana 'oidega ta'ebesinedi , weyahina mwalo 'ida sanapu we'awe'ana 'oina he'ita hagadi ma hadagi si'abinihu nihuwegita , beno tupwadi to'abowao 'idi he'itao hotohotodi ma galadi 'oidiyega .
49004015	Ma hesi 'ilobwainegita ma helauwega tagwaegwae moisa , eeta 'ida mumuga mabwaiyadi sida sinasinabwa debada Keliso 'ina mumuga gidemusa .
49004016	Weyahina tauda Keliso wahina yahunao ma 'igihewaiwaiyegita gide wahinaina 'ana walowalowao , ma 'ana tubweyao mabwaiyadi 'idi paihowega sihelemalema ma helauwega simadomadou ta sihewaiwai .
49004017	Bewa wete Bada saninega yaloguguya 'oimiya 'abehega mumuga tomiya ganamuli gidemusa walolagu , weyahina 'idi nuwatuhu besobeso 'oidiyega ,
49004018	'idi sinasinapu siguguyouwa , ma geya Yehoba yawasina 'oidiya 'imiyamiya , weyahina 'idi debapa'ala 'oinega siheyauyaule pwaiya .
49004019	Coinega sigala moisa , eeta sitagwalediya mumuga sogala weyahina , ma mumuga galadi baibaiwadi nuwadi si'eweya .
49004020	Ma 'omi Keliso mumugana wasanapu pwaiya 'abehega hagana ,
49004021	weyahina mwalo he'ita moisa Yesu weyahina wahesagoheya Kelisoina 'oinega .
49004022	Coinega mumuga miyamiyana walogwahatedi , beno paihowaedi mwalo wapaipaihowadi tutaina nuwatuhu dahwana sigihe galegomiya ,
49004023	ma hesi 'imi nuwatuhuwao ma 'atemi si'ehau hila ,
49004024	ma 'oinega mumuga hauhauna wa'ewa Yehoba 'ina mumuga gide , weyahina tauna 'ateda mumuga bwebwe'ana ma 'ehauna 'ilaguya .
49004025	Coinega 'abo walogwahate ma mabwaiyami wagwae moisa 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oimiya , weyahina mabwaiyada Keliso wahina yahunao .
49004026	Ma 'eguma wagamwasowala , geya'abwa wamumuga galana , ma hesi watoho ma wanuwa daumwala mwayamwayau ,
49004027	ma geya'abwa Tomudulele 'ina tuta wa'ebwa'ebwae ma 'ihetoloina 'oimiya .
49004028	Toyagaha 'ilobwainediya ma silolagu , ma hesi paihowa bwebwe'ana nimadiyega sida paihowadi ma paihowaina 'ana maisa 'oinega lema sida 'ebwa'ebwaya towewelohe 'oidiya .
49004029	Sahena wete 'eta gwae galana wa'ina'inana , ma hesi gwae bwebwe'anamo tomota 'adi lema weyahina , to'aha tuta 'aigeda 'aigeda 'ana lobwaina weyahina wahegwaegwae , ma 'oinega taiyawedi taudi sihesagohegomi , 'imi gwaeyega nata lema siloba .
49004030	Geya'abwa Yaluyaluwa Tabuna nuwana wagihegihegala , weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabunaina gide 'ila'ilala 'oida , 'abehega 'abwa 'ada gihe'ehau taloba .
49004031	Ma wete galaedi bewa gide walogwahatedi : he'ipi'ipi , gamwasowala , 'asona , 'ahwa galagala , ma wete gwae sinala ,
49004032	ma hesi wahelau hilegomi , 'atemuyemuyega 'iyamiyao 'idi pui wanuwasamudi 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oina , gidemusa Yehoba 'imi puiyao Keliso 'oinega 'inuwasamudiya .
49005001	Yehoba 'ina helauwega 'i'ahwa natune pwaigomiya , 'oinega tauna 'ina mumugaina wamuliye ,
49005002	ma wahelau hilegomi gidemusa Keliso 'ihelau 'esegita , ta tauna 'itagwaleya ta 'iboi 'ipwaoliyeya Yehoba 'oina weyahida , ta 'i'amasa , gide pwaoli mahaina Yehoba 'inisoya 'abehega 'ausalana .
49005003	Comi Yehoba 'ana tohemisao , 'oinega 'ilobwaineya pui ma ganawala ma wasawasa 'ana hamwa wa'ebesinedi , ma geya'abwa weyahidi to'aha 'eta wagwaegwaene .
49005004	Wete geya'abwa 'ahwasewa bo 'ahwa galagala bo gwae besobeso , weyahina gwaeyedi geya 'adi lobwaina solamiya , ma hesi 'imi gwaeyega Yehoba wahepwatuwe .
49005005	Moisa , togalaedi geya'abwa wete silugulugu Keliso ma Yehoba 'idi 'ebeloina 'oina taudi gidemusa topuiyao bo tosogala bo tobwatobwa 'adi tohamwao , weyahina tobwatobwa 'ana hamwa 'ana sanapu 'abehega 'ida hemisa talagu tobwatobwa 'oina , ma geya Yehoba 'oina .
49005006	Mumugaedi bewa weyahidi Yehoba toligeha loina 'igamwasowalediya , 'oinega geya'abwa 'aigeda taiya 'ina gwae besobesowega 'i'abo'abowegomi ,
49005007	ta wete geya'abwa toligeha loinaedi ba'idamiyao wa'ahwa 'iya'iyagu ,
49005008	weyahina 'omi guguyou mwalo 'oinega wahabala pwaima Yehoba 'ina 'asilala 'oina , 'oinega ma'imi mumuga 'asi'asilalaina wapaipaihowa ,
49005009	ma mumugaedi bwebwe'adi ma dumwaludi ma moisadi silatulatu 'asilala 'oinega .
49005010	Ta wete watohotoho ma to'aha Bada nuwanuwana wada sanapudi ma wapaihowadi ,
49005011	ma guguyou 'ana paihowa besobeso 'oidiyega wadena , ma hesi wahe'itaedi 'abehega galadi .
49005012	Moisa tuwa , 'ebe debamwadina , 'eguma taudi 'idi paihowa dahwadahwanidi weyahidi tagwaegwae ,
49005013	ma 'eguma 'aigeda paihowa galana 'ilohapwese 'asilala solana , sawasawahina ma ta'ita ,
49005014	ma 'eguma ta'ita pwaiya , tauna hesi 'asilalaina . Bewa weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Cowa to'eno'eno 'amasega 'utoholo ma Keliso 'ina 'asilala 'oinega 'u'asilala . ”
49005015	Cilobwainegomiya ma 'imi mumuga wa'ita'ita bwaibwainidi ma geya'abwa wapaipaihowa besobeso ma hesi wada sanasanapu moisa ,
49005016	ma geya'abwa 'imi tuta wamudamudali , weyahina bewa tuwa sauga gala hedada .
49005017	Coinega geya'abwa waheyauyaule , ma hesi nuwami 'ida sabwalena , to'aha Yehoba gidemusa 'ina nuwanuwa weyahimi .
49005018	Geya'abwa bwasi waiwaina 'oinega wanumanuma yauyaule , beno ginaula 'ebe hesilae , ma hesi Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ida lohemahegomi ma
49005019	wawaliwali ma'iyamiyao , wali tapwalolo ma Same walinao , ma wete hedale walinao 'oidiyega , ma'imi yaliyaya 'atemiyega wawali Bada 'oina ,
49005020	ma tuta mabwaiyana waloyauwedo ginaula mabwaiyadi weyahidi , 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega , Tamada Yehoba 'oina .
49005021	Cimi he'asisi Keliso 'oina gidemusa wete 'omi waboi wahe'asisi hilegomi , ma loina wahematamatanedi .
49005022	Comi wahiwahine haihainimi mwanemiyao 'idi gwae wahematamatanedi , gidemusa 'imi hematamatana Keliso 'oina ,
49005023	weyahina wahine 'ana tohanugeta beno mwanena , gidemusa Keliso tauda tohekalesiyao 'ada Tohanugeta ta 'ada To'abihetena , ma tauda gide wahina yahunao ,
49005024	eeta tohekalesiyao tauda Keliso 'ina gwae tahematamatanedi , 'oinega gide wete wahiwahine 'ilobwainediya ma mwanediyao 'idi gwae ginaula mabwaiyadi weyahidi sida hematamatanedi .
49005025	Haihainimi meloheyami 'ilobwainegomiya ma mwanemiyao wahelauwedi , gidemusa Keliso 'ina tohekalesiyao 'ihelauwegita , eeta tauna 'itagwaleya ta weyahida 'i'amasa ,
49005026	'ada gihe'ehau weyahina , beno 'ida pui 'ana 'ebe deula we'ahaina 'ina gwae 'oinega ,
49005027	'oinega tohekalesiyao tauda 'ihetohologita 'abehega 'ina bodao 'ehauda , ma geya 'abehega bi'i bo to'aha galana 'oida , ma hesi mabwaiyana tuwa bwebwe'ana , ta 'ehauna .
49005028	Coinega tauda meloheyada 'ilobwainegita ma mwanedao tahelauwedi , tauda wahida gide . Weyahina 'eguma taiya mwanena 'ihelauwe beno 'iboimo 'ihelau hileya .
49005029	Weyahina geya 'eta wete loheya taunamo wahina 'oina 'ida lo'aleha , ma hesi 'i'itayahi ma 'ana 'i'ai wahina 'ana lema weyahina , gidemusa Keliso tohekalesiyao tauda 'i'itayahigita ,
49005030	weyahina tauda tauna wahina yahunao .
49005031	“ Bewa weyahina loheya tamana ma sinana 'i'ebesinedi ma mamwanena sida miya 'aigeda , gide wahi 'aigeda tuwamo . ”
49005032	Gwae bewa gide gwae hegehegedi ma dahwadahwaina , ma 'ana sanapu Keliso ma tohekalesiyao weyahida .
49005033	Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya , ma 'aigeda 'aigeda mwanena 'ihelauwe 'iboi gide , ma wahine haihaiina sowasowana mwanena 'ihe'asisiye .
49006001	Comi gwagwama 'ilobwainegomiya ma sinamiyao ma tamamiyao 'idi gwae wahematamatanedi , Bada matana , weyahina bewa 'oinega 'abehega wamumuga bwebwe'ana .
49006002	Wete , “ Tamau ma sinau 'uhe'asisiyanedi . ” Bewa loinaina nugenugetaina ma'ana gwae hemisa 'ana tohematamatanao weyahidi ,
49006003	bewa gidemusa 'igwaeya , “ Cebe yaliyaya 'uloba ma bale'uwa 'umiya saliyana . ”
49006004	Comi tama wete geya'abwa natumiyao 'adi wahi 'wata'wata walagulagu , nata gide sigamwasowalegomi ; ma hesi 'ida Bada 'ina loinao ta 'ina he'itao waloguguyaedi .
49006005	Comi topaihowao 'imi badao bale'uwa wahe'asisiyanedi , ma 'idi gwae wahematamatanedi , gidemusa Keliso 'ina gwae wahematamatane 'eseya , ma geya'abwa wete wahehenuwanaluwa .
49006006	Geya'abwa 'abehega 'eguma tutaina 'imi babadao si'ebubugomi ma 'abwa 'oidiya wapaihowa bwaibwaina , ma 'eta tuta geya , ma hesi Yehoba weyahina 'imi guibiga 'atemiyega wapaipaihowa .
49006007	Comi Keliso 'ina bodao , 'ilobwainegomiya ma 'imi babadao 'oidiya wa'atetagwala gide Yehoba 'oina wa'ate'ate tagwala , ma weyahidi wapaihowa bwaibwaina .
49006008	Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega babadao ma 'idi topaihowao mabwaiyadi 'idi paihowa bwebwe'adi 'adi maisa Yehoba 'oinega siloba mahemahetena .
49006009	Comi babadao wete wamumuga bwaibwaina 'imi topaihowao 'oidiya , ma geya'abwa waheheliyedi , ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega mabwaiyami 'omi ma taudi 'imi Bada galewa 'imiyamiya , eeta 'ina loina 'oimiya mahemahetena mabwaiyami weyahimi , geya hagana ma hagana .
49006010	Ciyagwao , Bada 'ina waiwai madounega wahewaiwai ,
49006011	ma Yehoba 'ina tobwatobwa 'aleha mabwaiyana 'oidiyega wa'otena , ma 'oinega geya'abwa wawe'awe'a tutaina 'eguma Tomudulele 'i'abowegomi .
49006012	Weyahina 'ida lo'aleha geya tomota mahetedao , ma hesi toloina galadi ba'idadao , taudi guguyou bewa tuwa bale'uwa 'adi toloinao , ma galewa 'ana yaluyaluwao galadi .
49006013	Bewa weyahina Yehoba 'ina tobwatobwa 'aleha mabwaiyana wa'otedi , ma 'ane geya'abwa wawe'awe'a 'abwa tuta galana 'oina , ma 'oinega ma'imi waiwai watoholo pa'ala .
49006014	Coinega watoholo ma he'ita moisa walogadiwane ma lumalumami wa'ausidi mumuga dumwaluna 'oinega ,
49006015	ma 'ami butu wa'ote beno nuwa daumwala tetela bwebwe'ana 'oinega walobodabodae .
49006016	Ma wete 'imi hemisa gide 'imi lobodaboda 'oinega wa'ausigomi , beno sawasawahina Tomudulele 'ina 'aliliya waiwaidi 'ihabodebodedi .
49006017	Wete 'ami 'abihetena wa'ewa 'abehega debami 'adi 'ahubodaboda , ma Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina 'elepa 'aleha wa'ewa , beno Yehoba 'ina gwae .
49006018	Tuta mabwaiyana Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina lema 'oinega 'ahwanoi baibaiwadi 'oidiyega wa'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina . Sahena wawe'awe'a ma hesi ma'imi toholopa'ala wa'itayahigomi ma wa'ahwanoi tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi weyahidi ,
49006019	ma taugu wete weyahigu , ma 'oinega ma'igu 'atepatu tetela bwebwe'ana 'ana sanapu 'wai'waihina yahehepwaila .
49006020	Tetelaina bewa 'ana paihowa weyahina deliya silagu luhuwegauwa , 'oinega wa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina ma 'ane tetelaina yada gwae latuhe ma'igu 'atepatu , weyahina bewa gidemusa 'ana lobwaina .
49006021	Tikiko , tauna tasidai bwebwe'ana , ta 'ihetahetapewa Bada 'ina paihowa 'oina , ma yahewasaeyawa ma 'ane teteligu mabwaiyana 'ida he'ote'oteteli 'oimiya , ma 'abehega 'igu miya ta 'igu paihowa weyahidi wasanapudi , 'oinega 'ima miya weyahina 'ihenuwa lagugomi , ma wete 'ida gihepa'aligomi .
49006022	
49006023	Helau ma hemisa ma yaliyaya Tamada Yehoba ma Bada Yesu Keliso 'oidiyega , 'omi 'iyagwao moisa 'oimiya .
49006024	Ta wete taiyawedi ba'idamiyao , 'eguma 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso sihelau hataeya , tauna 'ina 'atemuyemuyega 'ida helauwedi wete . Taugu Paulo .
50001001	Taugu Paulo ma Timoti mahetegu 'apaipaihowa To'abihetena Yesu weyahina , 'aleleleleyawa 'omi mePilipai , Yesu Keliso 'ina tohekalesiyao , ta wete 'imi tohanugetao ta 'imi dikoniyao mahetemiyao ,
50001002	Tamada Yehoba eema Bada Yesu Keliso 'idi helauwega tuwa wamiya yaliyaya .
50001003	Tuta mabwaiyana Yehoba 'oina yahelau , 'eguma tutaina yanuwatuhugomi ,
50001004	ma'igu yaliyaya weyahimi , 'igu 'ahwanoiyao 'oidiya ,
50001005	ma'igu loyauwedo 'ama lema 'oimiyega 'alobediya , tetela bwebwe'ana 'ana hepwaila hauhauwega ta nige , weyahina .
50001006	Wete ma'igu hemisa 'abehega Yehoba 'ina paihowa bwebwe'ana 'ihegaineya 'atemiya , 'abwa nata tauna 'ilosalohi Yesu Keliso 'ina sabwelo madouna 'oina .
50001007	Moisa tuwa , 'ilobwaineya ma to'aha gidemusa weyahimi yalolotoho , eema nuwagu wete wa'eweya , weyahina 'omi mahetegwao Yehoba 'ilemelemegita bewa tuwa deliya yamiyamiya , ma 'ilemelemegita wete wasa bwebwe'ana 'ana he'ita ma 'ana 'abihewaiwai 'oidiya .
50001008	Yehoba wete 'isanasanapugau 'abehega Yesu Keliso 'ina helauwega nuwanuwagu 'omi ,
50001009	eeta ya'ahwa'ahwanoi weyahimi ta 'abehega wahehelau hilegomi ma 'oimiya helau 'imadou ma'imi sinasinapu ta wete ma'imi sanapu moisa ,
50001010	ee 'oinega nuwatuhu bwebwe'adi wahesinuwanedi , ma 'ane Keliso 'ina sabwelo 'abwa 'oina mumugami bwebwe'ana ma 'ehauna ,
50001011	ma'imi paihowa bwebwe'adi Yesu Keliso 'ina waiwaiyega , ta weyahidi tomota Yehoba sihepwatuwe ma si'ahwa bwebwe'ane .
50001012	Ciyagwao , nuwanuwagu ma wasanapu 'abehega mwauwedi yaloba pwaidiya ee 'oidiyega wasa bwebwe'ana 'i'elelewana tomota baibaiwadi 'oidiya .
50001013	Coinega tupwa bewa 'oina Sisa 'ina tolo'alehao ma tomota mabwaiyadi sihesagoha pwaiya 'abehega Keliso weyahina silagugauwa deliya .
50001014	Ta wete 'iyadao mabwaiyadi 'igu miya deliya si'iteya ma sihetahetapewa Bada 'ina paihowa 'oina , ta Yehoba 'ina gwae sihehepwaile ma'idi 'atepatu .
50001015	Tupwadi tologuguyao he'ipi'ipiyega silologuguya Keliso weyahina , ma tupwadi wete helauwega silologuguya ,
50001016	sisanapugauwa deliya yamiyamiya wasa bwebwe'ana 'ana he'ita weyahina ,
50001017	ma hesi tohe'ipi'ipiyedi nuwanuwadi ma nuwagu sigihegaladi bewa tuwa deliya yamiyamiya , 'oinega 'idi 'abowega Keliso tetelina siguguyae taudimo 'adi gilagata weyahina .
50001018	Ma tuwa Kelisoina wasana 'ana loguguya baibaiwana weyahina yayaliyaya , 'eguma 'abowega bo nuwana gwae moisega , yayaliyaya tuwa .
50001019	Ma wete yayaliyaya , weyahina yasanapuya 'abehega Yesu Keliso yaluyaluwana 'ina lema 'oinega ta 'imi 'ahwanoiyao weyahigu 'oidiyega nata lema yaloba miyamwau bewa 'oinega .
50001020	Taugu wete yahehemisa ma wete yanuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega geya'abwa yadebadeba mwadina , ta hesi yanuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega ma'igu 'atepatu bewa tuwa ma sauga mabwaiyana Keliso sanina yagihemadouwe , nuwana 'igu miya mayawasigu bale'u 'oina , nuwana 'igu 'amasa 'oina .
50001021	Ceguma yamiya bale'uwa beno Keliso ba'idagu , ma hesi 'eguma ya'amasa beno Keliso 'oinega loheposeyana yaloba .
50001022	Ceguma bale'uwa yamiyamiya 'igu paihowao bwebwe'adi silatulatu Keliso weyahina , 'oinega geya yasanapu to'aha nuwanuwagu ma yahesinuwe .
50001023	Weyahina ginaula 'eluwa 'oidiyega 'adi hesinuwa 'oiguwa mwau hedada . Nuwanuwagu ma bale'u bewa ya'ebesine ma Keliso mahetegu 'amiya , beno 'ebe yaliyaya madouna .
50001024	Ta hesi 'ilobwainegauwa ma bale'uwa yamiyamiya eema 'oinega 'ane yalemelemegomi .
50001025	Coinega yasanapu bwaibwainiya 'abehega 'omi mahetegwao tamiyamiya , ma yalemelemegomi eema wayaliyaya 'imi hemisa Keliso 'oina weyahina .
50001026	Eema 'abwa 'igu habo'ena hila 'oina , wayaliyaya madouna , beno Yesu Keliso 'ina lema 'oida .
50001027	Ta hesi wa'itayahigomi ma 'ane 'imi paihowao 'oidiyega tomota Keliso tetelina si'ahwa bwebwe'ane , eema 'eguma yahabo'enegomi , bo nuwana 'eguma yamiya hila , tuwa wasami bwebwe'ana yahesagohe 'abehega ma'imi 'atetagwala watoholo pa'ala , ta ma'imi nuwatuhu mahemahetena eema 'oinega wahetahetapewa wasa bwebwe'ana 'ana hemisa weyahina ,
50001028	ma geya'abwa wete wamatamatauta 'ami 'alehao 'oidiya . Ma 'eguma 'ami 'alehaowedi 'imi 'atepatu si'ita , beno taudi sisanapu moisa 'abehega sida hesilae , ma 'omi 'abihetena waloba Yehoba 'oinega .
50001029	Weyahina Yehoba 'itagwala pwaiya 'oimiya ma Keliso 'oina wahemihemisa , ma tauna wete weyahina wa'emuyamuya ,
50001030	taugu gidemusa 'igu lo'aleha Keliso weyahina 'agu muyao wa'itediya , ta bewa tuta wahesagohediya , ta 'omi wete 'imi lo'aleha ma 'ami muyao gidemusa waloba 'esedi .
50002001	Togidega , Keliso sawasawahina 'igihe 'atepatugita , nuwana 'ina helau 'igihe waiwaiyegita ? Togidega yaluyaluwa Tabuna sawasawahina 'ihe'iya'iyaguwegita , ma 'oinega tahelau hilegita ma tahe'ate muyamuyaegita ?
50002002	Ceguma gidemusa , 'ilobwainegomiya ma wanuwatuhu mahemahetena ma wahelau hilegomi 'omi , yaluyaluwami ma 'atemi 'idi he'aigeda 'oinega , ta 'imi helauina weyahina , 'ane yayaliyaya moisa .
50002003	Geya'abwa wanuwanuwa hane , nuwana wahehe'ipi'ipi , ma hesi wanuwasulu ma 'iyamiyao sanidiyao wagilagasidi .
50002004	Ma geya'abwa waboi 'imi paihowa weyahina wanuwanuwa , ta hesi 'iyamiyao 'idi miya bwebwe'ana weyahina wanuwatuhu .
50002005	Cilobwainegomiya ma 'imi nuwatuhuwao Yesu Keliso 'ina nuwatuhu gidemusa .
50002006	Yesuina Yehoba , ma genuwana ma 'ihetoloina ,
50002007	ta hesi Yehoba 'ina wasawasa 'i'ebesineya , ma 'ili'uwa bale'uwa eema 'iheloheya masiha , hewali 'aigeda gidemusa .
50002008	Ciheloheya ta 'inuwasuluwa eeta 'itagwaleya 'iboinamo ta 'i'amasa kelose 'oina .
50002009	Coinega Yehoba Yesu 'i'abihaneheya , ma wete sanina 'i'abihaneheya sani mabwaiyana tabwanidiya ,
50002010	ta 'oinega tauna sanina weyahina megalewa ma mebale'u ma wete to'amasao eema mabwaiyada ta'etuluha 'oina ,
50002011	ma ta'ahwa moisae 'abehega Yesu Keliso tauna Badaina , ta wete Tamada Yehoba tahepwatuwe .
50002012	Ciyagwao 'omi hematamatana lamuna . Mwalo mataguwa wahematamatana , ta bewa tuwa 'oimiyega yamiya bwaga , ma tuwa 'abwa wahematamatana moisa . Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma Yehoba wamataute ta wete watoho waiwai ma 'ina 'abihetena waloba ,
50002013	weyahina Yehobaina 'atemiya 'ihetahetapewa , ta 'abehega tauna 'ina nuwatuhuwega 'omi wanuwanuwatuhu ma wapaipaihowa .
50002014	Eema 'imi paihowa 'oidiya ma'imi tagwala wapaihowa ta geya'abwa ma'imi lowahi'wata walolomugi ,
50002015	ma hesi 'abehega 'omi Yehoba natunao bwebwe'ami ma 'ehaumi , ta geya wete 'imi galamo ma mebale'u 'idi mayale 'omi . Weyahina taudi 'idi mumuga guguyou ma galadi .
50002016	Ciyagwao , wasa bwebwe'ana wa'abiyahi momosi ma 'oinega yawasimi miyamiya hatayana waloba , ma tutaina Keliso 'ihilama taugu yayaliyaya weyahimi . Genuwagu ma 'igu paihowa 'oimiya 'adi mudala .
50002017	Wete 'eguma 'agu 'alehao 'i'iunamo silohe'amasigau , gide sipwaoliyegau , tuwa yayaliyaya , ma 'omi wete wada yaliyaya . Mwalo tutaina Yesu wahemiseya 'ana 'ita gidemusa wapwaopwaoli Yehoba 'oina , ma 'eguma ya'amasa , 'igu 'amasaina 'omi 'imi pwaoliyedi 'iloheposeyanedi .
50002018	Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya , ma 'omi ma taugu tayaliyaya hegogona .
50002019	Yanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega Bada Yesu 'ina lemega sawasawahina tuta 'i'iuna 'oina Timoti yahewaseyawa , ma 'ane wasami 'itauyeyama 'oiguwa , ma weyahimi yayaliyaya .
50002020	Timoti 'iboinamo 'imi miya weyahina 'inuwanuwatuhu madouna ,
50002021	ma 'iyamo 'agu tolemao baibaiwadi taudimo weyahidi sinuwanuwatuhu , ta geya Yesu Keliso 'ina paihowa weyahina sida nuwanuwa .
50002022	Ta Timoti wasanapuya 'abehega loheya bwebwe'ana , ma tuwa gidemusa natugu mahetegu wasa bwebwe'ana weyahina 'ahehetapewa waiwai .
50002023	Coinega 'eguma tutaina 'agu loina yahesagohe , nuwanuwagu ma Timotiina yahetuneyawa 'oimiya .
50002024	Ta wete yahemisa 'abehega Bada 'ina lemega tuta 'i'iuna ma taugu wete yatauyawa yahabo'enegomi .
50002025	Ta bewa tuwa 'igu nuwatuhu 'abehega 'ilobwaineya ma Epapilodito yahetune hileyawa 'oimiya , tauna tasigu ta mahetegu 'apaipaihowa , tuwa gide 'alolo'aleha Yesu Keliso weyahina . Epapiloditoina mwalo 'agu lema 'oimiyega 'itauyeyama ,
50002026	eeta bewa tuwa nuwanuwana 'omi , ma tutaina mwalo 'ina lohala wasana wahesagoheya , 'ebwa tauna 'inuwanuwatuhu ma 'abehega geya'abwa 'omi wa'ate'ateyoho 'ina lohala weyahina .
50002027	Moisa 'ilohala madouna , ma 'iyamo Yehoba 'i'atemuyemuyeya , ma wete taugu 'i'atemuyamuyaegauwa , weyahina 'eguma Epapiloditoina 'i'amasa nata yanuwagala moisa .
50002028	Bewa weyahina nuwanuwagu madouna ma yahetuneyawa , ma wa'ita hila 'abehega ma'ina bwebwe'ana , ma tauna weyahina wayaliyaya , ta wete 'abehega taugu 'igu 'ateyoho 'igumwala .
50002029	Eeta 'eguma to tuta 'ilatuwa 'oimiya , Bada saninega wabwauwe ma'imi yaliyaya 'oina . Ta tupwadi Bada 'ina topaihowao , 'eguma sitauyawa 'oimiya , wahe'asisiyanedi gidemusa Epapiloditoina .
50002030	Moisa tuwa , Epapilodito Keliso 'ina paihowa 'oina lohalega 'i'iunamo ma 'i'amasa , weyahina 'omi geya sawasawahina ma walemegau , ma Epapiloditoina 'ipasima ta 'ilemegau , eeta 'oinega lohalaina 'ilobeya .
50003001	Ciyagwao , 'ilobwainegomiya wete ma 'ida Bada 'oina wada yaliyaya . Mwalo 'ami loina yaleleyawa , ta bewa tuwa wete nuwanuwagu ma yalele hilawa , ma 'oinega wamiya bwebwe'ana .
50003002	Wa'itayahigomi galagalaidi 'idi mumuga gide tuwa 'edewa 'oidiyega , taudi 'adi 'ila'ilala si'upwa'upwa 'wapidiya .
50003003	Ma hesi tauda 'ada 'upwa 'ateda , ta geya 'wapida , 'eguma Yehoba 'oina ta'etuluha yaluyaluwanega , eema Yesu Keliso namo tahepwatuwe , ma sahena wasawasa bale'u 'oina tahehemisa .
50003004	Moisa tuwa , sawasawahigu ma wasawasa bale'u weyahina yagwae hane , weyahina taugu sanigu tomota baibaiwadi sanidiyao 'ihane sinediya ,
50003005	weyahina taugu gwama Isileli moisa , 'igu susu Beniyamina , eeta sabwelo 'eit 'igu li'u mulina 'igu 'ebeselolo 'wapina si'upweya , gide meYudiya 'ima 'ila'ilala , eema wete Palisiyao 'idi loinao yamuliyediya moisa .
50003006	Eeta yahetapewa madouna tohekalesiyao yagihe 'am'amnediya , ta geya 'eta wete Mosese 'ina loinao yaligeligehi .
50003007	Ma hesi saniguina madouna ya'ahwa ginaula besobesoweya , weyahina Keliso namo 'oina yatagwalegauwa .
50003008	Moisa tuwa , 'igu Bada Yesu Keliso 'ana sanapu bwebwe'ana hedada , eeta wasawasa bale'u 'ibwebwe'ana sinediya , 'oinega wasawasaedi ya'ahwa ginaula besobesowediya , eeta Keliso weyahina ginaula mabwaiyadi yaulediya ta ya'ahwa galaediya , weyahina nuwanuwagu Keliso namo ,
50003009	ma wete nuwanuwagu Keliso mahetegu 'amiya , geya 'abehega taugu 'igu mumuga dumwadumwalunega , bo Mosese 'ina loinao 'oidiyega , ta hesi hemisa Keliso 'oina weyahina , beno 'ida mumuga dumwadumwaluna Yehoba 'i'ebwaegita 'ida hemisa Keliso 'oina weyahina .
50003010	Nuwanuwagu wete Keliso yada sanapu ma 'ina toholohila 'ana waiwai yalotoho , ta 'ina muya wete tauna gidemusa yada lotohodi , wete gide 'igu 'amasa gide tauna ,
50003011	ma 'oinega , 'eguma sawasawahina 'amasega taugu wete yatoholo hila .
50003012	Geya 'abehega toholo hila yalobeya , geya wete 'igu mumuga mabwaiyana sibwebwe'ana , ta hesi bewa 'igu 'ebe masiina , ma 'abehega ya'abiyahi , weyahina nuwatuhu bewa weyahina Yesu Keliso 'i'abiyahi pwaigauwa .
50003013	Ciyagwao , geya yagwaegwae 'abehega ya'abiyahi pwaiya , ta hesi 'igu nuwatuhu 'aigeda tuwamo , 'oinega nuwatuhu muliguwa yanuwanaidedi , ma to'aha mataguwa weyahidi yatoho waiwai ,
50003014	beno 'ebe masiina , Yehoba 'ana maisa galewa Yesu Keliso 'oinega .
50003015	Coinega mabwaiyada bewa gidemusa tada nuwanuwatuhu mahemahetena , 'eguma 'ida nuwatuhu simatuha pwaiya . Ta wete 'eguma to'aha weyahina 'imi nuwatuhu hagana , ginaulaina lamuna Yehoba wete 'abwa 'ihe'ita 'oimiya .
50003016	Ma 'iyamo 'ilobwainegita ma ginaulaedi talobediya ta'abimomosidi .
50003017	Ciyagwao mabwaiyami wahe'au'aunawegau , ma taiyawedi taudi 'idi mumuga gidemusa taugu , 'oidiya wa'ebubuna , ma 'omi wete gidemusa wamumuga 'esa .
50003018	Ma 'iyamo tomota tupwana baibaiwadi 'idi mumuga 'oinega Keliso silo'aleheya , tauna Kelisoina weyahida 'i'amasa kelose 'oina . Tolo'alehaowedi mwalo yahepwailediya 'oimiya , bewa tuwa wete ma'igu dou yalohila , ma galaedi 'oimiya yahepwailedi .
50003019	Taudi nata 'abwa 'ebelosaloha 'oina sihesilae , weyahina 'idi hemisa gamwa seseha weyahina , ma nuwatuhu 'ebe debamwadinao sihehepwatuwedi , weyahina nuwatuhu bale'umo nuwanuwadi .
50003020	Ma tauda hesi 'ida tupwa galewa , eema nage 'oinega 'ada To'abihetena , tauna 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso , 'abwa 'ihilama , ta tauna weyahina tayamwayamwa .
50003021	Ma tutaina 'ihilama wahida 'ida buidi , nige we'awe'adi , ma 'ida buidi gide tauna wahina waiwaina ta 'ehauna gidemusa , ma 'ina paihowaina bewa tauna 'ina waiwaiyega , weyahina tauna sawasawahina ma ginaula mabwaiyadi 'oidiya 'ihetoloina .
50004001	Ciyagwao nuwagu wa'eweya moisa , ta yahelauwegomiya , ma 'abehega 'omi 'igu 'ebe yaliyaya moisa , nuwanuwagu ma loguguyaedi wamuliyedi , ma 'oidiyega watoholo pa'ala , 'ida Bada weyahina , ta tauna mahetemiu .
50004002	Comi wahiwahine sanimi Yu'odiya ma Sinitiki ya'ahwa'ahwanoi 'oimiya ma wada 'ahwa 'iya'iyagu hila , 'ida Badaina nuwanuwana gidemusa .
50004003	Cowa wete tohanugeta , 'owa 'iyagu moisa ya'ahwanoi 'oiuwa ma wahiwahineyedi 'ulemedi , weyahina mwalo taudi mahetegwao 'apaihowa mahemahetena , wasa bwebwe'ana 'ana hepwaila 'oina , ta wete Kelemeniti ma tupwadi wete 'agu tolemao mahetemayao 'apaihowa , taudi sanidi yawasi bukiina 'alona leleleina .
50004004	Tuta baibaiwana 'oidiya wada yaliyaya 'ida Bada weyahina , ta wete yahegwae hilegomi 'abehega wayaliyaya .
50004005	Cilobwainegomiya ma tomota mabwaiyadi 'imi he'alama'i'ita sida sanasanapu , weyahina 'i'iunamo 'ida Badaina 'ina sauga hilama .
50004006	Geya'abwa 'aigeda to'aha weyahina wanuwanuwa , ma hesi ma'imi loyauwedo ginaula mabwaiyadi weyahidi , Yehoba 'oina wa'etuluha , ta 'imi nuwatuhuwao weyahidi wa'ahwanoi ,
50004007	ma Yehoba 'ina lemao tomadou hedada 'oidiyega 'abwa 'igihe yaliyayegomi , ma 'oinega Yesu Keliso mahetemiu 'atemi ta 'imi nuwatuhuwao sibwebwe'ana .
50004008	Ciyagwao , bewa 'aigeda wete loguguya 'abehega wada nuwatuhu ginaula moisadi ma'adi he'asisi weyahidi , ma ginaula dumwadumwaludi weyahidi , ma ginaula 'ehaudi weyahidi , ma ginaula 'adi 'ita 'ausaladi weyahidi , ma ginaula helahelauidi weyahidi , ta 'eguma to'aha bwebwe'ana 'oidiya bo nuwana 'ebe hepwatu 'oidiya .
50004009	Comi wada he'au'aunawegau , 'igu paihowao wa'itediya , ta 'igu gwaeyao ta 'igu he'itao wahesagohediya ta wasanapudiya . Coinega Yehoba ma'ina nuwadaumwala mahetemiu nata wayaliyaya .
50004010	Cida Badaina 'igihe yaliyaya pwaigauwa , weyahina bewa tuwa wa'atemuyemuyegauwa . Moisa mwalo nuwanuwami ma walemegau , ma 'iyamo geya 'eta 'eda wada lobeya .
50004011	Ta hesi geya'abwa yalolomugi 'igu miya mwau mwalo 'oidiya weyahidi , weyahina yasanapu pwaiya sawasawahigu miya mabwaiyadi 'oidiya ma'igu yaliyaya tuwa ,
50004012	nuwana miya mwau 'oidiya nuwana 'ebe yaliyaya 'oidiya , nuwana tuta 'eli'eli , nuwana 'eguma ma'agu gomale , nuwana yahewasawasa , nuwana yahewewelohe ,
50004013	sawasawahigu miya mabwaiyana 'oidiya yada yaliyaya tuwa , weyahina tauna mahetegu 'igihe waiwaiyegauwa .
50004014	Ma 'iyamo 'igu miya mwau bewa wagihe malamalai pwaiya 'imi lemega , ta weyahina yaloyauwedo madouna 'oimiya .
50004015	Comi mePilipai wasanapu pwaiya 'abehega wasa bwebwe'ana 'ana hepwaila nugeta 'oimiya 'oina , tutaina Masidoniya ya'ebesineya , eeta geya 'eta 'asa tohekalesiyao 'idi 'ehele 'oinega silemelemegau , 'adi lema 'oiguwega 'ana maisa weyahina , ma hesi waboimo mePilipai walemegauwa .
50004016	Moisa tutaina mwalo Tesalonaika 'oina yamiyamiya 'agu lema ma'aigeda ta muliyetega heluwena wete wa'ebwaegauwa .
50004017	Cigu gwae bewa geya 'abehega nuwanuwagu 'ehele wada 'ebwaegau , ma hesi 'abehega 'imi 'ehele huwaina 'oimiya 'ida madou , 'ami lema moisa weyahina .
50004018	Ma 'imi 'eheleina Epapilodito 'itauyeyama , mabwaiyana yalobeya 'imaha tasitasiwa , gide 'ane 'imi pwaoli bwebwe'ana Yehoba 'oina , wagabu pwaiya eeta mahaina bwebwe'ana Yehoba 'inisoya , ta weyahina 'iyaliyaya .
50004019	Coinega 'igu Yehobaina 'imi nuwatuhuwao mabwaiyadi nata 'i'ebwaegomi , beno tauna 'ina wasawasa baibaiwa hedada Yesu Keliso 'ina paihowao 'oidiyega .
50004020	Coinega 'ida Yehoba Tamadaiina tada hepwatuwe hataya . Emeni .
50004021	Cigu helau Yesu Keliso 'ina tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi 'oidiya . Wete 'iyagwao 'ebwa mahetegwao 'amiyamiya 'idi helau 'oimiya .
50004022	Ma tohekalesiyao taudi Sisa 'ina hada sipaipaihowa , ma tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi wete 'idi helau 'oimiya .
50004023	Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina helauwega yaluyaluwami sida miya bwebwe'ana . Taugu Paulo .
51001001	Taugu Paulo , ma Yehoba 'ina hesinuwega yahetohepwaila Yesu Keliso weyahina , ta tasidai Timoti 'i'abihetegauwa , 'oinega 'imi leta bewa yaleleyawa ,
51001002	'omi meKolose , Yehoba 'ina bodao , ma Keliso 'ana tohemisao , 'oimiya . Tamada Yehoba 'ina helauwega tuwa wamiya daumwala .
51001003	Sauga mabwaiyana 'ima 'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina , tauna 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso Tamana , ma 'anuwanuwa tuhugomi ta weyahimi 'aloloyauwedo .
51001004	Weyahina wasami 'ahesagoheya , 'abehega Yesu Keliso wahemisaeya , ma tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi wahelauwediya .
51001005	Weyahina wanuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega 'imi 'ebe yaliyaya 'abwa waloba galewa , gide wasaina moisa mwalo wahesagoheya .
51001006	Wasaina wahesagoheya ta sauga bewa tupwa mabwaiyadi 'oidiya 'ihehemadou ma 'ihuwahuwa , 'omi gide saugaina Yehoba 'ina helau wahesagoha nugeteya Epapila 'oinega , ma wa'ahwa moisaeya .
51001007	Moisa , 'iyada Epapilaina loheya bwebwe'ana , 'oinega wasaina 'ihe'ita nugetegomiya . Weyahina tauma 'ihemiyalaemaiya ta 'ihehetapewa Keliso weyahina 'oimiya .
51001008	Eeta Epapilaina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ana helau 'atemiya 'ihepwaileya 'oima .
51001009	Saugaina wasami 'ahesagoha nugeteya 'ana siga bewa , 'ima 'ahwanoi weyahimi geya 'ada lolaguwa . Ma hesi Yehoba 'oina 'a'ahwa'ahwanoi ma 'oinega Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'i'abihenuwa sabwalenigomi , ta 'ane wasanapu bwaibwaini to'aha 'ina nuwatuhu weyahimi .
51001010	Ta 'imi paihowaedi 'oidiyega 'ida Badaina wa'abihe yaliyaya . Ma wete mumugami bwebwe'ana 'ihuwahuwa , ta Yehoba 'ana sanapu 'oimiya 'ihemadou .
51001011	Ma wete tauna 'ina waiwai madounega 'i'abihe waiwaiyegomi , ma 'imi paihowa mabwaiyadi 'oidiya wahe'alama'i'itanegomi , ma watoholo pa'ala , ta wete ma'imi yaliyaya ,
51001012	waloyauwedo Tamadai 'oina , weyahina tauna 'ina tagwalega tupwa 'asi'asilalaina 'oina tamiyamiya , 'ina tomotaiyao ba'idadao .
51001013	Moisa , tupwa guguyou 'oinega 'i'etolihasigita ma 'ilagubuigita Natuna 'ina 'ebeloina bwebwe'ana 'oina .
51001014	Weyahina tauna 'oina 'etolihasa talobeya , beno 'ida pui 'oidiyega 'ibuyogita .
51001015	Tauda geya sawasawahida ma Yehoba ta'ita , ma hesi 'ana 'ita tuwa Natunaina , ma Yehoba 'ana paipaihowa mabwaiyadi Natunaina 'ihane sinediya .
51001016	Weyahina Natunaina ginaula mabwaiyadi galewa ta bale'uwa huhudi , ginaulaedi ta'ita'itadi ma ginaulaedi geya tada 'itediya , gide aneloseyao bo toloinao waiwaidi bo yaluyaluwao , mabwaiyadi Yehoba 'ipaihowediya Natuna 'ina paihowega , ma Natunaina weyahina .
51001017	Ma tuta nugenugetana 'oina mulina ma ginaula mabwaiyadi geya silatu , ma nugeta Natuna 'imiyamiya . Ta Natunaina 'ina waiwaiyega ginaula mabwaiyadi sipaipaihowa .
51001018	Tauda tohekalesiyao gide tuwa yahunao ma tauna debada , ma tauna 'ebehegaina , ta tauna wete totoholo hila nugenugetaina 'amasega . Ma 'oinega ginaula mabwaiyadi 'ilohane sinediya .
51001019	Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu gide ma 'ina waiwai ta 'ina mumuga mabwaiyadi 'oidiyega Yesu 'ilohemaheya .
51001020	Ta Yesu kelose 'oina bweyahina 'ina dauwega ginaula mabwaiyadi bale'uwa ma galewa simiyawasiya 'i'ewedima Yehoba 'oina sabi he'iya'iyagu hila .
51001021	Comi wete mwalo wamiya wasiwasiya , ta 'imi nuwatuhuwega Yehoba walo'aleheya , 'oinega wamumuga galagala .
51001022	Ta Yesu wahina 'ina 'amasa 'oinega 'i'ewegomiya ma 'oinega Yehoba ba'idamiu wahe'iya'iyagu hila , ma'imi mumuga bwebwe'ana ma dumwaluna matana .
51001023	Beno 'eguma 'imi hemisa sahena 'iwe'awe'a , ma 'eguma watoholo pa'ala wasaina bwebwe'anaina wahesagoheya 'ana hemisa 'oina , ma sahena wa'ebe'ebesine . Wasaina 'ana lohatoto tomota mabwaiyadi bale'uwa sihesagoha pwaiya , ma taugu Paulo 'ana tohepwaila 'aigeda .
51001024	Coinega sauga bewa 'agu muya yalobaloba 'omi weyahimi , ma tuwa ma'igu yaliyaya . Taugu wahigu 'ina muya ma Keliso 'ina muya 'ilohegogoneya ta 'imadouwa , tohekalesiyao weyahidi , beno taudi Keliso wahina .
51001025	Eeta tohekalesiyao 'omi weyahimi taugu wete Yehoba 'ina loinega yahetopaihowa , ma 'oinega Yehoba 'ina gwae yahehepwaila latuhe .
51001026	Gwaeina mwalo tubudao 'oidiyega 'idahweya , ma tuta bewa 'ilagu latuheyama 'ina tomotaiyao tauda 'oida .
51001027	Weyahina Yehoba nuwanuwana ma sanapu bewa mwalo dahwadahwaina ma bwebwe'ana hedade , 'abehega 'ilagulatuhe 'omi ganamuli 'oimiya , beno Keliso nuwamiya 'imiyamiya , ma tauna 'oinega wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tupwa wasawasa 'oina waluhu .
51001028	Tauna Kelisoina 'ahehepwaile , ma'ima sanapu moisa 'aloguguya ta 'ahehe'ita tomota mabwaiyami 'oimiya , ma 'abehega Keliso 'ana tohemisao 'omi ma 'a'abilatuhegomi mamumugami mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana ta matuwana .
51001029	Bewa weyahina yahehetapewa , ta yahewaiwai , tauna 'ina waiwai nuwaguwa 'i'ebwaegauwa 'oinega .
51002001	Nuwanuwagu ma wanuwa sabwalena 'abehega taugu yahetahetapewa madouna 'omi weyahimi , ma wete Leodisiya weyahidi , ma wete taudi 'abwa geya si'itegau weyahidi .
51002002	Ma 'ane wete taudi helauwega sihe'iya'iyagu moisa , ma'adi lotohona bwebwe'ana ta ma'idi sanapu moisa , 'oinega siyaliyaya madouna , weyahina sinuwa sabwalena sanapuina mwalo dahwadahwaina , beno Keliso .
51002003	Ma Kelisoina 'oina sonoga ma sanapu mabwaiyana simiyamiya , beno 'ida wasawasa madouna .
51002004	Bewa yagwaegwae ma 'oinega sahena hali tomota 'idi gwae hotohotodiyega si'abo'abowegomi .
51002005	Sauga bewa wahigu 'imiya bwaga 'oimiyega , ta 'igu nuwatuhu 'oimiya 'imiyamiya , 'oinega yayaliyaliyaya 'imi miya bwebwe'ana ma'imi hemisa waiwai Keliso 'oina weyahina .
51002006	Bada Yesu Keliso 'oina 'atemi watagwala pwaidiya , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma tauna 'ina waiwaiyega watautauya .
51002007	Weyahina Kelisoina 'imi hemisa huhuna , ta 'ana 'abihemadou , ta 'ana 'abihepa'ala , gide 'ahe'itegomiya , ma weyahina waloyauwedo madouna .
51002008	Gesowana teya 'i'abowegomi tomota 'idi sanapuwega , weyahina sanapuwedi ginaula bwagabwaga bale'uwega , ma geya Keliso 'oinega .
51002009	Weyahina Keliso 'iboi 'oina Yehoba 'ina waiwai ta 'ina mumuga mabwaiyana simiyamiya .
51002010	Ta Keliso 'oinega bwebwe'ana moisa waloba pwaiya , tauna aneloseyao ma hi'ahi'a 'ihewaiwai sinediya ta 'iloina sinediya .
51002011	Ma wete Keliso 'oinega 'ami 'ila'ilala walobeya , gide 'upwa , geya 'wapimi 'oina , ma hesi bale'u mumugana 'atemiyega 'i'upwa yahuleya .
51002012	Coinega Keliso ba'idamiu babitaiso wa'eweya gide 'amasa , ta wete Keliso ba'idamiu 'imi babitaisowega watoholo hila . Weyahina Yehoba 'ina waiwai wahemisaeya 'abehega Keliso 'amasega 'i'abihetoholo hileya .
51002013	Comi mwalo geya 'wapi'upwa waloba , ta 'imi puiyao weyahidi gide 'ama'amasimi , ma hesi Keliso ba'idadai yawasi bwebwe'ana Yehoba 'i'ebwaegita , beno 'ida puiyedi 'inuwasamudiya .
51002014	Eeta 'ida lowaga 'ana loina mwauna 'i'upwa yahuleya , ma 'ana kelose 'oina 'itutu hepa'iya .
51002015	Ma wete welabanao ma yaluyaluwa galadi gide hi'ahi'a 'i'abi suluhediya ma 'ana keloseyega 'adi debamwadina 'ilaguya , ta 'ihewaiwai sinediya .
51002016	Coinega sahena 'eta taiya 'i'ahwa'ahwa galagalaegomi 'ami bo nuwana 'ami we'aha weyahidi , 'eguma 'omi 'adi bwabwale geya wapaihowadi , nuwana wai'ena 'ehauna 'ana sauga , bo nana Sabati 'oidiya .
51002017	Ginaulaedi ma'ama'ayau tuwa , ma 'adi moisaina Keliso tauna .
51002018	Coinega sahena 'eta taiya 'i'ahwa'ahwa galagalaegomi weyahina 'omi geya watapwa tapwalolo ma'imi nuwasulu aneloseyao 'oidiya . Weyahina tomotaedi 'adi sanapu nihiyega weyahidi sigagasa , ma sinuwahane mumuga bale'u 'oidiyega .
51002019	Ma hesi Keliso 'ana nuwatuhu geya 'oidiya , tauna debada , ta tauda yahinao gide nimana nana 'ahena , wahina 'aigeda tuwa . Wahinaowedi sipaipaihowa 'aigeda wahi 'ana bwebwe'ana weyahina ma 'imadomadou , ta 'ana madouina Yehoba 'ina paihowega .
51002020	Mwalo wa'amasa Keliso ba'idamiu , 'oinega mumuga gogo gabulena 'ana loina 'oimiya 'ilolaguwa , ma to'aha weyahina 'abwa wapaipaihowa gide gogo gabulena mumugana .
51002021	To'aha weyahina tomota 'idi he'itao ta 'idi loinao wahehematamatanedi 'abehega gesowana 'e'ahai hehe'asisina wa'abi'abitohodi bo walolotohodi . Ta ginaulaedi sawasawalidi ma 'eguma tahepaihowedi , nata sigumwala .
51002022	
51002023	Moisa , loinaedi 'adi 'ita gide sanapu moisa , weyahina 'adi tomuliyaowedi ma'idi he'asisi ta ma'idi nuwasulu sipaipaihowa , ta wete wahidi sihemuyedi ; ma tuwa geya 'eta 'idi waiwaimo , ma hesi wahidi 'idi nuwatuhu dahwana 'iloinaedi .
51003001	Yehoba Keliso ba'idamiu 'ihetoholo hilegomiya , 'oinega galewa ginaulaedi wa'ebesedi , nobwa Kelisoina Yehoba 'ina 'ebeulega galewa 'imiyamiya .
51003002	Wete 'imi nuwatuhuwao walagudi galewa ginaulaedi 'oidiya ma sahena gabula ginaulaedi 'oidiya .
51003003	Weyahina bo'i wa'amasa , ma bewa tuwa yawasimi Keliso ba'idamiu Yehoba 'oina .
51003004	Weyahina yawasida bwebwe'ana Keliso 'oinega ta'eweya , 'oinega 'abwa tutaina Keliso 'ilatuma , 'omi wete Keliso ba'idamiu walatu 'ina 'asilala wasawasa 'oina .
51003005	Coinega gogo gabulena mumugana 'oimiya walohe'amasidi , beno logwali , pui , ma henuhenuwa galadi ma hewasawasa , beno hali 'ebehemisao 'adi tuluha .
51003006	Ma nuwatuhuwedi bewa weyahidi 'abwa Yehoba 'igamwasowalegita .
51003007	Moisa , mumuga galadiyedi mwalo wapaihowediya .
51003008	Ma hesi sauga bewa 'oina 'ilobwaineya ma walogwahatedi , beno 'aleha ma gamwasowala ma he'ipi'ipi , ma sinala , ta 'ahwa galagala .
51003009	Ma wete sahena wa'e'abo'abo 'iyamiyao 'oidiya , weyahina bale'u mumugana walogwahateya .
51003010	Ta mumuga 'ehauna walobeya , weyahina 'ada topaihowaina sauga mabwaiyana 'i'abihe 'ehaugita , ma 'ane tauna wasanasanapu ma mumugana wahe'au'aunaowe .
51003011	Coinega geya 'eta wataha 'imiyamiya ma 'abehega wagwae “ Yudiya boda hagadi ma tauma boda hagama , ” bo wagwae , “ Taudi meYudiya 'adi 'ila'ilala si'upweya 'wapidiya boda hagana , ma taudi geya si'upwa boda hagadi , ” nuwana taumanao bo tomiya pwatula boda hagadi , nuwana wete topaihowao ma babadao hali bodao . Ma tuwa Keliso 'ina boda mabwaiyada . Ma 'ateda Keliso 'iboi 'ilohegogonegita .
51003012	Ta 'omi Yehoba 'ina helauwega 'ihesinuwanegomiya tauna weyahina , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma wa'atemuyamuya , ma wahehelau hilegomi ma wanuwasulu ma'imi hohobiga ta wete ma'imi 'alama'i'ita .
51003013	Ma wahe'abi 'abihetegomi 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oimiya , ta sahena 'iyamiyao wa'ahwa'ahwa yaliyedi , ma hesi 'idi pui wanuwasamudi . Weyahina 'ida Bada tauna wete 'imi pui mabwaiyadi 'inuwasamudiya .
51003014	Ma 'ilobwainegomiya mumugami wahehelau hilegomi , weyahina helau 'oinega paihowa mabwaiyana sidumwalu .
51003015	Ta wete Keliso 'ina nuwadaumwala nuwami 'iloinaedi . Bewa weyahina Yehoba mabwaiyada 'ibwauwegita ma taheboda 'aigeda , ma weyahina taloyauwedo 'oina .
51003016	Wete Kelisoina 'ina gwae bwebwe'adi 'atemiya sibwala moisa , ma 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oimiya wahehe'ita ma walolohatoto sanapu moisa 'oinega , ta wete 'ami wali ma Same walinao 'oidiyega , wete walibui 'oidiyega , Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega , ma'imi loyauwedo Yehoba 'oina 'atemiyega .
51003017	Ma mumugami mabwaiyadi , beno 'imi gwaeyao nana 'imi paihowao mabwaiyadi 'ida Bada Yesu saninega wapaihowa ma'imi loyauwedo Yesu saninega , Tamada Yehoba 'oina .
51003018	Cida Bada 'ina tomotaiyao tauda , ta 'ilobwaineya ma wahiwahine haihainimi mwanemiyao 'idi gwae wahematamatanedi .
51003019	Wete gide 'omi loheloheya , mwanemiyao wahelauwedi ta sahena waheheliyedi .
51003020	Gwagwama 'omi wete sauga mabwaiyana tamamiyao ma sinamiyao 'enadi wamuliyedi , bewa 'ida Bada 'ina 'ebeyaliyaya .
51003021	Ma 'omi hehenatunimi , sahena natumiyao wa'abi'abihe gamwasowalidi , nata gide 'adi wahi'wata walagu .
51003022	Comi topaihowao wete 'imi babadao bale'uwa 'idi gwae wahematamatanedi nuwatuhu mabwaiyadi weyahidi . Ma sahena sigwaegwae yahigomi 'abwa wapaihowa ma'imi hohobiga , ma 'oinega 'abehega wa'abi heyaliyayadi . Ma hesi sauga baibaiwana ma'imi tagwala Yehoba 'ana he'asisiyega .
51003023	Ta 'imi paihowa mabwaiyana 'oidiyega wagwahubiga , geya 'abehega tomota weyahidi , ma hesi Yehoba weyahina .
51003024	Ma muliyetega Badaina 'oinega 'ami maisa wa'ewa , weyahina 'ida Bada Keliso weyahina tapaipaihowa .
51003025	Ma hesi taudi togalaedi nata 'ihemaisedi ginaula galadi 'oidiyega , weyahina 'ina loina 'aigeda tuwa tomota mabwaiyada 'oida .
51004001	Ma 'omi babadao waloina dumwalu 'imi topaihowao 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oidiya , weyahina wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'omi 'imi Bada 'imiyamiya galewa .
51004002	Wa'itayahigomi ma sahena 'imi 'ahwanoi siwe'awe'a , ma hesi waloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , ma wahe'alama'i'itana 'imi 'ahwanoi 'oidiya .
51004003	Tauma wete weyahima wa'ahwanoi , ma 'oinega Yehoba 'ima 'eda 'i'abilatuhe 'oima , ma 'oinega Keliso wasana dahwadahwaina 'ahepwaila latuhe tomota 'oidiya . Tauna wasaina bewa 'ana hepwaila weyahina silagu luhuwegauwa deliya .
51004004	Coinega wa'ahwanoi weyahigu , ma wasaina 'ana sanapu ya'abilatuhe ma 'i'asilala , 'igu paihowa gide 'ana lobwaina .
51004005	Wete taudi geya Keliso 'ana tohemisao 'oidiya wapaihowa dumwalu , ma sahena 'imi sauga wamudamudali .
51004006	Catemuyemuyega sauga mabwaiyana wagwaegwae ma'imi sanapu moisa , eeta 'eguma 'iyamiyao sihesilalegomi , wahemaise gwae dumwaluwega .
51004007	Cabwa Tikiko 'itauyawa ma 'igu paihowa mabwaiyana 'ihepwailedi 'oimiya . Tauna 'iyadai bwebwe'ana , ma Yehoba 'ina topaihowa dumwadumwaluna , ma ba'idamai mahemahetena 'apaipaihowa .
51004008	Beno bo'i yahewaseyawa 'oimiya , ma tauma 'ima miyaina 'ihepwaile 'oimiya ma wete 'ina gwaeyega 'i'abihe pa'aligomi .
51004009	Ma tasidai Onesimo Tikiko ba'idana sitautauyawa , ta Onesimoina tauna tuwa 'imi 'asa loheyaina , ta loheya bwebwe'ana , ma'ana hemisa . Ma taudi to'aha 'ebwa silatulatuwa sihegwaegwae 'oimiya .
51004010	Alisitako ba'idagu deliya 'amiyamiya , ta 'ina loyauwedo 'oimiya bewa yahepwaileyawa . Ma wete Maki , tauna Banaba nibaina . ( Mwalo yahenuwa laguwegomiya Maki weyahina , 'eguma 'itautauyawa wabwauwe 'imi hada . )
51004011	Ma wete Yesu , tauna sanina heluwena Yusito , taudi sitetoi 'idi loyauwedo 'oimiya . Sitetoiyedi meYudiya 'ebwa ba'idagwao 'apaipaihowa Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina weyahina . Ma taudi 'igu miya mwauna 'oinega si'abi'abihe waiwaiyegau .
51004012	Epapila wete 'ina loyauwedo 'oimiya , tauna 'aigeda 'imi boda 'oimiyega . Ta 'ipaipaihowa To'abihetena Yesu weyahina , ma wete 'ina 'ahwanoi 'oidiya 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi waiwai ma 'ane watoholo pa'ala , ma'imi mumuga mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana , gide Yehoba nuwanuwana .
51004013	Moisa , Epapilaina bo'i 'ihehetapewa 'omi weyahimi , ma wete taudi Leodisiya ta Hiyelapolowedi weyahidi .
51004014	Wete 'iyadai Luke , tauna to'abilohala , ma Dimasa 'idi loyauwedo 'oimiya .
51004015	Ciyadao Leodisiya tupwaina 'oina simiyamiya 'igu loyauwedo wahepwaila 'oidiya , ma wete tohekalesiyaowedi wahineina Nimpa 'ina hada sitapwalolo 'oidiya .
51004016	Bewa 'imi leta 'omi tohekalesiyao wahasili nugete , ma muliyetega wahewase tohekalesiyao tupwa Leodisiya 'oidiya , ta wete Leodisiya 'idi leta wete sihewasaeyawa 'oimiya ma wahasili .
51004017	Ma Alikipo wahegwae 'abehega , “ Paihowaina Badaina 'i'ebwaegowa 'uhetapewa ma 'ulosalohi . ”
51004018	Loyauwedo bewa taugu nimaguwega yaleleya , wanuwatuhu yahigau 'abehega deliya yamiyamiya . Cigu helau madouna 'oimiya . Taugu Paulo .
52001001	Taugu Paulo ma Sailasa ma Timoti ba'idagwao bewa 'imi leta 'aleleyawa , 'omi tohekalesiyao Tesalonaika 'oina , 'omi Tamada Yehoba ma Bada Yesu Keliso 'adi tohemisao . Taudi 'idi helauwega tuwa wamiya daumwala .
52001002	Sauga baibaiwana 'aloloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , mumugami bwebwe'ana weyahina , ma wete tuta mabwaiyana Tamada Yehoba 'oina 'a'ahwa'ahwanoi weyahimi .
52001003	Cimi hemisa ma 'imi paihowa bwebwe'adi 'anuwatuhu yahidi , ma wete 'imi paihowao helauwega , ma'imi 'alama'i'ita , wete ma'imi hemisa ma 'ane 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'i'abihetegomi .
52001004	Moisa tuwa , 'iyamayao , Yehoba bo'i 'ihelauwegomiya ta 'ihesinuwegomiya .
52001005	Coinega tutaina tetela bwebwe'ana ya'ebwaegomiya , geya 'abehega gwae namo , ma hesi Yaluyaluwa Tabuna gwaeina 'i'abihe pa'aliya 'oimiya , ma 'ane gwaeina wa'ahwa moisae , ta tauma wete 'ima paihowa weyahimi wa'iteya , beno paihowa dumwaluna .
52001006	Coinega bo'i wahe'au'aunawemaiya , ma wete 'ida Badaina wahe'au'aunaweya , ta wamiya mwauwa , ma hesi tetelaina wa'eweya ma'imi yaliyaya , ta yaliyayaina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega 'itauyama .
52001007	Coinega 'omi 'ebe'ita bwebwe'ana , ma Keliso 'ana tohemisao tupwa Masidoniya ma Akaya 'oidiya sihe'au'aunawegomiya wete .
52001008	Moisa , 'ida Bada tetelina bo'i 'oimiyega 'idabalala Masidoniya ma Akaya 'oidiya , ma wete 'omi 'imi hemisa Yehoba 'oina tetelina bo'i 'idabalala tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiya , 'oinega 'eguma to tupwa 'oina 'atauya , geya sowasowahima weyahimi 'ahegwaegwae ,
52001009	weyahina taudi 'oima sihegwaegwaeya , 'omi 'imi tagwala mwalo 'oima weyahina , 'abehega 'imi 'ebe hemisaedi miyamiyaidi walogwahatediya , ma Yehoba 'iboi 'oina watagwalegomiya , weyahina tauna tuwa 'iboi Yehoba moisa ma mayawasina , 'oinega tauna weyahina wapaipaihowa ,
52001010	ma Natuna wayamwayamwa ma to tuta 'oina ma galewega 'isuluma , tauna tuwa Yesuina Yehoba 'amasega 'i'abihetoholo hileya ma 'i'abihetegita , ma 'ane sahena 'ebe yatala 'oina talatulatu .
52002001	Ciyamayao , wasanapu pwaiya 'abehega mwalo 'ima habo'ena 'oimiya geya 'ahabo'ena besobeso , ma hesi huwaina 'alobeya .
52002002	Wanuwatuhuyahi wete mePilipai mwalo simumuga geyogeyoiyemaiya ta si'abihedeba mwadinemaiya , ma tuwa Yehoba tauna 'i'abihe'ate patuwemaiya ma tetelina bwebwe'ana 'ahepwaileya 'oimiya , bwagana tomota silolo'alehemai , ma 'alologuguya 'oimiya ,
52002003	sahena 'abowega , wete sahena gwae galana 'oinega , ma hesi gwae moisa 'oinega .
52002004	Weyahina 'ima paihowa bewa Yehoba 'itagwala 'oima ma tetela bwebwe'ana 'ahepwaila latuweya , 'oinega 'ima hepwailaedi beno geya to'aha tomota nuwanuwadi , ma hesi to'aha Yehoba nuwanuwana . Eeta nuwatuhuwedi 'atema simiyamiya , bwebwe'adi bo galadi , Yehoba 'iboimo 'isanasanapu .
52002005	Ma wasanapuya mwalo 'atauyawa 'oimiya , geya 'ima gwae hotohotodi , ma wete Yehoba 'isanapuya geya 'abehega 'agwaegwae 'abo'abo ma 'abehega 'imi tobwatobwa 'a'ewadi .
52002006	Ma wete ginaulaedi 'apaipaihowadi matamiya ma hali tomota matadiya geya tauma 'ama hepwatu weyahina , ma hesi 'omi 'ami lema weyahina .
52002007	Moisa , tauma Keliso 'ana tohepwailao , sowasowana 'ahetoloina 'oimiya , ma hesi geya . Mumugama 'oimiya ma'ima wahinuha , gide wahine natunao 'oidiya ma'ina wahinuha .
52002008	Ma nuwama wa'eweya , 'oinega ma'ima tagwala 'oimiya Yehoba tetelina 'ahepwaileya , ma wete taumamo 'atagwalemaiya , ma 'ahe'iya'iyagu bwaibwainigomiya .
52002009	Ciyamayao , wanuwatuhuya mwalo 'ima paihowa 'oimiya , sabwelo ma nihuwana 'oidiya 'apaipaihowa sinabwana , ta 'oinega taumamo 'ahehe'aimai , ma wete Yehoba tetelina 'ahehepwaila 'oimiya , weyahina geya nuwama 'ami mwau 'alagu 'ama 'itayahina weyahina .
52002010	Comi Keliso 'ana tohemisao , ma tauma mumugama 'oimiya wasanapuya , ma Yehoba wete 'isanapumaiya 'abehega 'ehauma , ma wete dumwaluma , ma bwebwe'ama .
52002011	Weyahina mabwaiyami 'a'itayahigomiya , gide tuwa loheya natunao 'i'ita'itayahi 'esedi .
52002012	Ma wete 'alohatotowegomiya ma 'a'abihe waiwaiyegomiya , ta 'ahegwaegomi ma mumugami 'ibwebwe'ana , weyahina Yehoba bo'i 'ihesinuwegomiya 'ina 'ebeloina 'asi'asilalana weyahina .
52002013	Ciyamayao tuta mabwaiyana 'aloloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , weyahina Yehoba 'ina gwae bo'i 'a'ebwaegomiya ta 'oina watagwalegomi , geya 'abehega tomota 'idi gwae , ma hesi Yehoba 'oinega . Moisa , gwaeina Yehoba 'oinega , ma wahemiseya , ma 'ana waiwai walotoho pwaiya .
52002014	Ma wete miya mwauna walobeya , gide wete taudi Yesu Keliso 'ana tohemisao tupwa Yudiya 'oina , weyahina tohekalesiyaowedi 'idi miyamwau silobeya taudimo 'idi tomotaiyao 'oidiyega , gide wete 'omi 'imi miyamwau walobeya waboi 'imi tomotaiyao 'oidiyega .
52002015	Weyahina taudi meYudiya mumugadi bewa gide 'ida Bada Yesu silohe'amasiya , ma wete mwalo hene palopitao silohe'amasidiya , ta tauma wete silo'alehemaiya , 'oinega Yehoba geya nuwana taudi .
52002016	Eeta hali boda wete si'ausidi , ta 'ima hepwaila 'omi 'asa ganamuli 'oimiya sitohotoho ma si'ausimai , weyahina geya nuwadi ma Yehoba 'i'abihetegomi , 'oinega Yudiyaedi 'idi puiyao sisinabwa hedada , ma 'ana maisa beno muya madouna Yehoba 'i'ebwaedi .
52002017	Ciyamayao , mwalo 'a'ebesinegomiya ta sauga to'uto'upanamo geya 'ada 'itahilegomiya , ma hesi geya 'anaidegomi , ma 'atoho waiwai ma 'atauyawa sabi 'itahilegomi .
52002018	Moisa , taugu Paulo yatohotoho waiwai ma 'abehega 'atauyawa ma 'abo'enegomi , ta yatoho'asaya , weyahina Seitani 'ima 'eda 'igibodeya .
52002019	Moisa tuwa 'omi weyahimi 'anuwatuhu yahiya , ma 'ane tutaina 'ida Bada Yesu 'ina latuhilama ,
52002020	nata hepwatu ma yaliyaya weyahimi 'aloba .
52003001	Tutaina Ateni 'oina 'amiyamiya ta 'a'ate'ateyoho weyahimi , 'oinega yalohatotowa ma yagwae , “ Timoti 'utauya Tesalonaika ma 'ateluwa 'ebwa 'amiyamiya . ”
52003002	Coinega 'iyadaina Timoti yahesumaneyawa , weyahina tauna wete 'aigeda 'ima boda Yehoba 'ina paihowa Keliso tetelina weyahina , 'iyadaina yahesumaneyawa ma 'ane 'i'abihe waiwaiyegomi ma Keliso 'oina wahemisa moisa ,
52003003	ma 'ane sahena 'ami mwauwao 'oidiyega wawe'awe'a . Weyahina miyamwauwedi wasanapudiya 'abehega mabwaiyada talobalobadi .
52003004	Weyahina mwalo tauma 'amiyamiya ba'idamiyao , ma 'ahepwaila nugeta 'oimiya , nata miyamwauwedi silatu 'oimiya , ta nige bewa silatulatu .
52003005	Bewa huhuna 'oinega yanuwanuwatuhu hedade , ma Timoti yahewasaeyawa ma 'imi hemisa 'i'ita , ma tetelimi 'i'eweyama , weyahina ya'ateyohowa Seitani 'oina , nata gide 'ebetoho madouna 'i'ebwaegomi ma wawe'a , ma nata gide 'ima paihowa mwalo 'oimiya 'i'abihegala .
52003006	Coinega Timoti 'itauyawa 'i'itegomiya ma tetelimi 'i'eweyama , 'igwaeya , “ Tesalonaikaedi Keliso 'oina sihemisa moisa , ma taudi tohelau moisa , ma tuta mabwaiyana 'ida tauya nugeta 'oidiya sinuwanuwa tuhuyahi ma'idi yaliyaya , ma nuwanuwadi wete si'ita hilegita . ” Tauma gide wete nuwanuwama ma 'omi 'a'ita hilegomi .
52003007	Ciyamayao , bwagana ma'ama mwau , ta 'ama muya , ma hesi 'imi hemisa tetelina 'ahesagoheya ta 'i'abihe yaliyayemaiya .
52003008	Coinega 'imi toholo waiwai 'ida Bada weyahina 'amnama 'ibwebwe'ana .
52003009	Coinega 'ima loyauwedo Yehoba 'oina geya sowasowahina 'alolagu , weyahina Yehoba 'oina 'ima yaliyaya weyahimi 'imadou hedada .
52003010	Coinega nihuwana ma sabwelo 'oidiya 'a'ahwa'ahwanoi madouna ma 'abehega 'ami 'oleya 'a'itahila , ma wete hisa 'ebewe'a 'oimiya simiyamiya 'oidiyega 'a'abihe pa'aligomi .
52003011	Coinega bewa 'igu nuwatuhu 'eluwa . Nugeta Tamada Yehoba ma 'ida Bada Yesu 'ima 'eda siloina ma 'oinega 'atauyawa 'oimiya .
52003012	Ta heluwena 'abehega Bada helauwega 'ilohemahegomi ma waboi wahelau hilegomi , ma wete tomota hagadi wahelauwedi moisa , gide tauma 'ahehelau 'esegomi .
52003013	Ma 'ane 'abwa tutaina 'ida Bada Yesu , ma 'ana tohemisao silatuma , 'omi ma'imi waiwai ta nuwami 'ehaudi , Tamada Yehoba matana watoholo .
52004001	Ciyamayao , nuwatuhu wete 'aigeda 'ida Bada Yesu weyahina 'ahenuwa lagugomi , ma 'aguguyegomi , beno mwalo mumugaedi 'ahe'itegomiya ta wasanapuya 'abehega bwebwe'adi , ta weyahidi Yehoba 'iyaliyaya , ma bewa tuta 'oidiya wamumuga , sowasowana wapaipaihowa hilahiladi .
52004002	Ma wete Bada Yesu 'ina loinaedi 'a'ebwaegomiya wasanapudiya .
52004003	Yehoba nuwanuwana 'imi miya 'ausaladi , ma sahena wapuipui ,
52004004	ma 'ane 'aigeda 'aigeda wahai mumuga 'ausalana ma dumwalunega ,
52004005	ma sahena nuwadahwana , gide ganamuli taudi Yehoba 'ana tohenainaidao .
52004006	Coinega wete sahena tomota hagadi mwanediyao wayagayagahidi , nata gide Bada 'ina gamwasowala waloba . Ginaulaedi bewa weyahidi mwalo 'ahenuwa lagugomiya .
52004007	Weyahina Yehoba 'ihesinuwegita geya mumuga galana weyahina , ma hesi mumuga 'ehauna weyahina .
52004008	Ma hesi 'eguma taiya loinaina 'iligehi , geya 'abehega tomota 'idi loina , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina loina 'iligeligehi , weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna tauna nuwatuhu 'ana to'abihe'ehau , beno Yehoba 'ina 'ehele 'oida .
52004009	Ma 'iyadao 'adi helau weyahina nata geya 'alelediwa , weyahina Yehoba bo'i tauna 'ihe'itegomiya 'oinega waboi wahelau hilegomi .
52004010	Gide wete tomota mabwaiyadi tupwa Masidoniya 'alona wahelauwediya . Coinega 'alohatoto 'oimiya ma 'imi helauwedi 'oidiya 'isinabwa ,
52004011	ma wete watoho ma wamiya daumwala , ma waboi 'imi paihowa wapaihowadi , ta sahena lowahi'wata , gide mwalo 'ahenuwa laguwegomiya .
52004012	Bewa 'oinega taudi geya Keliso 'ana tohemisao sihe'asisiyegomi , ma hesi 'omi 'ami lema weyahina sahena tomota hagadi 'oidiya wahehemisa .
52004013	Ciyamayao sahena wahehenainaida to'amasao weyahidi , ma 'oinega 'eguma 'eta tasidai 'i'amasa , sahena wanuwanuwagala , gide taudi geya 'idi hemisamo toholohila weyahina .
52004014	Ma tauda Yesu tahemiseya tauna 'amasega 'itoholohila ma gide wete tahemiseya 'iyadaowedi bo'i si'amasa ma Yehoba tauna nata 'ihiledima , Yesu ba'idanao .
52004015	Bewa 'ida Bada 'ina gwaeyao 'ahehepwailediwa 'oimiya , 'abehega tutaina 'ihilama taudi 'ama'amasidi nata Keliso siloba nugeta , ma tauda mayawasida muliyetega .
52004016	Weyahina Badaina ma'enana madouna 'abwa 'ilatuma , ma aneloseyao 'adi tohanugeta wete 'ibwau , ma wete yoguli simu'a madouna , ma 'oinega Badaina galewega 'isuluma , ma to'amasaowedi mwalo Keliso 'ana tohemisao sitoholo nugeta ,
52004017	ta tauda wete mayawasida taudi ba'idadao tahane galewa , ta 'ida Badaina ba'idada tamiya hataya .
52004018	Coinega tetela bewa 'oinega wa'abihe yaliyayegomi .
52005001	Ciyamayao , geya sowasowahina ma 'imi leta bewa 'oinega 'ahegwaegomi to tuta 'oina Kelisoina 'ihilama ,
52005002	weyahina bo'i wasanapuya , 'abehega geya tasanapu , ma hesi 'ina tauyama 'abwa gide toyagaha 'ina tauyama gide nihuwanega ,
52005003	ma 'eguma tomota sigwae , “ Cida miya mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana tuwa , ” ma muliyetega hesilae taudi 'ilohesalutuidi , gide wahine 'ina 'abihelolo 'ina henatuna 'oina . Coinega nage gide hesilaeina , ma geya sowasowahina sidenasine .
52005004	Ma 'iyamayao 'omi geya tupwa guguyou 'oina wamiyamiya , 'oinega Bada 'abwa 'ina hilama sahena wa'ate'ateyoho , ma hesi guguyou 'ana tomiyanao 'ilohe'ateyohodi , gide tuwa toyagaha .
52005005	Weyahina 'omi maedana 'oina wamiyamiya , 'oinega maedanega tatauya , ma sahena guguyou 'ina 'edega .
52005006	Coinega sahena ta'eno'eno , gide tomota mabwaiyadi si'eno'eno 'esa , ma hesi Yesu tayamwayamwa 'ida nuwatuhu dumwalunega .
52005007	Ma sahena tauda gide taudi tomata'eno'eno , ma bwasi galana 'ana tonumao , taudi guguyou 'idi 'ebepaihowa .
52005008	Ma tauda hesi gide 'asi'asilalada , 'oinega taboi ta'itayahigita , ma yaluyaluwada tahabodebode , Yehoba 'ana hemisa ma 'ana helau 'oidiyega , ma wete 'ida nuwatuhuyahi 'ada 'abihetena 'abwa taloba 'oinega .
52005009	Weyahina Yehoba geya 'abehega 'iloinegita ma tatauya 'ebeyatala 'oina , ma hesi nuwanuwana 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina paihowega 'i'abihetegita .
52005010	Coinega Kelisoina weyahida 'i'amasa , ma nuwana mayawasida bo 'ama'amasida , ta 'eguma 'ihilama 'i'ewegita ma ba'idada tamiya hataya .
52005011	Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma waboi wa'abihepa'ali hilegomi ma wete wahelemalema hilegomi , beno paihowaedi gide sauga bewa wapaipaihowa 'esedi .
52005012	Ciyamayao , 'ima 'ahwanoi 'oimiya sowasowana 'imi tohanugetao wahe'asisiyanedi , ma wahelau bwaibwainidi , weyahina 'ida Bada 'ina paihowa sipaipaihowa , beno si'ita'ita yahigomi ma siloguloguguya 'oimiya . Ma wete 'aigeda , sahena he'ahwa lasalasa , ma hesi daumwalega wamiyamiya .
52005013	
52005014	Ma 'iyamayao , sowasowana wete tolowahi'watao walohatotodi , wete to'ateyoho wa'abihe 'atepatuwedi , ma wete towe'a wa'abihetedi , bewa ginaulaedi 'alama'i'itega wapaipaihowadi .
52005015	Wa'itayahigomi , sahena 'eta 'oimiyega galana 'ihehemaise galana 'oinega , ma hesi tuta mabwaiyana wahelau hilegomi ma wa'abihetena ma wete tomota hagadi wa'abihetedi .
52005016	Wayaliyaya tuta mabwaiyana .
52005017	Wete gide 'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina sahena walololagu .
52005018	Ma wete tuta mabwaiyana waloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , 'eguma 'imi miya bwebwe'adi 'oidiya ma wete miya galadi 'oidiya , 'imi yaliyayaina beno Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu , tauda Yesu Keliso 'ina bodao weyahida .
52005019	Ma sahena Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina paihowa wa'eto'etobode .
52005020	Coinega 'eguma toguguya 'eta 'ipalopisai , sahena 'ina gwae nugeta walologwahate ,
52005021	ma hesi gwaeina watoho , ma 'eguma bwebwe'ana wa'abiyahi ,
52005022	ma 'eguma galana beno mabwaiyana walogwahate .
52005023	Yehoba tauna daumwala huhuna , 'oinega yaluyaluwami ta nuwami ta wahimi 'i'abihe'ehau bwaibwainidi ma si'asilala , ma 'ane mumugami bwebwe'ana wamiyamiya 'ana siga Yesu Keliso 'ihilama .
52005024	Yehobaina 'ihesinuwegomiya , tauna ma'ana hemisa , eeta to'aha 'ihegwaegita , nata 'ipaihowa .
52005025	Ciyamayao , wa'ahwanoi weyahima Yehoba 'oina .
52005026	Ma wete tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi helauwega wa'atusapwala hiledi .
52005027	Ta yaloinaegomi Yehoba saninega leta bewa wahasili 'iyadao matadiya .
52005028	Cida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina helau 'oimiya . Taugu Paulo .
53001001	Taugu Paulo ma Sailasa ma Timoti ba'idagwao 'imi leta bewa 'aleleyawa 'omi tohekalesiyao Tesalonaika 'oimiya , weyahina 'omi Tamada Yehoba ma Bada Yesu Keliso 'adi tohemisao .
53001002	Tamada Yehoba ma 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'idi helauwega tuwa wamiya daumwala .
53001003	Ciyamayao , 'ilobwainemaiya tuta mabwaiyana 'aloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , 'imi hemisao ma 'imi helauwao waboi 'oimiya 'adi madou weyahina .
53001004	Coinega tohekalesiyao tupwa mabwaiyadi matadiya 'ahehepwatuwegomi , 'agwae , “ Moisa taudi Tesalonaika to'alama'i'ita hedade . Bwagana 'adi 'alehao mwau madouna si'ebwaedi , ma tuwa ma'idi 'alama'i'ita ta wete ma'idi hemisa Yehoba 'oina . ”
53001005	Bewa 'ebe'ita ma 'oinega Yehoba 'ina loina dumwaluna tasanapu , weyahina 'ami mwauwedi 'oidiyega 'i'abihe pa'aligomi , ma 'ane 'ina 'ebeloina 'ana lugu 'ilobwainegomi .
53001006	Ma hesi taudi 'ami 'alehaowedi 'adi maisa Yehoba 'i'atububuya ma 'ina gamwasowala siloba .
53001007	Yahegwaegomi 'omi tomiya mwau , 'ida Bada Yesu galewega nata 'isulu mwayamwayauma , ma 'ina aneloseyao ta 'aiwe ganinisa wete 'i'eweyama , ma 'omi ma tauma 'ida 'aiyawasi 'i'ebwaegita .
53001008	Ma taudi 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso tetelina silogwahateya , ta Yehoba sihenainaideya , 'adi maisa mwauna 'i'ebwaedi .
53001009	Coinega nata simiyawasi , ma sisilahe hataya tupwaina 'ala'alasina 'oina , ma Bada manina ta 'ina waiwai ta 'ana hepwatu nata geya si'ita'ita .
53001010	Eeta tutaina 'itautauyama , 'ana hepwatu madouna 'iloba 'ina paihowao 'ebenuwa pwanopwanowao weyahidi , 'ana tohemisao 'oidiyega . Ma 'omi mwalo tetelina 'a'ebwaegomiya ta wahemiseya , 'oinega 'abwa 'omi ba'idamayao Yesu 'ina latuma 'oina tahepwatu .
53001011	Mwalo Yehoba 'ihesinuwegomiya ta 'ibwauwegomiya , ta 'oinega wahemiseya . Bewa weyahina tauma tuta mabwaiyana 'a'ahwa'ahwanoi weyahimi ma 'ane wamuliya moisa , weyahina 'omi nuwanuwami hemisa moisega wamumuga dumwalu , 'oinega 'ima 'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina ma 'i'abihe waiwaiyegomi eema paihowaedi wapaihowadi .
53001012	Bewa 'oinega ma tomota mabwaiyadi 'ida Bada Yesu sanina sihepwatuwe , 'omi 'imi paihowa bwebwe'adi weyahidi . Ma 'omi wete hepwatu waloba tauna saninega , ta hepwatuwedi mabwaiyadi Yehoba ma Bada Yesu Keliso 'idi helauwega .
53002001	Ciyamayao , nuwanuwama wada sanapu 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina latuhilama ma 'ida miya'auta 'oina weyahina .
53002002	Ma 'oinega sahena wa'ate'ateyoho , ta 'eguma tomota sigwae , “ Bada 'ina latu hilama 'ana tuta bewa , ” sahena wahehemisa , ma 'eguma sigwae 'abehega sanapu silobeya 'idi nihiyega bo Yehoba 'ina gwae 'oidiya , bo nuwana taugu 'idi leta yaleleya 'oidiya weyahina ,
53002003	sahena wete 'idi 'abowedi wahehemisaedi , ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega nugeta tomota baibaiwa hedada Yehoba silo'alehe ma loheya galana 'ilatu , ta mulina 'abwa Yesu 'ihilama . Moisa , loheyaina loheya galana ta guguyou loheyaina ,
53002004	Yehoba 'ana 'aleha ma wete 'ebehemisa mabwaiyadi 'adi 'aleha , 'oinega tauna 'i'abihanehe ma Yehoba 'ina Hada He'asisi 'oina 'imiyatoi , ma 'ihetoloina gide Yehoba .
53002005	Wanuwatuhu yahiya taugu mwalo ba'idamiu tamiyamiya ta ginaulaedi weyahidi yahegwaegomiya .
53002006	Ta 'omi loheyaina galanaina 'ina tauyama 'iheheboi lamuna wasanapu pwaiya , 'abehega 'eguma 'ina tauyama 'ana tuta 'iloba ee nata 'ilatuma .
53002007	Moisa , bewa tutaina loheyaina galanaina 'ina paihowao silatulatu dahwana bale'uwa , ma loheya hagana paihowaina galanaina 'i'eto'etobode ma 'ana siga to'etobodaina 'itoholo wasi ,
53002008	ta 'oinega topaihowa galanaina 'ilatuma , muliyetega 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ilatuma , ma loheyaina galanaina 'ilohegumwali ginaula 'eluwa 'oidiyega , 'aigeda 'ina waiwai ma heluwenaina 'ahwanega 'aiwe 'iganiganinisa .
53002009	Ma tutaina loheyaina galanaina 'ilatu , nata Seitani 'ina waiwai 'oinega ma hedehedede ma ginaula 'ebehenainaida 'oidiyega tomota 'i'abowedi .
53002010	Ma taudi tetela moisa 'adi tologwahatao 'idi tupwa 'asa 'ala'alatana , Yehoba 'itagwaledi ma Seitani 'ina 'e'abo'abo mabwaiyana sihemisaedi , ma taudi yatala siloba , weyahina geya nuwadi he'ita moisa , ma hesi silogwahateya ,
53002011	
53002012	ta mumuga galana nuwadi 'i'eweya . Ceguma mwalo tetela moisa sihemisae , Yehoba 'ida 'abihetediya , ma hesi geya .
53002013	Ciyamayao , 'ida Bada 'ihelauwegomiya , weyahina tuta nugeta 'oina 'ihesinuwegomiya ma 'ane Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega 'i'abihe 'ehaugomi , ma tetela moisa wahemisae 'ami 'abihetena weyahina , 'oinega sowasowana tuta mabwaiyana weyahimi 'aloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina .
53002014	Tetelina mwalo 'aguguyaeya 'oimiya ta wahemiseya , ma bewa 'oinega 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina 'asilala 'i'ebwaegomiya .
53002015	Ciyamayao watoholo pa'ala , ma 'ami he'itaedi , 'ima gwaeyega bo 'ima letao 'oidiyega wa'abiyahidi .
53002016	Yehoba Tamada 'ihelau moisa 'oida , 'oinega tuta mabwaiyana 'i'abihe yaliyayegita , weyahina tanuwatuhuya ginaulaedi 'abwa tauda weyahida 'ipaihowadi .
53002017	Yehoba tauna ta 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso sida 'abihe yaliyayegomi , ma sida 'abihe waiwaiyegomi , ma 'ane waguibiga 'imi paihowa 'oidiya , ta tuta mabwaiyana 'imi hegwaegwae sibwebwe'ana .
53003001	Ciyamayao , nuwatuhu 'aigeda wete , nuwanuwama ma weyahima wa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina , ma Bada tetelina 'ima guguyega 'ihewaiwai tomota baibaiwadi 'oidiya , gide mwalo 'oimiya .
53003002	Ta wa'ahwanoi ma 'ane togala 'oidiyega Yehoba 'i'abihetemai , weyahina Bada 'ana touhalao baibaiwa hedada .
53003003	Ma hesi Badaina ma'ana hemisa sowasowahina 'i'abihe pa'aligomi , ma 'i'itayahigomi ma 'ane sahena Seitani 'i'abi'abi tohogomi .
53003004	Coinega Badaina 'ahemisaeya ma 'ima he'ita 'oimiya nige ma wete 'abwa wahematamatanedi ,
53003005	ma 'abehega wete 'ihenuwa lagugomi , tauna 'ina helau weyahina , ta wete 'imi toholo pa'ala Keliso 'oina weyahina .
53003006	Ciyamayao , wete 'ahenuwa lagugomi 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega , ma 'ane 'iyadao tupwadi tolowahi'wata wa'ebesinedi , weyahina lowahi'wata geya tauma 'ahe'itegomi , ma guibigamo 'ana 'eda hesi .
53003007	Coinega wasanapu pwaiya 'abehega 'ilobwainegomiya ma tauma wahe'au'aunawemai , weyahina mwalo ba'idamiyao tamiyamiya , geya 'eta tuta paihowa 'oinega 'alowahi'wata .
53003008	Gide wete tauma 'aboi 'amega 'ahehe'aimaiya , nihuwana ma sabwelo 'oidiya 'apaipaihowa . Weyahina geya nuwama ma 'ami mwau 'alagulagu , 'e'ahai weyahina .
53003009	Ma 'iyamo loina 'imiyamiya 'abehega 'omi wahe'aimai , ma tuwa taumamo 'amega 'ahehetapewa , ma 'ane 'omi 'ima paihowa wahe'au'aunawemai .
53003010	Ma wete mwalo ba'idamiyao tamiyamiya , 'aloinegomiya 'abehega 'eguma taiya geya 'ida paihowa sahena 'i'ai'ai .
53003011	Tetelimi 'ahesagoha pwaiya tupwadi 'oimiyega silowahi'wata ma geya simiya hohobiga ma sipaihowa .
53003012	Coinega 'iyadaowedi 'ahenuwa lagudi , ma 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso saninega 'aloinaedi , ma 'idi paihowa siboi sipaihowadi , ma simiya hohobiga ma 'ane 'adi siloba .
53003013	Ciyamayao , paihowa bwebwe'adi weyahidi sahena wahewahi we'awe'a .
53003014	Ceguma taiya he'itaedi 'imi leta bewa 'alonega 'isinalidi , loheyaina wa'ebesine , ma 'oinega 'ina paihowaina 'oina debana 'imwadina ,
53003015	ta watoho , ma sahena walolo'alehe , weyahina tauna tuwa 'iyadai , 'oinega he'ita tuwa wa'ebwae .
53003016	Cida Bada tauna nuwadaumwala huhuna ma 'i'abihenuwa bwebwe'anigomi , ma 'i'abihe yaliyayegomi tuta mabwaiyana , ma ba'idamiu wamiya hataya .
53003017	Leta bewa 'ina 'ebe gumwala taugu tuwa nimaguwega yaleleyawa , gide tuwa 'igu letao mabwaiyadi 'oidiya .
53003018	Ta 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina helau mabwaiyami 'oimiya . Taugu Paulo .
54001001	Yauwedo Timoti , 'ino leta bewa 'oiguwega 'itautauyawa . Taugu Paulo , Keliso weyahina yahetohepwaila 'ada To'abiheteina Yehoba ma Yesu Keliso 'idi loinega , weyahina Keliso 'oina tahehemisa 'ida 'abihetena 'abwa weyahina .
54001002	Cowa mwalo Keliso 'uhemisaeya , 'oinega ya'ahwa natunegowa moisa . Tamada Yehoba ma 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso sihelauwego , ma wete si'atemuyemuyego , ma 'umiya yaliyaya .
54001003	Mwalo 'ane tutenina ya'ebesinegowa ma yatauya Masidoniya , ma yahenuwa lagugowa , yagwaeya , “ Sahena 'utautauya . Cebwa tuwa Epeso 'oina 'umiyamiya , ma 'ane tomota tupwadi 'u'ausidi ma sahena he'itao hagana ma hagana sihehe'itadi .
54001004	Ma wete sahena sigwaegwae ma mwalo babadaedi sanidi si'ina'inanadi . ” Nata gide he'ahwa panapanawa 'ilatu 'oimiya weyahina he'ote'otetela balaina , sahena tomota si'abihetedi , ma gesowana 'idi hemisa Yehoba 'oina si'abi'abi .
54001005	Bewa 'igu loina ma 'ane nuwami 'ehaudiyega waboi wahelau hilegomi moisa ma wanuwanuwatuhu bwaibwaini , ma wahemisa moisa Keliso 'oina .
54001006	Ma hesi tomota tupwadi hemisa bewa silogwahateya , ta gwae besobesowega si'waniya .
54001007	Nuwanuwadi ma sihe'ita Yehoba 'ina loinao , ma hesi 'idi gwaeyedi ma 'idi lohatotowedi huhudi geya sisanapudi .
54001008	Loinaedi tasanapudiya 'abehega 'ebelema bwebwe'ana , 'eguma tamuliya moisa .
54001009	Weyahina loinaedi geya Yehoba 'ilagudi todumwalu weyahidi , ma hesi taudi loina 'ana toligehao weyahidi ma todeba pa'ala weyahidi , taudi geya Yehoba sihe'asisiyane , ma togala , ma bi'ibi'idi , ma toheliya , ma taudi sinadiyao ma tamadiyao ma hali tomota wete 'adi tolohe'amasao ,
54001010	wete toganawala ma loheloheya 'idi 'eheloheloheyao ba'idadiyao siganaganawala , ma tomota 'adi toyagahao , to'e'abo'abowao , to'eta'wata'walulu 'abo'abodi , ma wete he'ita dumwaluna 'ana toligehao .
54001011	He'ita dumwalunaina Yehoba 'oinega , tauna 'iboi 'asilala ma yaliyaya huhuna , ma 'igu paihowa 'i'ebwaegauwa wasana yaguguyae tomota 'oidiya .
54001012	Ma wete 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'i'abihewaiwai yegauwa 'igu paihowa bewa weyahina , 'oinega yaloyauwedo , weyahina 'ihemisaegauwa , ma paihowaina 'i'ebwaegauwa .
54001013	Mwalo geya gide , ma hesi Keliso ya'ahwa galagalaeya ma 'ina bodao yalosahiyediya , ma tuwa Yehoba 'isanapuya 'abehega ginaula galadi taugu yapaihowediya 'igu henuwa potapota 'oinega , ma wete geya yahemisa , 'oinega 'i'atemuyemuyegauwa .
54001014	Ma 'ida Badaina 'ihelauwegauwa madouna ma hemisa ma helau Yesu Keliso 'oinega 'i'ebwaegauwa .
54001015	Gwae bewa gwae moisa , ma 'ilobwaineya ma tahemisae , weyahina Yesu Keliso bo'i bale'uwa 'itauyama togalaedi sabi 'abihetedi , ma hesi togalaedi mabwaiyadi 'oidiyega taugu tuwa gala hedada .
54001016	Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyamuya 'oiguwa huhuna bewa gide , 'abehega Yesu Keliso taugu togala madouna weyahigu 'i'alama'i'ita , ma 'ane togala mabwaiyadi si'itegau ma sisanapu taudi wete 'eguma Keliso sihemisae yawasidi hataya siloba .
54001017	Coinega Yehoba tahe'asisiyane ma tahepwatuwe hataya , weyahina tauna 'aigeda tuwa Yehoba moisa , geya sawasawahina ma 'ana 'ita ta'ita , geya 'ida 'amasa , ma hesi 'ina loina 'oida nata geya 'igumwagumwala . Emeni .
54001018	Natugu Timoti , 'unuwatuhuyahi mwalo Yehoba 'ina topalopisai 'ino paihowa 'oiuwa sihepwaila nugeteya , ma taugu gidemusa yahegwaego ma 'upaihowadi , ma 'oinega 'uhewaiwai ,
54001019	ma ma'ino hemisa ta ma'ino nuwatuhu bwebwe'ana , tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya . Weyahina 'iyadao tupwadi nuwatuhu bwebwe'adi silogwahatediya , 'oinega 'idi hemisa siwe'a ta sibe'uwa .
54001020	Tobe'uwedi 'aigeda sanina Aimenio , ma wete 'aigeda sanina Alekisana . Siteluwaedi bo'i Seitani 'oina ya'ebwaediya ma 'ihematasabuwedi ma sisanapu ma 'ane sahena 'ida Badaina si'ahwa'ahwa galagalae .
54002001	Bewa 'igu loina 'imi miya hegogona 'oidiya , nugeta watuluha ma wa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina , tomota mabwaiyadi weyahidi , ma'imi loyauwedo Yehoba 'oina .
54002002	Gide kiniyao ma toloinao weyahidi wa'ahwanoi , ma 'ane 'idi loina 'idumwalu ma 'oinega tamiya daumwala ma'ida mumuga mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana .
54002003	Cada to'abihetenaina Yehoba nuwanuwana bewa gide ta'ahwanoi 'esa ,
54002004	weyahina Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhuina 'abehega tomota mabwaiyadi 'idi pui 'oidiyega 'i'abihetedi , ma he'ita moisa sisanapu .
54002005	Yehoba 'aigeda tuwamo , ma wete 'aigeda tuwa loheya sowasowana 'i'ewegita Yehoba 'oina , tauna Yesu Keliso .
54002006	Weyahina Keliso 'itagwaleya ta 'iboi 'ipwaoliyeya mabwaiyada weyahida , ta wasaina bewa tuta 'ana lobwaina moisa 'oina , Yehoba 'i'ebwaegita .
54002007	Coinega 'igu paihowa 'i'ebwaegauwa ma wasaina bewa yahehepwaili ma yaguguguyae ma yahehe'ita taudi tomiya ganamuli 'oidiya , ma 'ane sanapu moisa Yehoba 'oina sihemisae . Bewa gwae moisa , geya 'abo .
54002008	Nuwanuwagu loheloheya tupwa mabwaiyadi 'oidiya mumugadi sibwebwe'ana , ma nimadi si'abilagasi ta si'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina , ma sahena sihehegamwagamwagu ma sihehe'ahwalasalasa .
54002009	Wahiwahine wete nuwanuwagu siboi sihepasadi mumuga bwebwe'adi 'oidiyega weyahina beno totapwalolo 'ilobwaineya , ma sahena wahidi sipasa hedadedi ma 'oina 'idi tuta siuleule , ma sida pasa moisa , ma sahena sigagagagasa .
54002010	
54002011	Ma wete tapwalolo 'alona ma 'idi nuwatagwala he'ita sihesagohe , ma sahena sigwaegwae .
54002012	Geya yatagwala ma wahiwahine sihe'ita tapwalolo 'oina . Sahena siloiloina loheloheya 'oidiya , ma hesi sida miyahenono ma sihesagoha .
54002013	Weyahina Yehoba Adama 'ipaihowa nugeteya , ma muliyega Ibe .
54002014	Ma wete Seitani 'ina 'abo 'oinega Adama geya 'iwe'a , ma wahine hesi 'iwe'a ta 'ipui nugeta .
54002015	Ma bewa tutaina 'oina wahiwahine 'idi tuta henatuna 'oina , Yehoba sawasawahina 'i'abihetedi , 'eguma ma'idi hemisa , ma wete ma'idi helau , ma mumugadi 'ehauna , ta dumwaluna .
54003001	Moisa tuwa , 'eguma taiya nuwanuwana ma tapwalolo 'oina 'ihanugeta , beno paihowa bwebwe'ana ,
54003002	ma 'ana loina bewa : mumugana bwebwe'ana , mwanena 'aigeda tuwa , totoholo pa'ala ma'ina sanapu ta ma'ina he'asisi , ma tauna wete taumanao 'adi to'itayahi , ma wete tohe'ita bwebwe'ana ,
54003003	ma sahena bwasi galana 'inumanuma yauyaule , ma wete sahena 'ihehegamwagamwagu , ma hesi mumugana nuhana , ma geya 'ida 'ahwa panapanawa , wete sahena wasawasa nuwana 'i'ewa'ewa .
54003004	Cilobwaineya tauna 'ina hada 'adi tomiyanao 'ihanugete bwaibwainidi , ma 'ane natunao 'ina gwae sihesagohe ma'idi he'asisi .
54003005	Ceguma loheya geya natunao 'iloina hedumwaludi , tauna geya sawasawahina ma Yehoba 'ina tohekalesiyao 'iloina hedumwaludi , 'awa ?
54003006	Ma sahena tohemisa hauhauna wahehesinuwe ma 'ihetohanugeta , nata gide 'ina nuwahane 'oinega 'ibe'u , gide mwalo Seitani 'ina nuwahane 'oinega 'ibe'uwa .
54003007	Tohanugetaowedi 'ilobwainediya 'adi 'ahwa bwebwe'ana siloba taudi geya totapwalolo 'oidiyega , ma hesi 'eguma tomota tohanugetao si'ahwa galagalaedi mumugadi weyahina , beno gide Seitani 'ina si'wa 'oina tohanugetaowedi sisi'wa .
54003008	Dikoniyao wete 'ilobwainediya ma mumugadi 'ausalana ma'idi nuwatuhu dumwaludi , ma sahena bwasi galana sinumanuma hedada , ma sahena wasawasa 'oina sihehemisa .
54003009	Ma 'idi tapwalolo 'ana sanapu dahwadahwaina si'abiyahi , 'idi nuwatuhu bwebwe'anega .
54003010	Ma 'eguma taiyawedi loheloheya nuwanuwami wahesinuwedi ma sihedikoni , nugeta wa'ita 'idi hematamatana ma 'eguma mumugadi 'ausaladi taudi beno walagudi , ma sihedikoni .
54003011	Mwanediyao wete gide ma'idi nuwatuhu dumwadumwaluna , ma sahena 'iyadiyao si'ahwa'ahwa galagalaedi , sahena bwasi galana sinumanuma hedade , ma hesi siguibiga moisa .
54003012	Dikoni mwanena 'aigeda tuwa , ma natudiyao ma 'idi susuwao sihanugete bwaibwainidi .
54003013	Dikoniyedi 'eguma siguibiga , beno nata tomota si'ahwa bwebwe'anedi , ma wete Yesu 'ana hemisa 'oina sitoholo pa'ala .
54003014	Yanuwatuhuya nata muhemuhena ma yatauyawa 'oiuwa , ma nugeta 'ino leta bewa yaleleyawa ,
54003015	ma 'eguma yaheheboi , leta bewa 'oinega 'usanapu to mumuga tauda totapwalolo 'ilobwainegita , beno tauda 'ida Yehoba mayawasina 'ina boda 'alona , weyahina tauda tohekalesiyao 'ina he'ita moisa 'ana to'ita'ita yahinao .
54003016	Moisa tuwa , 'ida tapwalolo 'ana sanapu dahwadahwaina , ma hesi madouna , beno Keliso weyahina : Tauna 'ihetomotai masiha , ma Yaluyaluwana 'oinega 'ihewaiwaiya , ma aneloseyao si'iteya , ma wasana tupwa mabwaiyadi sihesagoheya , ma gogo gabulena tomiyanao sihemiseya , ma 'ihaneya tupwa wasawasa 'oina .
54004001	Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ihepwaila latuwa 'abehega tuta 'ana 'ebe gumwala 'oina tomota tupwadi nata tapwalolo silogwahate ma yaluyaluwa galadi ma Tomudulele 'idi he'ita 'abo'abowedi sihesagohedi .
54004002	Tohe'itaowedi tomota 'e'e'abo'aboidi , ma 'idi 'abowedi weyahidi geya sida nuwanuwa .
54004003	Cidi 'abowedi bewa gide 'abehega hai ginaula galana , ma wete 'e'ahai tupwadi 'adi 'ai si'ausidiya . Ma 'omi Keliso 'ana tohemisao he'ita moisa wasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba 'e'ahai mabwaiyana 'ipaihowediya 'ai weyahina , ma 'ane ma'ida loyauwedo ta'ai'ai .
54004004	Ginaula mabwaiyana Yehoba 'ipaihowediya bwebwe'adi , 'oinega weyahidi taloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina , ma ta'ewedi ,
54004005	weyahina Yehoba 'ina gwaeyega ma tauda 'ida 'ahwanoiyega 'i'abihe'ehau pwaidiya .
54004006	Bewa loinaedi 'iyadao 'oidiya 'uhe'itaedi , 'oinega 'owa Yesu Keliso 'ina topaihowa bwebwe'ana , weyahina he'ita dumwaluna Yesu 'ana hemisa weyahina 'umulimuliyedi , ma 'oinega yaluyaluwau 'ihewaiwai .
54004007	Ma he'ote'otetela besobesowedi geya Yehoba 'oinega , sahena 'uhehesagohedi , ma hesi 'utoho waiwai ma tuta mabwaiyana 'umumuga 'ausala Yehoba matana .
54004008	Eema ginauledi tapaipaihowedi wahida 'ana 'abi weyahina , beno ginaula bwebwe'ana , ma hesi yaluyaluwada 'ana 'abi ginaula bwebwe'ana hedada , 'i'abihetegita 'ida tuta bale'uwa weyahina , ma wete tuta 'inaonaoma weyahina .
54004009	Gwae bewa gwae moisa , sowasowana tatagwalegita 'oina .
54004010	Weyahina tuta bewa 'oina ma'ida hetapewa ma ma'ida guibiga , Yehoba tahehemise tauna 'iboimo miyamiya hatayana , tomota mabwaiyadi 'adi To'abihetena , 'eguma sihemisae . Eeta 'ida nuwatuhuyahina 'oina talaguya ma 'ane 'i'abihetegita .
54004011	Nuwatuhuwedi 'ulohatotowedi , ma 'uhe'itaedi tomota 'oidiya .
54004012	Tomota sahena sisinasinaligo weyahina 'abehega 'owa hewali tuwa , ma hesi 'ino gwae bwebwe'ana , ma 'ino paihowa bwebwe'ana , 'ino helau , 'ino hemisa , ma mumugau 'ehauna 'oidiyega 'owa 'ebe'ita taudi Yesu 'ana tohemisao 'oidiya .
54004013	Ma wete tapwalolo 'alona Buki Tabu 'uhasili , ma 'uguguya , ma 'uhe'ita 'ana siga yatauyawa .
54004014	Mwalo tapwalolo 'ana babadao si'abidebegowa , ma weyahiu sipalopisaiya 'ino paihowa Yehoba weyahina , eeta paihowaina weyahina Yehoba 'i'abihe waiwaiyego .
54004015	Coinega 'unuwatuhuyahi , ma paihowaina 'oidiya sahena 'ulowahi'wata , eema tomota 'ino hetapewa weyahina 'ane sigwae , “ Moisa , Timoti tauna toguibiga . ”
54004016	Timoti , 'u'itayahigo , tuta mabwaiyana 'uhe'ita moisa , ma 'ane Yehoba 'owa ma 'ino tohesagohaowedi ba'idamwao 'i'abihetegomi .
54005001	Sahena babadao 'uheheliyedi , ma hesi hohobigega 'ulohatotowedi , gide tuwa tamau 'oina 'uhehegwaegwae , ma wete 'a pateyao 'u'ahwa'ahwa tasinaedi ;
54005002	ma wahiwahine madoudi 'oidiya mumugau gide sinamwao , ma gumalaulau 'oidiya ma'ino nuwatuhu bwebwe'ana ma mumuga 'ausalana 'oidiyega 'u'ahwa nuhunedi .
54005003	Hiwahiwapeyedi geya 'idi susumo 'u'abihetedi .
54005004	Ma 'eguma natudiyao nana tubudiyao simiyamiya , beno taudi 'ilobwainediya ma si'itayahidi , ma 'ane mwalo masedesedediya 'adi 'itayahina sihemaise . Lemaedi bewa gide Yehoba 'ina 'ebe yaliyaya .
54005005	Ma taudi hiwahiwapeyedi geya 'idi susumo 'ulemedi , 'eguma Yehoba taunamo sihemiseya ma 'oina si'ahwa'ahwanoi sabwelo ma nihuwana 'oidiya .
