54005006	Ma taudi hesi yaliyaya besobeso weyahina sinuwanuwatuhu , beno taudi wahidi mayawasidi , ma yaluyaluwadi si'amasa pwaiya .
54005007	Coinega guguya bewa hiwahiwapeyedi 'u'ebwaedi ma simumuga bwaibwaina ma 'ane sahena hali tomota hiwahiwapeyedi si'ahwa'ahwa galagalaedi .
54005008	Ma 'eguma taiya 'ina susuwao bo natunao geya 'ida 'itayahidiya , beno tauna Yehoba 'ina he'ita 'ilogwahateya , ma tauna togala hedada 'abwa taudi Yehoba 'ana touhalao .
54005009	Hiwahiwapeyedi 'adi loina bewa : 'eguma 'adi bolime sikisiti nana 'ihane , ta mwanena mwalo 'aigeda tuwa ,
54005010	ma tomota matadiya mumugadi dumwaluna , weyahina natudiyao 'adi 'itayahina 'oina sipaihowa bwaibwaina ma wete taumanao ta tohekalesiyao 'adi 'abihetena 'oina , wete tomiya mwau silemedi ma si'atemuyamuyaedi , beno 'ilobwainediya ma tohekalesiya 'oidiya siluhu , ma tohekalesiyaowedi 'oidiyega 'adi lema , nana 'e'ahai , bo 'ale'o si'ewa .
54005011	Ma hiwahiwapeyedi taudi geya sihe'ai'aihale , sahena siluhuluhu bodaedi 'oidiya ma sigwaegwae hemisa Keliso 'oina 'abehega nata geya sihaihai hila , weyahina taudi nage gide nata 'idi gwae hemisaina siligehi ma sihai hila .
54005012	Ma bewa 'oinega Yehoba matana sigala pwaiya .
54005013	Ma wahiwahineyedi wete si'e'elomiya besobeso ma sitauya hali hada ma hali hada 'oidiya silolomugi ma hali tomota weyahidi sigwaegwae dadanedi .
54005014	Coinega yanuwatuhuya hiwahiwapeyedi taudi geya sihe'ai'aihale moisa sawasawahina ma sihai hila , ma sihenatuna ma si'ita'ita yahidi natudiyao ma wete 'idi hadao , ma 'ane sahena 'ada sahiyao si'ahwa'ahwa galagalaegita hiwahiwapeyedi mumugadi weyahina .
54005015	Weyahina tupwadi hiwahiwape siwe'a , 'oinega Seitani 'ina 'eda 'oina simulimuliya .
54005016	Ceguma to wahine Keliso 'ana tohemisa ma 'ina susuwao tupwadi sihiwapeya , 'ilobwaineya ma 'i'itayahidi . Ma tapwalolo 'ana tohanugetao 'idi paihowa hiwahiwapeyedi geya 'idi susumo si'itayahidi .
54005017	Ma 'ami tohanugetaowedi 'eguma silema bwaibwainigomi , 'omi wa'ita'itayahi bwaibwainidi , beno 'idi guguya ma 'idi he'ita maisana bwebwe'ana wa'ebwaedi .
54005018	Bewa weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina Yehoba 'ina loina , 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma bulumakau 'ipaipaihowa witi huwaina 'oina , sawasawahina ma tupwana wete 'i'ai . ” Ma wete 'igwaeya , “ Topaihowa 'adi 'iluwana 'ilobwainediya ma si'ai . ”
54005019	Ceguma tomota tupwadi sihe'ewa besobeso 'ami tohanugetao weyahidi , sahena 'uhehesagohe , ma hesi 'eguma tomota 'eluwa bo 'etoi sihegwaego 'aigeda tohanugeta 'ina pui weyahina , beno 'uyatala .
54005020	Ma 'eguma tohanugeta 'ina pui 'u'italobeya 'uheliye boda matadiya , ma 'ane taudi wete simatauta ma sahena puiina 'oina siluhuluhu .
54005021	Bewa 'a hemataluwa 'oiguwega Yehoba ma Yesu Keliso matadiya , ma wete aneloseyao hesihesinuwaidi matadiya , 'abehega loina bewa 'umuliya moisa . Tomota mabwaiyadi 'uloinaedi loina 'aigeda tuwamo 'oinega , ma sahena tupwadimo 'oidiya 'uloina waiwai , ma tupwadi 'oidiyega geya .
54005022	Tohanugeta 'ana hesinuwa 'oina sahena 'ulolo mwayamwayau . Nata gide 'ina pui dahwadahwaidi ma hesinuwa 'iloba , ta beno 'ana 'ita gide 'ina puiyao 'oidiya 'u'abi'abihete . Ma 'owa wete , 'uboi mumugau 'u'itayahi bwaibwaini .
54005023	Sahena we'ahamo 'unumanuma , weyahina tuta baibaiwana 'uhelolohala ma gamwau 'imuyamuya , ma hesi waini tupwana 'unuma .
54005024	Tomota tupwadi 'idi pui 'atamanega silatuwa ma weyahidi 'adi loina nata siloba . Ma tupwadi dahwadahwaidi 'idi pui , ma hesi 'abwa simiya latu .
54005025	Gide wete paihowa bwebwe'adi tupwadi simiyamiya latu , ma tupwadi 'abwa nata simiya latu , weyahina geya sawasawahina ma simiya dahwana .
54006001	Topaihowao 'adi loina ma 'idi babadao sihe'asisiyanedi , ma sihematamatanedi . Ceguma geya , tomota tupwadi 'idi he'itao si'ahwa galagalaedi , ma sigwae , “ Yehoba 'ana tohemisao taudi ma hesi geya sipaihowa bwaibwaina . ”
54006002	Wete topaihowaowedi 'eguma 'idi babadaedi ba'idadiyao si'ahwa tasina Keliso 'ana hemisa 'oina , ma 'ane sahena 'idi babadaowedi 'adi he'asisi silololagu , ma hesi sowasowana sihetapewa waiwai weyahidi , ma 'ane 'idi paihowa bwebwe'ana 'ihemadou , weyahina 'idi babadaedi taudi Keliso 'ana tohemisao , 'oinega 'idi helauwega ma sida paihowa 'oidiya . Loinaedi 'uhe'itaedi tomota 'oidiya .
54006003	Ma 'eguma taiya 'ina he'ita hagana , ma 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina gwae dumwaludi geya 'ida muliyediya , ma he'itaedi mumuga bwebwe'ana weyahina 'ilogwahatedi ,
54006004	tauna 'ina nuwahane 'oinega 'ihenainaida moisa , ma nuwanuwana 'ihe'ahwa panapanawa . Taudi nage gide tohe'ipi'ipi moisa ma tohegamwagamwagu , wete toheliya ma tosiwapa .
54006005	Coinega 'iyadiyao ba'idadiyao sihe'ahwa panapanawa , ma 'idi nuwatuhu galadi weyahina nata he'ita moisa geya sisanapu , ma hesi 'idi nuwatuhu 'abehega Yehoba 'ana he'asisi 'oinega 'idi wasawasa madouna sida loba bale'uwa .
54006006	Ma hesi tauda 'ida wasawasa hagana . Yehoba 'ana he'asisi 'oinega sawasawahina 'iloinaegita , ma hesi wasawasa bale'u 'ana loba sahena weyahina tanuwanuwatuhu .
54006007	Weyahina tauda mwalo manima daisidamo talatuma bale'uwa , nata wete manima daisidamo bale'u bewa ta'ebesine .
54006008	Coinega 'e'ahai ma 'ada 'ale'o weyahidi tayaliyaya , ma ginaula mabwaiyadi weyahidi sahena tanuwanuwa hedada .
54006009	Ma taudi wasawasa 'ana tohemisao nata Seitani 'ina 'ebetohona 'oina sisi'wa , ma siboi 'idi nuwatuhu besobesowedi 'oidiyega si'abihegala hiledi , ta 'abwa taudi beno hesilae moisa siloba .
54006010	Weyahina wasawasa 'ana nuwa'ewa beno puiyao huhudi , ma wete 'iyadao tupwadi wasawasa si'ebesa hedadeya , 'oinega tapwalolo moisa si'ebesineya , ma 'ebenuwagala mabwaiyana silobeya .
54006011	Timoti , 'owa hesi Yehoba 'ina topaihowa , 'oinega bewa mumugaina 'oinega 'u'itayahigo , ma mumuga dumwaluna 'umuliye , bewa gide 'eda'eda bwebwe'ana ma hemisa ma helau ma 'alama'i'ita ma wete hohobiga .
54006012	Ma wete tapwalolo 'ana paihowa bwebwe'adi 'oidiya 'utoho ma 'uhewaiwai , ma yawasiu miyamiya hatayana wete 'u'abiyahi , weyahina mwalo Yehoba 'ihesinuwegowa , beno tutaina 'ino hemisa 'uhepwaila latuwa tomota mabwaiyadi matadiya .
54006013	Cowa Timoti yaloinaego Yehoba matana , tauna ginaula mabwaiyana yawasidi 'ana to'ebwaya , ma wete Yesu Keliso matana , tauna mwalo Ponitio Pailato 'oina gwae moisega 'igwaeya .
54006014	Ma 'igu loinaina 'abehega hemataluwaedi 'umuliye bwaibwainidi , ma sahena 'eta 'oina 'uwe'awe'a , ma 'ana siga 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'abwa 'ihilama .
54006015	Weyahina nata 'abwa tuta hesihesinuwana 'oina , Yehoba Yesu 'i'abilatuhe . Yehobaina toloina 'aigeda tuwa ma 'asi'asilalana , ma toloinao mabwaiyadi 'idi toloina , ma wete babadao mabwaiyadi 'idi bada .
54006016	Yehoba 'iboimo miyamiya hatayana , ma geya 'eta taiya gide . Ma 'ina tupwa geya sawasawahida ma ta'ita , weyahina 'asilala hedada , ma geya sawasawahina Yehobaina ta'ita , ta 'ina wasawasa ta 'ina waiwai nata geya sigumwagumwala . Emeni .
54006017	Ma bale'u 'ana wasawasao 'uhemataluwedi , ma sahena sinuwanuwahane 'idi wasawasa weyahidi , ma wete sahena sihehemisa 'abehega nata 'abwa 'ebe 'abihetena siloba 'idi wasawasaedi 'oidiyega , weyahina wasawasaedi gumwagumwalidi . Ma hesi tuwa Yehoba 'iboi 'oina sihemisa , weyahina Yehoba 'iboi to'ebwaya bwebwe'ana , ta 'ida 'ebe yaliyaya mabwaiyana tauna 'oinega silatulatuma .
54006018	Ma wete wasawasaedi 'uhemataluwedi ma paihowa bwebwe'adi ta helau ta 'ebwaya 'oidiyega sihewasawasa moisa .
54006019	Bewa 'oinega 'adi maisa bwebwe'ana tuta 'inaonaoma 'oina siloba , beno yawasidi moisa .
54006020	Timoti yo , ginaulaedi Yehoba 'i'ebwaegowa 'u'itayahi bwaibwainidi , ma sanapu 'abo'abodi ma he'ahwa panapanawa besobeso sahena 'umulimuliyedi .
54006021	Weyahina taudi nuwatuhuwedi 'adi tomuliyao 'idi hemisa Yesu 'oina 'iwe'a . Yehoba 'ina helau 'oiuwa . Taugu Paulo .
55001001	Yauwedo Timoti 'owa natugu moisa , 'ino leta bewa taugu Paulo 'oiguwega . Taugu Yesu Keliso 'ana tohepwaila , Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu gide ta yahepwaila yawasida bwebwe'ana weyahina , beno Yesu Keliso 'oinega . Tamada Yehoba ma 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso sihelauwego ta si'atemuyamuyaego ma 'oinega 'umiya daumwala .
55001002	
55001003	Yehoba 'oina yaloyauwedo , tauna tubugwao mwalo 'idi Yehoba , ma 'oina yahetopaihowa 'igu nuwatuhu 'ehaudi 'oidiyega , gidemusa taudi . Wete 'oina ya'ahwa'ahwanoi weyahiu nihuwana ma sabwelo 'oidiya .
55001004	Mwalo 'ane ya'ebesinegowa , 'ino dou yanuwatuhu yahiya , 'oinega nuwanuwagu madouna ma to tuta 'oina ma ya'ita hilago , ta 'oinega yayaliyaya .
55001005	Ma wete 'ino hemisa moisa Yehoba 'oina yanuwatuhu yahiya , gide sinau Yunisi ma tubuu Loise Yehoba sihemisaeya moisa , ma yasanapugowa 'owa wete Yehoba 'uhemisae moisa .
55001006	Wete tutaina 'oina ya'abidebegowa ta Yehoba waiwai 'i'ebwaegowa , waiwaiina 'u'itayahi ma 'ane 'oiuwega sahena 'igumwagumwala .
55001007	Weyahina Yehoba yaluyaluwana 'i'ebwaegita sahena matauta weyahina , ma hesi waiwai ma helau ma nuwatuhu moisa 'i'ebwaegita .
55001008	Coinega sahena 'ida Cinapwana tetelina 'ana hepwaila weyahina 'uhedeba mwadimwadina . Taugu wete 'igu luhu deliya Cinapwana 'ina paihowa weyahina sahena weyahina 'udebadeba mwadina . Ma 'owa wete 'abwa Yesu tetelina weyahina tupwana miyamwau 'oiuwa silatu , ma 'ilobwainegowa Yehoba 'ina waiwai 'oinega 'utoholo pa'ala .
55001009	Yehoba tauna 'i'abihetegita ta 'ibwauwegita 'ina paihowa bwebwe'adi sabi paihowadi . Moisa tuwa tauda geya 'ida bwebwe'ana weyahina 'ihesinuwegita , ma hesi mwalo hene tauna 'ina nuwatuhu ma 'ina helau weyahina , ta Yesu Keliso 'ipaihoweya tauda weyahida .
55001010	Ma bewa tuwa 'ina helauina 'oida 'i'abilatuheya , 'ada To'abihetena Yesu Keliso 'oinega . Ta Kelisoina 'amasa 'ilohesawaliya , ma tetelina bwebwe'ana 'oinega yawasi hataya 'i'eweyama 'oida .
55001011	Ma Yehoba 'igu paihowa 'i'ebwaegauwa ma 'ane tetelina bwebwe'ana yahehepwaila ma yahehe'ita taudi 'asa ganamuli 'oidiya .
55001012	Bewa weyahina 'igu miyamwau yalobeya , ma hesi geya weyahina yadeba mwadina , weyahina 'ida Cinapwanaina yahemiseya tauna yasanapuya , ma to'aha 'i'ebwaegauwa sowasowana 'i'itayahiya nimanega , eema sabweloina madouna 'inaonaoma 'oina .
55001013	Mwalo guguyaedi bwebwe'adi ya'ebwaegowa , Yesu Keliso 'ana hemisa ma 'ana helau weyahidi , ee 'umuliya bwaibwainidi .
55001014	Ma Yaluyaluwa Tabuna tauna nuwada 'imiyamiya , ta sanapu moisa 'i'ebwae pwaigowa , 'oinega sanapuina 'unuwatuhuyahi .
55001015	Ma 'usanapu pwaiya , taudi meEsiya silogwahategauwa ma si'ebesinegauwa , taudi Paigelio ma wete Elimogini , ma bodaedi .
55001016	Ma Onesipolo hesi geya weyahigu 'ideba mwadina 'igu miyamiya deliya weyahina , ma tauna tuta mabwaiyana 'i'abi'abihetegau , 'oinega 'agu lotohona 'i'abi'abihe bwebwe'ani , 'oinega Yehoba 'oina ya'ahwa'ahwanoi ma 'ane Onesipolo ma 'iyanao 'i'atemuyamuyaedi .
55001017	Mwalo Onesipoloina 'ilatuma Loma 'oina , ma weyahigu 'i'ebesa waiwaiya eeta 'ilobegauwa .
55001018	Cowa 'ina paihowa madouna weyahigu Epeso 'oina 'usanasanapu , 'oinega nuwanuwagu , ma Cinapwana 'ina tuta yatala 'oina 'atemuyamuya 'ida loba Cinapwanaina 'oinega .
55002001	Natugu Timoti , Yesu Keliso 'ina 'abihetenega 'uhewaiwai , ma
55002002	wasana 'u'itayahi , wasaina 'oiguwega 'uhesagoheya tomota mabwaiyadi matadiya , 'oinega taudi ma'adi hemisa 'oidiya 'u'ebwaedi , ma taudi wete hali boda sihe'itadi .
55002003	Mabwaiyada Yesu Keliso weyahina miyamwau talobaloba , 'oinega 'ino miyamwauina 'oinega 'utagwalego , ma 'ane 'owa Yesu Keliso 'ina tolo'aleha bwebwe'ana .
55002004	Cunuwatuhuyahi 'eguma tolo'aleha tauna nuwanuwana ma 'ina toloina 'ina nuwatuhumo 'ipaipaihowa , nata geya 'ina 'asa 'ana paihowa weyahidi 'inuwanuwatuhu .
55002005	Gide tuwa tohepili , 'eguma pili 'ana loina geya 'imuliya , nata maisa geya 'i'ewa .
55002006	Gide wete tanoha 'ana topaihowa , 'ina paihowa waiwai 'oinega nata huwaina 'oinega 'i'aputoho nugete .
55002007	Cigu lohatoto bewa , 'unuwatuhuyahi , ma 'adi sanapu mabwaiyana Cinapwana tauna 'i'ebwaego .
55002008	Ma Yesu Keliso 'unuwatuhuyahi , tauna Debida 'ina susu , ta 'amasa 'oinega 'itoholo hila , gide tuwa yahepwaileya 'igu guguya 'oina .
55002009	Cigu guguyaina weyahina taugu miyamwau bo'i yalobeya 'oinega deliya sipaigauwa , gide 'abwa taugu topui 'aigeda . Ma hesi Yehoba 'ina gwaeina gesowana 'eta taiya 'i'etobode .
55002010	Bewa weyahina 'igu miya mwauwedi 'oidiyega ya'alama'i'ita , ma 'abehega Yehoba taudi 'ihesinuwediya yalemedi , ma 'ane Yesu Keliso 'i'abihetedi , ta yaliyaya miyamiya hatayana siloba .
55002011	Gwae bewa gwae moisa 'abehega : “ Ceguma Keliso ba'idada ta'amasa , 'abwa wete ba'idada yawasida bwebwe'ana taloba .
55002012	Ceguma Keliso ba'idada ta 'ida miyamwau 'oidiyega ta'alama'i'ita , 'abwa ba'idada tahetoloina . Ceguma Keliso tauhale 'abwa wete 'iuhalegita .
55002013	Ceguma geya 'ida hemisamo Keliso 'oina , tauna 'ina gwae hemisa geya sawasawahina ma 'ibui , weyahina tauna mumugana tuwa ma'ana hemisa . ”
55002014	Coinega Yehoba matana 'ino tomotaiyao 'ulohatotodi ma 'uhenuwa lagudi ma gwae bewa sahena sinuwanuwanaide , ma wete sahena gwae tupwadi 'adi bui weyahidi sihe'ahwa panapanawa . Weyahina he'ahwa panapanawa besobeso beno taudi tohesagoha 'oidiya nata geya 'i'abi'abihetedi , ma hesi 'i'abihe galadi .
55002015	Coinega wete 'uhetapewa ma tetela bwebwe'ana 'ana he'ita moisa weyahina 'uguibiga ma 'ane 'owa Yehoba 'ina topaihowa bwebwe'ana , wete 'abwa 'eguma matana 'ulatu 'ihepwatuwego .
55002016	Ta togwae besobeso bodaidi sahena 'oidiya 'uluhuluhu , weyahina gwaeyedi 'oidiyega mumuga galadi silatu ,
55002017	ma gwae besobesowedi 'oidiyega mumuga galana madouna 'ilatu . Togwae besobesowedi siteluwa sanidi Aimenio ma Pileto ,
55002018	ma siteluwaedi he'ita moisaina si'ebesineya ma sigwae , “ To'amasa 'idi toholo hila 'ana tuta 'igumwala , ” 'oinega 'iyadiyao tupwadi 'idi 'aboina sihesagoheya , ta 'idi hemisa 'iwe'a .
55002019	Ma hesi Yehoba 'ina gwae 'ana wahuwahu waiwaina 'oina , mwalo silelediya 'igwae : “ Cinapwana 'ina tomotaiyao 'isanapudiya . ” Ma wete 'igwaeya : “ Taudi Cinapwana 'oina sitagwala pwaidiya 'ilobwainediya ma mumugadi galadi silogwahatedi . ”
55002020	Moisa tuwa , hada wasawasaedi 'alodiya tupwadi gaeba goula ma siliba , ma tupwadi gaeba 'aiwe ma bale'u 'oidiyega sipaihowedi , ta gaebaedi bwebwe'adi taumanao weyahidi silagudi , ma gaeba galadi silagu wasiyedi mohomoho weyahidi .
55002021	Ma 'eguma taiya mumugana galana 'oinega 'i'abihe'ehau hila , beno 'ihegaeba bwebwe'ana , ma 'ina 'inapwana 'ilagu 'ina paihowa bwebwe'adi weyahidi .
55002022	Coinega hewahewali 'idi henuhenuwa 'ulogwahatedi ma mumuga dumwaluna ta hemisa ta helau ta miya daumwala 'umuliyedi , taudi Yesu si'ahwa badaeya ma'ate 'ehaudi ba'idamwao .
55002023	Ma wete 'ahwa panapanawa besobeso 'u'ebesinedi , weyahina 'ahwa panapanawa 'aleha 'ina 'ebelatu .
55002024	Ta he'ahwa panapanawa Cinapwana 'ina topaihowao geya 'ilobwainegita , ma 'atemuyamuya ma he'ita ma 'alama'i'ita hesi .
55002025	Ma wete 'ada 'alehao 'oidiya mumugada nuhana 'oinega ta'abihe dumwaludi , ma 'oinega Yehoba , 'eguma sawasawahina ma 'i'abihetedi ma sinuwabui ta he'ita moisa simuliye ,
55002026	ta wete Seitani 'ina si'wa 'oinega sidena , weyahina taudi mwalo Seitani 'isi'wediya , ma 'oina sihetopaihowa 'ina nuwatuhu weyahina .
55003001	Nuwanuwagu ma nuwau 'ida sabwalena tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'inaonama weyahina , 'abehega tutaedi 'oidiya mwau baibaiwana 'abwa silatu .
55003002	Weyahina tutaedi 'oidiya nata tomota taudimo weyahidi sinuwanuwatuhu , ma wasawasa 'ana hamwa nata 'imadou 'oidiya , ta sinuwa hanehane ta sigagasa ma wete siheliya . Ma sinadiyao ma tamadiyao 'enadi nata geya sihematamatana , ta tomota 'idi paihowa bwebwe'adi weyahidi nata geya siloyauwedo .
55003003	Mumugadi guguyou 'oinega gesowana si'atemuyamuya , ma hesi sihe'ahwa panapanawa besobeso , ma toganawala hedade . Ma sigamwasowala besobeso wete , ta wete mumuga bwebwe'ana 'ana tologwahatao ,
55003004	to'wayama , ma galana 'oina sihewaiwai , ma gwae hane hedada , ma geya Yehoba sihelauwe , ta hesi taudimo 'idi yaliyaya weyahina sinuwanuwatuhu .
55003005	Tomotaedi sitapwatapwalolo tuwa ma Yehoba 'ina waiwai geya sihemisae , 'oinega 'idi tapwaloloina tuwa ginaula besobeso , 'oinega bodaedi taudi sahena 'oidiya 'uluhuluhu .
55003006	Weyahina tupwadi 'oidiyega hadai siluhuluhu wahiwahine geya 'idi nuwatuhu pa'alidi sabi 'abowedi , ma wahiwahineyedi sisanasanapu taudi topui , 'oinega 'amna hagana ma hagana silolotoho soladiya ta simulimuliyedi ,
55003007	'oinega he'ita hagana ma hagana 'ana tohesagohao ta geya sawasawahina ma he'ita moisa sisanapu .
55003008	Tomotaedi he'ita moisa silo'aleheya , gide taudi mwalo Yanisi ma Yamilisi Mosese silo'aleheya , ta 'adi 'ita gide taudi tohemisa ma 'atediya 'abo ma nuwatuhu galadi simiyamiya .
55003009	Ma hesi muhemuhena sibe'u , ma tomota baibaiwadi si'itadi , mumugadi galadi gide mwalo Yanisi ma Yamilisi mumugadi galana , ta tomota si'iteya .
55003010	Ma 'owa bo'i 'usanapugauwa , 'igu he'ita , ta mumugagu , 'igu 'edao , 'igu hemisa , 'igu 'alama'i'ita , ta 'igu helau ta 'igu toholo pa'ala .
55003011	Ma 'asaedi Anitioki ma Ikoniyami ma Lisitila 'oidiya yamiyamwauwa ta 'agu muyaedi tomota 'oidiyega yalobediya wete 'usanasanapu , tupwaedi 'oidiya yamiyamwauwa moisa , ta mwauwedi mabwaiyadi 'oidiyega 'ida Cinapwana 'i'abihetegauwa .
55003012	Moisa , 'eguma Yesu Keliso tahemisae , ma tatagwalegita 'ina 'eda bwebwe'adi 'oina , nata miyamwau tomota 'oidiyega taloba .
55003013	Ta wete taudi togala , ma tomota 'adi to'abowao 'idi puiyao sihemadou moisa , weyahina Seitani bo'i 'i'abowediya .
55003014	Ta 'owa hesi he'itaedi 'uhemisa pwaidiya ta 'usanapudiya . He'itaedi 'uda muliyedi , weyahina tauma 'ino tohe'itao bo'i 'usanapumaiya 'abehega 'ima he'itaowedi wete 'amulimuliyedi .
55003015	Ma 'owa 'uboi wete 'ino tuta gwamega ma nige bewa Buki He'asisi 'ina gwae 'ana tohasila , ta 'ihehe'itego 'abehega 'ida hemisa Yesu Keliso 'oina sowasowana 'i'abihetegita .
55003016	Ma weteyage Buki He'asisi 'ina gwae mabwaiyana Yehoba Yaluyaluwanega sitauyama , ta gwaeyedi 'oidiyega 'ada he'ita ma 'ada lohatoto ma 'ada gihedumwalu
55003017	ta 'ida waiwai talobalobadi Yehoba 'ina paihowao weyahidi , weyahina Buki He'asisi 'ina gwae 'oidiyega Yehoba 'i'atububugita , ta 'ina paihowao bwebwe'adi mabwaiyana sawasawahida .
55004001	Timoti , yahenuwa laguwego Yehoba matana , ta Yesu Keliso , tauna to'amasao ma mayawasidi 'adi toloina matana , tauna nata 'ilatu hilama ma 'ihetoloina 'oida .
55004002	Bewa 'a loinaina : Tuta mabwaiyana 'uhetapewa waiwai ma tetela 'uhehepwaile , tuta mwau ma tuta yaliyaya 'oidiya , ma tomota 'oidiya 'uguguya ma sihemisa , ta wete 'u'abihe dumwaludi , ma 'u'abihe pa'alidi , ma bewa nuwatuhuwedi 'uhe'ita bwaibwainidi ma'ino 'alama'i'ita .
55004003	Weyahina tuta sinaonaoma 'oidiya tomota he'ita dumwaluna nata silogwahate , ma he'ita hagadi ma hagadi 'adi hesagoha 'abehega bwebwe'ana 'oidiya , simuliyedi .
55004004	Ma he'ita hagadi 'adi muliya 'oidiyega he'ita moisa si'ebesine .
55004005	Ma 'owa sahena gide taudi . Sauga mabwaiyana 'utoholo pa'ala , ta 'ino miyamwau 'oidiyega 'u'alama'i'ita , ma wasa bwebwe'ana 'uhehepwaile . Bewa 'oinega ma 'ane 'owa topaihowa waiwaina Yehoba 'ina paihowa 'oina .
55004006	Ta taugu nata sihunugau gide pwaoli , ma gogo bewa ya'ebesine .
55004007	Yalo'aleha pwaiya Yehoba weyahina , ta 'igu hepili yalohe gumwaliya , ta tuta baibaiwana Keliso yahemisaeya .
55004008	Coinega 'abwa 'ida Bada 'agu maisa , mumuga dumwaluna weyahina , 'i'ebwaegau . Ta maisaina weyahigu 'igibubu pwaiya ta 'imiyamiya . Badaina 'ina loina dumwaluna , ma 'eguma to sauga 'ilatuma , tauda ma wete taiyawedi 'ina hilama weyahina siyamwayamwana , mabwaiyada nata 'ada maisa 'i'ebwaegita .
55004009	Timoti , nuwanuwagu 'ulomwayamwayauma .
55004010	Dimasa bo'i 'i'ebesinegauwa weyahina bale'u mumugana nuwana 'i'eweya , ta 'itauya Tesalonaika . Kelesenisi bo'i 'itauya Galetiya , ma Taito wete 'itauya Dalimetiya . Taudi 'agu tolemaedi mabwaiyadi si'ebesinegauwa .
55004011	Luke 'iboi 'itupwa . Cino tauyama 'oina Maki 'utoeyama , weyahina tauna 'agu tolema bwebwe'ana .
55004012	Tikiko yahewasa pwaiya ma 'oinega 'itauya Epeso .
55004013	Ceguma 'utautauyama 'igu tobwatobwa tupwana 'u'ewedima , 'agu hewanu mwalo Tilowasi 'oina ya'ebesineya Kalipo 'ina hada , ma wete 'igu bukiyao ma pepa leleleledi , taudi beno nuwanuwagu madouna .
55004014	Pwawapwawati 'ana topaihowa sanina Alekisana mwau madouna 'i'ebwaegauwa , 'oinega 'ana maisa galana 'abwa Cinapwana 'i'ebwae .
55004015	Alekisanaina 'ida he'ita 'ilo'aleha hedadeya , 'oinega 'owa tauna 'oinega wete 'u'itayahigo .
55004016	Cigu yatala nugeta geya 'eta taiya 'i'abihetegau , mabwaiyadi simatauta ta si'ebesinegauwa , ma yaboimo . Yehoba , 'idi pui bewa sahena 'uhehemaise .
55004017	Ta 'igu yatalaina 'oina Yehoba 'i'abihetegauwa ta waiwai 'i'ebwaegauwa , ma tetelina mabwaiyana yahepwaileya tomiya ganamuli baibaiwadi 'oidiya , ma Yehoba 'ina 'abihetena 'oinega geya laiyoni 'oidiya siulegau .
55004018	Mwauwedi 'oidiyega Cinapwanaina nata 'i'abihetegau ma 'ina 'ebeloina galewa 'oina yaluhu , 'oinega tada hepwatuwe hataya . Emeni .
55004019	Cigu helau Pilisila ma Akuila , ta wete Onesipolo ma'ina susuyao 'oidiya , 'uhepwaile .
55004020	Ilasito 'imiyahila Kolinita , ma Tilopimo 'ilohala ta 'asa Milito 'oina ya'ebesineya .
55004021	Culomwayamwayauma weyahina muhemuhena ma gogai 'ana tuta 'ilatu . Yubulo ma Pudeni ma Lino ma Kalodiya ta wete 'iyadao mabwaiyadi 'idi helau 'oiuwa .
55004022	Cinapwana ba'idau ma yaluyaluwau 'i'abihe waiwaiye , ma 'owa ma'ino bodao 'i'abihetegomi . Taugu Paulo .
56001001	Natugu Taito , 'ino leta bewa taugu Paulo 'oiguwega , taugu Yehoba 'ina topaihowa ta Yesu Keliso 'ana tohepwaila . Cigu paihowaina 'i'ebwaegauwa ma taudi Yehoba 'ana hesihesinuwao ya'abihe waiwaiyedi ma sihemisa moisa ma nuwadi 'isabwalena , ta 'oinega sanapu moisega sipaihowa dumwalu .
56001002	Wete Yehoba mwalo hene 'igwae hemisaediya ta sihemisaeya 'abehega yawasidi miyamiya hatayana 'i'ebwaedi . Ta geya sowana 'i'abo .
56001003	Tutaina Yehoba 'ihesinuweya 'oina tauna 'ina gwaehemisega Yesu 'itauyama , ta yawasida moisa 'i'abilatuheya , ta Yehoba , tauna 'ada To'abihetena , 'iloinaegauwa ta yaguguguguya .
56001004	Taito , 'owa ya'ahwa natunegowa moisa 'ida hemisa 'aigeda , 'oinega Tamada Yehoba ma 'ada to'abihetena Yesu Keliso 'idi helauwega si'abihetego ma 'umiya daumwala .
56001005	Bewa weyahina ya'ebesinegowa bwanabwana Kiliti 'oina ma to'aha nobwa hekalesiya 'alona geya bwebwe'ana 'ugihe dumwalu , ma wete 'igu loinega tohanugetao 'uhesinuwedi , 'asa 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oidiya .
56001006	Ta 'igu loina bewa tohanugetao 'adi hesinuwa weyahina , beno gide , to loheya 'eguma 'ina mumuga 'ausalana , ma mwanena 'aigeda tuwamo , ma natudiyao wasadi 'ane geya sida puiya , ta geya sida logwahata , ma hesi taudi ma'idi hemisa Yehoba 'oina .
56001007	Weyahina tohanugetao Yehoba weyahina sipaipaihowa , 'ilobwainediya ma mumugadi bwebwe'ana , ma sahena sidebadeba pa'ala nana sihehe gamwagamwagu , nuwana bwasi galana sinumanuma yauyaule , nuwana loheya 'ana to'ehunuwa , nuwana wasawasa 'ana tohamwa .
56001008	Ma hesi 'adi lobwaina ma taumanao si'itayahidi , ma mumugadi tuwa 'ausaladi , ta 'idi nuwatuhu matuhadi . Ma wete mumugadi dumwaludi , ma 'ehaudi , ta taudi to'alama'i'itana .
56001009	Ta wete he'itaedi moisaedi sihesagohediya sihemisaedi , ma sinuwatuhu yahidi , ma 'ane tomota tupwadi silemedi he'ita 'oinega , ta 'eguma taiyawedi sihegwae 'abo'abowedi si'abihe dumwaludi .
56001010	Weyahina toguipaila mabwaiyadi simiyamiya , ta meYudiya 'idi loina 'ana tomuliyao boda hedada sigwaegwae besobeso ma tomota si'abo'abowedi .
56001011	Coinega 'idi 'ahwa'abo'abo weyahina 'u'etobodedi , weyahina hali susu ma hali susu si'abihepuidi , ta 'idi he'ita 'abo'aboina 'oinega nuwanuwadi mane siloba .
56001012	Bewa 'oinega ta palopita 'aigeda Kiliti loheyaina 'igwaeya , “ Kiliti taudi mumugadi to'e'abo'abo ma tologwahata , ma mumugadi gide tuwa hebahebai , weyahina gamwadi 'ina mwausumo weyahina sinuwanuwatuhu . ”
56001013	Palopitaina 'ina gwae bewa moisa , 'oinega 'uheliyedi ma sinuwabui ma sihemisa moisa .
56001014	Ma 'u'etobodedi , ma sahena Yudiyaedi 'idi he'ote'otetela sihehesagohedi , ta wete he'ita moisa 'ana towahi'wata'watao sahena simulimuliyedi .
56001015	Taudi mumugadi 'ehauna 'oidiya ginaula mabwaiyana 'ehauna , ma hesi taudi wasa bwebwe'ana 'ana tolowahi'wata , ma mumugadi galadi , taudi 'oidiya geya 'eta to'aha 'ehauna , weyahina 'idi nuwatuhu galadi mabwaiyadi .
56001016	Taudi sigwae 'abehega Yehoba sisanapuya , ta 'idi paihowa 'oinega Yehoba siuhaleya , weyahina taudi togala ma wete loina 'ana tosinala , 'oinega paihowa bwebwe'ana geya 'eta 'adi lobwaina .
56002001	Ma 'owa he'ita dumwaluna 'uhe'itae .
56002002	Ma babadaedi 'uhegwaedi sahena sinumanuma yauyaule we'aha galana , ma sahena wete siyaliyaliyaya besobeso , ma hesi Yehoba sihemisa moisa , ma helau ta 'alama'i'ita 'oidiyega simaha .
56002003	Cai'aihaleyao wete 'uhegwaedi ma mumugadi ma'idi he'asisi , ta sahena tomota si'ahwa'ahwa galagalaedi , ma wete sahena waini sinumanuma hedade , ta 'ilobwainediya mumuga 'ausalana sihehe'ita wahiwahine hauhaudi 'oidiya ,
56002004	ma 'ane mwanediyao ta natudiyao sihelau bwaibwainidi .
56002005	Ma 'ane ma'idi he'asisi , ma mumuga bwebwe'ana 'oidiyega 'idi hada si'itayahidi , ma wete mwanediyao sihelauwedi ta 'enadi sihematamatana , ma bewa 'oinega hali tomota Yehoba 'ina gwae sihe'asisiye , ta sahena si'ahwa'ahwa galagalae .
56002006	Loheloheya hauhaudi 'uguguyadi ma mumugadi si'itayahidi .
56002007	Ta 'owa mumugau mabwaiyana 'oidiyega tomota 'uhe'itadi ma taudi wete simumuga bwebwe'ana . Eeta gwae moisega 'uhe'ita , ma 'ane mumugau ta 'ino he'ita 'ilobwaine .
56002008	Ma 'ane 'ino he'itao sahena tomota si'ahwa'ahwa 'abo'abowe , ma 'ino gwae bwebwe'adi 'adi hesagoha 'oinega 'a 'alehao sideba mwadina , 'idi 'ahwayali besobeso 'oidiyega .
56002009	Topaihowao wete 'uhegwaedi ma 'idi babadao 'idi loina sihe'asisiyedi , ta 'idi paihowega si'abihe yaliyayadi , ma sahena silologwahata ,
56002010	ta sahena yagaha . Ma hesi ma'idi he'asisi moisa taudi 'ada to'abihetena Yehoba tetelina si'abilatuhe 'idi paihowa 'ausalanega .
56002011	Yehoba 'ina helauina 'ilatu pwaima tomota 'ada 'abihetena weyahina ,
56002012	ta 'ihe'itaegita ma mumuga besobeso ma nuwatuhu galadi talogwahatedi , ma hesi tamiya mumuga bwebwe'adi ma dumwaludi 'oidiya .
56002013	Bewa tuta ma'ida yaliyaya 'ada to'abihetena Yesu Keliso tahemisae , tauna 'ida Yehoba waiwaina ma ma'ina wasawasa , ta 'ina hapwesa weyahina tayamwayamwa .
56002014	Tauna 'itagwaleya weyahida , ta 'i'amasa sabi 'abihetegita 'ida pui mabwaiyana 'oidiyega , ta 'i'abihe 'ehaugita , ta 'iboi 'ina boda 'oina 'ilagugita , ta 'ane 'ina paihowa bwebwe'adi 'oidiya taguibiga .
56002015	He'ita bewa 'uhe'itadi tomota 'oidiya , ma loina dumwaluna 'oinega 'ulohatotodi ma simumuga bwaibwaina . Ma sahena 'eta taiya 'igwae sinaligo .
56003001	Wete 'uhenuwa lagudi ma 'asa 'ana toloinao 'idi loina 'oidiya sitagwaledi , ma sihematamatana , ta paihowa bwebwe'adi sipaihowadi .
56003002	Ta sahena 'ahwayali ma he'ahwa panapanawa , ma hesi tomota 'oidiya simumuga wahinuhega ma'idi he'asisi .
56003003	Moisa tauda mwalo yauyauleida ta tologwahata hedada , 'oinega henuhenuwa ma yaliyaya besobeso nuwada si'ewa'ewa ma 'eda bwebwe'ana ta'ebesineya . Ma wete nuwanuwada lo'aleha ma he'ipi'ipi , 'oinega tomota tupwadi silo'alehegita , ma wete tauda talo'alehediya .
56003004	Ta muliyetega Yehoba tauna 'ada To'abihetena 'ina helau ma 'ina 'atemuyamuya 'i'abilatuheya ,
56003005	ta 'i'abihetegita , geya 'ida paihowa dumwaludi weyahidi , ma hesi tauna 'ina 'atemuyemuyega , 'oinega 'ina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega 'ida pui 'ibuyodiya , ta 'i'abihe 'ehaugita , ta yawasida 'ehauna 'i'ebwaegita .
56003006	Ma 'ada To'abihetena Yesu Keliso tauna 'oinega Yaluyaluwa Tabuna Yehoba 'isiweya 'ateda .
56003007	Ma tauna 'ina helauwega 'i'ahwa dumwaluwegita , 'oinega tanuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega yawasida miyamiya hatayana taloba .
56003008	Gwae bewa mabwaiyana gwae moisa , 'oinega 'uhewaiwai 'adi lohatoto 'oidiya , ma 'ane taudi Yehoba 'ana tohemisao gwaeyedi sihemisedi ma simuliyedi , ma paihowa bwebwe'adi sipaihowadi , bewa ginaula bwebwe'ana ta tomota 'adi 'ebelema .
56003009	Ma he'ahwa lasalasa besobeso loina weyahidi , nana hali yaso sanidi weyahidi , bewa nata geya si'abihetegita , 'oinega 'u'ebesinedi .
56003010	Ceguma taiya nuwanuwana 'i'ahwa lasalasa tomota 'oidiya 'uhegwae ma'aigeda bo maluwa ma 'ilolagu . Ceguma geya 'ilolagu walogwahate .
56003011	Weyahina 'ina nuwatuhu geya sidumwalu , ta tauna 'iboi 'isanapu ginaulaedi 'ipaipaihowadi galadi tuwa .
56003012	Cabwa Atimasi bo Tikiko yahesumaneyawa 'oiuwa , 'oinega 'eguma 'itautauyawa 'ulomwayamwayauma , weyahina nuwanuwagu gogai 'ana tuta taugu 'asa Nikopoli 'oina yamiyamiya .
56003013	Loina 'ana tosanapu tauna Senasi ma wete Apolosa 'u'abihetedi , ta manima 'abiyadi 'uhesumanedi 'idi 'adau 'oina , ma 'ane ma'idi yaliyaya .
56003014	Ta 'idi bodao mabwaiyadi 'uhe'itadi ma siguibiga , ta sawasawahidi tomiyamwau si'abihetedi , ma sahena simiyamiya daidaita .
56003015	Cebwa ma'igu bodao 'ima helau 'oiuwa , ma 'iyadao Bada 'ana tomuliyao ba'idamwao wamiyamiya taudi wete 'ima helau 'oidiya . Yehoba 'ina 'abihetena mabwaiyami 'oimiya . Taugu Paulo .
57001001	Yauwedo tasigu Pilimoni , 'owa Yesu Keliso 'ina topaihowa 'aigeda , gide taugu . Ma taugu Paulo deliya bo'i silagugauwa Yesu Keliso 'ina paihowa weyahina , ma bewa Timoti 'i'abihetegau ta bewa 'ino leta 'aleleleleyawa .
57001002	Ma 'ima helau mabwaiyami 'oimiya , 'owa ma nuhudai Apiya ma tasidai Alikipo , tauna ba'idada tahehetapewa Yesu Keliso 'ina paihowa weyahina , ma wete 'ima helau tohekalesiyao mabwaiyadi taudi 'ino hada silolotapwalolo 'oidiya .
57001003	Cida Bada Yesu Keliso ma Tamada Yehoba 'idi helauwega tuwa wamiya yaliyaya .
57001004	Wasau yahesagoha pwaiya beno 'ino helau ma 'ino hemisa 'ida Bada Yesu 'oina , ma 'ana tomuliyao mabwaiyadi wete 'oidiya , 'oinega tuta mabwaiyana 'igu 'ahwanoi 'oidiyega ma'igu loyauwedo , Yehoba 'oina weyahiu .
57001005	
57001006	Nuwanuwagu ma 'ida he'iya'iyagu Keliso 'oinega 'ida 'abihewaiwaiyego ma wete ginaula mabwaiyadi bwebwe'adi Keliso 'oinega silatulatuma 'uda sanapudi .
57001007	Tasigu , 'ino helauwega tohekalesiyao 'u'abihetediya ma 'adi lotohona 'i'abihe bwebwe'aneya , ma 'ino helau ta wasau bwebwe'ana yahesagoheya , ta yayaliyaya madouna .
57001008	Nuwanuwagu ma helauwega ginaula 'aigeda 'upaihowa . Taugu Paulo , 'ino bada , ma deliya yamiyamiya Yesu Keliso weyahina , 'oinega sawasawahigu ma Keliso saninega yaloinego ma ginaulaina 'upaihowa , ma tuwa hesi , helauwega yahegwaego ,
57001009	
57001010	beno ya'ahwanoiyego natugu Onesimo weyahina , tauna 'ima miya deliya 'oinega ya'ahwa natuneya , 'ina hemisa Keliso 'oina weyahina .
57001011	Mwalo loheyaina Onesimo 'ino paihowa 'oiuwa geya bwebwe'ana , ma bewa 'inuwabuiya ta 'ina paihowa 'oiguwa bwebwe'ana , ma wete yasanapuya mumugana weyahiu 'ibwebwe'ana pwaiya .
57001012	Coinega Onesimoina yahesumana hileyawa , ta ma'igu nuwagala ,
57001013	weyahina nuwanuwagu yanuwahi ma tauna 'ihesuwahego ma 'i'abihetegau 'igu miya deli 'oina .
57001014	Ma nata geya yanuwanuwahi , weyahina 'owa 'ana toloina . Ma wete nuwanuwagu 'ino tagwala 'oiguwa helauwega 'upaihowa ma sahena 'igu he'i'ima 'oinega .
57001015	Nuwana bewa tauna huhuna ta Onesimo 'i'ebesinegowa tuta muhemuhena tuwa , ma 'eguma 'ihilawa nata ba'idau wamiya hataya .
57001016	Mwalo tauna 'ino topaihowa , ma sauga bewa geya 'abehega 'ihetopaihowamo , ma tauna wete ta'ahwa tasine Yesu Keliso 'oinega . Tauna bo'i ya'ahwa tasineya , ma 'owa 'ilobwainegowa ma 'u'ahwatasina moisa , weyahina tauna 'ino topaihowa ma wete tasiu 'ida Bada 'oinega .
57001017	Pilimoni 'owa ma taugu ta'ahwa tasineya , 'oinega 'agu helau 'oiuwega , 'eguma yahapwesawa , gide wete Onesimo 'utoehila .
57001018	To'aha gide mwalo 'ina pui , nana 'ana haga 'ulagu , 'abwa taugu yahemaise .
57001019	Taugu Paulo bewa nimaguwega yalelelele 'abehega mabwaiyana yahemaise hegumwali . Ma hesi sahena 'a haga 'oiguwa weyahina yagwaegwae , beno mwalo taugu 'igu paihowega ta yaluyaluwau 'i'ehau pwaiya .
57001020	Cae tasigu , nuwanuwagu ma Keliso saninega Onesimo 'uhelauwe , ma 'ina pui 'unuwasam , beno 'abihetena madouna 'oiguwa , ma 'ane 'agu lotohona 'ibwebwe'ana mabwaiyana .
57001021	Cigu nuwatuhu bewa yaleleyawa , ma'igu hemisa ma 'abehega 'igu gwaeyedi 'uhesagohedi , ma 'umuliyedi , ma wete 'u'abihemadou .
57001022	Ginaula 'aigeda wete nuwanuwagu , beno 'igu 'ebe'eno 'ino hada , 'u'atububu , weyahina yanuwatuhuya 'abehega 'ino 'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina 'oinega ma muhemuhena ma deliyega silihasigau ta yatauyawa 'oiuwa .
57001023	Epapila ba'idagu Yesu Keliso 'ina paihowa weyahina ta deliya silagumaiya , ma Epapilaina 'ina helau 'oiuwa .
57001024	Gide wete taudi ba'idagwao 'apaipaihowa : Maki ma Alisitako ma Dimasa ma Luke , 'idi helau wete 'oiuwa .
57001025	Cida Bada Yesu Keliso tuwa yaluyaluwau 'ihehelauwe ma 'umiya bwebwe'ana . Taugu Paulo .
58001001	Mwalohene hali tuta ma hali tuta 'oidiya , ta nuwatuhu baibaiwana 'oidiyega Yehoba 'ina gwae palopitao 'i'ebwaediya , ta taudi sihepwaileya tubudao 'oidiya .
58001002	Ma 'ebelosaloha tauda 'ida tuta 'ina gwaeyao 'ihepwailediya 'oida natuna 'oinega . Yehoba natunaina 'ihesinuweya , ma 'abehega ginaula mabwaiyadi 'oidiya 'ihetoloina , ta mwalohene natunaina ba'idana ginaula mabwaiyana sihemasalehediya .
58001003	Ma Yehoba natunaina tamana 'ina 'asilala 'i'asi'asilalae ta tauna Yehoba 'ana 'oleya gide . Ma 'ina gwae waiwaina 'oinega ginaula mabwaiyana galewa ma bale'uwa 'i'abi'abi yahidi . Ma 'ida puiyao 'oidiyega 'ibuyogita ma muliyetega 'imiyatoiya Yehoba Tomiyahane hedade 'ina 'ebeulanega .
58001004	Tauna aneloseyao 'imiyahane sinediya , ma saninaina Yehoba 'i'ebwaeya anelose sanidiyao 'imadou sinediya .
58001005	Weyahina geya 'eta tuta Yehoba anelose 'eta 'oina 'ida gwae , “ Cowa natugu , nige bo'i ya'ahwa natunegowa . ” Geya wete anelose 'eta weyahina 'ida gwae , “ Taugu 'oiguwa 'ida 'ahwatamana , ma tauna 'oina yada 'ahwanatuna . ” Gwaeyedi bewa natunamo weyahina 'igwaenediya .
58001006	Ma tutaina 'ina tautuwa 'ihesumaneyama bale'uwa , 'igwaeya , “ Aneloseyao galewa sawasawahidi ma tauna 'oina si'etuluha . ”
58001007	Ma hesi aneloseyao weyahidi 'ina gwae hagana , 'igwaeya , “ Yehoba 'ina aneloseyao 'ihemasalehediya , 'oinega 'idi tauya gide yaumai , ma 'ina topaihowaedi gide 'aiwe ninima . ”
58001008	Ma hesi natunaina weyahina 'igwaeya , “ Cowa Yehoba ma'ino loina dumwaluna nata 'uloina hataya .
58001009	Mumuga bwebwe'ana nuwau 'i'eweya ma galana 'a didiga . Coinega 'ino Yehoba bo'i 'iheholoigowa yaliyaya moisa 'oinega , ta 'ino yaliyaya 'iyamwao 'idi yaliyaya 'imadou sinediya . ”
58001010	Ma 'aigeda wete 'ina gwae natunaina 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Bada yo , tuta nugeta 'oina bale'u 'uhemasaleheya ma nimauwega galewa 'upaihoweya .
58001011	Ginaulaedi 'abwa silohesa hesawala ma 'owa 'umiyamiya , ma ginaula mabwaiyadi sihemiyamiya gide 'wama ,
58001012	ma 'unupilidi gide 'ale'o , ta 'adi 'ita 'i'egibui , ma 'owa geya'abwa 'ugibugibuigo ta hesi 'umiya hataya . ”
58001013	Ma hesi , Yehoba geya 'aigeda wete anelose 'oina 'ida gwae , “ Cigu 'ebeulega 'umiyatoi ma 'ana siga 'a 'alehao yalagu dobihedi 'aeu gabulena . ” Ma bewa gwaeina natunamo 'oina 'igwaeneya .
58001014	Ta anelose taudi yaluyaluwa tuwa ma tohalewasa , taudi Yehoba 'ilagudiya ta 'abehega si'abihetegita tauda taiyawedi 'eguma 'abihetena weyahina 'ihesinuwanegita .
58002001	Coinega sawasawahida ma gwaeyedi tahesagohediya tanuwatuhu yahidi , ma sahena tanuwanuwa naidedi .
58002002	Mwalo aneloseyao Yehoba 'ina gwae sihepwaileya tomota 'oidiya , ma gwaeina gwae moisa , 'eguma tomota geya sida muliyediya , beno 'idi pui , ta 'ana maisa silobeya .
58002003	Tauda wete 'eguma 'abihetenaina madounaina talogwahate , bwa'omatana taloba , ta geya sawasawahina tadenasine . Gwaeina 'abihetenaina weyahina 'ida Bada Yesu 'ihepwaila nugeteya , eeta 'ina gwaeyao 'ana tohesagoha nugetao si'ebwaegita tauda .
58002004	Ma Yehoba wete 'ihe'ita 'abehega gwaeina gwae moisa , beno 'ila'ilala ma hedehedede ma paihowa waiwaidi 'oidiyega , ta wete Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina heguyai 'oida 'oinega . Ma 'ina 'eheleyedi Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu gide , ta Yaluyaluwa Tabuna ginaulaedi 'oida 'iheguyaiyediya .
58002005	Cahegwae pwaigomiya tupwaina 'abwa taloba weyahina , ta Yehoba aneloseyao sahena 'idi loina 'i'ebwa'ebwaedi tupwaina 'oina ,
58002006	ma hesi tomota 'aigeda 'i'ebwaeya , weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaila 'igwaeya , “ Yehoba yo , to tomota tauna ta 'oinega weyahina 'unuwanuwatuhu ? Ma taiya hede tomota natuna tauna 'u'ita'itayahi ?
58002007	Coinega tuta to'uto'upanamo weyahina 'ulagu suluheya , aneloseyao gabulediya ma muliyetega 'ana 'amayaba ta 'ana hepwatu madouna 'u'ebwaeya .
58002008	Ma waiwai wete 'u'ebwaeya ma ginaula mabwaiyadi 'iloinedi . ” Ma 'ina 'ebeloina ginaula mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'iloina , ta hesi geya sauga bewa , 'abwa hesi 'ihetoloina ginaula mabwaiyana 'oidiya .
58002009	Ma hesi Yesu ta'ita pwaiya , beno tuta to'uto'upanamo 'oina 'imiyasuluwa aneloseyao gabulediya ta muliyetega 'ana 'amayaba ta 'ana hepwatu madouna 'ilobediya 'ina muyamuya ma 'ina 'amasa 'oidiyega . Beno Yehoba 'ina helau 'oida , weyahina Yesu 'amasa 'ana muya 'ilotohoya mabwaiyada weyahida .
58002010	Yehoba ginaula mabwaiyadi 'ihemasalehediya tauna 'iboi weyahina , eeta nuwanuwana natunao baibaiwadi 'itoedima tauna 'ina tupwa wasawasa 'oina . Cilobwaineya ma Yehobaina 'ada To'abihetenaina 'i'abihe 'asilale . Bewa lamuna muya madouna 'ilotohoya , ma hesi tuwa 'i'alama'i'ita , ta 'oinega mumugana mabwaiyana dumwadumwaluna .
58002011	Yesuina 'ada To'abihetena ma tauda 'i'abi 'ehaugita , ta tauna ma tauda Yehoba 'oinega tanaoma , 'oinega geya'abwa Yesu 'ihemwadimwadina weyahida , ta hesi 'i'ahwa'ahwa tasinegita ,
58002012	weyahina 'ina gwae tamana 'oina , 'igwaeya , “ Saniu nata yahepwaile tasigwao 'oidiya , ma 'eto'auta 'alona yahepwatuwego . ”
58002013	Ta wete 'igwaeya , “ Yehoba 'oina 'igu hemisa yalagu . ” Ta wete 'igwaeya , “ Gwagwamaedi Yehoba 'i'ebwaegauwa ba'idagwao 'ebwa 'amiyamiya . ”
58002014	Moisa tuwa , Yesu 'ina gwagwamao tauda tomota mahesiyoda ma mabweyahida , 'oinega Yesu wete 'iheloheya ta loheya wahina 'i'eweya ma 'i'amasa , ma 'abehega 'ina 'amasega Tomudulele 'ilohesawali , ma Tomuduleleina 'ina loina 'amasa weyahina 'ilohesawaliya .
58002015	Ta wete 'amasa 'ana matauta 'ana pai waiwaina 'ida tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiyega 'i'abihetegita .
58002016	Cabiheteina geya aneloseyao weyahidi ta hesi tauda Ebalahamo tubunao weyahida .
58002017	Coinega Yesu 'iheloheya tauda tasinao gide , ta 'ihetopwaoli madouna ma'ina 'atemuyamuya weyahida , ma Yehoba 'ina paihowa 'oina 'ihetapewa , ta 'ipwaoliyeya 'ida mumuga galadi weyahidi ta 'abehega Yehoba 'inuwasamudi .
58002018	Ta wete Yesu bale'uwa miyamwau ta 'ebetohona baibaiwana 'ilobediya , 'oinega 'eguma Tomudulele 'itohogita Yesu 'ebetohowedi 'isanapu pwaidiya , ta sawasawahina 'oidiyega 'i'abihetegita .
58003001	Ciyagwao , 'omi ma taugu Yehoba 'ihesinuwegita 'ina tupwa weyahina , 'ilobwaineya ma Yesu tanuwatuhuyahi , weyahina tauna 'ida tapwalolo 'ana tohepwaila ta wete 'ida topwaoli madouna ,
58003002	ta 'ihetapeweya 'ina paihowaina Yehoba 'i'ebwaeya , gide mwalona Mosese 'ihehetapewa 'esa Yehoba 'ina hada 'oina .
58003003	Coinega Yesu hepwatu madouna 'ilobeya , ta Mosese 'ana hepwatu tupwanamo tuwa , hesi gide tuwa hada bwebwe'ana , geya hene hepwatu madouna 'ida lobeya , ma hesi 'ana to'abi . Ta Moseseina gide hada , ta Yesu to'abi .
58003004	Moisa , hada 'aigeda 'aigeda 'adi to'abi simiyamiya , ta ginaula mabwaiyadi 'adi topaihowa Yehoba .
58003005	Moseseina Yehoba 'ina hada 'ihehetapewa , topaihowa gide , ta Yehoba 'ina gwaeyao ginaulaedi 'abwa silatu weyahidi 'ihepwaila latuhediya .
58003006	Ma 'iyamo Keliso Yehoba 'ina hada 'ihetapewa , geya topaihowa gide , ta hesi tauna natuna moisa . Tauda taboi Yehoba 'ina hadaina tuwa , 'eguma tahemisa hataya ma'ida 'atepatu ta ma'ida yaliyaya .
58003007	Coinega Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ihegwaegita 'igwaeya , “ Nata , 'eguma 'enana wahesagohe ,
58003008	sahena wadebadeba pa'ala gide tubumiyao mwalo hene yoho 'awawa 'oina sitohogauwa ta 'igu loina silogwahatediya .
58003009	Weyahina bolime poti 'oidiya 'igu paihowa waiwaidi baibaiwadi si'itediya , ta tubumiyaowedi 'idi lomugiyega sitohogauwa ta weyahidi ya'ala'i'iwasa , ta yagwaeya , ‘ Tuta mabwaiyana taudi 'idi nuwatuhuwega sitautauya pui , weyahina 'igu 'eda geya sisanapu . ’
58003010	
58003011	Coinega yagamwasowalediya ta yaloina pa'alediya , yagwaeya , ‘ Sahena wete 'igu 'ebe 'aiyawasi 'oina siluhuluhu . ’ ”
58003012	Ciyagwao , wa'itayahigomi ma sahena wadebadeba pa'ala nuwana walolopui , 'amuge ta Yehoba mayawasina wamiyasine .
58003013	Ma bewa tuwa waboimimo wahelemalema sabwelo 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oidiya , ta 'oinega sahena mumuga galana 'i'abowegomi ta Yehoba 'enana walogwahate .
58003014	Tauda mwalo 'ida hemisa Keliso 'oina talaguya , ma 'eguma 'ida hemisaina ta'abiyahi bwaibwaini ma 'ana siga tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'oina , Keliso ba'idadai tayaliyaya mahemahetena .
58003015	Gide Buki He'asisi 'ina gwae 'igwaeya , “ Nata 'eguma Yehoba 'enana wahesagohedi , sahena wadebadeba pa'ala gide tubumiyao mwalohene 'igu loina silogwahateya . ”
58003016	Taiyawedi Yehoba 'ina gwae sihesagoheya ta silogwahateya ? Taudi Mosese Itipita 'oinega 'ihanugetediya ta silatuma , 'awa ?
58003017	Taudi weteyage bolime poti 'oidiya 'idi mumuga galadi weyahidi Yehoba 'i'ala'i'iwasa , 'oinega togalaedi yoho 'awawa si'ama'amasa hegumwala .
58003018	Weyahina taudi 'ina gwae geya simuliye , 'oinega 'adi gwae 'igwaeya , “ Geya'abwa wete 'igu 'ebe'aiyawasi 'oina siluhuluhu . ”
58003019	Coinega tasanasanapu 'abehega taudi geya sida luhuwa , weyahina geya sihemisa .
58004001	Cina gwae hemisaina 'abwa 'imiyamiya 'abehega 'ina 'ebe 'aiyawasi tauna 'oinega taloba , eeta 'ilobwainegita ma tamatauta 'amuge ta tupwami wabe'u ma sahena walobaloba .
58004002	Moisa , wasaina 'i'ebwaegita , taudi wete mwalohene 'i'ebwaediya , ta wasaina geya 'ilemedi , weyahina sihesagoheya ta geya sihemise .
58004003	Ma tauda 'ana tohemisao talobeya , ma hesi taudi mwalohene geya sida lobeya , weyahina geya sihemise , ta Yehoba 'adi gwae 'igwaeya , “ Yagamwasowalediya 'oinega yagwae pa'alediya ta sahena 'ebe 'aiyawasi 'oiguwega silobaloba . ” Yehoba 'ina 'ebe 'aiyawasiina 'imiyamiya , weyahina tutaina bale'u mabwaiyana 'ihemasalehediya ta 'igumwala , ta 'oinega 'i'aiyawasiya .
58004004	Ta sabweloina 'i'aiyawasiya , weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaila pwaiya , 'igwaeya , “ Yehoba sabwelo hesebenina 'oina 'ina paihowa mabwaiyana 'oinega 'i'aiyawasiya . ”
58004005	Coinega tanuwanuwatuhu gwae bewa weyahina , “ Sahena 'ebe'aiyawasi 'oiguwega silobaloba . ”
58004006	Moisa , 'ebe 'aiyawasiina 'imiyamiya , ta tupwadimo 'abehega siloba , ma hesi taudi wasa sihesagohe nugeteya , ta loina sisinaliya , 'oinega sahena silobaloba .
58004007	Eeta Yehoba tuta hauhauna 'ilaguya ma 'oina tomota 'ebe 'aiyawasi siloba , ta 'oinega sanapu 'i'ebwaeya Debida 'oina ta Debidaina 'igwaeya , “ Nata hesi 'eguma Yehoba 'enana wahesagohe , sahena wadebadeba pa'ala . ”
58004008	Ta 'ebe 'aiyawasiina Yehoba 'igwaeneya geya Yosuwa ma 'ana bodao 'idi 'ebe 'aiyawasi , ta hesi hali 'ebe 'aiyawasi , beno tuta 'aigeda hauhauna 'ilaguya ma 'abehega tomota 'idi 'ebe 'aiyawasiina siloba .
58004009	Coinega Yehoba 'ina tomota tauda 'ida 'ebe 'aiyawasi 'imiyamiya , ta 'ebe 'aiyawasiina Sabati 'ana 'aiyawasi gide .
58004010	Eeta 'eguma taloba , tauda 'ida paihowega ta'aiyawasi , gide Yehoba mwalo 'ina paihowega 'i'aiyawasi 'esa .
58004011	Ma 'ilobwainegita ma tatoho waiwai 'abehega 'ebe 'aiyawasiina taloba , ma sahena 'aigeda taiya 'ilologwahata , 'amuge ta 'ibe'u , taudi gide mwalo sibe'u 'esa .
58004012	Moisa , Yehoba 'ina gwae mayawasina ta waiwaina gide 'elepa 'aleha 'ina matamatagi matupwa luwaluwana , ta sawasawahina 'ibadigita 'aloda moisa , beno nuwatuhu ta mumuga dahwanedi simiyamiya .
58004013	Weyahina Yehoba matana geya 'eta wete to'aha 'imiya dahwana , mabwaiyana silo'atamanediya , ta tauna 'oina 'abwa 'ida paihowa mabwaiyana tahepwailedi .
58004014	Cida Topwaoli Madouna ma 'ausalana 'imiyamiya , tauna Yesu , Yehoba Natuna , weyahida 'ihane pwaiya galewa , 'oinega 'ida hemisa 'oina ta'abiyahi momosi .
58004015	Tupwadi topwaoliyao geya sida 'atemuyamuyaegita 'ida we'a weyahidi , ta hesi Yesu 'ida miyamwau 'inuwa sabwalenidiya ta 'i'atemuyemuyegita , weyahina mwalo bale'uwa Tomudulele 'ina 'ebetoho mabwaiyana 'ilobediya gide tauda talobaloba 'esedi , ta Yesu geya 'eta wete 'ina pui .
58004016	Coinega ma'ida 'atepatu tanao ma ta'ahwanoi 'ada toloinaina 'oina , ta 'oinega 'ida miyamwau 'oidiya 'i'atemuyemuyegita , ta wete 'i'abihetegita .
58005001	Topwaoliyao madoudi Yehoba 'ihesinuwediya ta 'ilagudiya , ma tauna matana sipwaopwaoli tomota 'idi mumuga galadi weyahidi .
58005002	Topwaoliyedi 'idi mumuga nuhana tomata'u'upao ma topuiyao 'oidiya , weyahina topwaoliyedi tomota tuwa , ma'idi we'a .
58005003	Coinega taudi 'idi puiyao weyahidi ta wete tomota baibaiwadi 'idi puiyao weyahidi sipwaopwaoli Yehoba 'oina .
58005004	Geya sawasawahina ma 'aigeda taiya tauna 'ina nuwatuhuwega 'ihetopwaoli , ta Yehoba hesi 'ina hesinuwega , gide mwalo Yehoba Eloni 'ihesinuweya ta 'ihetopwaoli .
58005005	Wete gide Keliso geya taunamo 'ida 'abilagasiya ma 'ihetopwaoli , ta Yehoba 'ihesinuweya ta 'ihegwaeya , 'igwae , “ Cowa natugu . Nige bo'i ya'ahwa natunegowa . ”
58005006	Ta wete 'ina gwae heluwena , 'igwaeya , “ Cowa 'uhetopwaoli hataya gide Melikisedeki . ”
58005007	Mwalo Yesu bale'uwa 'imiyamiya ma'ina dou 'i'ahwa 'ahwanoiya Tamana 'oina , ta nuwanuwana 'amasega 'i'abihete , 'oinega 'i'abiheteya weyahina Yesu Tamana 'ihe'asisiyeya .
58005008	Yesuina Yehoba Natuna , ta hesi tuwa muyamuya 'ilobeya ta 'ina 'alama'i'itega 'ihematamatana moisa ,
58005009	ta 'oinega 'ina mumuga mabwaiyana dumwaluna . Tauda wete 'eguma tahematamatane 'abihetena hataya Yesuina 'oinega taloba ,
58005010	weyahina Yehoba Yesu 'ihesinuweya ma 'ihetopwaoli hataya gide Melikisedeki .
58005011	Nuwatuhu bewa weyahina gwae baibaiwana simiyamiya , nuwanuwagu ma yahepwailedi 'oimiya , ta geya sawasawahina , weyahina tenami tuituidi .
58005012	Tuta bewa 'ilobwainegomiya ma hali tomota 'oidiya wahe'ita , ta geya sawasawahimi , weyahina Yehoba wasana huhuna geya wasanapu , 'oinega 'abwa 'ahehe'itegomi . Comi susumo 'ilobwainegomiya weyahina 'e'ahai pa'alina geya 'ilobwainegomi .
58005013	Coinega 'omi gide gwagwama , 'eda dumwadumwaluna geya nuwami 'isabwalena moisa , eeta 'ilobwainegomiya ma he'ita nuhana 'oinega 'ahe'aigomi nugeta .
58005014	Ta 'eguma taiyawedi 'idi sanapu 'imatuwa , taudi gide 'e'ahai pa'alina 'ana to'aiyao , weyahina nuwadi 'isabwalena pwaiya , ta sawasawahidi sihesinuwa to'aha 'ausalana ma to'aha galana .
58006001	He'ita nugenugetana Keliso weyahina wahesagoha pwaidiya ta wasanapudiya , 'oinega nuwanuwagu sanapu hauhaudi Keliso weyahina yahe'itegomi ta 'imi nuwatuhu 'oidiya waheloheya . He'itaedi tahesagoha pwaidiya ta tasanapudiya sahena talolohilahiladi . He'itaedi bewa : 'ida mumuga mwalo galadi 'adi logwahata , 'ida hemisa Yehoba 'oina ,
58006002	babitaiso 'ana he'ita , ta wete 'ada tohanugetao nimadi 'adi lagu debada , ma to'amasa 'idi toholo hila , ma gala 'ana maisa hesilae hataya . He'itaedi wasanapu pwaidiya .
58006003	Ceguma Yehoba 'itagwala , sanapu nugenugetadi wa'abiyahidi ta 'adi loheposeyana wete yahe'itegomi .
58006004	Weyahina taiyawedi mwalo Yehoba weyahina nuwadi 'isabwalena , ta helauina galewega silotohoya , ta Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina 'abihetena 'oidiya silotohoya ,
58006005	ta wete Yehoba 'ina gwae silotohoya 'abehega 'ausalana , ta 'ina waiwai tuta 'inaonaoma weyahina wete silotohoya ,
58006006	ma 'eguma muliyetega sibe'u , geya sawasawahina ma ta'abihe nuwabui hiladi , weyahina taudi 'idi mumugega Yehoba Natuna si'abihe kelose hileya ta sanina siheginaula besobesoweya .
58006007	Tanoha weyahina tanuwatuhu . Ceguma 'idohi hilahila , 'oinega bale'u 'i'abihegogai , ma hewana ma'ina yaliyaya 'ibwalabwala , beno tobegula 'ina 'ebeyaliyaya , ta 'ana sanapu 'abehega bale'uina Yehoba 'igwae helauweya .
58006008	Ta hesi 'eguma bale'uina 'oina 'awata ma talitali sibwala , bale'uina ma'ana heliya Yehoba 'oinega , ta tuinenamo 'ilobwaineya .
58006009	Ma 'iyagwao 'igu gwae bewa henuwalagu tuwa , ta yanuwatuhu yahiya helauwega 'abehega 'omi Keliso 'ina 'abihetena 'ana to'ewao wahewaiwai moisa .
58006010	Yehoba 'ina loina 'oimiya dumwaluna , 'oinega 'imi paihowao geya'abwa 'inainaidedi , beno 'imi helauwao ta 'imi lemao Yehoba saninega , tohekalesiyao 'oidiya , mwalo ta 'ana siga nige bewa .
58006011	Coinega nuwanuwagu ma 'omi 'aigeda 'aigeda wahetapewa ta 'abehega 'abwa muliyetega 'imi hemisa huwaina mabwaiyana waloba .
58006012	Sahena walologwahata , ma hesi tomotaedi wahe'au'aunawedi , taudi ma'idi 'alama'i'ita sihehemisa , ma 'oinega ginaulaedi Yehoba 'igwae hemisaediya si'ewadi .
58006013	Mwalo hene Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa Ebalahamo 'i'ebwaeya , ta Yehoba tauna saninega 'igwae hemisa , weyahina geya 'aigeda wete sani miyamiya hanena ma 'oinega 'igwae hemisa .
58006014	Ta 'ina gwae hemisaina bewa : “ Ya'abihetego tuta baibaiwana , ma tubumwao 'iyada . ”
58006015	Ma Ebalahamoina 'i'alama'i'ita tuta dudulena , eeta gwaeina huwaina 'ilobeya .
58006016	Tauda tomota tagwaegwae hane bo ta'eta'wata'watalulu 'aigeda sani madouna 'oinega , ta 'abehega tomota si'ahwa moisegita .
58006017	Yehoba gide nuwanuwana madouna 'ina gwae moisa tauda 'ihe'itegita 'abehega to'aha 'igwae hemisaeya 'oida 'abwa taloba , 'oinega tauna saninega 'i'eta'wata'waluluwa .
58006018	Ginaula waiwaidi 'eluwaedi miyamiya hatayadi , beno Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa ma 'ina 'eta'wata'walulu . Coinega tasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba geya 'eta tuta 'i'abo . Weyahina tauda bo'i Yehoba 'oina tadena ta 'i'abihetegita , 'oinega ta'atepatu ma tanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'ina gwae hemisa 'oida geya'abwa 'i'ebe'ebesinegita .
58006019	Cida nuwatuhu yahinaina gide 'ida loho waiwaina , ta 'oinega 'ale'o biliupa taluhubwale ma taluhu Yehoba 'ina 'ebemiya 'oina .
58006020	Nage 'oina Yesu 'iluhu nugeta pwaiya weyahida , ta 'ihetopwaoli madouna ma miyamiya hatayana weyahida , gide Melikisedeki mwalo hene .
58007001	Ma Melikisedekiina meSalema 'idi kini , ta Yehoba Tolohanena moisa 'ina topwaoli . Mwalo hene Melikisedekiina Ebalahamo 'ilobeya , tutaina lo'aleha 'oinega 'ihilama . Ta Ebalahamoina toloinao baibaiwadi ma 'adi bodao 'ipe'udiya , 'oinega Melikisedeki gwae hemisa bwebwe'ana 'i'ebwaeya Ebalahamo 'oina .
58007002	Coinega Ebalahamo 'ina tobwatobwa 'iwatahidiya he'une 'adi baibaiwa nima luwaluwa , ta he'une 'aigeda Melikisedeki 'i'ebwaeya ta Ebalahamo tauna naeni 'i'ewediya . Ta Melikisedeki sanina 'ana gibui “ Toloina dumwaluna , ” ta 'ina tupwa sanina Salema , 'ana bui “ Daumwala , ” 'oinega tasanasanapu 'abehega Melikisedeki tauna 'ina loina daumwalina .
58007003	Melikisedekiina geya tamanamo ta geya sinanamo , ma wete geya 'ina susumo ta 'ina li'u ma 'ina 'amasa geya 'adi tosanapumo , ma hesi gide tuwa Yehoba natuna 'ihetopwaoli hataya Yehoba 'oina .
58007004	Moisa , Melikisedekiina 'aigeda bada lohanena , ta Ebalahamo 'ilohane sineya , weyahina Ebalahamo 'ina tobwatobwa 'oinega tupwana 'i'ebwaeya Melikisedeki .
58007005	Ta topwaoli taudi Libai 'ina bodao si'ewa'ewa 'idi tobwatobwa tupwana tauda Ebalahamo tubunao 'oidega . Taudi ma tauda susu 'aigeda , ta hesi 'adi loina 'imiyamiya sowasowana tobwatobwa si'ewa'ewa 'idi tomota 'oidiyega .
58007006	Melikisedeki hali susu , ta 'ina miya lohanenamo , 'oinega tobwatobwa tupwana 'i'eweya Ebalahamo 'oinega . Coinega wete Melikisedeki 'ina gwae hemisa Ebalahamo 'i'ebwaeya . Ebalahamoina loheya madouna , weyahina mwalo Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa 'i'ebwaeya ,
58007007	ta hesi Melikisedeki Ebalahamo 'ilohane sineya , weyahina taudi sanidi madouna 'idi gwae hemisa si'e'ehele tomota taudi sanidi 'i'iudi 'oidiya , 'oinega wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega Melikisedeki 'ina gwae hemisa 'i'ebwaeya Ebalahamo 'oina .
58007008	Bewa tuwa Libai 'ina bodao 'ida tobwatobwa tupwana si'ewa'ewa . Taudi tomota tuwa 'ama'amasidi , ta hesi Melikisedeki wasana 'abehega tauna miyamiya hatayana .
58007009	Bewa tuwa 'ida tobwatobwa tupwana ta'e'ehele Libai tubunao 'oidiya , ta mwalo 'ana 'ita gide Melikisedeki 'ina tobwatobwa tupwana 'i'eweya Libai 'oinega ,
58007010	weyahina Libai 'abwa tubuna Ebalahamo 'alona , saugaina Ebalahamo Melikisedeki 'edai 'ilobeya , ta 'ina tobwatobwa tupwana 'i'ebwaeya .
58007011	Libai tubunao taudi 'idi paihowa beno Yehoba 'ina loinao meIsileli tauda sihe'itegita , ta loinaina geya sawasawahina 'i'abihedumwalu bwaibwainigita , 'oinega nuwanuwada 'aigeda topwaoli hauhauna ma 'i'abihe dumwalugita , topwaoliina gide Melikisedeki , ma geya Eloni matubunao gide .
58007012	Eeta 'eguma topwaoli hagana talagu , loina wete hagana talagu .
58007013	Tasanapuya 'abehega Keliso tauna 'ida topwaoli hauhauna , geya Libai 'ina susuwega 'inaoma ,
58007014	ta hesi Yuda 'ina susuwega 'inaoma , taudi geya hesinuwa siloba Mosese 'oinega ma sihetopwaoli .
58007015	Coinega 'ida topwaoli hauhauna gide Melikisedeki .
58007016	Geya Mosese 'ina loinega 'ihetopwaoli , ta hesi yawasina miyamiya hatayana ma waiwaina 'oinega .
58007017	Tauna Yesu , ma weyahina Buki He'asisi 'igwaeya , “ Cowa 'uhetopwaoli hataya , gide Melikisedeki . ”
58007018	Moisa , Mosese 'ina loinao geya sawasawahidi ma 'aigeda to'aha si'abihe dumwalu bwaibwaini . Coinega loina nugenugetana ta'ebesineya , weyahina we'ana , ma 'oinega hemisa hauhauna ta bwebwe'ana 'ilatuma , ta hemisaina 'oinega Yehoba 'oina talohoho .
58007019	
58007020	Ta tauda 'ida hemisa Keliso 'oina 'imiyamiya . Yehoba mwalo Kelisoina 'oina 'i'eta'wata'walulu , ta 'igwae hemisaeya , ma hesi topwaoliyao nugenugetadi geya gwae hemisa Yehoba 'oina siloba .
58007021	Ta Yesumo weyahina 'igwaeya , “ Bada 'igwae hemisa pwaiya ta 'owa 'uhetopwaoli hataya , ma 'ina gwae hemisaina geya'abwa 'iligeligehi . ”
58007022	Coinega Yesu 'ina loina hauhauna tasanapu bwaibwainiya 'abehega loina miyamiyaina 'ibwebwe'ana sineya .
58007023	Mwalo topwaoli nugenugetadi baibaiwadi sipaipaihowa 'ana siga si'amasa ta muliyetega hauhaudi sihemiyalaenedi .
58007024	Ta hesi Yesu tauna 'ida topwaoli hataya , 'oinega geya 'ana miyalaenamo .
58007025	Yesuina tuta mabwaiyana sawasawahina 'i'abihetegita 'eguma 'ana hemisega taluhu Yehoba matana , weyahina Yesu miyamiya hatayana , ta tuta baibaiwana weyahida 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina .
58007026	Moisa , Yesuina sawasawahina ma 'ihetopwaoli weyahida , weyahina tauna mumugana mabwaiyana 'ausalana tuwa , ta geya gide togala tauda , 'oinega Yehoba Yesuina 'i'abilagasiya ta galewa 'ana tomiyao 'ilohane sinediya .
58007027	Ta topwaoliyao nugenugetadi sabwelo 'aigeda 'aigeda Yehoba 'oina sipwaopwaoli , taudi 'idi puiyao , ma tomota wete 'idi puiyao weyahidi . Ta hesi Yesu ma'aigedamo wahina 'itagwaleya ta 'ipwaoliyeya Yehoba 'oina weyahida .
58007028	Tuta nugenugetaidi 'oidiya Mosese 'ina loinega tomota we'awe'adi sihetopwaoli madouna , ta muliyetega Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa 'oinega Natuna 'ihetopwaoli , ma tauna mumugana bwebwe'ana miyamiya hatayana .
58008001	Cigu gwae mabwaiyana huhuna bewa 'abehega 'ida Topwaoli Madouna , bewa tuwa 'imiyamiya galewa Tolohaneina 'ina wagahata wasawasa 'ebeulanega .
58008002	Ma tauna 'ihetopaihowa Yehoba 'ina hada moisa 'oina . Hadaina tomota geya si'abi , ta hesi Badaina 'i'abiya .
58008003	Bale'u 'ana topwaoliyao mabwaiyadi 'idi paihowa beno 'ehele ma pwaoli si'ebwa'ebwae Yehoba 'oina , 'oinega 'ida topwaoliina hauhaunaina 'ilobwaineya ma tauna wete 'aigeda 'ehele 'i'ebwae Yehoba 'oina .
58008004	Ma tauna 'eguma bale'uwa 'imiyamiya geya'abwa 'ihehetopwaoli weyahina topwaoli baibaiwadi simiyamiya , ta tuta mabwaiyana sipwaopwaoli , gide Mosese 'ina loina 'igwae 'esa ta 'abehega 'ehele si'ebwae Yehoba 'oina .
58008005	Ma 'idi 'ebe pwaoliina Hada He'asisi 'alona , Yelusalema 'oina . Ma Hada He'asisiina 'ebe'ita bo ma'ama'ayau tuwa , ta hesi Hada He'asisi moisana galewa 'imiyamiya . Weyahina mwalohene Mosese geya Hada He'asisi nugenugetana 'i'abiya ta muliyetega Yehoba 'ihenuwa laguweya 'igwaeya , “ Mosese , 'unuwatuhuyahi hadaina 'ana 'ita mabwaiyana yahe'ita pwaigowa 'oyai , mabwaiyana 'uhe'au'aunawe , ta 'igu Hada He'asisiina 'u'abi . ”
58008006	Ma bewa tuwa Keliso 'ina paihowa , paihowa miyamiyaina 'ibwebwe'ana sinediya , gide wete 'ina loina , loina nugenugetana 'ibwebwe'ana sineya , weyahina 'ina loinaina gwae hemisa hauhauna 'oinega 'ilatuma . Ta gwae hemisaina , gwae hemisa nugenugetana 'ibwebwe'ana sineya .
58008007	Ceguma loina miyamiyaina tomota mabwaiyadi 'i'abihetediya , sahena tanuwanuwatuhu loina hauhauna weyahina . Ma geya 'ilemedi , 'oinega hauhauna nuwanuwada .
58008008	Mwalohene Yehoba 'isanapuya 'abehega meIsileli 'idi mumuga geya bwebwe'ana , 'oinega weyahidi 'igwaeya , “ Cabwa loina hauhauna yalagu meIsileli ma meYuda weyahidi .
58008009	Geya gide loinaina yalaguya tubudiyao weyahidi , tutaina mwalo yahanugetediya ta Itipita 'oinega silatuwa ta sitauya taudi 'idi tupwa . Weyahina loina yalaguya siligehiya , 'oinega nimagu 'oidiyega yalisi'eweya !
58008010	Bada wete 'igwaeya , 'igwae , ‘ Cabwa 'igu loina hauhauna meIsileli nuwadiya yalagudi ma 'atediya yaleledi , ta 'oinega taugu 'idi Yehoba ma taudi 'igu tomotaiyao .
58008011	Coinega geya sawasawahina ma tasidiyao sihe'itadi , nuwana sigwae , “ Yehoba wada sanapu , ” weyahina mabwaiyadi sisanapu pwaigauwa , taudi sanidi madoudi ta wete taudi towewelohe .
58008012	Eeta ya'atemuyamuyaedi , ta 'idi mumuga galadi yanuwasamudi ta yanuwanaidedi . ’ ”
58008013	Yehoba loina hauhauna 'ilaguya weyahina loina miyamiyana 'iwe'a pwaiya , ta nata 'ilohesahesawala .
58009001	Loina nugenugetana 'alona loina baibaiwana simiyamiya tapwalolo weyahina , ma wete hada tapwalolo bale'uwa weyahina .
58009002	Ta hadaina hebai 'wapidiyega sipaihoweya , ta 'ale'o 'oinega sibiliupa luweya ta biliupa madouna sihesaniyeya Tupwa He'asisi , ma biliupa 'i'iuna beno 'alona moisa sihesaniyeya Tupwa He'asisi Hedade . Biliupaina madouna 'alona mayale 'adi 'ebelagu ma 'aigeda teibele , ma teibeleina 'oina beledi silagulagu Yehoba matana .
58009003	Ma Tupwa He'asisi Hedade 'alona 'ebegabu 'imiyamiya gado'a weyahina , beno goula 'oinega sipaihoweya , ta wete loina 'ana dedewaga 'imiyamiya , beno goula wete 'oinega sipaihoweya , ta dedewagaina 'alona gaeba goula 'imiyamiya , ta gaebaina 'alona tubudao 'adi 'e'ahai sanina mana , tupwana 'imiyamiya . Ta wete dedewagaina 'alona Eloni 'ina digona , beno mwalo 'ibwala , ta wete da'uleyedi Yehoba 'ina loinao 'oidiya 'ilelediya simiyamiya .
58009004	
58009005	Ma dedewagaina pwatana 'eluwa anelose namanamalidi sipaihowediya ta dedewagaina siheloguloguya , beno Yehoba 'ina 'ebemiya tomota 'idi puiyao 'adi nuwasam weyahidi . Ta hesi sahena tanuwanuwatuhu hedade tobwatobwaedi weyahidi .
58009006	Ceguma tobwatobwa mabwaiyadi si'atububudi , 'oinega topwaoliyao siluhuluhu Hada He'asisi 'alona ta 'idi paihowa sipaipaihowa ;
58009007	ma hesi Tupwa He'asisi Hedadeina Topwaoli Madounamo 'oina 'iluhu , ma bolime 'aigeda 'oina ma'aigedamo . Ta tutaina 'iluhuluhu bweyaha 'i'ewa ta bweyahina 'ilosehusehule , gide 'ipwaopwaoli Yehoba 'oina 'ina mumuga galadi weyahidi , ta wete tomota mabwaiyadi 'idi puiyao weyahidi .
58009008	Bewa 'ebe'ita tomota hauhauda 'oida , Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'oinega , ta 'oinega tasanapu 'abehega 'eguma paihowaina miyamiyaina 'abwa tapaipaihowa , geya sawasawahina ma taluhu Tupwa He'asisi Hedade 'alona . Eeta helauwao ma hebahebai loina miyamiyaina 'oinega sipwaopwaoliyedi Yehoba 'oina , ta hesi geya sawasawahidi ma tomotaedi 'atedi si'abihe'ehau , ta wahidimo si'abihe'ehau ,
58009009	
58009010	'eguma loinaowedi tomota simulimuliyedi 'e'ahai ma 'adi we'aha ma hali buyo ma hali buyo weyahidi . Weyahina mwalo loinaina miyamiyaina Yehoba 'ilaguya ta 'imiyamiya 'ana siga Keliso 'ilatuma ta loina 'ibuiya .
58009011	Weyahina 'iboi 'ina pwaoliyega miya bwebwe'ana hedade 'i'ebwaegita , ta hali Hada He'asisi 'oina 'iluhuwa , ta hadaina madouna ta bwebwe'ana , beno tomota geya si'abi bale'u 'oina .
58009012	Coinega Yesu Tupwa He'asisi Hedade 'oina 'iluhuwa ma'aigeda , ta bweyaha 'oinega 'ipwaoli , ma bweyahina geya hebai goti bweyahidi bo bulumakau 'i'iudi bweyahidi , ta hesi tauna bweyahina , ta 'oinega 'ada 'abihe'ehau hataya talobeya .
58009013	Ceguma ginaula bi'ibi'ina ta'abitoho ma wahida ta'abihebi'i ma goti bweyahina nuwana bulumakau bweyahina 'oidiyega talosehuligita , nuwana bulumakau mewahinena tagabu ma 'oinega tapwaoli Yehoba 'oina , beno 'ebe 'abihe'ehau wahida weyahina .
58009014	Ta hesi Keliso bweyahina 'ebe 'abihe'ehau bwebwe'ana hedade , weyahina 'ateda 'i'abihe'ehaudi ma 'oinega paihowa besobeso talogwahatedi , ta Yehobaina mayawasina 'ina paihowao tapaihowadi . Weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna miyamiya hatayana Keliso 'i'abihe waiwaiya , ta tauna ma'ina mumuga mabwaiyana dumwaluna ta geya 'aigeda wete galana 'oina , 'oinega tauna 'ipwaoliyeya Yehoba 'oina , beno 'i'amasa tauda 'ada 'ehau weyahina .
58009015	Eeta Kelisoina loina hauhauna 'i'eweyama ta 'oinega tanaoma Yehoba ba'idadai tahe'iya'iyagu , weyahina 'eguma 'ihesinuwegita nata yawasida hataya 'igwae hemisaeya 'i'ebwaegita . Weyahina tauda loina nugenugetana taligehiya , 'oinega 'ilobwaineya ma ta'amasa , ta hesi Keliso weyahida 'i'amasa pwaiya sabi 'abihetegita .
58009016	Wasanapuya 'eguma taiya to'waiha loina mwalo 'ilaguya nuwana 'ileleya , 'ina tobwatobwa mabwaiyana 'adi heguyai weyahidi , ma muliyetega 'i'amasa , ta loinaina 'ina susuwao sida muliye .
58009017	Ta 'eguma 'abwa mayawasina , geya'abwa loinaina simulimuliye . Beno namo 'eguma 'i'amasa , loinaina 'ihewaiwai ma simuliye .
58009018	Gide wete loina nugenugetana Mosese 'oinega , nugeta tupwadi hebai silohe'amasidiya , ta bweyahidiyega buki ma tomota mabwaiyadi Mosese 'ilosehu sehulidiya , ta 'oinega muliyetega loinaina 'ihewaiwaiya .
58009019	Weyahina loina mabwaiyadi 'ihepwailediya tomota 'oidiya , ta 'oinega bulumakau 'i'iudi bweyahidi ma goti bweyahidi we'aha ba'idana 'ihebweliyeya , ta 'i'eweya , ta sipi hunuhunuwana belabelalana 'i'eweya , ma 'aiwe sanina hisopa matana 'ibadiyeya , ta bweyaha ma we'aha 'alona 'ihebuteya , ta 'oinega buki ma tomota 'ilosehu sehulidiya ,
58009020	ma Mosese 'igwaeya , “ Loinaina Yehoba 'ilaguya weyahimi , 'ana 'ila'ilala bweyaha bewa . ”
58009021	Gide wete Hada Tapwalolo ma gaebaedi Hada Tapwaloloina 'oina bweyahega 'ilosehu sehulidiya .
58009022	Weyahina Mosese 'ina loina 'oidiya 'abehega ginaula mabwaiyadi bweyahega si'ehau . Ta mumuga galana 'ana nuwasam wete bweyaha 'oinega , ma 'eguma geya bweyaha 'idau gesowana nuwasam taloba .
58009023	Hada He'asisi 'ana tobwatobwao galewa simiyamiya , ta 'adi ma'ama'ayau tuwa bale'uwa Mosese 'ipaihowediya , ta 'ilobwaineya ma bweyaha 'ana paihowega 'ipwaopwaoli Yehoba 'oina ma 'i'abihe'ehaudi , ma hesi ginauledi galewa 'adi 'abihe'ehau pwaoli bwebwe'ana hedade 'oinega , beno Keliso bweyahinega .
58009024	Ta Keliso geya 'iluhu Hada He'asisi 'abi'abina 'oina , beno Hada moisa 'ana ma'ama'ayau tuwa , ta hesi galewa 'iluhuwa ta Yehoba matana 'imiyamiya ma 'ilemalema weyahida .
58009025	Kelisoina sahena sauga baibaiwana tauna wahina 'i'e'eheleye nuwana 'ipwaopwaoli Yehoba 'oina , gide bolime 'aigeda 'aigeda Tupwa He'asisi Hedadena 'alona Topwaoli Madouna 'iluhuluhu ma bweyahega 'ipwaopwaoli , ta bweyahina geya tauna bweyahina .
58009026	Moisa , 'eguma Keliso 'ina paihowa taudi topwaoli madoudi gide , 'ida 'amasa hilahila bale'u 'ana gihehemasalaha 'oinega ta tuta nige . Ta hesi ma'aigedamo tuwa , tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha bewa 'oina , wahina tauna 'ipwaoliyeya , mumuga galadi 'adi nuwasam weyahina .
58009027	Tomota tauda 'ada loina 'imiyamiya 'abehega ma'aigeda ta'amasa ta muliyetega bwa'omatana .
58009028	Wete gide Keliso 'ina 'amasega tauna 'ipwaoliyeya ma'aigedamo tuwa , ma baibaiwada mumugada galadi 'i'ewa yahulediya , ma 'abwa 'ihilama , ma geya 'abehega mumuga galadi 'i'ewayahule hiladi , ta hesi sabi 'abihetegita , 'eguma ma'ida nuwa'ewa tayamwayamwa .
58010001	Cabwa 'ebe yaliyaya moisa 'oida 'ilatuma , ma hesi Mosese 'ina loina gide ma'ama'ayaumo tuwa , ta geya 'ebe yaliyaya moisa . Mosese 'ina loinaina 'abehega bolime ma bolime hebai sihunuhunudi ta Yehoba 'oina sipwaoliyedi , ta paihowaedi geya sawasawahina ma 'i'abihe bwebwe'anedi .
58010002	Weyahina 'eguma paihowaina sawasawahina ma 'i'abihe'ehaudi , ma'aigedamo sida paihowa ma 'adi lotohona 'ida bwebwe'ana hataya , ta 'oinega sahena bolime 'aigeda 'aigeda sipaipaihowa hilahila , 'awa ?
58010003	Geya ! Ta hesi pwaoliyedi bolime 'aigeda 'aigeda 'ebe nuwahilamo tuwa , mumugadi galadi weyahidi , 'oinega 'adi lotohona geya'abwa 'ibwebwe'ana .
58010004	Weyahina bulumakau ma goti bweyahidi geya sawasawahina ma pui 'ideuli yahuledi .
58010005	Coinega tutaina Keliso bale'uwa 'idobima , Kelisoina Yehoba 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Pwaoliyao ma 'ehele geya nuwau , 'oinega wahigu 'u'ebwaegauwa 'ino paihowa weyahina .
58010006	Wete geya nuwau hebai gabugabudi , 'eguma tomota sipwaoliyedi mumugadi galana weyahidi .
58010007	Coinega yatagwalegauwa 'owa Yehoba 'oiuwa , ta yatauyama ma 'ane 'ino nuwatuhu yapaihowa , gide mwalo weyahigu Buki nupinupilina 'oina sileleya . ”
58010008	Cina gwaeina wanuwatuhuyahi , 'igwaeya , “ Geya nuwau pwaoliyao bo 'ehele , bo hebaiyedi sigabugabudi , bo nuwana to'aha sipwaopwaoliye mumugadi weyahidi , ma geya'abwa 'uyaliyaliyaya paihowaedi weyahidi . Pwaoliyedi taudi Mosese weyahidi 'iloina . ”
58010009	Coinega wete 'igwaeya , “ Yatagwala pwaiyegauwa 'oiuwa ma 'ane 'ino nuwatuhu yapaihowa . ” Cina gwae bewa 'abehega loina nugenugetana 'i'ewayahuleya ta hauhauna 'ilaguya .
58010010	Ta Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhuina ma Yesu Keliso tauna wahina 'ipwaoliye sabi 'abihe'ehaugita 'ina 'amasa ma'aigedamo 'oinega .
58010011	Ta topwaoliyao mabwaiyadi Hada He'asisi 'oina sitotoholo , ma sabwelo 'aigeda 'aigeda 'idi pwaoliyedi si'e'ehele Yehoba 'oina , ma hesi pwaoliyedi geya sawasawahina ma mumuga galadi si'ewayahuledi .
58010012	Ta Keliso hesi ma'aigeda 'ipwaoliya mumuga galana weyahina , ta 'ina pwaoliina tuta mabwaiyana sawasawahina , ta 'ina pwaoliina mulina Yehoba 'ebeulanega 'imiyatoiya ,
58010013	ma 'iyamwayamwa ta to tuta 'ana 'alehao Yehoba 'ida lagu suluhedi 'aena gabulena .
58010014	Weyahina 'ina pwaoli 'aigedamo , ta sawasawahina tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya 'i'abihe 'ehaugita ma 'i'abihe bwebwe'anegita .
58010015	Cabihe'ehau bewa weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna ta wete Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihe'itegita Bada 'ina gwae beno mwalohene weyahida 'ihepwaila ,
58010016	'igwaeya , “ Cabwa loina hauhauna ya'ebwaedi ma 'igu loinao nuwadiya yalagudi ma 'atediya yaleledi . ”
58010017	Ta wete 'igwaeya , “ Cidi galao ma 'idi puiyao yanuwanaidedi . ”
58010018	Beno weyahina geya'abwa tapwaopwaoli mumugada galadi weyahidi , weyahina Yehoba 'inuwasam pwaidiya .
58010019	Ciyagwao Yesu bweyahina 'idau pwaiya weyahida , 'oinega ma'ida 'atepatu taluhu Yehoba 'ina Tupwa He'asisi Hedade 'oina ,
58010020	bewa 'eda hauhauna yawasida weyahina . Mwalo Yehoba 'ina Tupwa He'asisi 'ale'o 'oinega sibiliupeya ta Yesu 'iso'eya tauna wahina 'ina 'amasa 'oinega sawasawahina ma taluhu Yehoba 'oina .
58010021	Ma wete 'ida topwaoliina lohane hedade , ta Yehoba 'ina hada weyahina 'ipaipaihowa .
58010022	Coinega Yehoba tahahoho ma'ida 'atetagwala ta ma'ida hemisa moisa , ma 'oinega wahida ta'abihe'ehaudi we'aha 'ausalana 'oinega , ma wete 'ida nuwatuhu si'ehau , weyahina Yesu 'ina losehusehula 'oinega 'ida nuwatuhu galadi 'i'abihe 'ehaudiya .
58010023	Coinega tatoholo pa'ala ma 'ida hemisa Yesu 'oina ta'abi'abiyahi , ma tahepwaila latuwe tomota 'oidiya , weyahina Togwae hemisaina geya 'i'abo , ta hesi 'ina gwaeyedi gide 'ipaipaihowa 'esedi .
58010024	Cilobwainegita wete ma tauda tada he'abi'abihetena , ma 'ane tahe'iya'iyagu moisa , ma wete paihowa 'ausaladi tapaihowadi .
58010025	Tupwadi 'iyadao tapwalolo 'ana 'eto'autao sinuwanaideya , ta sahena gide 'omi , ma hesi tuta mabwaiyana wa'abihe pa'aligomi , ma 'eguma to tuta wasanapuya 'abehega Yesu 'ina tuta hilama 'ihahoho nata wahe'abi 'abihetena hilegomi moisa .
58010026	Ma 'eguma tanuwa sabwaleni to'aha Yehoba 'ana wasa moisa , ma muliyetega tatagwalegita mumuga galana 'oina , geya 'eta wete pwaoli 'imiyamiya sabi 'abihe'ehau hilegita ,
58010027	ma hesi bwa'omatana taloba , beno 'aiwe ninima 'igabu hegumwaligita . Bewa Yehoba 'ipaihoweya 'ana 'alehao weyahidi .
58010028	Mwalohene 'eguma 'eta taiya Mosese 'ina loinao 'iligehidi , ma tohepwaila 'eluwa nuwana 'etoi mumugana sihepwaila latuhe , geya'abwa si'ate'ate muyamuya ma hesi silohe'amasiyamo tuwa .
58010029	Coinega 'eguma taiya Yehoba Natuna 'ilohesohesoiye , ma bweyahina 'i'abihe'ehauya 'i'ahwa galagalae , ma wete 'i'abihe gamwasowali 'ada to'abihetena Yaluyaluwa Tabuna , nata 'ana maisa muya madou hedade 'iloba Yehoba 'oinega .
58010030	Ma tasanapu pwaiya taiya 'ada Toloina madouna tauna 'ihegwaegita , 'igwaeya , “ Taugu Toloinaigu , togala yahemaisadi muya 'oinega . ” Ma wete 'igwaeya , “ Taugu 'imi Bada , ma 'omi 'igu tomotaiyao nata yaloinegomi . ”
58010031	Sowasowana Yehobaina mayawasina tamataute 'amuge 'iloinaegita .
58010032	Ciyagwao , mwalo 'asilala 'ina latu nugenugetana 'oimiya , wanuwatuhuyahi 'imi miyamwau 'oidiyega wa'alama'i'ita ,
58010033	tutaina tupwana tomota si'abihedeba mwadinegomiya ma si'abihe muyamuyagomiya ta tuta tupwana mwalo 'iyamiyao ba'idamiyao wamuyamuya mahemahetena .
58010034	Ta wete tupwadi deliya silagudiya weyahidi wa'atemuyamuya , ta wa'abihetediya . Ta wete tutaina mwalo tomota 'imi tobwatobwao siyagahidiya wayaliyaya moisa , weyahina wasanapuya 'abehega galewa 'imi tobwatobwao 'ausala hedadedi ma miyamiya hatayadi simiyamiya .
58010035	Coinega 'imi hemisaina wa'abiyahi momosi ma sahena walologwahate , weyahina 'abwa 'imi hemisaina 'ana maisa 'ausala hedade waloba .
58010036	Ma 'ilobwainegomiya watoholo pa'ala ma Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu wapaihowa , ma to'aha 'igwae hemisaeya wa'ewa .
58010037	Weyahina tuta 'i'iunamo tauna Totauyamaina 'ilatuma , geya'abwa wete 'iheheboi .
58010038	Coinega taiyawedi todumwalu 'idi hemisega yawasidi 'ausalana siloba , ta 'eguma 'idi 'ateyohowega silohihila , Yehoba geya nuwana tomotaedi .
58010039	Ma tauda sahena talolohihila , weyahina beno 'ebe hesilae . Ma tuwa ma'ida hemisa ma 'oinega yaluyaluwada simiya bwebwe'ana .
58011001	Ceguma to'aha tanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'abwa taloba , ma hesi bewa tuwa geya'abwa ta'ita'ita , beno hemisa moisa .
58011002	Tubudao mwalohene tanuwatuhu yahidi taudi 'idi hemisa weyahina Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anediya .
58011003	Tauda wete 'ida hemisa 'oinega tasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba tauna 'ina gwae 'oinega bale'u mabwaiyana 'ihemasalahediya , beno ginaulaedi geya tada 'itediya 'oidiyega ginaulaedi ta'ita'itadi 'ihemasalahediya .
58011004	Coinega Ebeli wete ma'ina hemisa 'ipwaoli Yehoba 'oina , 'oinega 'ina pwaoliina Keni 'ina pwaoli 'ibwebwe'ana sineya , ta Yehoba 'iyaliyaya Ebeli 'ina pwaoli weyahina ta 'i'ahwa dumwaluweya . Ebeliina bale'u 'i'ebesine pwaiya , ma hesi 'ina hemisega 'oida 'ihehe'ita .
58011005	Inoke wete 'ina hemisega geya 'i'amasa ma hesi wahina mayawasina Yehoba 'i'eweya galewa , weyahina Yehoba 'ihepwaila nugeteya 'abehega “ Inokeina tauna weyahina yayaliyaliyaya . ”
58011006	Moisa , 'eguma sahena tahehemisa Yehoba 'oina , geya'abwa weyahida 'iyaliyaliyaya . Ceguma nuwanuwada ma Yehoba 'oina tatauya , tahemisa nugeta 'abehega Yehobaina 'imiyamiya , ta 'ana to'ebesao 'adi tohelau tauna , ma muliyetega tatauya 'oina .
58011007	Nowa wete Yehoba 'ihe'iteya 'abehega to'aha 'abwa 'ilatu 'oidiya , 'oinega Nowaina 'imatauta ma 'ina hemisega 'ina waga sanina 'aki 'igoheya , 'itagiya , ta tauna ma'ina susuwao 'i'abihetediya . Nage 'oina 'ihe'itaeya 'abehega tomota mabwaiyadi togala , ma tauna loheya dumwaluna 'ina hemisa weyahina .
58011008	Ebalahamo wete 'ina hemisega Yehoba 'ina bwau 'imuliyeya ta 'abehega 'ina 'asa 'i'ebesine ma 'ina 'asa 'ehauna hali tupwa 'iloba , 'oinega 'itoholowa ta 'itauya , ta geya 'isanapu to tupwa 'oina 'itautauya .
58011009	Ta wete 'ina hemisega tupwa gwaehemisaina 'oina ma'ina susuwao Aisake ma Yakobo simiyamiya , gide taumanao , ma 'idi hada hebai 'wapidi 'oidiyega si'abidiya , 'asaina Yehoba 'igwae hemisaeya 'abehega Ebalahamo 'oina 'ilo'asa , ma muliyetega tubunao wete 'idi 'asa .
58011010	Ma hesi Ebalahamo 'inuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega 'asaina 'ana wahuwahu pa'alina 'oina 'iluhu , beno Yehoba tauna 'ina nuwatuhu gide ma 'i'abiya .
58011011	Sela wete 'ihe'ai'aihaleya tuwa ma 'ina hemisega wahina 'ihewaiwaiya ta 'igamwa , weyahina Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisaina 'ihemiseya .
58011012	Moisa , Ebalahamoina 'ihetautaubada hedadeya , ta 'i'iunamo ma 'i'amasa , ta hesi boda madouna 'idabalala 'oinega , ta 'adi baibaiwa tuwa gide galewa 'ipwalao , ma wete nenegwala holai 'adi baibaiwa gide .
58011013	Tomota nugenugetadiyedi ma'idi hemisa , ma hesi si'amasa ta gwae hemisaedi huwaidi geya sida lobeya , ta hesi tuwa bwagebwagega si'iteya ta siloyauwedowa weyahina , ma wete taudimo si'ahwa taumanaediya gide taumana tuwa tupwa bewa bale'u 'oina .
58011014	Moisa , 'eguma ta'ahwa taumanaegita , beno gide tahepwaila latuwe 'abehega 'ida 'asa moisa ta'ebe'ebese .
58011015	Ma babada nugenugetaidi 'idi 'asa si'ebesineya , ma 'eguma nuwanuwadi sihila , nata 'eda si'ebese ma sihila ,
58011016	ma hesi geya sihila , weyahina nuwanuwadi 'asa bwebwe'ana hedade , beno galewa . Coinega geya'abwa Yehoba 'imwadi mwadinedi , ta hesi 'abehega tauna 'idi Yehoba , ta 'idi 'asa 'ihemasaleheya .
58011017	Ebalahamo wete ma'ina hemisa tutaina 'ebetohona 'ilobeya Yehoba 'oinega , 'abehega natuna moisa Aisake 'ipwaoliye Yehoba 'oina . Mwalo Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisao 'i'ebwaeya Ebalahamoina 'oina , ta wete 'igwaeya , “ Cabwa Aisake 'oinega 'ino boda 'ilatu , ” 'oinega Ebalahamo natunaina 'itagwaleya ma 'ilohe'amasi ,
58011018	
58011019	weyahina Ebalahamo 'isanapuya 'abehega Yehoba sawasawahina ma to'amasao 'i'abihe toholodi , 'oinega 'ana 'ita gide natunaina 'amasega 'ihilama .
58011020	Aisake wete 'ina hemisega natunao Yakobo ma Iso 'igwae hemisaediya 'idi 'ebe yaliyaya tuta 'inaonaoma weyahina .
58011021	Yakobo wete tutaina nata 'i'amasa ma 'ina digona 'i'abiheteya ta 'itoholowa ma Yehoba 'oina 'i'etuluha , ta 'ina hemisega Yosepa natunao 'aigeda 'aigeda 'idi 'ebe yaliyaya 'abwa weyahina 'ihepwaileya .
58011022	Yosepa wete 'ana bolime 'ebelosaloha 'oina 'ina hemisega meIsileli 'idi latu nata Itipitega 'ihepwaila nugeteya , ta loina 'ilaguya 'ana lagu galiha weyahina .
58011023	Mosese tutaina 'ili'uwa , tamana ma sinana 'idi hemisega silagu dahweya wai'ena 'etoi 'oidiya , weyahina 'ana 'ita gwama gumabwaina , ma wete kini Pelo 'ina loina pa'alina geya simataute .
58011024	Mosese wete tutaina 'ihebada , 'ina hemisega geya nuwana ma tomota sigwae , “ Moseseina Pelo tubuna , ” weyahina 'ina tuta gwama 'oina Pelo natuna wahinena Mosese 'i'eweya , 'i'itayahiya ta 'i'ahwa natuneya .
58011025	Eeta Moseseina geya nuwana tuta to'uto'upana 'oina 'iyaliyaya mumuga galana weyahina , ma hesi nuwanuwana Yehoba 'ina tomotao ba'idanao sida miyamwau .
58011026	Weyahina geya nuwana wasawasa bale'uwedi Itipita 'alona , ma hesi muyamuya Keliso weyahina 'ihesinuweya , weyahina 'isanapuya 'abehega 'abwa maisa bwebwe'ana 'iloba .
58011027	Coinega 'ina hemisega Itipita 'i'ebesineya , ta geya kini Peloina 'ina gamwasowala 'imataute , ma hesi 'i'atepatuwa 'abehega Yehoba 'i'iteya matana 'imiyamiya .
58011028	Ta wete 'ina hemisega Hataona Guyaina 'ipaihoweya ta bweyahega 'idi hadao 'ilosehulidiya , 'abehega tautuwao 'adi tolohe'amasa sahena 'iluhuluhu 'ihunuhunudi .
58011029	Bodaedi 'idi hemisega Hola Bwehabwehalina sihabaleya gide bale'u lohulohuna 'oinega sitautauya , ma meItipita simuliyama 'abehega sihabala wete ta geya sawasawahidi , ta mabwaiyadi sidamana .
58011030	Ma wete tutaina taudi 'asa Yeliko sisakowasiyeya mabwaiyadi sabwelo sebeni 'oidiya , 'idi hemisa weyahina 'asaina 'ana 'ali madouna 'ibe'uwa ,
58011031	ta siluhuwa ma toni'asa sihunudiya , weyahina taudi tologwahatao . Ma toganawala sanina Leyabi geya sihunu , weyahina wahineina ma'ina hemisa , weyahina tutaina mwalo Yosuwa 'ina tolo'alehao 'eluwa 'asaina 'oina siluhuwa Leyabiina 'ilemediya .
58011032	Tohemisao baibaiwadi wete gide Gidiyoni ma Belaki , Samisoni , Yepita , Debida , Samuwela ma palopitao wete , geya sawasawahina ma tahe'ote'otetela hegumwalidi .
58011033	Taudi 'idi hemisega sihewaiwaiya 'adi 'alehao 'oidiyega , ma wete 'idi tomotao siloina dumwaluwediya , ma wete Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa huwaina silobediya , ma wete laiyoni lolosasaidi si'abi hedaumwalidiya , ta wete
58011034	'aiwe ganinisa madoudi sigibodiya , ta wete 'aleha 'oinega si'abihetediya , weyahina 'idi tuta siwe'a 'oina ma tuwa sihewaiwaiya , ma wete 'aleha 'oina sihewaiwai hedadeya , ta 'adi 'alehao baibaiwa hedade sipa'ipa'i lelewanedi .
58011035	Tupwadi wahiwahine wete 'idi to'waihao 'amasega sitoholo hila . Ta wete tupwadi tohemisao 'adi 'alehao 'oidiyega muya silobeya , weyahina sitohodiya 'abehega si'ewa hiledima , ma hemisa silolagu , ma 'iyamo sitoho 'asaediya , weyahina 'idi hemisa pa'alina 'abehega 'abwa 'amasega sitoholo hilama , ma yawasidi 'ausalana si'ewa .
58011036	Tupwadi wete 'adi 'alehao silotuyanediya , ma gulahega sihunuhunudi , ma wete deliya silagu luhuwediya ta sipaidiya .
58011037	Tupwadi wete dimwa madoudi 'oidiyega siloda'ulediya , ma tupwadi si'e'upwa luwediya , ma tupwadi 'elepa 'aleha 'oidiyega silohe'amasidiya , ma tupwadi sipi ma goti 'wapidi 'oidiyega si'wama'wama ta ma'idi nuwagala gide wewelohe , weyahina tomota si'abihe galediya .
58011038	Ma hesi tohemisaowedi mebale'u sibwebwe'ana sinediya , 'oinega yoho 'awawa ma 'oya 'oidiya siyawayawala dadana , ta wete gaula ma duluha 'oidiya si'eno'eno dadana .
58011039	Ta tohemisaowedi wasadi bwebwe'ana tahesagoha pwaiya , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina gwae hemisa huwaina moisa geya siloba , tuta nage 'oina ,
58011040	ma 'iyamo 'ebe yaliyaya tauda weyahida Yehoba 'ihepwaila nugeteya , 'abehega taudi ba'idadao 'abwa tamiya bwebwe'ana .
58012001	Ma tohemisao baibaiwadi galewega si'e'ebubugita , ta sawasawahida ginaula mwaudi 'oidiyega ta'aisinedi , ma 'oinega tapili waiwai 'ebepiliina 'ana 'eda 'oinega , ta wete mumuga galadiyedi sipaipaigita ta'aisinedi .
58012002	Ma wete Yesu 'oina talolo'italaga , weyahina Yesuina 'ida hemisa 'ana 'ebehegaina ta 'ana 'ebelosaloha . Tutaina Yesu bale'uwa 'imiyamiya 'isanapuya 'abehega 'abwa 'ebeyaliyaya madouna 'iloba , 'oinega kelose 'ina muyamuya 'i'alama'i'itaneya , mwadina wete geya weyahina 'inuwatuhu , ta 'ebelosaloha 'oina 'ihaneya galewa ta Yehoba 'ina 'ebeulega 'imiyatoiya .
58012003	Yesuina wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'i'alama'i'ita madouna togala 'idi lo'aleha 'oinega , ta 'oinega 'omi wete gide 'abehega sahena wahesabulolo nuwana wawe'awe'a .
58012004	Ma 'omi tutaina mumuga galana walo'aleheya 'imi miyamwau 'i'iuna tuwa , ta geya sida lohe'amasigomiya Yesu gide .
58012005	Nuwana guguya wanuwanaideya , guguyaina 'oina 'i'ahwa natunegomiya 'igwaeya , “ Natugu , 'eguma tutaina Bada 'ihemata sabuwego sabi 'abihe dumwalugo , bewa weyahina 'unuwanuwatuhu ma sahena wete 'uwe'awe'a .
58012006	Weyahina 'eguma taiya Yehoba 'i'ahwa natune ta 'ihelauwe , sawasawahina ma sapi 'iloba 'ina puiyao weyahidi , ma 'oinega 'ida bwebwe'ana hila . ”
58012007	Ta 'eguma sapi waloba Yehoba 'oinega , tuwa wa'alama'i'ita , weyahina tama mabwaiyadi natudiyao sisapisapidi sabi 'abihedumwaludi .
58012008	Coinega Yehoba wete mabwaiyada 'isapigita , ma 'eguma taiya 'owa Yehoba geya 'isapigo , beno weyahina 'owa geya natuna moisa , ta 'abehega 'owa 'aigeda tamabudabuda .
58012009	Wanuwatuhuyahi 'eguma tamadao bale'uwa sisapigita ma 'oinega tahe'asisiyanedi , wete 'ilobwainegita ma yaluyaluwada Tamadiu galewa tahe'asisiyane , ma 'oinega yawasida 'ausalana 'i'ebwaegita .
58012010	Weyahina tamadao bale'uwa taudimo 'idi nuwatuhu 'oidiyega sisapisapigita ma si'abi'abi hedumwalugita tuta to'uto'upanamo weyahina , ma hesi Yehoba 'isapisapigita 'ada lema weyahina ma 'abehega 'i'abihe 'ehaugita ma tada mumuga 'ausalana , tauna 'ina mumuga gide .
