58012011	Moisa , tutaina 'eguma bada 'aigeda 'isapigita tamuyamuya madouna ta geya'abwa tayaliyaliyaya , ma hesi 'eguma 'i'abihe dumwalugita 'abwa huwaina 'ausalana taloba , beno mumuga bwebwe'ana ma miya daumwala .
58012012	Coinega 'imi we'a wa'ebesine ma wahewaiwai ,
58012013	ta 'imi 'eda wa'abihe dumwaludi , ma 'eguma toha'au'au sitautauya , sahena sibe'ube'u , ma hesi 'idi ha'au'auwedi sibwebwe'ana , ta taudi wete sihewaiwai .
58012014	Watoho waiwai ma wamiya daumwala tomota ba'idamiyao , ta wete watoho ma 'imi mumuga 'ibwebwe'ana mabwaiyana , weyahina 'eguma taiya geya 'ina mumuga bwebwe'ana geya'abwa Bada 'i'ita'ita .
58012015	Wa'itayahigomi 'amuge nata 'oimiyega taiya Yehoba 'ina helau geya'abwa 'ilobaloba . Ma sahena 'aigeda taiya 'oimiyega 'ihegaina ma 'imumuga galana , 'amuge ta baibaiwadi simuliye .
58012016	Sahena wanuwanuwa 'ubuna , ta wete sahena Yehoba 'ina helau walologwahate , gide Iso mwalo Yehoba 'ina gwaehemisa tauna weyahina ma 'ipeleya tasina 'oina , 'ana maisa 'e'ahai 'aigeda tuwamo .
58012017	Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tuta muliyetega Iso gwae hemisaina 'inuweya , ta weyahina 'idouwa , ta geya sawasawahina 'i'ewahila , weyahina tasina 'i'ewa pwaiya .
58012018	Bewa tuwa wanaoma Yehoba 'ina tupwa , geya gide mwalo Mosese ma meIsileli ba'idanao sitauya ta silotohoya 'oya Sainai 'oina , weyahina 'aiwe ganinisa ma guguyou madouna ma hogahoga ta duba madouna ,
58012019	ma yoguli 'enana ma wete loheya 'enana 'oyaina 'oina , 'oinega meIsileli simatauta madouna , ta si'ahwa'ahwanoi ta 'abehega sahena 'enanaina sihehesagoha hila ,
58012020	weyahina loinaina sihesagoheya 'i'abihe matautediya 'abehega , “ Sahena 'aigeda to'aha 'oya bewa 'i'abi'abitoho , ma 'abehega 'eguma 'aigeda hebai 'inaoma 'oyaina 'oina , dimwega siloda'ule ma 'i'amasa . ”
58012021	Moisa , 'oyaina 'ebe matauta madouna , ta Mosese tauna wete 'imatauta , ta 'ihepwaila 'igwaeya , “ Cigu matautega yadedela . ”
58012022	Ta 'omi hesiyage wanao pwaima Saiyoni 'oyana 'oina , beno Yehoba tauna mayawasina 'ina 'asa , Yelusalemaina galewa 'oina , aneloseyao baibaiwa hedade simiyamiya ta siyaliyaliyaya gide guyai 'oina ,
58012023	ma wete wanaoma tomotaedi Yehoba 'i'ahwa natunediya , ta sanidiyao galewa 'ilelediya 'oidiya , ma wete tauna tauda ta ginaula mabwaiyana 'ada Toloina , beno Yehoba 'oina , ma wete taudi yaluyaluwadi Yehoba 'i'abihe dumwaludiya 'oidiya ,
58012024	ta wete Yesu 'oina , tauna loina hauhauna 'ana to'eheleina , ta bweyahina 'ana losehusehula 'oinega 'i'abihetegita , ma geya gide Ebeli bweyahina , weyahina beno 'ebehesilae .
58012025	Coinega wa'ita yahigomi ma tauna galewega 'igwaegwae 'oida sahena 'enana walologwahate . Weyahina mwalo tomota tupwadi bale'uwa Mosese 'ina lohatoto 'oidiya silogwahateya , ta mwau silobeya . Ma bewa sauga Yehoba galewega 'ilologuguya 'oida , ta 'eguma 'enana talogwahate mwau madou hedade taloba .
58012026	Weyahina 'enanaina mwalo bale'u 'i'abi nihuweya , ta bewa tuwa 'igwae hemisa pwaiya 'abehega , “ Cabwa bale'u ma galewa wete ya'abi nihuwedi ma'aigeda tuwa . ”
58012027	Bewa gide 'igwae 'esa weyahina ginaula hehemasalahadi 'ida 'abinihuwedi , ma 'oinega ginaulaedi geya sipa'ala sida be'u , ma ginaula pa'alidi sitoholo hataya .
58012028	Bewa 'ida tupwa hauhauna 'oina taluhuluhu , waiwaina ma miyamiya hatayana , 'oinega sowasowana Yehoba 'oina taloyauwedo , ma talotapwalolo to'aha 'ina nuwatuhu 'ana lobwaina gide , ta wete tada he'asisiyane ma'ida matauta ,
58012029	weyahina 'ida Yehobaina 'aiwe ganinisa gide .
58013001	Coinega wahelau hilegomi taumimo 'oimiya .
58013002	Ta wete taumanao wabwauwedi 'oimiya , gide mwalohene tupwana tomota taumanao si'ita'ita yahidiya , ma hesi taumanaedi taudi aneloseyao , ta geya si'inanedi .
58013003	Wete 'iyamiyao wanuwatuhu yahidi taudi deliya simiyamiya , ma wa'abihetedi gide tuwa 'omi ba'idamiyao deliya wamiyamiya . Ma wete 'iyamiyao taudi simiya mwauwa wanuwatuhu yahidi ma wa'abihetedi , weyahina 'omi tomota tuwa , gide taudi !
58013004	Mabwaiyami hai 'ana loina wahe'asisiye ma sahena wanuwanuwa 'ubuna , weyahina tolopuiyao ta tologwaliyao 'abwa Yehoba 'iloinedi .
58013005	Sahena wasawasa bale'uwa nuwami 'i'ewa'ewa , ta hesi wayaliyaya to'aha waloba pwaidiya weyahidi , ma sahena hali ginaula ma hali ginaula weyahidi wahehetapewa , weyahina Yehoba 'igwaeya , “ Geya'abwa yanuwanuwa naidego . Geya'abwa ya'ebe'ebesinego . Geya ! ”
58013006	Coinega ma'ida 'atepatu moisa tagwae , “ Bada tauna 'agu To'abihetenaina , 'oinega sahena yamatamatauta to'aha gide tomota 'idi loina galana 'oiguwa . ”
58013007	Cami tohanugetao wanuwatuhu yahidi , weyahina mwalo Yehoba 'ina gwae si'ebwaegomiya , ta wete wanuwatuhuyahi 'idi hemisa huwaina 'abehega bwebwe'ana silobeya , eeta wahe'au'aunawedi .
58013008	Yesu Keliso 'ina mumuga mwalohene ta nige , ta tuta 'inaonaoma 'oidiya , geya 'ida 'abihedumedumeya .
58013009	Coinega sahena loina hauhaudi ma hagahagadi wahehesagohedi , weyahina 'ateda 'ihewaiwai Yehoba 'ina helaumo 'oinega , ma geya 'e'ahai 'oidiyega . Loinaedi 'e'ahai weyahina gesowana si'abihetegita .
58013010	Ma tauda ma'ida 'ebepwaoli , ma hesi Hada He'asisi bale'uwa 'ana topwaoliyao geya sawasawahina ma si'ai 'ida 'ebe pwaoliina 'oina .
58013011	Moisa , 'idi Topwaoli Madouna hebai bweyahidi 'i'ewe'ewedima Tupwa He'asisi Hedade 'alona , ta mumuga galana weyahina 'ipwaopwaoli Yehoba 'oina , ta 'oinega muliyetega hebaiyedi 'wapidi sigabu yahuledi 'asa tuluhana 'oina .
58013012	Coinega Yesu wete 'asa 'ana 'ahwa'eda tuluhana muyamuya 'ilobeya , ma 'ane bweyahinega 'i'abihe 'ehaugita .
58013013	Tauda wete sowasowana tatauya 'asa tuluhana Yesu 'oina , ma 'ebe mwadina taloba tauna gide .
58013014	Weyahina 'ebwa bale'uwa geya 'aigeda 'ida 'asa miyamiya hatayana , 'oinega 'ilobwainegita ma 'asa miyamiya hatayana tuta 'inaonaoma weyahina ta'ebese .
58013015	Eeta Yesu 'ina lema 'oinega tuta baibaiwana 'oidiya Yehoba tahepwatuwe . Bewa 'ida pwaoli nonohana , 'eguma tauna sanina ta'ahwa madouwe .
58013016	Caigeda pwaoli wete Yehoba nuwanuwana madouna , beno helau tomota weyahidi ma'ida 'atemuyamuya .
58013017	Cimi tohanugetao 'oidiya wahematamatana ma watagwalegomi 'idi loinao 'oidiya , weyahina yaluyaluwami si'ita'ita yahidi , ma 'oinega tuta 'inaonaoma 'oina 'imi mumuga weyahina sihepwaila Yehoba 'oina . Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya watoho ma wasami weyahina ma'idi yaliyaya Yehoba 'oina sihepwailegomi , ma hesi sahena ma'idi mwadina , 'amuge ma loina mwauna waloba .
58013018	Nuwanuwama wete tauma weyahima wa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina . Bewa tuwa 'anuwatuhuya 'abehega 'ima mumuga 'ausalana , ta nuwanuwama mumuga 'ausalanaina 'oina 'atoholo hataya .
58013019	Ta 'ateguwega ya'ahwa'ahwanoi 'oimiya ma 'imi 'ahwanoiyega 'igu 'eda 'ibwebwe'ana ma 'oimiya yahila mwayamwayauwa .
58013020	Yehoba miya daumwala 'ana to'ehele , ma tauna wete 'ida Bada Yesu 'amasega 'i'abihetoholo hileya , ta Yesuina 'ina tohekalesiyao tauda 'ada To'itayahina moisa , ta tauna bweyahinega 'ada loina 'ausalana ta miyamiya hatayana 'i'ebwaegita .
58013021	Ma Yehoba sowasowana ginaula baibaiwadi 'ausaladi 'i'ebwaegomi ma 'oidiyega 'ina nuwatuhu wamuliye moisa , ma 'oinega Yesu Keliso 'ina paihowega Yehoba 'i'abihe bwebwe'anigomi to'aha gide 'ina nuwatuhu , ma weyahimi 'iyaliyaya . Coinega Kelisoina tada hepwatu hatae . Emeni .
58013022	Ciyagwao , 'imi leta bewa to'uto'upana tuwa , ma ya'ahwanoi 'oimiya ta ma'imi 'alama'i'ita 'igu lohatoto bewa wada hesagohe .
58013023	Nuwanuwagu wete 'iyadaina Timoti wasana wahesagohe , weyahina deliyega silihasa pwaiya , 'oinega 'eguma 'ilomwayamwayauma 'abwa ba'idagu 'atauyawa 'oimiya .
58013024	Cima helau yahewaseyawa 'ami tohanugetao ma tohekalesiyao mabwaiyami 'oimiya . Ma meItali wete 'idi helau sihesumaneyawa 'oimiya .
58013025	Yehoba 'ina helau mabwaiyami 'oimiya . Emeni .
59001001	Yauwedo 'omi Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao susu tuwelo 'oidiyega wamiya lelewana 'asa baibaiwadi 'oidiya . Bewa 'imi leta yaleleyawa , taugu Yehoba ma Bada Yesu Keliso 'idi topaihowa , sanigu Yemesa .
59001002	Tasigwao , tuta sinaonaoma 'oidiya 'eguma 'ebe tohona baibaiwadi ma wete mwaudi walobadi , weyahidi wayaliyaya ,
59001003	ma wasanapu 'abehega 'ebe tohonaedi 'imi hemisa weyahina eema 'oidiyega watoholo pa'ala .
59001004	Coinega wa'ita yahigomi ma watoholo pa'ala moisa eema 'oinega 'imi mumuga mabwaiyana 'ibwebwe'ana .
59001005	Ta 'eguma taiyawedi 'omi Yehoba 'ana sanapu moisa geya 'oimiya , Yehoba 'oina wa'ahwanoi , ma 'oimiya 'i'ebwaya , weyahina tauna Totagwala ma To'ebwaya moisa .
59001006	Wa'ahwa'ahwanoi ma'imi hemisa moisa ma geya'abwa ma'imi henuwanaluwa , weyahina taudi ma'idi henuwanaluwa taudi gidemusa bagodu silasalasa ni'u 'awawa , 'eguma yaumai 'isihesiheyedi .
59001007	Taudi wete geya'abwa sinuwanuwatuhu 'abehega to'aha siloba Bada 'oinega ,
59001008	weyahina ma'idi henuwanaluwa 'idi paihowa baibaiwadi 'oidiya .
59001009	Ta tohekalesiyao wewelohedi 'eguma Yehoba 'igihanehedi siyaliyaya madouna .
59001010	Ma wete tohekalesiyao tohewasawasao 'ilobwainediya ma siyaliyaya 'eguma Yehoba 'ilagu suluhedi , weyahina tohewasawasao 'abwa sigumwala gide pwatula dididiyao .
59001011	Weyahina 'eguma sinenuga 'ihala 'oidiya nata 'ina waiwaiyega didiyaowedi siwelai ma sigubala , wete 'adi 'ita bwebwe'ana sigumwala . Gide tuwa wasawasaowedi 'abwa sipaipaihowa ma 'idi 'amasa 'ilomwayamwayau .
59001012	Ceguma taiya 'owa 'ebetohonao 'oidiyega 'utoholo pa'ala , 'uyaliyaya , weyahina 'a maisa bwebwe'ana Yehoba 'oinega 'abwa 'uloba , beno yawasi hataya . Bewa Yehoba 'ina gwaehemisa mabwaiyada 'oida , 'eguma tahelauwe .
59001013	Ma 'eguma taiya 'owa 'ebe tohonedi 'ulobadi , sahena 'unuwagala ma 'ugwae 'abehega , “ Yehoba 'itohotohogau . ” Weyahina tomota geya sawasawahidi ma Yehoba sitoho ma 'abehega tauna nuwatuhu galadi 'ida paihowadi , ta Yehoba wete geya tomota 'ida tohodiya ma nuwatuhu galadi sida paihowediya ,
59001014	ma hesi taboi 'ida pui dahwana 'oinega nuwatuhu galadi 'ilisilisigita ,
59001015	ta 'ida pui dahwanaedi 'oinega paihowa galana 'ihapwesa , 'oinega wete muliyetega 'amasa 'ilatu .
59001016	Yauwedo tasigwao , sahena 'imi nuwatuhu walagulagu puidi .
59001017	Ma hesi wasanapu moisa helau 'ausaladi mabwaiyadi galewega silatuma Yehoba 'oinega , tauna 'asilala 'adi topaihowa , ma wete geya 'ida buiya , gidemusa logulogu sibuibuidi .
59001018	Hesi tauna 'ina nuwatuhuwega , ta wete 'ina gwae moisa 'oinega 'ipaihowa nugetegita ma 'abehega tauda 'ana paipaihowao 'oidiyega tahemadou sinediya .
59001019	Tasigwao , 'ilobwainegomiya ma gwae wahesagohe bwaibwaini , ma sahena gwaehila ma gamwasowala 'oidiyega wahehewaiwai .
59001020	Weyahina tomota 'idi gamwasowala Yehoba 'ina 'eda dumwadumwaluna geya 'ilobwaine .
59001021	Coinega 'imi mumuga bi'ibi'idi ta 'imi puiyao mabwaiyadi wa'ebesinedi , ma watagwalegomi Yehoba 'oina , ta wete gwaeina 'atemiya Yehoba 'ibeguliya wahemisae , ma wahematamatane , ta 'oinega 'i'abihetegomi .
59001022	Geya'abwa wahesagohamo , beno tuwa wa'abo'abowegomi , ma wapaihowa wete .
59001023	Weyahina 'eguma taiya 'ihesagohamo ma geya 'ida paihowa , tauna gide loheya 'aigeda gelasi 'oina manina 'i'iteya ,
59001024	ta muliyetega 'itauya , ta tuta 'i'iuna 'oina manina 'ana 'ita 'inuwanaideya .
59001025	Ma Yehoba 'ina loina dumwadumwaluna 'oinega 'ida puiyao 'oidiyega 'ilihasigita . Ta 'eguma taiya loinaina weyahina 'inuwanuwatuhu ma 'ipaipaihowa , ma geya 'ida nuwanaideya , tauna loheyaina 'ina paihowa mabwaiyana yaliyayamo .
59001026	Ma 'eguma 'aigeda loheya 'inuwa hanehane ta 'abehega tauna totapwalolo moisa , ma geya 'ina gwae 'ida 'itayahiya , tauna tuwa 'iboimo 'i'aboweya , nata 'ina tapwaloloina ginaula besobeso .
59001027	Ma hesi tapwalolo 'asilalana ma dumwadumwaluna Yehoba Tamada matana bewa 'abehega taudi sinasinagehenidi ma hiwahiwapedi 'idi miyamwau 'oidiyega ta'abihetedi , ta wete geya'abwa mumuga bale'uwega ta'abi'abi hebi'igita .
59002001	Cae tasigwao , 'omi 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ana tohemisao , tauna tobwebwe'ana 'iya , 'oinega sahena 'imi hesinuwa tohewasawasao 'oidiya walagulagu .
59002002	Ceguma tomota 'eluwa siluhuwa 'imi hada tapwalolo 'alona , ma 'aigeda tohewasawasa ma'ana 'ale'o bwebwe'ana ta wete 'ana pasapasa bwebwe'ana , ta heluwena towewelohe 'ana 'ale'o bi'ibi'ina ,
59002003	'oinega 'eguma siteluwaedi wa'itadi nata towasawasaina wa'amayabe ma 'oina wagwae , “ Cebemiya bwebwe'ana bewa 'oina 'umiyatoi , ” ta toheweweloheina nata 'oina wagwae “ Beno nobwa 'utoholo , ” nuwana “ Cumiyatoi sehala , ”
59002004	ta 'eguma 'imi hesinuwa bewa gidemusa , 'ana 'ita geya bwebwe'ana , weyahina nuwatuhuina geya dumwaluna .
59002005	Tasigwao , 'igu gwae bewa wahesagohe , 'abehega Yehoba towewelohe bale'uwa 'ihesinuwediya ma hemisa 'oinega sihewasawasa . Weyahina Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'igwae hemisaeya ma 'oina silatu , 'eguma tauna sihelauweya .
59002006	Ta hesi towewelohe geya wada he'asisiyanediya , ma hesi taudi tohewasawasao loina pa'alina si'ebwa 'ebwaegomi , ta wete siloloheso hesoiyegomi 'ebe yatala 'oidiya .
59002007	Wanuwatuhuyahi wete 'abehega 'ida Bada sanina 'i'ebwaegita , ma tohewasawasaedi hesiyage saninaina si'ahwa'ahwa galagalae .
59002008	Ta 'ida Bada 'ina loina madouna Buki He'asisi 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Ciyamwao 'uhelauwedi gidemusa 'owa 'uhehelauwego . ” Loina bewa 'eguma 'umuliya bwaibwaini , beno mumuga bwebwe'ana .
59002009	Ma 'eguma tupwadi tomota wahe'ahe'asisiyanedi ma tupwadi tomota geya , beno loinaina wadi'wadi'wai , ma waboimimo 'imi mumuga wa'abi'abi hegaladi .
59002010	Ta 'eguma taiya loina 'aigedamo 'idi'wai , beno 'abehega loina mabwaiyadi wete 'idi'wa pwaidiya .
59002011	Weyahina loina mabwaiyadi 'adi To'ebwaya 'aigeda tuwa , tauna 'igwaeya 'abehega “ Sahena logwali , ” ma wete 'igwaeya “ Sahena lohe'amasa . ” Ta 'eguma geya walogwali ma hesi walohe'amasa , beno 'ina loina wadi'wa pwaiya .
59002012	Coinega 'imi gwae ma 'imi paihowa wa'itayahidi , weyahina Yehoba 'abwa 'ihesinuwegita 'ina loinega , ta 'ina loinaina beno tomota 'ada lihasa weyahina .
59002013	Weyahina 'eguma taiya geya 'iyanao 'i'atemuyamuyaedi , Yehoba gidemusa gesowana loheyaina 'i'atemuyamuyae . Ta 'eguma taiya to'atemuyamuya geya'abwa Yehoba 'ina bwa'omatana 'imatamataute .
59002014	Tasigwao , to'aha 'ana bwebwe'ana 'eguma 'aigeda taiya 'igwae , “ Taugu ma'igu hemisa , ” ta 'ina paihowa geya dumwaluna . Sawasawahina 'abihetena 'iloba 'ina hemisega ? Geya , 'awa ?
59002015	Ma 'eguma tanuwanuwa tasidao ma nuhudao weyahidi , taudi geya 'adi 'ale'omo ta wete geya 'adi 'e'ahaimo ,
59002016	ta 'oidiya tagwaehelau , tagwae , “ Yauwedo , wamiya bwebwe'ana ma wa'ai bwaibwaina , ” ma geya lema ta'ebwaedi , to'aha 'ida gwae 'ana bwebwe'ana ?
59002017	Bewa gidemusa 'eguma hemisamo , ta geya paihowa ba'idana hemisaina gide 'ama'amasina .
59002018	Ma 'eguma tupwadi tomota sigwae , “ Cowa ma'ino hemisa ta taugu ma'igu paihowa , ” ta hesiyage taugu 'igu gwaehila 'abehega , “ Ceguma 'ino hemisaina geya paihowa ba'idana , togidega 'ana bwebwe'ana ? Ta taugu bewa 'igu hemisa yahe'itego 'igu paihowega . ”
59002019	Cowa 'uhemisa 'abehega Yehoba 'iboi 'aigeda . Beno bwebwe'ana . Ta 'unuwatuhuyahi 'abehega Tomudulele ma 'iyanao taudi 'idi hemisa gidemusa , ta wete ma'idi matauta .
59002020	Cowa yauyauleiu . Bewa 'ebe'ita ya'ebwaego 'abehega 'eguma hemisamo , ta geya paihowa , beno ginaula bwagabwaga .
59002021	Cebe'ita bewa 'aigeda : tubudai Ebalahamo 'ina paihowega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'aneya . Cina paihowaina beno natuna Aisake 'itagwaleya ta 'abehega 'ipwaoliye Yehoba 'oina .
59002022	Bewa 'oinega nata 'usanapu 'abehega Ebalahamo 'ina hemisa ma 'ina paihowa sipaihowa mahemahetena , ta 'ina paihowega 'ina hemisa moisa 'i'abilatuheya .
59002023	Coinega Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwailaina 'ilatu moisa 'igwaeya , “ Ebalahamo Yehoba 'ihemiseya , ta 'ina hemisaina weyahina Yehoba Ebalahamo 'i'ahwa bwebwe'aneya , ” ma wete 'i'ahwa 'iyaguweya .
59002024	Coinega 'usanapu 'abehega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'anegita 'ida paihowega ma geya 'ida hemisamo 'oinega .
59002025	Cebe'ita heluwena bewa : tauna toganawala Leyabi 'ina paihowa bwebwe'ana 'oinega Yehoba 'i'ahwa bwebwe'aneya , weyahina Yosuwa 'ina tohepili wasawasao 'eluwa 'ilemediya , ta hali 'eda 'ihe'itediya , ta 'oinega 'i'abihetediya .
59002026	Gidemusa tuwa 'eguma wahida geya yaluyaluwanamo , beno 'i'amasa pwaiya , ta 'eguma hemisa geya paihowa mahetena , hemisaina 'ama'amasina .
59003001	Tasigwao , sahena watohotoho ma baibaiwami wahetohe'ita , ma wasanapu 'abehega 'eguma tahe'ita ma geya tapaihowa , 'abwa Yehoba 'ihetalaegita .
59003002	Moisa tuwa mabwaiyada pui tapaipaihowa . Ta 'eguma taiya tauna geya gwae galana 'ahwanega 'ida hapwesa , tauna loheya 'ehauna ta dumwadumwaluna , weyahina sawasawahina ma wahinao mabwaiyana 'iloinaedi .
59003003	Gidemusa tuwa hebai hosi 'adi 'ebe 'eyaisa 'ahwadiya talagudi ma ta'abihe manasami , ta 'eguma nuwanuwada ta'eha sitauyegita , 'eyaisina 'ana gulaha ta'abiyahidi ma 'oinega sawasawahina hebaiina wahina mabwaiyana taloinae .
59003004	Cebe'ita wete bewa 'aigeda , 'eguma tanuwanuwatuhu waga weyahidi . Bwagana waga madoudi ma yaumai madoudi 'ipilipilihedi , ta 'adi 'eyaisa 'i'iuna tuwa , to'eyaisina sawasawahina ma wagaina 'iloinae ma to'eha nuwanuwana ma 'itauya , nata 'itauya tuwa .
59003005	Gidemusa tuwa 'ahwada ginaula muhemuhena , ma sawasawahina ginaula maudoidi 'iloinaedi . Bewa wete 'aigeda 'ebe'ita 'abehega 'eguma 'aiwe 'ala'alasina muhemuhena nedu 'oina tatui , sawasawahina ma 'aiweinaina 'oinega nedu 'i'ala hegumwali .
59003006	Ta 'ahwada gidemusa 'aiwe mumugana , weyahina ginaula mabwaiyana galadi 'idi 'ebe he'ale . Coinega wahida mabwaiyana ta'abihegaladi 'ahwaina muhemuhena 'oinega . Moisa tuwa , galana mabwaiyana 'inaonaoma Tomudulele tauna 'oinega , ma ginaula mabwaiyadi 'ahwadega 'i'abi'abi hegaladi .
59003007	Tomota tauda sawasawahida ma hebai ta'abihe manasami , taudi gidemusa totopwatula ma bwasumowao ma hebai 'awa'awalidi ta wete silahanao .
59003008	Ta hesi geya sawasawahina ma 'ahwada ta'abihe manasami . Weyahina 'ahwada ginaula gala hedada ma bonewala simiyamiya , 'oinega 'ana 'abihemanasami mwau hedade .
59003009	Weteyage 'ahwadega Tamada Yehoba tahehepwatuwe , ta wete 'ahwadega 'iyadao ta'ahwa galagalaedi , taudi Yehoba 'ipaihowediya tauna 'ana 'ita gidemusa ,
59003010	eeta tasigwao , 'abehega 'ahwa 'aigeda gwae bwebwe'adi ma gwae galadi 'oinega silatulatuma , geya 'ana 'ita bwebwe'ana .
59003011	Ta tanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega bwasi 'ilupwalupwama 'ana lotohona geya 'ida gihedumedumeya ma 'abehega 'eta tuta 'ausalana ta 'eta tuta memaina ,
59003012	weyahina hola 'oinega geya sawasawahina ma we'aha 'ausalana taloba . Tasigwao , gidemusa tuwa 'aiweina damaya 'oina geya sawasawahina ma mwawa'i huwaina 'ilagu . Gidemusa wete geya sawasawahina ma piyoi 'oina damaya huwaina 'ilagu . Cebe 'itaedi bewa gidemusa tuwa 'ahwa 'ina paihowao .
59003013	Ceguma taiya 'owa ma'ino sanapu , 'upaihowa bwebwe'ana ma'ino nuwadobi , ma tomota 'abwa si'ita ma sisanapu 'ino mumuga bwebwe'ana .
59003014	Ma 'eguma wahe'ipi'ipi ma wagamwasowala hali tomota 'oidiya , ta wete waboi 'imi nuwatuhuwao 'igihe gagasigomi , nata he'ita dumwadumwaluna wagihegaladi .
59003015	Mumugami bewa bo 'imi sinasinapuwedi bewa geya galewega , ma hesi bale'u mumugaidi Tomudulele 'oinega .
59003016	Weyahina 'eguma tomota sihe'ipi'ipi ma taudimo weyahidi sinuwanuwatuhu , nage 'oina sideya , ma mumuga galadi wete 'oidiya silatu .
59003017	Ta 'eguma taiya 'ina sinasinapu galewega 'itauyama , tauna 'ina mumuga nugeta 'ehauna , ta wete nuwadaumwala , ma mumuga nuhanuhana , ma he'iya'iyagu ma 'atemuyamuya , ta 'abehega wete huwaidi bwebwe'adi silatulatu , ta geya 'iyanao 'ida lososomanediya , nuwana 'ida 'abowediya .
59003018	Ma wete taudi topaihowa siwaloha 'idi paihowega mumuga bwebwe'ana sigihegihe hapwese .
59004001	To'aha weyahina 'aleha ma he'ahupanapanawa silatulatu 'oimiya ? Nuwana waboi 'imi nuwa'ubuna 'oidiyega , weyahina tuta mabwaiyana hali mumuga ma hali mumuga 'alomiya sipaipaihowa .
59004002	Ceta tuta nuwanuwami 'iyamiyao 'idi tobwatobwa wa'ewadi , ta geya sawasawahimi , 'oinega walohe'amasidi . Ta ginaulaedi wanuwatuhu dahwanedi geya sawasawahimi ma wa'ewadi , 'oinega 'iyamiyao 'oidiya wa'ala'ala 'ohe'ohe ma wahe'upwa . Ma ginaulaedi geya wada lobediya weyahina geya weyahidi wada 'ahwanoiya Yehoba 'oina .
59004003	Ma 'eguma weyahidi wa'ahwanoi , geya wada lobediya , beno weyahina 'imi 'ahwanoi geya dumwaludi , weyahina 'imi 'ahwanoiyedi waboimo 'imi yaliyaya weyahina .
59004004	Comi tohemisa 'abo'abowao ! Ceguma bale'u mumugaina wahelauweya , beno Yehoba walo'aleheya , weyahina 'eguma taiya bale'u mumugaina nuwanuwana , tauna Yehoba 'ana 'aleha .
59004005	Coinega sahena Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwaila wa'ahwa'ahwa muhemuheye tutaina 'igwae , “ Yaluyaluwaina Yehoba 'ilaguya 'oida nuwanuwana madouna tauda . ”
59004006	Ma hesi Yehoba 'ina lema 'oida 'imadou hedade , weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaila 'igwaeya , “ Yehoba togagasa 'i'ausidi , ma hesi tonuwasulu 'oidiya 'itagwala ma 'ilemedi . ”
59004007	Coinega Yehoba 'oina watagwalegomi , ma Tomudulele walogwahate ma tauna 'i'ebesinegomi .
59004008	Ta wanao Yehoba deina ma 'oinega tauna wete 'inaowa deimiya . Ta 'omi galami ma to'abo 'ilobwaineya ma nimami wadeulidi ma 'atemi wagihe'ehaudi .
59004009	Ta wete 'imi mumuga galadi weyahidi wadou gwaegwae ma'imi nuwagala , eema 'imi hedagiyao wagibui ma wadou , ta wete 'imi yaliyaya wagibuidi ma wanuwagala ,
59004010	ta wanuwasulu Bada matana , ma 'oinega tauna 'igilagasigomi .
59004011	Tasigwao , sahena tasimiyao wa'ahwa galaedi , weyahina 'eguma taiya tauna tasina 'i'ahwagalae , nuwana 'iloinae , tauna geya Yehoba 'ina loina 'imuliye , ta hesi loinaina 'i'ahwa galaeya .
59004012	Yehoba 'iboimo loina 'ana to'ebwaya , ma wete toloina , tauna sawasawahina 'i'abihete bo 'ilohe'amasa , 'oinega 'omi sahena 'iyamiyao wa'ahwa galagalaedi bo waloiloinaedi .
59004013	Gwae bewa wahesagohe , 'eguma taiyawedi 'oimiyega wagwae gagasa ma wagwae , “ Nata bo gona 'atautauya 'asa madouna 'oina , ta nobwa bolime 'aigeda 'amiyamiya ma tauma 'ima paihowa 'apaihowadi , ma 'ahewasawasa , ”
59004014	ma hesi geya wasanapu yawasimi 'ina tautauya gona weyahina , weyahina tauda tomota gidemusa hogahoga . Cihapwesa tuta 'i'iuna tuwa , ta wete 'ilohesawala hila .
59004015	Ma hesi 'ilobwaineya ma wagwae , “ Ceguma Bada 'itagwala , 'ada miyamiya ma ginaulaedi nuwanuwama 'ada paihowadi . ”
59004016	Nata bewa wagagasa ma wagwaehane , ma hesi gwae haneina galana .
59004017	Coinega 'eguma taiya paihowa bwebwe'adi 'isanapudiya , ma geya 'ida paihowediya , beno 'ina pui .
59005001	Comi tohewasawasao , hepwaila bewa wahesagohe bwaibwainidi , ma 'imi tuta mwau nata weyahina wadou ma'imi dou gwaegwae .
59005002	Weyahina 'imi wasawasao simwahulu pwaiya , ta wete 'ami 'ale'owao ganagana si'ai pwaidiya .
59005003	Ta wete 'imi maneyao wanuwahidiya , 'oimiya simiyamiya ma sigala , ta maneina bewa sihepwaila 'abehega mane madou hedade wanuwahidiya , ta tuta 'ebe losaloha 'oina 'i'alasigomi , gide 'aiwe .
59005004	Ma 'imi tanoha 'adi topaihowao geya wahemaisa bwaibwainidi , 'oinega topaihowaedi 'idi lomugi ta 'idi dou Yehoba Tohewaiwai tauna 'ihesagoheya .
59005005	Ma 'imi miya bale'uwa bwebwe'ana hedade , weyahina tuta mabwaiyana ma'imi yaliyaya , 'oinega ma'ami tole bwebwe'ana , lohe'amasa 'ilobwainegomiya , gidemusa tuwa guyai baweidi .
59005006	Weyahina taudi todumwalu wabwa'omatanedi , nuwana walolohe'amasidi , ta geya sawasawahina ma 'oimiya sihemaisa .
59005007	Coinega tasigwao , wa'alama'i'ita 'ana siga 'ida Bada 'ihilama . Gidemusa tuwa tanoha 'ana topaihowa ma'ina 'alama'i'ita 'iyamwayamwana dohi yaigalugalu 'ana tuta ma bolimana 'ana tuta ee 'ana siga 'eli'eli 'ana tuta 'oina ma hewana 'i'elidi .
59005008	Coinega 'omi wete gidemusa wa'alama'i'itana ma'imi 'atepatu weyahina 'i'iunamo 'ida Badaina 'ihilama .
59005009	Tasigwao , sahena waboi walomugi hilegomi , nata gide 'ida Bada 'ibwa'omategomi , ma tauna Toloinaina 'i'iunamo ma 'ilatuma .
59005010	Coinega tasigwao , wanuwatuhuyahi palopitaowedi , taudi 'ida Badaina weyahina sihepwaila . Bewa 'ebe'ita bwebwe'ana 'oimiya , weyahina palopitaowedi 'idi miya mwauwedi 'oidiyega sitoholo pa'ala .
59005011	Ta 'eguma taiyawedi taudi gidemusa tahesaniyedi toyaliyaya , weyahina mwauwedi 'oidiyega sitoholo pa'ala . Ma bewa wete 'aigeda 'ebe'ita Yobi 'ina 'alama'i'ita weyahina wasanapu pwaiya , 'abehega Yobiina 'ina miya mwau 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'oina 'ana 'abihetena 'ilobeya 'ida Bada 'oinega , weyahina tauna Badaina helau ta 'atemuyamuya lamuna .
59005012	Ma tasigwao , 'aigeda wete ginaula madouna 'oida 'abehega sahena ta'eta'wata'walulu Tamada saninega , nuwana bale'u ginaulao 'oidiyega , bo nuwana to ginaula tuwa 'oidiyega , 'eguma 'imi gwaeupaupa 'oidiyega . Ta hesi tuwa wagwae , “ Cehe , ” 'eguma 'imi nuwatuhu gidemusa , ta 'eguma geya , wagwae , “ Geya . ” Weyahina 'eguma gwae madoudi wa'inanadi , muliyetega Yehoba 'iheyatalaegomi .
59005013	Ta 'eguma taiya 'imiyamwau , 'ilobwaineya ma 'i'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina . Ta 'eguma taiya ma'ina yaliyaya , nata waliyega Yehoba 'ihepwatuwe .
59005014	Ta 'eguma 'aigeda 'oimiyega ma'ina lohala , hekalesiya 'ana tohanugetao 'ibwauwedima , ma si'ahwanoi weyahina , ma wete holowa 'oina silagu 'ida Bada saninega .
59005015	Ta 'eguma ma'idi hemisa si'ahwanoi , Yehoba 'ileme tolohalaina ma 'ibwebwe'ana , ta wete 'eguma ma'ina pui , Yehoba 'inuwasamudi .
59005016	Coinega 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oimiya 'imi galaowedi wahepwailedi , ma weyahina wa'ahwanoi , ma 'oinega 'imi bwebwe'ana waloba . Moisa , tobwebwe'adi 'idi 'ahwanoi waiwai hedade .
59005017	Bewa 'aigeda 'ebe'ita 'oida , beno Ilaitiya , tauna tomota tuwa tauda gidemusa , ta 'i'ahwanoi nuwana mabwaiyana 'oinega ma 'abehega sahena 'idohidohi bolime 'etoi ma tupwana 'oidiya , eema geya 'idohi .
59005018	Coinega wete 'i'ahwanoi hila ta galewega dohi 'isuluma , ta 'e'ahai mabwaiyadi sibwala hila .
59005019	Ma tasigwao , 'eguma 'aigeda taiya 'oimiyega 'eda bwebwe'ana 'i'ebesine , ma 'eguma taiya 'owa 'iyauina 'u'ewa hila 'eda bwebwe'ana 'oina ,
59005020	nata togalaina yaluyaluwana 'u'abiheteya 'amasega , weyahina 'ina galaina mabwaiyana sigumwala .
60001001	Taugu Pita , Yesu Keliso 'ana tohepwaila , bewa 'igu leta 'oimiya 'omi Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao wahetautaumana ma wahe'asa hali tupwa 'oidiya , gide Ponitio ma Galetiya ma Kapadosiya ma Esiya , ma wete Bitiniya 'asaidiyao 'oidiya .
60001002	Comi mwalo Yehoba 'inuwatuhugomiya ma 'ane 'ihesinuwegomi 'ina tomotaiyao , eeta 'ina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna bo'i 'igihe'ehau hilegomiya , beno Natuna bweyahinega , ma 'abehega Yesu Kelisoina 'enana wahematamatane . Sowasowana helau ma nuwadaumwala simadou 'oimiya .
60001003	Yehoba tahepwatuwe , tauna 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso tamana , weyahina 'i'atemuyamuyaegita madouna ta li'u hauhauna 'i'ebwaegita Yesu Keliso 'ina toholo hila 'amasega 'oinega . Bewa weyahina tuta mabwaiyana tanuwatuhu 'abehega 'ina helauwao galewa 'abwa talobadi .
60001004	Nage 'oina helauwedi 'ilagu bwaibwainidi weyahimi , ma geya'abwa silamilamida bo sigalagala bo sitalatala sawala .
60001005	Ma 'omi helauwedi wada lobadi , 'eguma Yehoba wahemisae 'abehega 'ina waiwaiyega 'ida 'itayahigomi , ta tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'oina 'abihetenaina 'igibubuya weyahimi 'i'ebwaegomi .
60001006	Coinega wayaliyaya madouna , mane gide tuta to'uto'upana tuwa bewa 'oina tupwana 'ebetohonao mwaudi walobalobadi .
60001007	Bewa 'oidiyega 'imi hemisaedi Yesu weyahina Yehoba 'itohodi . Gidemusa tuwa goula 'aiwe ganiganinisega sitohotohodi . Ma hesi 'imi hemisaina goula 'imadou sineya , weyahina goula ginaula gumwagumwalina . Ma 'eguma 'imi hemisaina waiwaina , 'abwa Yesu Keliso 'ina hapwesama 'oina hepwatu ma wasawasa ma he'asisi walobadi .
60001008	Kelisoina tauna geya wa'ita ma tuwa wahelauweya , ma bewa tuwa wete geya wada 'iteya , ma tuwa 'oina wahemisa ma'imi yaliyaya 'oina geya'abwa tagwaegwae .
60001009	Weyahina 'imi hemisaina 'ana masi 'oina walatuwa , beno yaluyaluwami 'adi 'abihetena .
60001010	Bewa 'abihetenaina mwalo palopitao sihesilaleya ma sibeseya , eeta 'imi 'abihetenaina sigwae hemiseya ma 'abehega Yehoba 'i'ebwaegomi .
60001011	Ma Keliso Yaluyaluwana 'atediya 'ihe'ita nugetediya 'ina muyao ma 'ina wasawasa muliyetega weyahidi eeta palopitaowedi sanapu si'ebeseya to tuta 'oina ma togidega 'abihetenaina 'ida hapwesa 'esa .
60001012	Ma Yehoba palopitaowedi 'ihe'itediya 'abehega gwae hemisaedi sihepwaila nugetediya geya taudi siboi weyahidi ma 'omi hesi weyahimi , ma nuwatuhuwedi mwalo weyahidi sigwae pwaiya bewa wahesagohediya wasa bwebwe'ana 'ana tohepwailao 'oidiyega , beno Yaluyaluwa Tabuna galewega 'ina waiwaiyega . Ma nuwatuhuwedi sihegwaegomiya , aneloseyao galewa nuwanuwadi ma taudi wete sida sanapu , ma hesi geya si'ita .
60001013	Coinega ginaula bewa weyahina 'imi nuwatuhu mabwaiyana wagihepa'alidi , ma wete 'imi hemisa walagu bwaibwainidi 'abehega tutaina Yesu Keliso 'ihapwesama 'ebe yaliyaya waloba Yehoba 'oinega .
60001014	Yehoba 'oina wahematamatana , ma geya'abwa 'imi nuwa'ubunao siloiloinaegomi gidemusa mwalo 'imi tuta hemwagemwage 'oina .
60001015	Ma hesi 'imi paihowa mabwaiyadi 'oidiya wamumuga dumwalu , gidemusa tauna 'ibwauwegomiya 'ina mumuga dumwadumwaluna .
60001016	Weyahina Buki He'asisi 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Wagihe'ehaugomi , gidemusa taugu 'ehaugu . ”
60001017	Cabwa Yehoba 'ina loina 'aigeda dumwadumwaluna 'oinega tomota mabwaiyadi 'iloinaedi , gide 'ida paihowa , bwebwe'ana , bo nuwana galana . Tauna Yehobaina wahesaniyeya Tamamiu 'imi 'ahwanoi 'oidiya , sowasowana wahe'asisiyane tuta mabwaiyana bale'u bewa 'oina wamiyamiya .
60001018	Mwalo 'imi mumuga tubumiyao 'oidiyega geya bwebwe'ana , 'oinega Yehoba 'ami he'isa 'ipaihoweya sabi 'abihetegomi . Ma he'isaina wasanapuya 'abehega geya ginaula gumwagumwalidi gidemusa siliba bo goula ,
60001019	ma hesi he'isaina Yehoba 'ina lami bweyahina bwebwe'ana hedada 'oinega 'i'abihetegomiya , tauna Kelisoina bwebwe'ana hedada , geya 'eta to'aha galana 'oina .
60001020	Yehoba Kelisoina 'ihesinuwa nugeteya 'ina paihowa bewa weyahina , ee muliyetega bale'u 'ipaihoweya , ma tutaina 'ebe gumwala bewa 'oina Kelisoina 'ihapwesama , tauda weyahida .
60001021	Eeta tauna Kelisoina 'oinega Yehoba wahemisaeya 'abehega tauna 'amasega 'igihetoholo hileya eeta 'ebemiya wasawasa 'oina 'ilaguya , 'oinega 'imi hemisa ma 'imi nuwatuhu walagu bwaibwainidi Yehoba 'oina .
60001022	Coinega 'eda dumwadumwaluna wamuliya bwaibwainiya , beno 'oinega 'imi 'ehauhila walobeya , ma wete taudi 'iyamiyao wahelauwedi 'atemi mabwaiyana 'oinega , eeta sowasowana 'omi wete wahelau hilegomi 'aigeda 'aigeda , helau moisa 'oinega .
60001023	Comi bo'i wali'u hila pwaiya , geya tamamiyao 'ama'amasidi 'oidiyega , ma hesi Tamamiu mayawasina ma miyamiya hatayana 'ina gwae 'oinega .
60001024	Gidemusa tuwa Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwaila 'igwaeya , “ Tomota mabwaiyadi gide modumodu ma 'idi wasawasao gide modumoduwedi hoyadiyao . Weyahina modumoduwedi muhemuhena ma si'amasa , 'oinega hoyadiyao wete siwelai .
60001025	Ma hesi Bada 'ina gwae miyamiya hatayana . ” Gwaeina bewa 'oida 'imiyamiya , beno wasaina bwebwe'anaina wahesagoha pwaiya .
60002001	Eeta 'imi galao ma 'imi 'e'abo'abowao gwaeyega bo paihowega ma 'imi he'ipi'ipiyao ma 'imi 'ahwa galagalao waguipailedi ,
60002002	ma hesi yaluyaluwami 'ana susu bwebwe'ana wa'ebese , gidemusa taudi gwagwama hauhaudi susu nuwanuwadi , eeta susuina yaluyaluwami 'adi 'abihetena weyahina .
60002003	Comi 'ida Badaina 'ina 'atemuyamuya walotoho pwaiya ,
60002004	'oinega wanaoma 'oina , tauna logidi mayawasina , mebale'u silososomaneya , ma hesi Yehoba nuwanuwana eeta 'ihesinuweya .
60002005	Coinega 'omi wete gide yowayowana mayawasina , yaluyaluwami watagwaledi , ma 'oimiyega Yehoba 'ina Hada 'ida 'abi , ma nage 'oina wahetopwaoli 'ehaumi , ma Yesu Keliso 'ilemegomi ma yaluyaluwamiyega wahetopwaoli bwebwe'ana Yehoba 'oina .
60002006	Gidemusa wete Buki He'asisi 'oina 'igwaeya , “ Wa'ita logidi bewa bwebwe'ana ma hesihesinuwaina yalagulagu nugete hada 'ana 'abi weyahina 'asa Saiyoni 'oina . Ceguma taiyawedi sihemisa tauna 'oina geya'abwa sideba mwadina . ”
60002007	Ma 'omi taiyawedi logidi bewa wahemisaeya , tauna 'oimiya 'abehega logidi bwebwe'ana hedade , ma hesi taudi geya 'oina sihemisae taudi weyahidi Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaileya , 'igwae , “ Logidiina mwalo to'abi hada silogwahateya , ma bewa tuwa sihetoholo pwaiya ma 'ihelogidi nugeta , ma logidi mabwaiyadi 'iloinaedi . ”
60002008	Ma wete 'igwae , “ Logidi bewa tomota 'idi 'ebetupa , 'abwa 'oina situpa ma sibe'u . ” Ma situpa 'oina weyahina gwae geya sihemisae . Bewa gide Yehobaina 'ina loina nugenugetana taudi weyahidi .
60002009	Ma 'omi geya gide taudi , ma 'omi hesi Yehoba 'ina boda hesihesinuwaimi , 'omi Kiniina 'ina topwaoli ma 'ina tomotaiyao 'ehaumi , weyahina tupwa guguyou 'oinega 'ibwauwegomiya eeta 'ina 'asilala tobwebwe'ana hedada 'oina 'ilagugomiya , ma 'abehega 'ina paihowa bwebwe'anaina wahepwaile .
60002010	Tuta mwalo 'oidiya 'omi geya waheboda 'aigeda , ma sauga bewa Yehoba 'oina waheboda 'aigeda pwaiya , ma mwalo wete Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyamuya geya 'oimiya 'imiyamiya , ma sauga bewa waloba pwaiya .
60002011	Ciyagwao 'oimiya yahepwaila 'abehega tauda bale'u bewa 'oina tohetautaumana , 'oinega 'imi nuwa'ubunaowedi 'atemiya simiyamiya walogwahatedi , weyahina yaluyaluwami silo'alehedi .
60002012	Ma wamumuga bwebwe'ana taudi geya meYudiya 'oidiya . Weyahina bewa tuwa 'abwa si'ahwa'ahwa galagalaegomi , ma tuta muliyetega 'imi paihowa bwebwe'ana si'ita , ma 'oinega tutaina Yehoba 'ilatuma Yehobaina sihepwatuwe .
60002013	Comi Badaina 'ina boda , 'oinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma loina mabwaiyana bale'uwa wahe'asisiyanedi , gidemusa kini 'ina loina 'oina watagwalegomi , weyahina tauna toloina madouna ,
60002014	ma wete gabemaniyao wahe'asisiyanedi , weyahina kiniina 'ihesinuwediya ma gabemaniyedi togala siloinaedi , ma tobwebwe'ana si'ahwa bwebwe'anedi .
60002015	Ma Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu bewa ma 'eguma tomata'u'upao sigwae besobeso weyahimi , ma 'iyamo 'imi paihowa bwebwe'ana 'abwa si'ita ma gesowana to'aha weyahimi sigwaegwae .
60002016	Ma 'omi hesi Yehoba 'ilihasi pwaigomiya ma 'abehega waboi waloinaegomi , ma hesi geya'abwa paihowa galadi 'oidiya watautauya , ma wapaihowa tuwa gidemusa 'omi Yehoba 'ina topaihowao .
60002017	Coinega tomota mabwaiyadi wahe'asisiyanedi , ma taudi Yesu 'ana tohemisao wahelauwedi . Yehoba 'oina wahe'asisi madouna , ma wete toloinaina kini wahe'asisiyane .
60002018	Ma 'omi topaihowao 'imi babadao wahe'asisiyanedi ma 'oidiya wahematamatana , ma geya 'abehega babadao bwebwe'adimo 'oidiya , ma wete taudi 'idi loina waiwaidi wete wahe'asisiyanedi .
60002019	Weyahina 'eguma geya 'aigeda 'imi paihowa galana , ma sigihemuya daisigomi ma Yehoba weyahina wanuwanuwatuhu madouna eeta wa'alama'i'itana , beno mumuga bwebwe'ana Yehoba matana .
60002020	Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'eguma 'ida paihowa galana 'oinega sigihemuyegita ma ta'alama'i'ita , beno geya ginaula madouna . Ma hesi 'eguma 'ida paihowa bwebwe'ana 'oinega sigihemuyegita , ma ta'alama'i'itana , Yehoba weyahida 'iyaliyaya .
60002021	Ma 'eda bewa weyahina Yehoba 'ibwau pwaigita , weyahina Keliso tauna weyahida 'i'emuyamuya eeta 'ebe'ita 'ilaguya 'oida ma 'abehega leleyana tamuliyedi .
60002022	Weyahina tauna geya 'ina galamo ma wete geya 'eta 'abo 'ahwanega 'ida latuwa .
60002023	Ma tutaina si'ahwa galagalaeya geya wete 'oidiya 'ihe'isa , ma wete si'ehemuyeya , geya wete 'igamwasowaledi , ma hesi Yehoba 'ihemiseya moisa , weyahina tauna Toloina dumwadumwaluna .
60002024	Ma weteyage Keliso tauna wahinega 'ida galao 'i'ahalidiya kelose 'oina , ma nage 'oinega 'ida mumuga galadi sigumwala , ma mumuga dumwaluna 'oinega tatauya . Tauna 'ana badi 'oinega 'imi bwebwe'ana walobeya .
60002025	Moisa , 'omi gide sipi hehebe'uina , eeta sipi 'adi to'itayahina 'itoe hilegomima 'oina , tauna yaluyaluwami 'ana to'itayahina .
60003001	Gidemusa 'omi wete tohai mewahinemi mwanemiyao wahe'asisiyanedi , eeta 'eguma taudi geya Yehoba 'ina gwae sihemisae , 'omi 'imi paihowa bwebwe'ana he'asisiyega wahe'itadi , ma 'oinega taudi wete sihemisa .
60003002	
60003003	Ma geya'abwa wahe'aupasegomi 'ahupasa hapwehapwesadi 'oidiyega , gidemusa debami wapaihowa bwaibwainidi , nuwana ginaula goula 'oidiyega wahepasegomi , nuwana 'ami 'wamao 'ausaladi wa'otedi ,
60003004	ma hesi 'atemi wahepasadi pasaedi miyamiya hatayadi 'oidiyega , taudi gidemusa mumuga nuhana ma nuwadobi 'oidiyega , Wanuwatuhuyahi mumugaedi 'abehega ginaula madouna Yehoba matana .
60003005	Gidemusa mwalo taudi wahiwahine totapwalolo Yehoba sihemisaeya eeta 'atedi sihe'ahupaseya mumuga nuhana ma nuwadobi 'oidiyega eeta mwanediyao sihe'asisiyanediya .
60003006	Gidemusa wete Sela mwanena Ebalahamo 'enana 'ihematamataneya eeta 'i'ahwa badaeya . Ma 'eguma 'omi wamumuga bwebwe'ana ma geya 'eta to'aha wamatamataute , 'omi Sela natunao .
60003007	Ma 'omi wete tohai meloheyami mamwanemiyao wamiyamiya , wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega taudi we'awe'adi , 'oinega wahe'asisiyanedi ma wa'itayahidi , weyahina 'omi mamwanemiyao mahetemiyao yawasimi Yehoba 'i'ebwaegomiya . Bewa gidemusa wamumuga 'esa ma 'oinega geya'abwa to'aha galana 'imi 'ahwanoiyao 'i'abihewe'adi .
60003008	Bewa 'igu gwae 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'oimiya 'abehega 'imi nuwatuhuwega ma 'ami lotohonega wahe'aigeda ma wahelau hilegomi , ma ma'imi nuwadobi wa'atemuya muyaegomi .
60003009	Ma 'eguma tupwadi 'oimiya sipaihowa galana , geya'abwa 'oidiya wahehemaisa , ma 'eguma wete siheliyegomi geya'abwa waheheliyedi . Ma hesi wahemaisedi gwae bwebwe'ana 'oidiyega , weyahina Yehoba 'igwae hemisa pwaiya 'abehega 'ihelauwegomi , 'eguma 'omi gwae bwebwe'anega 'oidiya wahemaisa .
60003010	Gidemusa Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaila , 'igwaeya , “ Ceguma taiya tauna nuwanuwana ma 'iyaliyaya sabwelo mabwaiyana 'oidiya , 'ilobwaineya ma gwae besobeso ta 'abo 'ilolagu .
60003011	Wete paihowa galadi 'ilogwahatedi ma 'ipaihowa bwebwe'ana hali tomota 'oidiya , ma wete 'ihetapewa waiwai nuwadaumwala weyahina .
60003012	Weyahina 'ida Bada tuta mabwaiyana tobwebwe'anao 'ilomatayahidi , ma wete 'idi 'ahwanoiyao 'ihesagoha bwaibwainidi , ma taudi togala 'ilogwahatedi . ”
60003013	Moisa tuwa , geya sawasawahina 'eta taiya 'i'ehemuyegomi , 'eguma ginaula bwebwe'ana nuwami 'i'ewa'ewa , ma tuta mabwaiyana 'oina wapaipaihowa .
60003014	Ma geya'abwa tomota wamatamatautedi bo nuwana wanuwanuwa mwau 'oidiya , ma hesi wayaliyaya , 'eguma ginaula bwebwe'ana wapaipaihowa ma si'ehe'ehe muyegomi ,
60003015	ma hesi 'atemiyega 'ida Bada Keliso wahe'asisiyane . Ma 'eguma taiya 'ihesilalegomi ma 'igwae , “ To'aha weyahina 'uhemihemisa ? ” nata 'omi wagwaehila ma'imi hepwaila bwebwe'ana 'oidiya , ma ma'imi mumuga nuhana 'oinega wahegwaedi .
60003016	Ma to'aha wanuwatuhuya bwebwe'ana , tuta mabwaiyana gidemusa wapaipaihowa 'esa , 'oinega 'eguma taiyawedi si'ahwa galaegomi weyahina 'abehega 'omi Keliso 'ana tomuliyao , 'abwa sideba mwadina , 'eguma 'imi mumuga bwebwe'ana wahe'itedi .
60003017	Ceguma Yehoba 'inuwatuhuya 'abehega muya taloba , 'ilobwainegita ta'emuyamuya 'ida paihowa bwebwe'ana weyahina , ma hesi geya 'ana 'ita bwebwe'ana 'eguma paihowa galana weyahina ta'emuyamuya .
60003018	Gidemusa tuwa , Keliso ma'aigeda 'i'amasa 'ida galao weyahidi , ma tauna loheya bwebwe'ana , ma tauda galagalaida ma weyahida 'i'amasa , ta 'oinega 'itoegita Yehoba 'oina . Ma Keliso wahinamo silohe'amasiya , ma yaluyaluwana geya .
60003019	Coinega yaluyaluwana 'ilatuwa ta 'itauya yaluyaluwa paipainidi 'oidiya 'ilohatotowa .
60003020	Yaluyaluwaedi tomota yaluyaluwadi , taudi mwalohene Nowa 'ina tuta Yehoba weyahidi 'ihe'alama'i'itana ma 'abehega 'oina sihemisa , ta geya . Coinega mabwaiyadi yagewa 'oinega sidamana , ma tupwadimo bwasiyega 'i'abihetediya , beno nima 'aigeda ma 'etoi , 'i'abihetedi wagaina Nowa 'i'abiya 'oinega .
60003021	Bwasiina 'ihe'ita moisa 'oida 'abehega bewa tuwa bwasi 'ebe babitaiso 'i'abihetegita . Ma babitaisoina geya 'abehega wahida 'ana deulamo , ma hesi 'ida 'ahwanoiyega Yehoba 'ateda 'igihe 'ehaudi , Yesu Keliso 'ina toholo hila 'oinega ,
60003022	tauna 'ihane pwaiya galewa , eeta bewa tuwa Yehoba 'ina 'ebeulega 'imiyamiya , ma aneloseyao ma toloinao mabwaiyadi galewa 'oina 'iloiloinaedi .
60004001	Wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega tutaina Yesu 'ihetomotai muya 'ilobeya , ma 'imi nuwatuhu walagu Yesu gidemusa , ma 'oinega waboimo wagihepa'aligomi , weyahina 'eguma taiyawedi taudi wahidiyega muya silobediya , 'idi mumuga galana 'igumwala pwaiya .
60004002	Coinega 'ida tuta mabwaiyana bale'uwa tamiyamiya tatagwalegita Yehoba 'oina ma tauna 'iloinaegita ma hesi 'ida nuwa'ubuna geya'abwa 'iloloinaegita .
60004003	Mwalo 'imi mumuga galana gidemusa taudi tomiya ganamuli , ma mumugaedi bewa walogwahatedi , gidemusa sogala ma nuwa'ubuna ma bwasi waiwaidi 'adi numa yauyaule , ma he'iya'iyagu paihowa galadi weyahidi , ma wete hemisa 'abo'abodi hali ginaulao 'oidiya .
60004004	Ma tomiya ganamuliyedi sinuwa henainaida 'eguma 'omi geya mahetemiyao ginaulaedi galadi wapaipaihowadi , 'oinega si'ahwa galagalaegomi .
60004005	Ma hesi Yehoba tomota mayawasidi ma 'ama'amasidi 'abwa 'ibwa'omatadi , ma wete taudi tomiya ganamuli 'abwa siyatala matana .
60004006	Bewa huhuna 'oinega wasa bwebwe'ana 'iguguyaeya to'amasao 'oidiya , ma tuta mayawasidiya 'adi loina mwauna silobeya , ma 'ane yaluyaluwadiyega yawasidi si'ewa Yehoba 'oinega .
60004007	Muhemuhena ginaula mabwaiyana sigumwala . Coinega wa'itayahigomi ma 'imi nuwatuhuwao wagihepa'alidi , ma tuta baibaiwana wa'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina .
60004008	Coinega wahelau hilegomi moisa 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oimiya , weyahina helau sawasawahina ma galana baibaiwadi 'igibodi .
60004009	Coinega 'iyamiyao wabwauwedi 'imi hada , nuwa bwebwe'anega , ma geya'abwa walolomugiyedi .
60004010	Ma 'aigeda 'aigeda Yehoba heguheguyai hagana ma hagana 'i'ebwae pwaigomiya , 'oinega heguheguyaiyedi 'oidiyega wapaihowa ma 'iyamiyao walemedi , ma 'oinega 'omi Yehoba 'ina topaihowa bwebwe'ami .
60004011	Ceguma taiyawedi 'omi wahetohepwaila , wahetohepwaila tuwa gidemusa Yehoba 'ina gwae wahepwaileya , ma 'eguma taiyawedi 'omi walemalema , walema tuwa 'imi waiwai mabwaiyanega , gidemusa waiwaiina 'i'ebwaegomiya , ma 'oinega paihowa mabwaiyadi 'oidiyega tomota Yesu Keliso sisanapu ma Yehoba sihepwatuwe , weyahina tauna wasawasa moisa ma tohewaiwai moisa , tuta mabwaiyana 'oidiya . Emeni .
60004012	Ma tasigwao , geya'abwa ma'imi henainaida 'eguma tutaina 'ebe tohona mwaudi walobadi . Geya'abwa wanuwanuwatuhu 'abehega silatulatu daita ,
60004013	ma hesi wayaliyaya , ma wete wanuwatuhu 'abehega Yesu Keliso muya 'ilobeya , eeta 'omi gidemusa tuwa waloba 'ese , ma muliyetega tutaina 'ina wasawasa 'ihapwesama wayaliyaya madou hedada .
60004014	Ma 'eguma tomota si'ahwa galagalaegomi 'imi hemisa Keliso 'oina weyahina , wayaliyaya tuwa , weyahina Yehoba yaluyaluwana 'asi'asilalaina 'oimiya 'imiyamiya .
60004015	Ma hesi geya ginaula bwebwe'adi weyahimi 'eguma walohe'amasa bo wayagaha bo wapui bo wapaihowa besobeso ma weyahidi muya waloba .
60004016	Ma ginaula bwebwe'ana hesi 'eguma 'omi Keliso 'ina bodao ma muya waloba . Beno geya 'ebe debamwadina , ma hesi Yehoba wahepwatuwe , weyahina 'omi Keliso 'ina bodao moisa .
60004017	Ma tuta 'ilatu pwaima ma 'ane bwa'omatana 'ihegaina , ma 'oinega Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao 'ida bwa'omatana nugetedi , eema muliyetega taudi wasana bwebwe'ana geya sihemihemise , 'idi galao 'ana maisa mwau hedada siloba .
60004018	Ma Buki He'asisi 'oina 'ihepwaila pwaiya , 'igwae , “ Yehoba 'oina mwauna ma 'abehega tobwebwe'adi 'i'abihetedi , ma hesi togidega togala , taudi Yehoba 'ana tologwahatao ? Taudi beno 'adi 'abihetena mwau hedada . ”
60004019	Coinega 'eguma 'omi Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu 'oinega muya walobalobadi , yawasimi watagwaledi tauna 'oina , ma 'ane 'i'itayahigomi , weyahina tauna 'ada Topaihowa bwebwe'ana moisa , ma 'omi wete gidemusa wamumuga bwebwe'ana .
60005001	Tohekalesiyao 'adi babadao 'omi , 'abehega yagihenuwa yahigomi 'imi paihowa weyahina . Weyahina taugu 'aigeda wete tohekalesiyao 'idi bada , eema taugu mataguwega Keliso 'ina muya ya'iteya , ma 'abwa 'ina wasawasa 'asi'asilalana 'oina yamiyamiya to tuta 'eguma 'ina wasawasaina 'igihe hapwese .
60005002	Coinega wete yahenuwa lagugomi 'abehega 'imi bodaowedi wa'itayahidi , taudi beno Yehoba 'ina tomotaiyao . Ma wa'itayahidi 'imi 'atetagwalega tuwa gidemusa Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu , ma geya'abwa ma'imi logwahata . Ma 'imi paihowa wapaihowadi , geya 'ami maisa madouna weyahina , ma hesi 'ate tagwalega wapaihowa .
60005003	Ma geya'abwa watoho ma wahetoloina 'oidiya , ma hesi mumuga bwebwe'ana wahe'itae 'oidiya , ma simuliyegomi .
60005004	Ma 'oinega tutaina To'itayahina madouna 'ilatuma , tauna 'oinega 'ami maisa bwebwe'ana ma miyamiya hatayana waloba .
60005005	Coinega wete 'omi tubu hanehaneyao sowasowana babadao wahe'asisiyanedi , ma mabwaiyami wanuwadobi ma 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oimiya wahelemalema hilegomi . Gidemusa tuwa Buki He'asisi 'ina gwae gide , 'igwaeya , “ Yehoba tonuwahane 'i'ausidi , ma hesi tonuwadobi 'ihelauwedi . ”
60005006	Coinega wanuwadobi ma watagwalegomi Yehoba Tohewaiwai moisa nimana , ma 'oinega muliyetega tauna 'ina tuta bwebwe'ana 'oina 'igihanehegomi .
60005007	Ceguma wanuwagala , beno 'ami mwauyao mabwaiyadi Yehoba 'oina wa'ebwae ma 'i'ewayahuledi , weyahina Yehobaina 'i'atemuyamuyaegomiya .
60005008	Coinega walomata yahigomi bwaibwaini 'ami 'aleha Tomudulele 'oinega . Weyahina Tomudulele tauna gidemusa totopwatula , tuta mabwaiyana 'isakosakowasi ma 'i'ebe'ebesa 'abehega 'ana tai 'iloba , ma 'i'ai .
60005009	Ma geya'abwa wamatamatauta , ma hesi 'imi hemisa 'oina watoholo pa'ala , weyahina wasanapuya 'abehega 'iyadao taudi Yesu 'ana tohemisao mwauwedi silobalobadi tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiya .
60005010	Yehoba tauna 'atemuyamuya huhuna ma 'ibwau pwaigita ma 'abehega 'ina wasawasa miyamiya hatayana 'oina tamiyamiya Keliso mahetedai . Ma 'imi muya tuta 'i'iunamo ma sigumwala , ma muliyetega Yehoba 'igihe 'ehaugomi ma 'igihepa'aligomi ma 'igihe waiwaiyegomi ma 'abehega wamiya bwebwe'ana .
60005011	Weyahina tauna Tohewaiwai miyamiya hatayana . Emeni .
60005012	Cimi leta 'i'iuna bewa Sailasa 'ilemegauwa eeta yaleleya weyahimi . Tauna Sailasaina tahesaniyeya 'abehega tauna 'aigeda tasidai ma'ina hemisa . Coinega 'imi leta bewa 'oina nuwanuwagu ma Yehoba 'ina helau moisa yahepwaile 'oimiya , ma 'oina watoholo pa'ala .
60005013	Ma wete tohekalesiyao tupwa bewa Babiloni 'oina 'idi helau 'oimiya . Taudi Yehoba 'ihesinuwediya gidemusa tuwa 'omi 'ihesinuwegomiya , 'idi gwae helau 'oimiya . Ma wete natugu Maki 'ina gwae helau 'oimiya .
60005014	Coinega wahelau hilegomi 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oina , ma wa'atusapwali hilegomi helau moisega . Ma 'omi Keliso 'ina tomotaiyao wamiya yaliyaya . Taugu Pita .
61001001	Taugu Saimoni Pita ta Yesu Keliso 'ina topaihowa 'aigeda , nuwana 'ana tohepwaila , 'imi leta yaleleyawa . Comi ma taugu 'ida hemisa mahemahetena , ma weyahina tayaliyaya . Hemisaina talobeya 'ida Yehoba ma 'ada To'abihetena Yesu Keliso 'idi loina bwebwe'ana 'oinega .
61001002	Yehobaina ma 'ida Badaina Yesu 'adi sanapu 'oinega , helau moisa ma yaliyaya 'oimiya sihasiwa .
61001003	Yehobaina 'ina waiwaiyega 'ilemegita , eema 'i'ebwaegita ginaulaedi baibaiwadi yawasida weyahina ta 'ida mumuga 'ehauna weyahina . Weyahina tauna tasanapuya 'abehega 'ihesinuwegita ma 'ane 'ina wasawasa ta 'ina mumuga bwebwe'ana 'i'ebwaegita .
61001004	Ma wete 'ina gwae hemisa bwebwe'adi ma waiwaidi 'oidiyega mumuga bale'u 'ana nuwa'ubunao galadi wahasinedi , eema Yehoba 'ina mumuga bwebwe'ana waloba .
61001005	Coinega watoho waiwai ma 'imi hemisa waloheposeyanedi bewa ginaulaedi 'oidiyega , nugeta mumuga bwebwe'ana , heluwena sanapu ,
61001006	hetoina 'alama'i'itana , 'ehatana toholopa'ala , nima 'aigeda mumuga 'ehauna ,
61001007	hesikisina 'ahwa'iya'iyana , ma 'ebelosaloha helau .
61001008	Ceguma ginaulaedi 'oimiya simadomadou moisa , 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ana sanapu 'oina wahewaiwai , ma geya'abwa 'imi paihowa simudamudali .
61001009	Ma 'eguma ginaulaedi geya 'oimiya simiyamiya , 'ana 'ita gide mata gibugibuimi , weyahina 'ami gihe'ehau 'imi puiyao mwalo 'oidiyega wanuwanaide pwaiya .
61001010	Coinega 'iyagwao , watoho waiwai ma geya'abwa Yehoba 'ana hesihesinuwao bodaedi 'oidiyega wamiyamiya latu . Ma 'eguma 'igu gwae bewa wahematamatanedi geya'abwa wabe'ube'u ,
61001011	ma 'oinega muliyetega ma'imi yaliyaya waluhu 'ida Bada ma 'ada To'abihetena Yesu Keliso 'ina 'ebeloina 'oina ma nobwa wamiya hataya .
61001012	Coinega nuwanuwagu ma yalohatotogomi ma nuwatuhu bewa wanuwatuhu yahidi , weyahina wasanapu pwaidiya eema sanapu moisa 'oimiya 'imiyamiya .
61001013	Ma tuta bewa mayawasiguwa yamiyamiya , 'ilobwainegauwa ma yahenuwa lagugomi ma 'omi wahetapewa mumuga bwebwe'ana weyahina .
61001014	Weyahina 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ihe'ita pwaigauwa 'abehega 'i'iuna ma ya'ebesinegomi ,
61001015	'oinega yatohotoho waiwai ma 'abehega 'abwa 'igu 'waiha mulina he'itaedi geya'abwa wanuwanuwa sinedi .
61001016	Mwalo 'ida Bada Yesu Keliso 'ina waiwai ma 'ina tauyama 'ahepwailediya 'oimiya , ma 'ima hepwailaina geya tosonosonogao 'idi 'ote'otetelao 'oidiyega , ma hesi matamega tauna 'ina wasawasa 'a'iteya .
61001017	Ma tutaina mwalo mahetemai 'oyai 'amiyamiya Yehoba 'enana galewega 'ahesagoheya , 'igwaeya , “ Bewa Natugu moisa , tauna weyahina yayaliyaya madouna . ” Ma 'enanaina Tamana 'ina tupwa 'ehauna galewega 'itauyama eeta 'oyaina debana Yehoba hepwatu ta wasawasa 'asi'asilalaina Natuna 'i'ebwaeya .
61001018	
61001019	Ma palopitao mwalo 'idi gwae 'oidiyega Keliso sihepwaila nugeteya , ta tauma wete 'a'iteya , 'oinega 'omi 'ilobwainegomiya ma gwaeyedi wanuwatuhu yahidi , weyahina gwaeyedi gide wodam tupwa guguyou 'oina 'i'asi'asilala ma 'ana siga gona 'i'asale ma 'ubwana 'atemiya 'isaehane .
61001020	Ma ginaula bewa wanuwasabwaleni 'abehega palopitao 'idi gwae Buki He'asisi 'alona geya sawasawahina taboimo 'adi gibui tasanapu ,
61001021	weyahina palopitaowedi geya siboidimo 'idi nuwatuhuwega sigwaegwaenedi , ma hesi Yehoba 'oinega , ma Yaluyaluwa Tabuna palopitao 'ihenuwa lagudiya eeta gwaeyedi sigwaenediya .
61002001	Ma hesi mwalo hene tupwana palopita 'abo'abodi tomota gamwagamwanidiya silatuwa . Gidemusa 'abwa tohe'ita 'abo'abowao 'omi gamwagamwanimiya silatulatu , ma 'idi he'ita 'abo'abo 'oinega tomota sigihe galadi 'idi he'ita galana 'oinega . Badaina tauna 'ihegimwaneyegita bweyahinega , ma taudi siuhaleya , 'oinega maisa galana nata siloba .
61002002	Ma tomota baibaiwa hedade 'idi paihowa galana gidemusa pui 'ebe debamwadina sihe'au'aunaowedi , beno Yesu 'ina 'eda moisa 'ana 'ebe 'ahwa galagala .
61002003	Ma togalaedi tobwatobwa nuwadi 'i'eweya , 'oinega 'idi gwae hotohotowega 'abwa si'abowegomi ma 'imi tobwatobwa si'ewadi . Mwalo hene 'adi maisa Yehoba 'ilaguya eema 'iyamwayamwa namo , ma geya 'ida buiya .
61002004	Weyahina Yehoba aneloseyao galadi geya 'ida 'atemuyemuyaediya , ma hesi gaula guguyou 'oina 'iula suluhediya , eema simiyamiya 'ana siga bwa'omatana 'ana tuta .
61002005	Ma wete mwalo hene mebale'u mabwaiyadi geya 'ida 'atemuyamuyaediya , ma hesi yagewega togalaedi 'imutudiya . Ma Nowamo ma 'ina bodao site sebeni 'i'abihetediya , weyahina Nowa tauna mumuga bwebwe'ana 'ana tologuguya .
61002006	Ma wete 'asaedi galadi Sodoma ma Gomola 'igabudiya eeta sihegawala , ma 'oinega 'abehega mabwaiyada tada sanapu ma geya'abwa tamumuga galana gidemusa taudi .
61002007	Ma Lota taunamo 'asaedi 'oidiyega 'ina mumuga bwebwe'ana , 'oinega Yehoba 'i'abiheteya . Moisa Lotaina 'inuwagala togalaedi 'idi mumuga sogala weyahina .
61002008	Weyahina Lota togalaedi gamwagamwanidiya 'imiyamiya eeta 'idi mumuga galana 'i'ita'ita ma 'ihehesagohe eeta 'inuwagala madouna .
61002009	Coinega tasanapuya Yehoba sowasowana tobwebwe'adi 'ebe tohowao 'oidiyega 'i'abihetedi , ma togalaedi 'iloinaedi ee 'ana siga sabwelo bwa'omatana 'oina .
61002010	Moisa , 'eguma togalaedi Yehoba 'ina loina silogwahate , ma 'idi nuwa'ubunao bi'ibi'idi simulimuliyedi , beno 'adi maisa gala hedadena nata 'i'ebwaedi . Togalaedi wete gagasa huhudi , ma geya 'idi he'asisimo megalewa 'asi'asilalaidi 'oidiya , ma hesi si'ahwa'ahwa galaedi .
61002011	Ma aneloseyedi ma'idi waiwai madouna 'idi 'ebemiya Yehoba matana , ma geya 'ilobwainedi ma si'ahwa galagala tohe'ita 'abo'abowedi 'oidiya .
61002012	Moisa togalaedi gide hebai . Hebai 'adi lotohonamo simulimuliyedi , ma geya sida nuwanuwa bwebwe'ana , 'oinega tomota hebaiyedi si'abiyahidi ma sihunudi . Togalaedi wete sanapu moisa geya sisanapu ma hesi si'ahwa galae , 'oinega taudi wete sihesilae , hebai gidemusa ,
61002013	ma 'adi maisa 'idi pui weyahina 'igala moisa . Nuwanuwadi sabwelo 'aigeda 'aigeda siyaliyaya besobeso . Ma 'eguma mahetemiyao wa'ai , 'idi mumuga galana 'oidiyega 'ami 'e'ahaina sigihebaili .
61002014	Ma 'idi pui 'ebedeba mwadina 'oinega sihemata ganawala , ma 'idi pui hilahila weyahina geya tani'odi 'ida towa . Ma towe'a sihanuhanugetedi 'eda galana 'oina , ma tobwatobwa 'ana nuwa'ewa 'oidiya 'imadou hedada . Ma Yehoba 'abwa 'ihemaisa 'idi mumuga galana weyahina .
61002015	Ceda dumwadumwaluna si'ebesine pwaiya eeta sitauya puiya , 'oinega Bioli natuna sanina Balami 'ina mumuga galana mwalo hene taudi bewa tuwa simuliyeya , weyahina tauna nuwanuwana ma 'ina paihowa galana 'oinega 'ida hewasawasa ,
61002016	ma hebai 'aigeda 'ase Balamiina 'ina mumuga galana 'igihe lolaguya , ma hebaiina tomota 'enadiyega 'igwaeya Balami 'oina eeta 'ina paihowa yauyauleina 'i'etobodeya .
61002017	Ma tohe'ita 'abo'abowedi 'idi mumuga gide bwasi gaula geya bwasidimo , ma taudi wete gidemusa yaloha , geya sida miya hohobiga , 'oinega Yehoba nata 'ilagu dobihedi gaula guguyou 'oina ma nobwa simiya hataya .
61002018	Tohe'itaowedi 'idi mumuga galadi ma'idi gwae gagasa sihe'ote'oteli , ma wete nuwa'ubuna galadi 'oidiyega tonuwabui hauhau silisidi ma sihila 'idi mumuga nugenugetana 'oina .
61002019	Cadi tomuliyao 'oidiya sigwae , “ Ceda bewa 'oina wanaoma , 'eda bwebwe'ana , ma geya 'eta wete 'etoboda 'imiyamiya . ” Ma geya , taudi 'idi mumuga galana 'oinega siboimo sipai hilediya .
61002020	Taudi mwalo 'idi Bada ma 'adi To'abihetena Yesu Keliso 'ote'otetelina sihemisaeya eeta mumuga bale'u si'ebesineya , ma 'eguma silohihila mumuga miyamiyaidi 'oidiya nata sibe'u , ma 'oinega taudi sigala moisa .
61002021	Taudi geya sisanapu mumuga bwebwe'ana 'ana 'eda , ma hesi he'ita 'abo'abodi simulimuliyedi , ee nata galana siloba . Ma hesi taudi mumuga bwebwe'anaina ma Yehoba 'ina loina 'ehauna 'ana tomuliyao , 'eguma si'ebesine sigala moisa .
61002022	Ta 'idi mumugaina gidemusa tuwa gwae hegehegedi 'aigeda 'igwaeya , “ Cedewa tauna maiwaina 'i'ai hila . ” Ma wete , “ Bawe 'wapina tadeuli tagihe 'ehau ma muliyetega 'ihila ma 'i'edobadoba'a hila . ”
61003001	Ciyagwao , bewa 'igu leta heluwena 'oimiya , ma 'igu letaedi 'eluwa 'oidiyega yatohotoho ma yahenuwa laguwegomi ma wanuwatuhu bwaibwaini ,
61003002	ma Yehoba 'ina palopitao 'idi gwae nugenugetadi wanuwatuhu yahidi , ma wete 'ida Bada beno 'ada To'abihetena , 'ina loina 'ana tohepwailao loinaedi si'ebwaegomiya wete wanuwatuhu yahidi .
61003003	Ma nuwatuhu 'aigeda sowasowana wada sanapu nugeta 'abehega tuta 'ana 'ebe losaloha 'oina tupwadi tolotuyeya silatu , ma Bada 'ina 'eda weyahina sigwaegwae besobeso , ma taudi 'idi nuwatuhu galadi simuliyedi ,
61003004	ma sigwae , “ To sauga 'imi badaina 'ihilama ? Geya'abwa , bo ? Mwalohene bale'u 'ana paihowa hauhauna 'oinega 'ana siga nige geya 'eta wete ginaula 'ida buiya . Mwalo tubudao 'ama'amasidi 'idi saugega 'ilagama , ginaula mabwaiyana 'adi 'itaedi tuwa . Geya sida buiya . ”
61003005	Taudi genuwadi sinuwatuhuyahi 'abehega mwalo hene Yehoba 'ina gwaeyega galewa 'ilatuwa , ma bwasi 'alonega bale'u 'ipaihoweya bwasiyega ,
61003006	eeta muliyetega bwasiyega bale'u mabwaiyana 'igihegaleya .
61003007	Ma Yehoba 'ina gwaeyega galewa ma bale'u siyamwayamwa ma loina 'ana sabwelo 'oina nata 'igabu yahuledi ma togala 'ilohesawalidi .
61003008	Ciyagwao , 'aigeda wete ginaula wanuwatuhuyahi , 'abehega bolime tausani gide sabwelo 'aigeda 'ida Badaina 'oina , ma wete bolime tausani tauna 'oina gide sabwelo 'aigeda mahemahetena .
61003009	Tupwana tomota 'idi nuwatuhu 'abehega Yehoba geya'abwa 'ipaipaihowadi ginaulaedi mwalo 'igwae hemisaedi . Ma 'omi geya'abwa wanuwanuwatuhu 'eguma Yehoba 'ina paihowa 'oina gide 'iheheboi , ma hesi tauna ma'ina 'alama'i'ita 'iyamweyamwegomi ma mabwaiyami wanuwabui , ma genuwana 'aigeda taiya 'ihehe'waihi mahemahetena .
61003010	Ma Bada 'ina bwa'omatana 'ana sabwelo 'abwama 'ina tauyama gide toyagaha ma 'ilohesalutuigitamo , ma galewa sisawala ma'ina 'alapwasi madouna , ma ginaula mabwaiyadi galewa 'aiwe 'ala'alasina 'oinega 'i'ala hesawalidi , ma wete bale'u ta ginaula mabwaiyadi 'oina 'i'ala hesawalidi .
61003011	Ceguma ginaulaedi mabwaiyana 'abwa sisawala , 'ilobwaineya ma'imi mumuga 'ehauna ma ma'imi he'asisi Yehoba 'oina wapaihowa .
61003012	Ma wayamwayamwa ma'imi nuwatuhuyahina Badaina 'ina sabwelo hilama weyahina , ma tutaina 'oina Yehoba galewa nugenugetaina ta bale'u nugenugetaina 'ilohesawalidi 'aiwe 'ala'alasina 'oinega ,
61003013	ma tauda tayamwayamwa ma galewa ta bale'u hauhaudi ta'itadi , gidemusa Yehoba mwalo 'igwae hemisa pwaiya , ta tupwainaina 'oina mumuga bwebwe'anamo 'imiyamiya .
61003014	Ciyagwao , 'imi yamwana 'ana tuta watoho waiwai eeta 'eguma 'itauyama 'ilobwainegomiya ma 'imi mumuga bwebwe'ana mabwaiyana , ma nuwadaumwalega wamiyamiya .
61003015	Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'ida Bada 'ina he'alama'i'ita huhuna 'abehega nuwanuwana ma 'ada 'abihetena taloba . Paulo 'iyadaina moisa , ma nuwatuhu bewa weyahina Pauloina 'oimiya 'ilele pwaiya ma'ina sanapu Yehoba 'oinega 'ilobeya .
61003016	Eeta nuwatuhuina weyahina 'ihepwaila 'ina lele nugenugetadi mabwaiyadi 'oidiya . Ma tupwana nuwatuhuwao 'ina letao 'alodiya 'adi sanapu mwauna , 'oinega tohenainaidao ma towe'ao nuwatuhuwedi sigibuidiya , ta Buki He'asisi 'ina leleyao wete sigibuidiya ma si'abo , 'oinega siboidimo sigihe galediya .
61003017	Ciyagwao , nuwatuhuwedi 'omi wasanapu pwaidiya , 'oinega wa'itayahigomi watoholo pa'ala ma geya'abwa togala si'abowegomi , 'amuge ta sihanugeta puigomi ma wabe'u .
61003018	Ma hesi 'ida Bada , tauna 'ada To'abihetena Yesu Keliso , 'ana sanapu ma 'ina helau 'oimiya 'imadomadou , ma tauna tahepwatu sauga bewa ta sauga baibaiwana sinaonaoma 'oidiya . Emeni . Taugu Saimoni Pita .
62001001	Mwalo gwaeina yawasida weyahina Tamana ba'idana simiyamiya , 'oinega tauma wete tenamega 'ahesagoheya , ma wete nimamega loheyaina 'a'abitohoya , weyahina 'ihapwesa pwaima ta matamega 'a'iteya , ma tauna weyahina 'ahehepwaila 'oimiya , beno tauna yawasida miyamiya hatayaina huhuna , ma mwalo tauna tamana ba'idana simiyamiya ma 'oima 'ihapwesama .
62001002	
62001003	Tauna 'a'iteya ma 'ahesagoheya ma 'oimiya 'ahepwaila , 'oinega 'omi mahetemao tahe'iya'iyagu mahemahetena , ta wete Tamada ma Natuna Yesu Keliso mahetedao ta'ahwa 'iya'iyagu mahemahetena .
62001004	Coinega 'imi leta bewa 'aleleyawa , 'itauyawa ma 'ane wahasili , ma tayaliyaya moisa , 'omi ma tauma .
62001005	Coinega wasa bewa sihegwaemaiya , ta 'ahepwaileya 'oimiya 'abehega Yehoba 'asilala huhuna , ma geya 'eta guguyou Yehoba 'oina 'imiyamiya .
62001006	Coinega 'eguma tupwa guguyou 'oina tamiyamiya , geya'abwa ta'e'abo'abo ma tagwae 'abehega , “ Yehoba mahetedai ta'ahwa 'iya'iyagu . ” Beno geya mumuga bwebwe'ana moisa .
62001007	Ma hesi 'eguma tupwa 'asilala 'oina tamiyamiya , gidemusa Yehoba 'ina tupwa 'asilala 'oina 'imiyamiya , beno ta'ahwa 'iya'iyagu moisa , weyahina Natuna Yesu bweyahinega 'igihe'ehaugita 'ida puiyao mabwaiyadi 'oidiyega .
62001008	Moisa , mabwaiyada topui tuwa , ma geya'abwa ta'e'abo'abowegita , ma tagwae “ Taugu bwebwe'agu , ma geya 'igu puimo . ”
62001009	Ma hesi 'eguma tahepwaila moisa ma tagwae “ Yapui pwaiya . ” beno Yehoba 'ida pui 'inuwasamudi ma 'igihe 'ehau hilegita , weyahina Yehoba mumugana dumwaluna ma ma'ana hemisa .
62001010	Ceguma tagwae , “ Geya wete 'aigeda tuta yapui , ” beno Yehoba ta'abo'abowe , weyahina 'ina gwae geya tahemihemisae .
62002001	Cae natugwao , 'imi leta bewa yaleleyawa ma 'oinega geya sowana pui wapaipaihowa . Ma 'eguma tapui , Yesu Keliso tauna todumwadumwalu 'i'ahwanoi weyahida , Tamada 'oina ,
62002002	ma 'ida puiyao 'inuwasamudi , weyahina Yesu tauna wahina 'ipwaoliyeya 'ida puiyao weyahidi , ma wete mebale'u mabwaiyadi weyahidi .
62002003	Yehobaina tasanapuya 'abehega 'iyadai moisa , 'eguma 'ina loinao tahematamatanedi .
62002004	Ta 'eguma taiya 'igwaegwae ma 'igwae , “ Taugu Yehoba 'iyagu . ” ma Yehoba 'ina loinao geya 'ihematamatanedi , beno 'i'abowa weyahina 'eda dumwaluna 'i'ebesineya .
62002005	Ma 'eguma Yehoba 'ina gwae tamulimuliye 'ina helau 'oinega 'ilohemahegita ma tasanasanapu 'abehega 'iyadaina mahetedai tamiyamiya .
62002006	Eeta 'eguma taiya 'owa 'ugwae , “ Taugu Yehoba 'iyagu ma mahetegu 'amiyamiya , ” 'ilobwainegowa ma 'umumuga gidemusa Yesu 'ina mumuga .
62002007	Ciyagwao , geya'abwa loina hauhauna yaleleleleyawa , ma hesi loina miyamiyanaina wahesagoha nugeteya , ta wasanapu pwaiya , bewa yalolohileyawa .
62002008	Ma hesi loina bewa yalele hileya gide loina hauhauna helau weyahina , weyahina helauina Keliso 'ana lobwaina , ma 'omi 'ami lobwaina wete . Beno 'oinega guguyou 'igumwagumwala , ta 'asilala moisa 'isaehane pwaima .
62002009	Ceguma taiya tasina 'ilo'alehe ma 'igwaegwae 'abehega tauna 'asilala 'oina 'imiyamiya , beno 'i'abo'abo , weyahina tauna 'abwa tuwa guguyou 'oina 'imiyamiya .
62002010	Ma wete 'eguma taiya 'owa 'iyamwao 'uhehelauwedi , 'owa 'asilala 'oina 'umiyamiya , 'oinega geya'abwa 'ube'ube'u .
62002011	Ma hesi 'eguma tasiu 'ulo'alehe , lamuna bewa weyahina 'owa 'abwa guguyou 'ina tupwa 'oina 'umiyamiya , ma wete guguyou 'oina 'utautauya , ma 'eda geya'abwa 'u'ita'ita , weyahina matau guguyou 'iumabodeya .
62002012	Gwagwama yo , gwae bewa yaleleyawa weyahina 'imi puiyao Yehoba 'inuwasamudiya , Yesu saninega .
62002013	Babadao yo , gwae bewa yaleleyawa weyahina 'omi tauna mwalohene ta bewa tuwa 'imiyamiya wasanapu pwaiya . Hewahewaliyao yo , gwae bewa yaleleyawa , weyahina tauna topuiina wahewaiwai sineya .
62002014	Ma 'omi gwagwama madoumi , gwae bewa yaleleyawa weyahina Tamada wasanapu pwaiya . Babadao yo , gwae bewa yaleleyawa weyahina 'omi tauna mwalohene ta bewa tuwa 'imiyamiya wasanapu pwaiya . Hewahewaliyao yo , gwae bewa yaleleyawa , weyahina 'omi tohewaiwai ta Yehoba 'ina gwae 'imiyamiya 'oimiya , 'oinega tauna topuiina wahewaiwai sineya .
62002015	Ciyagwao , geya'abwa bale'u bewa nuwami 'i'ewa'ewa , weyahina 'eguma bale'u tobwatobwanao nuwami 'i'ewa , bewa 'oinega Tamadai wanuwanaide , ma geya wada helauweya .
62002016	Moisa , bale'u ginaulinao mabwaiyana , beno nuwa'ubuna ma tobwatobwa 'ana hamwa ma nuwahane , ginaulaedi bewa geya Tamadai 'oinega sitauyama , ma hesi bale'u 'oinega .
62002017	Ma bale'u bewa 'i'iunamo 'isawala , ma nuwatuhu bale'u tobwatobwanao weyahidi 'ilolagu , ma taudi hesi 'eguma Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu sipaipaihowa simiya hataya .
62002018	Natugwao , tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'itauya pwaima , ma mwalo wahesagoheya 'abehega Keliso 'ana 'alehaina 'i'iuna 'ihapwesama , sowasowana wanuwatuhuyahi Keliso 'ana 'alehao baibaiwadi bale'uwa simiyamiya , 'oinega tasanapuya tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha bewa ,
62002019	ma Keliso 'ana 'alehaowedi 'adi 'ita gide Keliso 'ana tohemisao , ma geya . Weyahina taudi 'eguma 'ida boda moisa , 'abwa mahetedao tamiyamiya . Ma hesi geya ! Tuwa si'ebesine pwaigita .
62002020	Ma 'omi taudi geya gidemusa , weyahina Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'igihesanapu pwaigomiya , ma 'oinega sanapu baibaiwana wasanapuya ,
62002021	ma geya 'abehega ma'imi henainaida 'imi leta bewa wahasihasili , weyahina he'ita dumwadumwaluna wasanapu pwaiya , ma wete wasanapuya 'abehega geya 'eta wete 'abo 'oinega 'ihapwesa .
62002022	Ma taudi to'abowedi Yesu simwehihiyeya , ma sigwae , “ Yesu tauna geya To'abihetena . ” Ceguma taiyawedi sigwaegwae gidemusa , taudi Keliso 'ana 'alehao , weyahina Keliso ma Tamana silogwahatediya .
62002023	Ceguma taiya 'owa Yehoba Natuna 'ulogwahateya geya Yehoba maheteu wamiyamiya . Ma hesi 'eguma 'utagwalego Natuna 'oina , tauna ma Tamana mahetemwao wamiyamiya .
62002024	Comi mwalo wasadi wahesagoheya , 'oinega 'eguma wasaina 'oimiya 'imiyamiya beno tauna ma Tamana mahetemiyao wamiyamiya .
62002025	Ma yawasidaina 'igwae hemiseya 'ida 'ebwaegomi , beno yawasida miyamiya hatayaina .
62002026	Bewa mabwaiyana yalele pwaiyawa ma 'abehega wasanapu taudi 'ami to'abowao weyahidi .
62002027	Ma sanapuina wasanapu pwaiya , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'i'ebwae pwaigomiya , ta mahetemiu wamiyamiya , ma 'ihe'itegomi . Coinega geya 'aigeda wete loheya sawasawahina ma 'ihe'itegomi , ma hesi Yehoba 'ina 'ebwaya 'oinega sanapu baibaiwana wasanapuya , beno sanapu moisa , weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana geya 'i'abowegita . Coinega 'ina he'itao wamuliyedi , ma Keliso mahetemiu wamiyamiya , ma geya'abwa wa'ebe'ebesine .
62002028	Coinega natugwao , sowasowana ma Keliso 'oina wamiya hataya , 'oinega 'eguma tutaina 'ihapwesama , geya'abwa ma'imi matauta , nuwana ma'imi deba mwadina , ma hesi 'ina tauyama weyahina wayaliyaya .
62002029	Tauna mumugana wasanapuya mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana , eeta wasanapuya 'abehega tomota tobwebwe'ana , taudi wete Yehoba 'oinega sili'uma .
62003001	Tauda 'eguma Yehoba 'oinega tali'u , tauna 'ida 'ahwa natunegita . Bewa 'ina helau madou hedadena weyahida . Ma hesi mebale'u Yehoba geya sisanapu , 'oinega mebale'uwedi geya'abwa si'ina'inanegita , 'abehega tauda Yehoba natunao .
62003002	Ciyagwao , bewa tuwa Yehoba 'i'ahwa natunegita ma muliyega to'aha 'ihapwesa 'oida ? Beno tuwa tasanapu 'abehega 'ina hilama 'oina 'abwa 'ana 'ita tauna ta'ita , ma tauda 'ada 'ita 'ilagu buidi ma tauna gidemusa .
62003003	Cida hemisa nuwatuhu bewa weyahina , 'oinega mumugada tagihe'ehaudi , gidemusa Keliso .
62003004	Ma hesi topui mabwaiyadi Yehoba 'ina loina siligeligehi , beno mumuga galana .
62003005	Ma wete tasanapuya , 'abehega Kelisoina 'itauyama 'ida mumuga galaedi sabi 'ewayahuledi , ma tauna geya 'eta wete 'ina puimo .
62003006	Eeta 'eguma tauda Keliso mahetenao tamiyamiya geya'abwa tapuipui , ma hesi taudi topuiyedi geya Keliso sida 'iteya , ma geya wete sida sanapuya .
62003007	Natugwao , geya'abwa he'ita 'abo'abodi wamulimuliye , ma hesi nuwami 'ida sabwalena , 'abehega 'eguma taiyawedi taudi 'idi mumuga 'ausalana , taudi beno tobwebwe'ana , gidemusa Keliso .
62003008	Ta topui beno taudi Tomudulele 'ina bodao , weyahina tuta mwalo 'oinega ta nige , Tomudulele tauna topui . Coinega Yehoba Natuna 'ihenatuneya bale'uwa , 'itauyama Tomudulele 'ina paihowao sabi 'ahusepaledi .
62003009	Coinega wete 'eguma Yehoba 'oinega tali'uma gesowana tapui , weyahina mumuga hauhauna 'ateda 'ilagu pwaiya , 'oinega tauda Yehoba natunao geya sawasawahina ma pui wete tapaihowa .
62003010	Coinega taudi ta'inanadi 'abehega taiyawedi Yehoba natunao , ma taiyawedi Tomudulele natunao , weyahina taudi Tomudulele 'ina boda geya'abwa sipaipaihowa dumwalu , weyahina geya sili'u Yehoba 'oinega , ma wete geya'abwa sihelau matasidiyao .
62003011	Mwalo hemataluwa madouna bewa 'agwae nugeta pwaiya 'oimiya 'abehega 'iyadao mabwaiyadi tahelauwedi .
62003012	Ma geya'abwa Keni gidemusa , weyahina Keniina Tomudulele 'ina boda , ta tasina 'ihunuya . Ma 'ina lohe'amasaina huhuna tuwa he'ipi'ipi , weyahina tasina 'ina paihowa bwebwe'ana ma Keniina 'ina paihowa galana .
62003013	Tasigwao , geya'abwa wahehenainaida 'eguma mebale'u silo'alehegita .
62003014	Ma tasanapuya 'abehega 'amasa 'ina tupwa ta'ebesine pwaiya , weyahina 'atedega 'iyadao tahelauwedi , ta yawasida miyamiya hatayana taloba pwaiya , ma 'eguma taiyawedi taudi geya helau 'atediyega , taudi tuwa 'abwa 'amasa 'ina tupwa 'oina simiyamiya .
62003015	Moisa , 'eguma taiya tasina 'ilo'alehe , tauna tolohe'amasa tuwa , ma wasanapuya 'abehega geya'abwa taudi tolohe'amasaedi yawasidi miyamiya hatayana silobaloba .
62003016	Ma wete helau tasanapuya , beno 'abehega Keliso yawasina 'itagwaleya ta weyahida 'i'amasa , 'oinega 'ilobwainegita wete ma yawasida tatagwale tasidao weyahidi .
62003017	Ma hesi 'eguma taiya towasawasa 'imiyamiya , ma 'iyana 'aigeda 'imiya mwau , ma 'eguma geya 'aigeda lema 'i'ebwae , togidega Yehoba 'ina helau 'atena ? Geya .
62003018	Natugwao , geya'abwa 'ida helau gwaenamo 'oinega , ma hesi 'ida paihowega ma tada helau moisa .
62003019	Ceguma 'ida paihowega tahelau , bewa 'oina tasanapuya 'abehega he'ita moisa 'oina tamiyamiya , ma geya sowana tamatauta Yehoba matana .
62003020	Ma 'eguma ma'ida matauta 'abehega tauda galada , beno Yehoba matautaedi 'igibodi , weyahina paihowa baibaiwana sawasawahina , ma wete sanapu mabwaiyana 'isanapuya .
62003021	Ciyagwao , 'eguma geya 'ida 'ebe matautamo , sawasawahina ma ta'atepatu Yehoba matana ,
62003022	ma 'eguma to'aha ta'ahwanoiye 'oina 'i'ebwaegita weyahina tauna 'ina loinao tahematamatanediya , ma 'ida paihowao weyahidi 'iyaliyaya .
62003023	Ma 'ina loina 'eluwaedi 'abehega Natuna Yesu Keliso tahemise , ma 'iyadao tahelauwedi , gidemusa Kelisoina 'ada loina 'i'ebwaegita .
62003024	Ta 'eguma 'ina loinao tamulimuliyedi , tauda 'oina tamiyamiya , ma tauna 'oida 'imiyamiya . Ma togidega 'ina miya 'oida tasanapu 'ese ? Weyahina yaluyaluwana 'i'ebwaegita , ta 'oida 'imiyamiya .
62004001	Ciyagwao , sahena yaluyaluwa mabwaiyadi wahemihemisaedi , ma hesi watohodi , bwebwe'adi bo nuwana galadi . Ceguma taudi bwebwe'adi tasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba 'oinega sitauyama , ma taudi galadi hali tupwega sitauyama , weyahina bewa tuta palopita 'abo'abowao sihapwehapwesa mayaluyaluwadi geya Yehoba 'oinega .
62004002	Ma hesi Yehoba Yaluyaluwana wada sanapu weyahina 'eguma Yesu Keliso ta'ahwa moisae 'abehega 'iheloheya bale'uwa , 'ida gwaeyedi beno Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'oinega .
62004003	Ma hesi yaluyaluwaedi 'eguma Yesu simwehihiye , taudi geya Yehoba 'oinega , ma hesi Keliso 'ana 'aleha yaluyaluwana 'oinega , ma Yesu 'ana 'alehaina mwalo wahesagoheya 'abehega 'itauyama . Ta moisa , bewa tuwa bale'uwa 'imiyamiya .
62004004	Natugwao , 'omi Yehoba 'oinega wali'uma , 'oinega hali yaluyaluwaedi wahewaiwai sinediya , weyahina Yaluyaluwaina 'oida 'imiyamiya Tohewaiwai moisa , ma hesi yaluyaluwaina mebale'u 'oidiya 'imiyamiya , 'ina waiwai geya madouna .
62004005	Ma taudi mebale'u , ta mumuga bale'u weyahina sihehegwaegwae , 'oinega mebale'u baibaiwadi 'enadi sihesagoheya .
62004006	Ma tauda hesi Yehoba 'oinega tali'uma , 'oinega 'eguma taiyawedi Yehoba 'ana tosanapuwao , 'enada sihesagoheya , ma taudi geya Yehoba 'ana tosanapuwao , 'enada geya'abwa sihehesagohe . Coinega tasanapu 'abehega yaluyaluwa 'abo'abo 'oidiya 'imiyamiya , weyahina 'eguma Yaluyaluwa moisa 'oidiya beno 'enada sihesagohe .
62004007	Ciyagwao , sowasowana mabwaiyada tahelau hilegita , weyahina Yehoba helau huhuna , 'oinega tohelauwao taudi Yehoba 'ihenatunediya , ma taudi Yehoba 'ana tosanapuwao .
62004008	Ma hesi taudi geya tohelau , taudi geya Yehoba 'ana tosanapuwao , weyahina Yehoba helau huhuna ,
62004009	ta 'ina helau 'igihe hapweseya 'oida Natuna 'oinega , weyahina Natunaina 'iboimo 'ihetuneyama , ta bale'uwa 'itauyama , ma 'abehega yawasida moisa 'i'ebwaegita .
62004010	Bewa helau moisa , geya 'abehega tauda Yehoba 'ana tohelauwao , Yehoba hesi 'ada tohelau , ta Natuna 'itagwaleya ma 'iboi 'ipwaoliyeya tauna , 'ida puiyao weyahidi .
62004011	Bewa 'oinega Yehoba 'ina helau 'imadou hedadeya . Ciyagwao , 'ilobwainegita ma tauda wete tada helau hilegita .
62004012	Geya 'eta tuta mebale'u Yehoba sida 'iteya , ma tauda hesi 'eguma tahelau hilegita beno Yehoba mahetedai , ma 'ina helau moisa 'ateda 'imiyamiya .
62004013	Ta wete tasanapuya 'abehega tauda 'oina ma tauna 'oida , weyahina yaluyaluwana 'i'ebwae pwaigita .
62004014	Ma tauma matamega Yehoba Natuna 'a'iteya , ta weyahina 'ahehepwaila 'abehega Tamana 'ihetuneyama bale'uwa 'abehega 'ada To'abihetena .
62004015	Ceguma taiya 'owa 'u'ahwa moisa 'abehega Yesu tauna Yehoba Natuna , Yehoba 'oiuwa 'imiyamiya ma 'owa tauna 'oina 'umiyamiya .
62004016	Coinega Yehoba 'ina helau 'oida tasanapu pwaiya , ta ta'ahwa moisaeya . Yehoba helau huhuna , 'oinega 'eguma taiya helau 'ina tupwa 'oina 'imiyamiya , tauna Yehoba 'oina 'imiyamiya ma Yehoba wete tauna 'oina 'imiyamiya .
62004017	Bewa 'oinega tahelau hilegita moisa , ma bwa'omatana 'ana sabwelo 'oina geya'abwa tamatamatauta , ma hesi tada 'atepatu , weyahina tuta bewa bale'uwa tamiyamiya tauda Keliso gidemusa .
62004018	Eeta 'ida helauina 'oinega geya'abwa tamatamatauta , weyahina helau moisa matauta 'i'ewayahuleya . Ma hesi loina 'oina tamatauta , 'eguma helau moisa geya 'oida .
62004019	Ta 'ida helauina huhuna bewa , weyahina Yehoba 'ihelau nugetegita .
62004020	Ceguma taiya 'igwae , “ Yehoba yahelauweya , ” ma 'eguma loheyaina tasina 'ilo'alehe , tauna to'abo , weyahina tasidai ta'ita'ita , ma 'eguma tasidai geya tahelauwe , geya sawasawahida ma Yehoba tahelauwe , tauna geya tada 'iteya .
62004021	Ma 'ada loina Yehoba 'oinega 'abehega tauna tahelauwe , ta wete tasidao tahelauwedi .
62005001	Ceguma mabwaiyada Yesu tahemise 'abehega tauna To'abihetena , tauda Yehoba natunao . Ma wete 'eguma Tamana tahehelauwe , natuna gidemusa tahelauwe .
62005002	Ceguma Yehoba tahelauwe , ma 'eguma 'ina loinao tahematamatanedi , beno tasanapu 'abehega Yehoba natunao wete tahelauwedi .
62005003	Weyahina Yehoba 'ana helau ma 'ina loina 'ana hematamatana mahemahetena , ma 'ina loinaedi geya mwaudi , ma hesi meyameyahadi .
62005004	Coinega 'eguma Yehoba 'ihenatunegita mumuga bale'u tahewaiwaisine , ma 'ida 'ebe hewaiwaiina sanina hemisa .
62005005	Weyahina 'eguma Yesu Keliso tahemisae 'abehega Yehoba Natuna , bewa 'oinega mumuga bale'u tahewaiwai sinedi .
62005006	Natunaina 'ina tauyama 'oida beno bwasiyega ma wete bweyahega , tauna Yesu Keliso , geya bwasimo 'oinega , ma hesi bwasi ma bweyaha wete 'oidiyega . Bewa weyahina Yehoba Yaluyaluwana 'ihepwaila moisa , weyahina Yaluyaluwana mumugana dumwadumwaluna .
62005007	Weyahina Yesu 'ana tohepwailao 'etoi simiyamiya ,
62005008	beno Yaluyaluwa ma bwasi ma bweyaha , ta 'idi he'ita mahemahetena .
62005009	Ceguma tomota 'idi hepwailao tahemisaedi , sawasawahina ma Yehobaina 'ina hepwaila tahemise , weyahina Yehoba tauna Tohewaiwai , ta Natuna weyahina 'ihepwaila pwaiya 'oida .
62005010	Ceguma tauna tahemisae 'ateda talotoho 'abehega tauna Yehoba Natuna , ma hesi 'eguma geya tahemihemisae , bewa 'oinega ta'ahwa 'abo'abowe , weyahina 'ina hepwaila Natuna weyahina geya tahemise .
62005011	Ma 'ina hepwailaina 'abehega Natuna 'oinega yawasida miyamiya hatayana 'i'ebwaegita .
62005012	Ceguma taiya Yehoba Natuna 'oina 'imiyamiya , loheyaina yawasina bwebwe'ana 'iloba pwaiya , ma 'eguma taiya geya Yehoba Natuna 'oina , tauna geya .
62005013	Cimi leta bewa yalele pwaiyawa ma 'ane wasanasanapu 'abehega 'eguma Yehoba Natuna saninega wahemihemisae , yawasimi miyamiya hatayana waloba ,
62005014	ma wete matana tayaliyaya weyahina 'ida 'ahwanoi 'ihesagohediya ma 'i'ebwaegita to'aha ma to'aha weyahidi ta'ahwa'ahwanoi , 'eguma tauna 'ina nuwatuhu wete gidemusa .
62005015	Moisa tuwa , 'ida 'ahwanoiyao mabwaiyadi 'ihesagohediya , 'oinega tasanapuya 'abehega 'ida 'ahwanoiyedi nata 'ihemaisedi .
62005016	Tupwana pui 'adi maisa 'amasa ma tupwadi geya , 'oinega 'eguma taiya 'owa tasiu 'u'iteya 'ipuiya , ma puiina 'i'iuna geya 'ana maisa 'amasa , 'oinega 'eguma topuiina weyahina 'u'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina , Yehoba 'ino 'ahwanoi nata 'ihesagohe , ma tasiu yawasina 'itagwale . Ma hesi puiyedi 'adi maisa 'amasa geya'abwa weyahidi wa'ahwa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina .
62005017	Pui mabwaiyadi galadi , ma tupwadi 'adi maisa geya 'amasa .
62005018	Ma hesi tasanapuya 'abehega 'eguma Yehoba 'ihenatunegita geya'abwa tapuipui , weyahina tauna Yehoba 'ihenatuna nugeteya 'i'ita'ita yahigita , ma geya'abwa topuiina 'i'abi'abi tohogita .
62005019	Ma wete tauda tasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba 'ihenatunegita , ma bale'u mumugaina 'ana topaihowao mabwaiyadi topuiina 'ina bodao .
62005020	Ma wete tasanapuya 'abehega Yehoba Natuna 'itauya pwaima , ta 'igihenuwa sabwalenigita ma Yehoba tasanapu 'abehega tauna Todumwalu , ta 'oina tamiyamiya , weyahina tauda Yehoba Natuna Yesu Keliso mahetenao . Yesuina Yehoba moisa , ma yawasida miyamiya hatayana huhuna tauna .
62005021	Natugwao , wa'ita yahigomi hali 'ebe hemisao 'oidiyega , ma wadena sinedi .
63001001	Taugu 'imi bada , ma 'owa wahine Yehoba 'ihesinuwegowa manatumwao 'imi leta bewa yaleleyawa . Moisa tuwa 'ateguwega yahelauwegomi . Taudi wete gide 'eda moisa 'ana tomuliyao sihelauwegomiya ,
63001002	weyahina sanapu moisa 'ateda 'imiyamiya ma 'oida 'imiyahataya .
63001003	Coinega Tamada Yehoba ma Natuna Yesu Keliso 'idi helau ma 'idi 'atemuyamuya 'oidiyega nata tamiya daumwala , ma'ida gwae moisa , eema wete ma'ida helau .
63001004	Mwalo natumwao tupwadi ya'itediya 'eda dumwadumwaluna simuliyeya , gide 'ada loina Tamada 'oinega , 'oinega yayaliyaya madouna .
63001005	Nuhugu yo , yahegwaego wete bewa geya 'abehega loina hauhauna ya'ebwaego , ma hesi loina miyamiyanaina wahesagohe nugeteya , 'abehega mabwaiyada tahelau hilegita .
63001006	Weyahina 'eguma tahelau hilegita , beno Yehoba 'ina loinao tamulimuliyedi , ma loinaina mwalo wahesagoheya 'abehega helau 'ana 'eda 'oinega tatauya .
63001007	Ma to'abowao baibaiwadi sihapwesa pwaiya bale'uwa ma siuhauhala sigwae , “ Yesu Keliso geya 'iheloheya . ” Ceguma taiya gide 'i'abo 'esa , tauna Keliso 'ana 'aleha .
63001008	Coinega to'abowedi 'oidiyega wa'itayahigomi , ma 'imi paihowa 'ana maisa geya'abwa wauleule , ma hesi mabwaiyana wa'ewa .
63001009	Ma 'eguma watauya pui ma Keliso 'ina he'ita wa'ebesine , 'omi Yehoba wa'ebe'ebesine , ma hesi 'eguma Keliso 'ina he'itao wa'abiyahi momosidi , Tamadai ma wete Natuna 'oimiya simiyamiya .
63001010	Ceguma taiya 'oimiya 'inaowa ma 'ina he'ita hagana , geya'abwa wabwaubwauwe 'imi hada , ma geya'abwa waloloyauwedowe ,
63001011	nata gide 'ina paihowa galana waleme .
63001012	Nuwatuhu baibaiwana simiyamiya eema nuwanuwagu weyahidi yaleleyawa , ma tuwa , weyahina yanuwatuhu yahiya 'abehega 'abwa yatauyawa 'omi mahetegwao tahegwaegwae , eema tayaliyaya moisa .
63001013	Tasiu tauna wete hesihesinuwana Yehoba 'oinega , tauna natunao 'idi helau 'oiuwa .
64001001	Taugu 'imi bada , leta bewa yaleleyawa 'owa 'iyagu Geyo 'oiuwa . Moisa , 'ateguwega yahelauwegowa .
64001002	Ciyagu , 'igu 'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina wahiu 'ina miya bwebwe'ana weyahina , yasanapuya weyahina yaluyaluwau 'ina miya bwebwe'ana , eema ma'ina yaliyaya .
64001003	Mwalo tupwadi tasidao sitauyama 'ebwa , ta 'ino mumuga dumwaluna tetelina 'oinega sigihe yaliyayaegauwa , weyahina 'eda dumwaluna 'oinega 'utautauya .
64001004	Bewa 'igu 'ebe yaliyaya madouna 'eguma natugwao wasadi yahesagohe 'abehega 'eda dumwadumwaluna 'oinega sitautauya .
64001005	Ciyagu , 'ino lema eema 'ino paihowa tasidao ma taumanao 'oidiya , tutaina 'eguma 'ino 'asa sihapwesawa , weyahina yayaliyaya .
64001006	Ma tasidaowedi 'eguma sihilama 'ino helau 'oidiya weyahina sihehepwaila tohekalesiyao 'oima . Moisa tuwa , taudi Yehoba 'ina topaihowao , 'oinega 'ilobwaineya 'eguma si'ebe'ebesinegomi nima'abiyadi wete wa'ebwaedi .
64001007	Taudi Keliso 'ina paihowa weyahina sisakosakowasi , ma lema geya sida lobeya taudi geya Yehoba 'ana tohemisao 'oidiyega .
64001008	Coinega 'ilobwainegita ma tauda talemedi , eema taudi mahetedao tahetopaihowa mahemahetena 'eda dumwadumwaluna weyahina .
64001009	Cami hemataluwa ya'etoladi pwaiyawa , 'omi tohekalesiyao , ma loheyaina sanina Diotilipi nuwanuwana ma taunamo 'ida loina , 'oinega taugu 'igu loina 'i'ausiya ,
64001010	ma 'igwae hesihesinuwegauwa , ma wete 'iyadao 'ilososomanediya , ma 'eguma tupwadi 'oimiyega nuwanuwadi ma silemedi 'i'ausidi , ma tohekalesiyaowedi 'ipa'ipa'idi . Coinega 'eguma 'abwa yalatuwa beno 'ina mumugaedi yahegwaegwae weyahidi .
64001011	Ciyagu , geya'abwa mumuga galana 'umulimuliye , ma mumuga 'ausalana hesi . Tobwebwe'anao taudi Yehoba 'ina bodao , ma topuiyao geya Yehoba sida sanapuya .
64001012	Ma Dimitilo tauna loheya bwebwe'ana . Tomota mabwaiyadi 'idi hepwaila gidemusa , weyahina taudi he'ita moisa 'ana tomuliyao sihehepwaila 'abehega Dimitilo loheya bwebwe'ana , ma taugu wete 'igu hepwaila gidemusa , ma 'igu hepwaila wasanapuya 'abehega gwae moisa .
64001013	Nuwatuhu baibaiwadi simiyamiya ma nuwanuwagu yaleleyawa weyahidi ,
